Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa jama'aare Isra'iila'en ɓe Amasiya wi'i ɓe kuuca ngam taa ɓe mballa mo nder haɓre, jama'aare man hippi gure Yahuuda diga Samariya haa yotti Baytihurun, mbari yimɓe ujine tato (3.000), kooci keɓal konu ɗuuɗŋgal.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi-biro nɛ̀ Amasia dora so ká nɛ́ biro in wi'i na tika zu o ye Juda, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ Samarii hɔ nɛnɛ Bɛt-Hɔrɔŋ; wa gbɛɛ bíí booro-taar, ɓɛɛ wa kai mɔɔ-oi-biro nɛ̀ dɔka-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi-biro nɛ̀ Amasia dora so ká nɛ́ biro in wi'i na tika zu o ye Juda, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ Samarii hɔ nɛnɛ Bɛt-Hɔrɔŋ; wa gbɛɛ bíí booro-taar, ɓɛɛ wa kai mɔɔ-oi-biro nɛ̀ dɔka-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama pa ka sewajɛa ka Israyɛl nyi zhɛnemte Amasiya kezha ɗema hɛ kadzawa mpa pesleyi geva mbe yɛ meleme ta ka Zhəwda nyi kwelɛ yɛ Samari le Bɛt-Horon. Pa hɛ mpəmte mbeli 3.000 ba'a fəhwe wəshi kwele kwele.
Tupurri: De sen ni, jar ma yoo sode maga Amatsiya hay nii ra go ga aà mo wo wo durgi wer se wa mono, kal wo dusgi go äi leege ma Juda wo, tï¡ï¡ wer le Samari ka' haçaç nduu go kañge Bet-Horon. AÀ ii wo jar ndar swa'a, day frum wo feçeçre pur debañ.

Francais: Après qu'Amasias fut revenu de battre les Edomites, il apporta les dieux des fils de Séir et, les ayant établis pour ses dieux, il se prosterna devant eux et leur offrit des parfums.
Anglais: Now it came to pass, after that Amaziah was come from the slaughter of the Edomites, that he brought the gods of the children of Seir, and set them up to be his gods, and bowed down himself before them, and burned incense unto them.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma Amatsiya hotay vo'o bugol kolda valam kay sa Edomna, nam mar lawayna vi gurona vi Seyir, nam muɗum ki lawayna valam nala; nam girif gaa vokomu, ŋalam urdina kaw.
Bulu: Eyoñ Amatsia a nga bulan a kooé na a maneya dañe bôte ya Edom, ane a nga soo bezambe yʼEdom a nyoñe be ane bezambe bé; a nga kute be meboñe si a diʼi be beôlobinda.
Guiziga: Ti Amasiya mimawa, a dirba naŋ mulum bugawla a hirnga Edomoy na, a hilo kuli ngi Edomoy a haŋ, a tiri taŋ kuli naŋhay, a huruk huruk a mbuŋ taŋ, a wura taŋ urdi.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde Amasiya jaali Edoomi'en, o hoori ɗowanteeɓe yimɓe Se'ir, o darni ɓe haa ɓe laato ɗowanteeɓe maako. O sujidani ɓe, o wulani ɓe uurle boo.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde Amasiya jaali Edoomi'en, o hoori ɗowanteeɓe yimɓe Se'ir, o darni ɓe haa ɓe laato ɗowanteeɓe maako. O sujidani ɓe, o wulani ɓe uurle boo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Amasia pia ɗoŋ nɛ̀ tɛ bíí o be Edɔm, a̧ kaia o géé-sɔ̧ ko o be Sɛir piinɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɗafi nɛ̀ sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧; a̧ gasa wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ dɔ fuu-nyama ha̧ wa mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Amasia pia ɗoŋ nɛ̀ tɛ bíí o be Edɔm, a̧ kaia o géé-sɔ̧ ko o be Sɛir piinɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɗafi nɛ̀ sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧; a̧ gasa wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ dɔ fuu-nyama ha̧ wa mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa zhɛneke geva Amasiya sheke kwamte mpa nya hərəte ka Ɛdom ŋkɛ ne, kəliɓə fəte wəshi nyi zhɛrete ka Ɛdom kashala, kaveyi hɛ kala yɛ shala ta ŋkɛ. Ntake kahawe va hɛ ba'a kadzeghe nda melɛ ke hɛ.
Tupurri: De maga Amatsiya fer le liñ blam maga se nii jar Edom wo mono, aà kal hoo baa mani weere jar Seyir wo le, day kal kol rage do baa äe wo nono. AÀ kal le' mondra pel äaara, kal roë feçeçre foçoçre no ne hara.

Francais: La colère de Yahweh s'enflamma contre Amasias, et il envoya vers lui un prophète, qui lui dit : "Pourquoi as-tu honoré les dieux de ce peuple, qui n'ont pu délivrer leur peuple de ta main?"
Anglais: Wherefore the anger of the  Lord  was kindled against Amaziah, and he sent unto him a prophet, which said unto him, Why hast thou sought after the gods of the people, which could not deliver their own people out of thine hand?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ki kayn nala Ma-Vatɗina muɗ ɦiya kat Amatsiya, nam gi sa ma jobta kep talamu, sa ma jobta dum ala: Naŋ kal gar lawayna vi sum nisina kay mige? Kay lawayna visiya may butsi goy hay ɓaŋɗi.
Bulu: Eyoñe te ayaa Zambe e nga yôñe Amatsia nyô, a a nga lôme nkulu mejô be nye a jô nye na: Amu jé ô nga beta ke nyoñe bezambe ya ayoñe bôte te éyoñ be nji kui na be nyii bôte bap e mo môé?
Guiziga: Akẽh na, Bumbulvuŋ a slikiɗ himaˀ ar Amasiya, a slinaŋ mijiviɗ, ɓa a ɓaŋ: «Mizli tayna, kuli taŋhay a tiɓaka taŋ tisi haŋ ɗike gu ta, na ki ɗuva hirnga da kuli tayna vur mike?»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jawmiraawo tikkani Amasiya, neli annabiijo haa maako, haa o wi'a mo: “Koni ɗakkotirɗa bee ɗowanteeɓe ɓe mbaawaay hisnugo yimɓe muuɗum'en hokkaaɓe haa juŋngo ma?”
Fulfulde_DC: Jawmiraawo tikkani Amasiya, neli annabiijo haa maako, haa o wi'a mo: “Koni ɗakkotirɗa bee ɗowanteeɓe ɓe mbaawaay hisnugo yimɓe muuɗum'en hokkaaɓe haa juŋngo ma?”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ mɔ‘i, see GASA WAN kura zu a̧, ɓɛɛ tom ŋma  wi-tɔ̧-wen  oi nú-wi mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ gasi o sɔ̧ nɛ̀ nyɛm so mɛ gbo o bíí kɔ-wa er mɛ na wen ge?»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ mɔ‘i, see GASA WAN kura zu a̧, ɓɛɛ tom ŋma  wi-tɔ̧-wen  oi nú-wi mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ gasi o sɔ̧ nɛ̀ nyɛm so mɛ gbo o bíí kɔ-wa er mɛ na wen ge?»
Kapsiki_DC: Mɓɛke Mahwətə hwepete wənə ve. Pa ghweneke kwete nde mɛ ŋkwa nya kegeze nda: «Wa raberə zhɛrave nda geva na ke shala nyi keshaŋe kambele mbelia nci shave mbe dzeve ta ŋa wa?»
Tupurri: Do kay nono, soçoçge äil mani Manwur kal do' wuu ne Amatsiya ti, aà kal äo' je ndar nen waçaçre ma jag Baa go le äiñ äe maga kal wiigi äe ga: Diñ wer may ga ndo fer kië baa mani jar sen wo, ga hay kaçaç wo ma yaçaç rage go do äo gaa mo la?

Francais: Comme il lui parlait, Amasias lui dit : "Est-ce que nous t'avons fait conseiller du roi? Retire-toi! Pourquoi te frapperait-on?" Le prophète se retira et dit : "Je sais que Dieu a résolu de te détruire, parce que tu as fait cela et que tu n'as pas écouté mon conseil."
Anglais: And it came to pass, as he talked with him, that the king said unto him, Art thou made of the king's counsel? forbear; why shouldest thou be smitten? Then the prophet forbare, and said, I know that God hath determined to destroy thee, because thou hast done this, and hast not hearkened unto my counsel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma nam ka lawa, Amatsiya di talamu: Numa tunaŋ kay vul gatta mi mulla lancitige? Baŋ vunaŋu. Naŋ min ala numa ma caŋu kay mige? Sa ma jobta vat vunam hiɗi dit ala: Nan wi ala varta vi Lawn coli vatiya kay ɓulakaŋ goyo, kay naŋ li slen kayni, may naŋ min hum gatta vanɗi.
Bulu: A ngenan a kobôʼô nde Amatsia a jô nye na: Ye bi nga telé wo ô bo môt a ve njô bôte mefek? Sukuʼu valé! Amu jé wo kômbô na be bôme wo? Nde nkulu mejô a nga mane nkobô a jôʼô na: Ma yeme na Zambe a tyiʼiya na a ye jiane wo, amu wo te bo jame te a amu ô nji kômbô wôʼô melebe mam.
Guiziga: Ti mijiviɗ mira ɓaŋ kanah tuwa na, Amasiya a slaŋ di, a ɓaŋ: «A cucukuw kaɓa ngi biga wuluk da ya buyo kwa? Ki ɓi hirdam hirdam ta, malla ki wuɗ kiɗ kwa?» Mijiviɗ a ɓi hirdam hirdam mata, amma a ɓaŋ: «Ka migi kahana, yo ka mitiɓa wuluk ɗu ta na, yi si na le, Buymisemuŋ a juwa le ɓa a kiɗuw vagay.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Saa'i o ɗon wolwa tawon, Amasiya wi'i mo: “Min mbaɗi ma dawranoowo laamiiɗo na? Accu! Malla a yiɗi mbareego?” Annabiijo acci felugo laamiiɗo, ammaa o wi'i: “Mi anndi Allah anniyi halkugo ma, ngam a waɗi ɗum, a nanaay wasuyeewol am boo.”
Fulfulde_DC: Saa'i o ɗon wolwa tawon, Amasiya wi'i mo: “Min mbaɗi ma dawranoowo laamiiɗo na? Accu! Malla a yiɗi mbareego?” Annabiijo acci felugo laamiiɗo, ammaa o wi'i: “Mi anndi Allah anniyi halkugo ma, ngam a waɗi ɗum, a nanaay wasuyeewol am boo.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ tɛ kaɗi tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen'i hɔ̧ɔ̧ na, ɓɛɛ Amasia gɔn wen nú-a tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «Nɛ́ o a̧ ee mɛ nɛ wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ ha̧ wannu o? Kà mɛ nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ha'i mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ in mɛɛ na, mɛ̀ kpé nú mɛ tɛ wen'i!»   Wi-tɔ̧-wen  oi nú Sɔ̧ gɔna wen kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Mi iŋa'e, Sɔ̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ gbɛ mɛ, wen nɛ̀ mɛ bɛ̧ɛ̧ zia wen kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ mɛ de mɔ hegɔ!»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ tɛ kaɗi tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen'i hɔ̧ɔ̧ na, ɓɛɛ Amasia gɔn wen nú-a tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «Nɛ́ o a̧ ee mɛ nɛ wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ ha̧ wannu o? Kà mɛ nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ha'i mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ in mɛɛ na, mɛ̀ kpé nú mɛ tɛ wen'i!»   Wi-tɔ̧-wen  oi nú Sɔ̧ gɔna wen kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Mi iŋa'e, Sɔ̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ gbɛ mɛ, wen nɛ̀ mɛ bɛ̧ɛ̧ zia wen kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ mɛ de mɔ hegɔ!»
Kapsiki_DC: Hatse meghe slamte nda ghena kwa mɛ, ma ke 'yɛwete ve: «Nahe 'ya kentave ŋa kande ncɛ nda ntsehwele ke meghe na? Zhɛnema ghə na keɗema na kaɗe kapesle ŋa mbeli ma.» Tikə tikə nde mɛ ŋkwa, ama ma ke: «Nahe 'ya keɗepe Shala nde tarete kapesle ŋa, kwa menete wəsə nya kala nya ba'a kwa ɗema na kefate ghena ta ɗa.»
Tupurri: De maga aà ti waçaçre mono Amatsiya kal wiigi äe ga: Wuur de kañ moge diñ je bag yañ ne wañ yawla? Äo' jag äe go! Diñ wer may ga ndo de dage ga äum ndo la? Je ndar nen waçaçre ma jag Baa gon kal äo' jag äe go diñ de waçaçge ga: Ndi de koge ga Baa go de baa jag see äe ga se älag ndo go, werga ndo laa baage yañ äin gaa mono.

Francais: Après avoir pris avis, Amasias, roi de Juda, envoya dire à Joas, fils de Joachaz, fils de Jéhu, roi d'Israël : "Viens, et voyons-nous en face!" Et Joas, roi d'Israël, envoya répondre à Amasias, roi de Juda :
Anglais: Then Amaziah king of Judah took advice, and sent to Joash, the son of Jehoahaz, the son of Jehu, king of Israel, saying, Come, let us see one another in the face.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugolda hay li ma Amatsiya mulla vi Yuda job sa falamna jobna, nam gi sunda tam Yowas, goora vi Yowahaz, goora vi Yehu mulla vi Israyel ala: Naŋaya, nay duray tuwaya.
Bulu: Eyoñ a maneya bo ékôan, Amatsia, njô bôte ya Yuda, a nga lôme bôt be kate Yôas, e mone Yoakaz, e mone Yéhu, njô bôte yʼIsraél na: Zaʼak, bia wo bia ye tômetan!
Guiziga: Amasiya, buy Zuda, a wuluk wuluk mekelem, a slin ng'avu Zoˀas, buy Israyel, mangal ngi Zoˀahas, i dideˀ ngi Zehu, ɓa a ɓakaŋ na: «Sawa i zliram dibiɗ ati ka!»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Amasiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda sarwotiri bee yimɓe mum. Nden o neli nelaaɓe haa Yo'as ɓii Yo'ahas ɓii Yeehu, laamiiɗo Isra'iila, ɓe mbi'a mo: “War potten, kaɓen!”
Fulfulde_DC: Amasiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda sarwotiri bee yimɓe mum. Nden o neli nelaaɓe haa Yo'as ɓii Yo'ahas ɓii Yeehu, laamiiɗo Isra'iila, ɓe mbi'a mo: “War potten, kaɓen!”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Amasia zia nɛ́ o ŋma mbɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ tom mɔ si zu Jɔas wannu  Israɛl , bem ko Jɔakas bezaŋ Jɛhu hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mɛ̀ tɛ́, ɛ̀ɛ̀ bí ŋmaa.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Amasia zia nɛ́ o ŋma mbɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ tom mɔ si zu Jɔas wannu  Israɛl , bem ko Jɔakas bezaŋ Jɛhu hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mɛ̀ tɛ́, ɛ̀ɛ̀ bí ŋmaa.»
Kapsiki_DC: Za ma kweci ntsehwele yaɗehwe Amasiya, meghea ka Zhəwda, pa ghwenakɛ nda mɛ ke meghea ka Israyɛl Zhowas, wəzege ta Zhowakaz ba'a shia Zhɛhə. Ma ke shɛ: «Nde kabegemete geva mə kwa mpa!»
Tupurri: Blam maga Amatsiya joñ nen laa baage yañ ma tigriñ laa mono, aà kal laa jar wo wii Jowas je ni Yowahas no, je ni Jehu, wañ Israyel ga: AÀ le, naa joñ nen yiñ kaçaçra ëa!

Francais: "L'épine qui est au Liban envoya dire au cèdre qui est au Liban: Donne ta fille pour femme à mon fils. Et les bêtes sauvages qui sont au Liban passèrent et foulèrent l'épine.
Anglais: And Joash king of Israel sent to Amaziah king of Judah, saying, The thistle that was in Lebanon sent to the cedar that was in Lebanon, saying, Give thy daughter to my son to wife: and there passed by a wild beast that was in Lebanon, and trode down the thistle.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yowas mulla vi Israyel, gi sunda tam Amatsiya, mulla vi Yuda ala: Gu-cocona vi Libaŋ gi sunda tam gu-gamna vi Libaŋ ala: Vul goota vaŋ ca'a mi goora vanu. May muuriya ma fulla hay Libaŋ jik kay gu-cocona, nam tayam gaa'a.
Bulu: Eyoñe te Yôas, njô bôte ya Israél nye fe a lôme bôt be kate Amatsia njô bôte ya Yuda na: Ndôé ya Libañ é nga lôme sédre ya Libañ tyiñe na: Vaʼa mone wom ngo jôé a luʼu je! Ve betite ya fé be ne Libañ be nga lôt a mane tibi ndôé.
Guiziga: Zoˀas, buy Israyel, a slin ɓa a ɓaka Amasiya, buy Zuda na: «Titif ngi Libaŋ, a slin ɓa ara ɓaka miter ngi Libaŋ na: ‹Vuliy zuŋ ɗike ngi ngwas da mangal ɗu.› Amma gwat misãmi ngi ɓuh, a cuh baɗ ar titif tuwa, a kurupaŋ kirap kirap.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yo'as, laamiiɗo Isra'iila neli haa Amasiya laamiiɗo Yahuuda, wi'ugo mo: “Wumre gi'e Libanon neli haa lekki cemmbiɗki Libanon, wi'ugo: Accu ɓiyam gorko te'a ɓiya debbo. Ammaa ndabbaawa ladde ngonŋga haa Libanon saali ton, dammi wumre gi'e.
Fulfulde_DC: Yo'as, laamiiɗo Isra'iila neli haa Amasiya laamiiɗo Yahuuda, wi'ugo mo: “Wumre gi'e Libanon neli haa lekki cemmbiɗki Libanon, wi'ugo: Accu ɓiyam gorko te'a ɓiya debbo. Ammaa ndabbaawa ladde ngonŋga haa Libanon saali ton, dammi wumre gi'e.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jɔas wannu  Israɛl  kifa nú ɓɛɛ tom si zu Amasia, wannu Juda mbɛt hegɔ: «Tɛn-ga̧a̧ Libaŋ toma ha̧  gbatui  Libaŋ‘e: ‹Mɛ̀ há̧ boko-bem kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ kóò ha̧ bem kɔ‘m!› Ɓɛɛ ŋma saɗi zaŋbɛɛ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ Libaŋ ɓir yak hi̧i̧, i̧si̧ tɛn-ga̧a̧‘i e nù.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jɔas wannu  Israɛl  kifa nú ɓɛɛ tom si zu Amasia, wannu Juda mbɛt hegɔ: «Tɛn-ga̧a̧ Libaŋ toma ha̧  gbatui  Libaŋ‘e: ‹Mɛ̀ há̧ boko-bem kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ kóò ha̧ bem kɔ‘m!› Ɓɛɛ ŋma saɗi zaŋbɛɛ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ Libaŋ ɓir yak hi̧i̧, i̧si̧ tɛn-ga̧a̧‘i e nù.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Zhowas zhɛnete nda ke Amasiya: «Pa kwete wəfe katigə pelɛ ghweme ta Liban vəashi 'yɛwakɛ wəzha ta lekelekea Liban kezha wəme nda ŋkɛ ke wəzege ta ŋkɛ. Ama pa kwete wəsə keseɗa nya hwa gamba se kaŋkeɗemte wəfea shɛ.»
Tupurri: Jowas wañ Israyel kal laa jar le wii Amatsiya wañ Juda ga: Yoo hoçoçre ma Liban laa jar wo wii Sedre ma Liban ga: Haç may mani äon ne je ni äin waçy! Ama naèy ma yoo koo maga wo Liban ni kal wo heege kal wo dag yoo hoçoçre go.

Francais: Tu te dis : Voici que tu as battu les Edomites, et ton coeur te porte à te glorifier. Maintenant, reste chez toi ! Pourquoi t'engager dans le malheur, pour tomber, toi et Juda avec toi?"
Anglais: Thou sayest, Lo, thou hast smitten the Edomites; and thine heart lifteth thee up to boast: abide now at home; why shouldest thou meddle to thine hurt, that thou shouldest fall, even thou, and Judah with thee?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Naŋ kolawa kay sa Edomna naŋ di nala, dikaŋ fok kulo'o, naŋ subur tuwaŋu kaw. Wulin kayni musaŋ hay ziyna vaŋu. Naŋ kal tuwaŋ vun duur ma laŋ joon ɗaw kay mige? Naŋ ma mita, jafna vi Yuda hiɗi naŋ kaw.
Bulu: Ô nga bôé bʼEdomite, nalé wo jô, ajô nleme wôé wo bo mebun a wo ve womiene duma. Eyoñe ji tabeʼe ñhe si jale dôé. Amu jé wo kômbô futi womien e jam da suʼulane wo abé ? Wo ye ku mia Yuda nsamba.
Guiziga: Ko mbri na, ki ra ɓi ti kwacay ɗike, ki pa hirnga le da Edomo. Ki ra jijih di a mevel ɗike, yo ki ra huhum di vu. Amma zuwen ka macifi a hay ɗiki! Vurum masa kiɗ mi ti malambaˀ, yo masa kiɗukuw anga jom ati Zudahay na, ki zla ɓi naŋ ngi mike?»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Gooŋga, a jaali Edoom, kanjum ɓernde ma mawniti, a teddini hoore ma! Jonta kam, jooɗa haa saare ma. Koni ngiɗɗa fooɗango hoore ma sarru haa ndo'oɗa, an e Yahuuda fuu?”
Fulfulde_DC: Gooŋga, a jaali Edoom, kanjum ɓernde ma mawniti, a teddini hoore ma! Jonta kam, jooɗa haa saare ma. Koni ngiɗɗa fooɗango hoore ma sarru haa ndo'oɗa, an e Yahuuda fuu?”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɛ‘e ndé, wi gana o be Edɔm, ɓɛɛ mɛ ŋmaŋ nɛ tɛ-mɛ zɔn nɛ̀ tɛ-mɛ. Mɔ kpɔk, gana so mɛ̀ dúk tɛ kɔ-mɛ! Wen ge mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ye gee tum biro ha̧ mɛ mɛ fe in o be Juda lɛŋ ge?»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɛ‘e ndé, wi gana o be Edɔm, ɓɛɛ mɛ ŋmaŋ nɛ tɛ-mɛ zɔn nɛ̀ tɛ-mɛ. Mɔ kpɔk, gana so mɛ̀ dúk tɛ kɔ-mɛ! Wen ge mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ye gee tum biro ha̧ mɛ mɛ fe in o be Juda lɛŋ ge?»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Zhowas ɓiyitsa: «Gha kamene fege va nya ɗate ka Ɛdom na na. Fare fare wənəa ŋa te, ama nde kele ghə na gəmə! Megela ma nza ŋa na divə te hɛɗia ŋa! Wa raberə ɗe na kagha mpa nya ketekele ŋa wəsə kwa ndiremi ba'a nya tehərə ŋa ba'a pɛtɛa ka sewajɛa ka Zhəwda mbeli hwe wa?»
Tupurri: Ndo hay äum jar Edom wo, ndo waçaç sen de äil äo na nono day ndo kal le' mañ ti see äo ciñ togoë see äo. Hay wo patala ni äo ni. Diñ wer may ga ndo joñ nen mañ gaali ma se ti'n de coocoon ti äo la? Ndo le' ge day sen diñ de jar Juda wo äuy.

Francais: Mais Amasias ne l'écouta pas car ce fut d'après la volonté de Dieu qu'il fit cette guerre, afin de livrer les hommes de Juda entre les mains de l'ennemi, parce qu'ils avaient honoré les dieux d'Edom.
Anglais: But Amaziah would not hear; for it came of God, that he might deliver them into the hand of their enemies, because they sought after the gods of Edom.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May Amatsiya min humumɗi, kay kayni may goy vi Lawna pa, kay nam ma vulis goy hay ɓam sa ma gawta, kay mige nam gar lawayna vi Edom.
Bulu: Ve Amatsia a nji wôʼô nye, amu jame te e nga so be Zambe, nalé ba ye veban e mo besiñ. Amu be nga ke nyoñe bezambe yʼEdom.
Guiziga: Amma ko Amasiya a cinaŋ di ta, asi mike na, ɓi nah a so ti vu Buymisemuŋ, a wuɗ ɓa a vula Amasiya ati soje naŋhay asi haŋ ngi mesene taŋhay, vur taŋ mihuruk hurukam a mbuŋ kuli ngi Edomoy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa Amasiya faalaay bolle ɗe'e ngam ɗum iwi haa Allah mo muuyi hokkugo Yahuudu'en haa juŋngo Yo'as, ngam ɓe ɗakkotiri bee ɗowanteeɓe Edoomi'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa Amasiya faalaay bolle ɗe'e ngam ɗum iwi haa Allah mo muuyi hokkugo Yahuudu'en haa juŋngo Yo'as, ngam ɓe ɗakkotiri bee ɗowanteeɓe Edoomi'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Amasia zii wen kɔ̧-a̧ na, wen mɔ‘i tɛ nɛ̀ tɛ Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ fo a̧ in o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ pi̧ er wi nɔ‘i, wen zu gasa o géé-sɔ̧ ko o be Edɔm nɛ̀ wa gasa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Amasia zii wen kɔ̧-a̧ na, wen mɔ‘i tɛ nɛ̀ tɛ Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ fo a̧ in o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ pi̧ er wi nɔ‘i, wen zu gasa o géé-sɔ̧ ko o be Edɔm nɛ̀ wa gasa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama kese Amasiya kave ghə te ghena shɛ we. Kwa ɗe Shala kazamte yɛ Amasiya le ka sewajɛa ŋkɛ, va nya zhɛrave nda geva hɛ ke yɛ shala ta ka Ɛdom.
Tupurri: Ama Amatsiya joñ nen co' sug äe gaa, werga sen hay nduu le diñ se Baa maga aè mo haçn go ne jar hee äen wo äi coo do, diñ werga aà hay raw kië baa mani jar Edom wo.

Francais: Et Joas, roi d'Israël, monta, et ils se virent en face, lui et Amasias, roi de Juda, à Bethsamès, qui est à Juda.
Anglais: So Joash the king of Israel went up; and they saw one another in the face, both he and Amaziah king of Judah, at Beth–shemesh, which belongeth to Judah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ki kayn nala Yowas mulla vi Israyel fokay kulo'o kir Amatsiya mulla vi Yuda. Nisi dur tuwsiya hay Bet-Semes ta vi Yuda.
Bulu: Ane Yôas, njô bôte yʼIsraél a nga bet; nde be nga tômetan ba Amatsia, njô bôte ya Yuda e Bétsemék ya Yuda.
Guiziga: Zoˀas, buy Israyele, a bi, ara zliram dibiɗ ati Amasiya, buy Zuda, a Bet-Semes, hirwuy Zuda.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Yo'as, laamiiɗo Isra'iila wari, fotti bee Amasiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda, ɓe kaɓi haa Bayti-Semes nder maral Yahuuda.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Yo'as, laamiiɗo Isra'iila wari, fotti bee Amasiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda, ɓe kaɓi haa Bayti-Semes nder maral Yahuuda.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jɔas wannu  Israɛl  daŋa, ɓɛɛ o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ in ko Amasia ba biro dúk nɛ̀ ŋmaa sɛn Bɛt-Sɛmɛs nù Juda.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jɔas wannu  Israɛl  daŋa, ɓɛɛ o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ in ko Amasia ba biro dúk nɛ̀ ŋmaa sɛn Bɛt-Sɛmɛs nù Juda.
Kapsiki_DC: Cape Zhowas, meghea ka Israyɛl kadzemte mpa. Begeme ka sewajɛa ŋkɛ le ŋa Amasiya kwa mpa mbe Bɛt-Shɛmɛsh te hɛɗia Zhəwda.
Tupurri: Do kay nono Jowas wañ Israyel kal mbe rawge. AÀ kal wo yiñ kaçaçra de Amatsiya wañ Juda Bet-Semes maga diñ ma Juda mono.

Francais: Juda fut battu devant Israël, et chacun s'enfuit dans sa tente.
Anglais: And Judah was put to the worse before Israel, and they fled every man to his tent.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Israyel kol kay Yuda, gigekaw pir jaŋi hay guɗukŋa valamu valamu.
Bulu: Ane Israél a nga bôme Yuda, a môt ase a nga tup e nda éndelé jé.
Guiziga: Israyeley a kiɗaka Zudahaya, dar soje Zudahaya a kilam, mbur gar ngi hay naŋ ngi hay naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Isra'iila jaali Yahuuda, yimɓe Yahuuda ndoggi, koo moy haa saare mum.
Fulfulde_DC: Isra'iila jaali Yahuuda, yimɓe Yahuuda ndoggi, koo moy haa saare mum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa bìí ŋmaa ɓɛɛ o wi-biro ko Jɔas wannu  Israɛl  gbin biro ti o wi-biro ko Juda. Hegɔ o wi-biro Juda pɛsa, kóó o ndé ma yi si tɛ kɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa bìí ŋmaa ɓɛɛ o wi-biro ko Jɔas wannu  Israɛl  gbin biro ti o wi-biro ko Juda. Hegɔ o wi-biro Juda pɛsa, kóó o ndé ma yi si tɛ kɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ka sewajɛa ka Israyɛl ɗate ka sewajɛa ka Zhəwda, kweracɛ ka sewajɛa ka Zhəwda hwɛnji kalə sha ghɛa nci.
Tupurri: Jar Israyel kal wo äum jar Juda wo, day wosela kal dañge de ëe äi mburyug äe.

Francais: Et Joas, roi d'Israël, prit à Bethsamès Amasias, roi de Juda, fils de Joas, fils de Joachaz. Il l'emmena à Jérusalem, et il fit une brèche de quatre cents coudées dans la muraille de Jérusalem, depuis la porte d'Ephraïm jusqu'à la porte de l'angle.
Anglais: And Joash the king of Israel took Amaziah king of Judah, the son of Joash, the son of Jehoahaz, at Beth–shemesh, and brought him to Jerusalem, and brake down the wall of Jerusalem from the gate of Ephraim to the corner gate, four hundred cubits.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Amatsiya mulla vi Yuda goora vi Yowas, goora vi Yowahaz, Yowas mulla vi Israyel vum daŋgaya hay Bet-Semes. Nam kalam hay Yerusalem, nam co baŋana ir goldoŋ kis-fiɗi hay gulmunna vi Yerusalem, tun caway tam vun-galana vi Efrayim pa ta-ta tam vun-galana ma ŋuy goyna.
Bulu: Yôas njô bôte ya Israél, a nga bi Amatsia, njô bôte ya Yuda, e mone Yôas, e mone Yoakaz mbôk e Bétsemék. A nga kee nye e Yérusalém, nde a nga sale mfine ya Yérusalém tañe méta mintete mibaé, ataté mbé yʼEfrayim, a kui mbé ya Akot.
Guiziga: Amasiya, buy Zuda, mangal ngi Zoˀas, dideˀ ngi Ahaziya, Zoˀas, buy Israyele, a jaŋ ng'ar beke, aru di nga Zeruzalem. Zoˀas a wuh avu mohol ngi Zeruzaleme gwat ngi metir skat skat cuw, zle a mizlingre Efrayime, hã a mizlingre zlirɗi ngi mohol.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yo'as laamiiɗo Isra'iila naŋngi Amasiya ɓii Yo'as ɓii Yo'ahas haa Bayti-Semes, nden o yahri mo haa Urusaliima. O sumpiti mahol Urusaliima, diga Dammugal Efrayim haa Dammugal Toldu , baakin meetir teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi.
Fulfulde_DC: Yo'as laamiiɗo Isra'iila naŋngi Amasiya ɓii Yo'as ɓii Yo'ahas haa Bayti-Semes, nden o yahri mo haa Urusaliima. O sumpiti mahol Urusaliima, diga Dammugal Efrayim haa Dammugal Toldu , baakin meetir teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jɔas wannu  Israɛl  baa Amasia wannu Juda, bem ko Jɔas, be-koo Ahazia nɛ̀ bara-biro sɛn hi̧i̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba a̧ pii ɗoŋ sɛn Jerusalɛm. A̧ tɛɛ gbin garo ye Jerusalɛm a nù, nyɛi̧a ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ mɛtrɛ gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ nú garo ko Efraim hɔ nɛnɛ nú garo mɛ mgbii-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jɔas wannu  Israɛl  baa Amasia wannu Juda, bem ko Jɔas, be-koo Ahazia nɛ̀ bara-biro sɛn hi̧i̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba a̧ pii ɗoŋ sɛn Jerusalɛm. A̧ tɛɛ gbin garo ye Jerusalɛm a nù, nyɛi̧a ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ mɛtrɛ gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ nú garo ko Efraim hɔ nɛnɛ nú garo mɛ mgbii-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Zhowas, meghea ka Israyɛl keseve Amasiya meghea ka Zhəwda, wəzege ta Zhowas ba'a shia Ahaziya kamava kwa Bɛt-Shɛmɛsh. Se tagha, pa keleghe kadzembe Zhɛrəzalɛm ba'a pa ŋzlamte zli nya yitea meleme gare mɛtre gwəmsə bake biya ta ŋkɛ kadzeyi ŋwela, nya kwelɛ peləa Ɛfrayim le peləa nya te megwekwe ta zli.
Tupurri: Jowas wañ Israyel kal baa Amatsiya wañ Juda, je ni Jowas no, je ni Yowahasn ti dañgay Bet-Semese. AÀ kal rawge de äe Jerusalem, kal caa ywaale wo go see kor ma Jerusalemn nen meder kiskis äog no kay, tï¡ï¡ wer jag tiñ Efrayimn ka' haçaç nduu go jag tiñ ma de her coçoç no.

Francais: Il prit tout l'or et l'argent et tous les ustensiles qui se trouvaient dans la maison de Dieu, chez Obédédom, et les trésors de la maison du roi ; il prit aussi des otages, et retourna à Samarie.
Anglais: And he took all the gold and the silver, and all the vessels that were found in the house of God with Obed–edom, and the treasures of the king's house, the hostages also, and returned to Samaria.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam yaw ora hiɗi doorota kaf, hiɗi slen kaf ma ka hay ziyna vi Lawna, hay ziyna vi Obed-Edom, hiɗi timgilla ma ka hay ziyna vi mulla; nam yaw sum sara daŋgaya kaw, bugolda nam hotay hay Samariya.
Bulu: A nga nyoñe or ase a argent a biôm bise bi nga too e Nda Zambe, e nda Obéd-Edom, a mefoʼo mese ya nda njô bôt; a nga bi fe minkôm a bulane Samari.
Guiziga: A hila ɓiri tapasl tapasl ati ɓiri bara gar, waɗ gwatay misi ar hay ngi Buymisemuŋ gar, Obet-Edom majigina taŋ, zlili ngi hay buyo waɗ a ji mizli ngi mbiɗi hirnga taŋ ti mbiɗi, a mi nga Samari.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O hooci kaŋŋeeri e cardi e kuuje marɗe saman gonɗe nder haykaliiru Allah les aynol Obet-Edoom, non boo ndesaaje saare laamu fuu. O hooci boo naŋngaaɓe, o lorti haa Samariya.
Fulfulde_DC: O hooci kaŋŋeeri e cardi e kuuje marɗe saman gonɗe nder haykaliiru Allah les aynol Obet-Edoom, non boo ndesaaje saare laamu fuu. O hooci boo naŋngaaɓe, o lorti haa Samariya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ kaia lɔr in o bu-mbɔi ká bá nɛ̀ o mɔ nɛ̀ yaa so sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ Obɛd-Edɔm duka so pɛm, o mbɔi-tua ko wannu in o ŋma bíí, ɓɛɛ a̧ si sɛn Samarii.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ kaia lɔr in o bu-mbɔi ká bá nɛ̀ o mɔ nɛ̀ yaa so sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ Obɛd-Edɔm duka so pɛm, o mbɔi-tua ko wannu in o ŋma bíí, ɓɛɛ a̧ si sɛn Samarii.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa fəhwe mze kwa tere tere, mze gheme ba'a kweci wəshi nyi ndeɗe ndeɗe mbe ghɛa Shala, nya ya Obɛd-Ɛdom ba'a nyi ki ghɛa meghe. Pa ŋkɛ keseve ka mavashi ɓiyitsa, tewətelɛwe ŋkɛ zhɛneke geva kadzembe Samari.
Tupurri: AÀ kal hoo boo biñnin wo de boo solayn äuy, de feçeçre maga hay wo äi tiñ mani Baan ni mo äuy, ni Obed-Edom mono, de horog ma liñ ni wañn wo äuy. AÀ kal hoo jar dañgay ni lay, blam äe kal ferge Samari.

Francais: Amasias, fils de Joas, roi de Juda, vécut quinze ans après la mort de Joas, fils de Joachaz, roi d'Israël.
Anglais: And Amaziah the son of Joash king of Judah lived after the death of Joash son of Jehoahaz king of Israel fifteen years.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Amatsiya goora vi Yowas, mulla vi Yuda, mus iri busat doogo yam vasl bugol mitta vi Yowas, goora vi Yowahaz, mulla vi Israyel.
Bulu: Amatsia e mone Yôas, njô bôte ya Yuda, a nga nyiñ mimbu awôm a mitan mvus awu Yôas e mone Yoakaz, njô bôte ya Israél.
Guiziga: Zoˀas, buy Israyel, mangal ngi Zoˀakas mumuc na, a dirba nah, Amasiya, buy Zuda, a gi ar siifa vi kuruˀ nga zlum.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa ɓaawo maayde Yo'as ɓii Yo'ahas, laamiiɗo Isra'iila, Amasiya ɓii Yo'as, laamiiɗo Yahuuda tokki yeeɗugo duuɓi sappo e jowi.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa ɓaawo maayde Yo'as ɓii Yo'ahas, laamiiɗo Isra'iila, Amasiya ɓii Yo'as, laamiiɗo Yahuuda tokki yeeɗugo duuɓi sappo e jowi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Amasia bem ko Jɔas wannu Juda duka zaŋnu pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ woyo ɗoŋ fio ko Jɔas bem ko Jɔakas, wannu  Israɛl .
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Amasia bem ko Jɔas wannu Juda duka zaŋnu pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ woyo ɗoŋ fio ko Jɔas bem ko Jɔakas, wannu  Israɛl .
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa sebe ta mte ta Zhowas, wəzege ta Zhowakaz ba'a meghea ka Israyɛl ne, pa Amasiya meghea ka Zhəwda menete va meŋe mcɛfeghəmbe.
Tupurri: Amatsiya je ni Jowas no, wañ Juda, joñ kiñgi hwal ti dwee caw blam Jowas je ni Yowahas wañ Israyel no.

Francais: Le reste des actes, d'Amasias, les premiers et les derniers, cela n'est-il pas écrit dans le livre des rois de Juda et d'Israël?
Anglais: Now the rest of the acts of Amaziah, first and last, behold, are they not written in the book of the kings of Judah and Israel?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Caw lopna vi Amatsiya ma hinina, ma jewna hiɗi ma cawna, kayni ka ɗoy hay ɗerwelda vi muliyana vi Yuda hiɗi Israyel.
Bulu: Mimboon mi Amatsia mivok, mi ya atataʼa a mi ya asuʼulan, mi ne ntilan e kalate bejô bôte ya Yuda a Israél.
Guiziga: Is ngi slra ngi Amasiya, zle angi ɗuva virzi naŋ hã avu kiɗa mi naŋ na, i mutoho taŋ le angi ɗerewol ngi buy Zudahay ati Israyeleye,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Luttuɗum haala Amasiya, diga fuɗɗoode haa timmoode, ɗum winndaama nder Deftere Laamiiɓe Yahuuda e Isra'iila.
Fulfulde_DC: Luttuɗum haala Amasiya, diga fuɗɗoode haa timmoode, ɗum winndaama nder Deftere Laamiiɓe Yahuuda e Isra'iila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Oi o tom ko Amasia tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ-a hɔ sɔŋkur-aa yɔra zaŋ Kalata ko o wannu Juda in  Israɛl .
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Oi o tom ko Amasia tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ-a hɔ sɔŋkur-aa yɔra zaŋ Kalata ko o wannu Juda in  Israɛl .
Kapsiki_DC: Ma nyi ketene ghena ta Amasiya se te kwa ghate pa te kwa keɗaŋe ne, nahe hɛ kenza kerafe rafe mbe palepa ta slene nyi menete ka meghea ka Zhəwda ba'a ŋa ka Israyɛl.
Tupurri: Te joñre Amatsiya no, ma tañgun wo de ma blam taw wo no, sen wo de yerge äil kefder wañre ma Judan wo de ma Israyel no.

Francais: Après qu'Amasias se fut détourné de Yahweh, on ourdit contre lui une conspiration à Jérusalem, et il s'enfuit à Lachis ; mais on envoya après lui des hommes à Lachis, et on l'y mit à mort.
Anglais: Now after the time that Amaziah did turn away from following the  Lord  they made a conspiracy against him in Jerusalem; and he fled to Lachish: but they sent to Lachish after him, and slew him there.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma Amatsiya ja jaram goy hiɗi Ma-Vatɗin jana, nisi fok lawt kalamu hay Yerusalem, nam pir hay Lakis; nisi jaŋ kuɗumu hay Lakis; ɗawni nisi cum goyo.
Bulu: Eyoñ Amatsia a liʼiya Nti, be nga bôndé feʼe ya wôé nye Yérusalém, nde a nga tup a ke Lakis; ve be nga tôñe nye Lakis e vôm be nga wôé nye.
Guiziga: zle ti hin ngi Amasiya mupula sipa Bumbulvuŋ. Mizli a gam gidiɓi ar Amasiya a Zeruzaleme, a kil nga Lakis. Amma a slinam mizli, a sipakaŋ nga Lakise, a kiɗaka a diga vagay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Diga Amasiya acci tokkaago Jawmiraawo, ɓe tuurtani mo haa Urusaliima. O doggi haa Lakis. Ammaa ɓe neli ɗaɓɓitoygo mo haa Lakis, ɓe tawi mo, ɓe mbari mo ton.
Fulfulde_DC: Diga Amasiya acci tokkaago Jawmiraawo, ɓe tuurtani mo haa Urusaliima. O doggi haa Lakis. Ammaa ɓe neli ɗaɓɓitoygo mo haa Lakis, ɓe tawi mo, ɓe mbari mo ton.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Amasia ee nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ́ ɗoŋ GASA WAN duk, wa baa ɗaŋ keta zu a̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ a̧ yu mɔ yak si Lakis. Wa toma o bíí ndak ɗoŋ-aa si Lakis, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ a̧ hi̧i̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Amasia ee nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ́ ɗoŋ GASA WAN duk, wa baa ɗaŋ keta zu a̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ a̧ yu mɔ yak si Lakis. Wa toma o bíí ndak ɗoŋ-aa si Lakis, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ a̧ hi̧i̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma se te və nya zhɛrave nda wəmbə Amasiya ke Mahwətə, ntake mbeli katsa ghena kadzeyite mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm. Ma te kwete hɛ ne, pa hwɛnyɛ kadzembe Lakish, ama pa mbeli kekave ŋkɛ ba'a peslekɛ ŋkɛ te ŋkwa shɛ.
Tupurri: Blam maga Amatsiya joñ nen celge go see Manwur mono, aè kal mañ äaale äe Jerusalem, aà kal dañge wo go Likisi. AÀ kal baa blam äe wo go Lakis ni, ti ngeel maga aè 'warn wo go ni.

Francais: On le transporta sur des chevaux, et on l'enterra avec ses pères dans la ville de Juda.
Anglais: And they brought him upon horses, and buried him with his fathers in the city of Judah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi ziyimu hay kulumayna, nisi pum kat sumiyamu hay hoyok-ziyna vi Yuda.
Bulu: Be nga beʼe nye e bikabela yôp a jame nye ba bʼésaa e tisone ya Yuda.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, a zuɓaka vagay naŋ ti pilisey, ara dikaka angi zivi ngi dideˀ naŋhay ar walahay ngi ruwuy Zuda.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe njahri ɓanndu maako bee pucci, ɓe uwi mo baŋnge kaakiraaɓe maako haa berniwol Yahuuda.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe njahri ɓanndu maako bee pucci, ɓe uwi mo baŋnge kaakiraaɓe maako haa berniwol Yahuuda.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa baa wɔr-aa nɛ̀ keekee-nyaŋa nɛ́ɛ̀ gun in o dáà kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn tɛ ŋma ye nù Juda.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa baa wɔr-aa nɛ̀ keekee-nyaŋa nɛ́ɛ̀ gun in o dáà kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn tɛ ŋma ye nù Juda.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ ne, pa mbeli keleke wəndə kemte mtea ŋkɛ kadzembe Zhɛrəzalɛm kwa wəmata gədəwə nya ntsehe gədəwə kwele kwele, pa mbeli lamte ŋkɛ kwa kwele ta ka shihɛnyɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ kal mañge äe ti piiri wo, day aè kal teege äe see paçaçre äe wo äi leege mani Dafid no.

Francais: Tout le peuple de Juda prit Ozias, qui était âgé de seize ans ; et on l'établit roi à la place de son père, Amasias.
Anglais: Then all the people of Judah took Uzziah, who was sixteen years old, and made him king in the room of his father Amaziah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa Yudan kaf vi Oziyas, busata valam doogo yam karkiya, nisi tunum mulu hay baŋal bulum Amatsiya.
Bulu: Ane bôte bese ya Yuda be nga nyoñ Ozias, a too mimbu awôm a misaman, a telé nye njô bôt éjian ésaa wé Amatsia.
Guiziga: Mizli Zudahay gar, a zuɓaka Oziyasa, naɓa naŋ ti vi kuruˀ nga merkeɗe, a cakaŋ buy ar li ngi cine naŋ Amasiya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ummaatoore Yahuuda fuu laamini Uzziya haa pellel baaba mum Amasiya. Saa'i man Uzziya woodi duuɓi sappo e joweego.
Fulfulde_DC: Ummaatoore Yahuuda fuu laamini Uzziya haa pellel baaba mum Amasiya. Saa'i man Uzziya woodi duuɓi sappo e joweego.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O dukbíí Juda baa Ozias nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk pi̧ tɛ wan oi dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Amasia.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O dukbíí Juda baa Ozias nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk pi̧ tɛ wan oi dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Amasia.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma Oziyas, wəzege ta Amasiya ne, va ta ŋkɛ meŋe ŋkwaŋeghəmbe nda ntave ka Zhəwda kaveyi kameghe te ŋkwa yitenyɛ.
Tupurri: Jar Juda wo äuy kal wo baa Osiyas, maga kiñgi äe hay hwal ti hiira' mono, kal wo kañge äe wañ ti ngeel pan äe Amatsiya.

Francais: Ozias rebâtit Elath et la ramena à Juda, après que le roi fut couché avec ses pères.
Anglais: He built Eloth, and restored it to Judah, after that the king slept with his fathers.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam hot in Eliyot kulo'o, hota'ay gaa kuɗ gaŋeraŋa vi Yuda; kayni bugol mitta vi bulumu.
Bulu: Nye a nga bo na, éyoñ ésaa wé a wuya, a nga beta nyoñe tison Elat a lôñe je mfefé nlôñan.
Guiziga: Mindira hiri ngi walahay Elat i naŋ, a vula da hirwuy Zuda a muŋ. Hana a gi na, a dirba muc ngi cine naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O nyiɓti berniwol Elat, o wartiri ngol nder maral Yahuuda ɓaawo maayde laamiiɗo Amasiya.
Fulfulde_DC: O nyiɓti berniwol Elat, o wartiri ngol nder maral Yahuuda ɓaawo maayde laamiiɗo Amasiya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ a̧ á̧ bìì ye Elat ɓɛɛ ba piiɗoŋ ha̧ Juda ɗoŋ nɛ̀ wa guna nɛ̀ wannu si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i kaɗi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ a̧ á̧ bìì ye Elat ɓɛɛ ba piiɗoŋ ha̧ Juda ɗoŋ nɛ̀ wa guna nɛ̀ wannu si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i kaɗi.
Kapsiki_DC: Gheŋkɛ nde zhɛne kaŋate meleme ta Ɛlat, kandeke nda ke Zhəwda kwa sebe ta mte ta yiteyɛ.
Tupurri: Joñ nen boo äi leege ma Eladn diñ se, fern le nen do Juda, sen diñ blam maga wañ hay joñ nen sugi go äiñ paçaçre äe wo mono.

Francais: Ozias avait seize ans lorsqu'il devint roi, et il régna cinquante-deux ans à Jérusalem. Sa mère se nommait Jéchélia, de Jérusalem.
Anglais: Sixteen years old was Uzziah when he began to reign, and he reigned fifty and two years in Jerusalem. His mother's name also was Jecoliah of Jerusalem.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Oziyas ka hiɗi busat doogo yam karkiya hay li ma nisi tunum mulu, nam ti mulda ir busat dok-fiɗi yam ma' hay Yerusalem. Sulumu semda va' ala Yekoliya, goota ta Yerusalemta.
Bulu: Ozias a nga bili mimbu awôm a misaman éyoñ a nga taté jôô. A nga jôô bôt mimbu mewôm metan a mibaé e Yérusalém. Nyia wé a mbe ngone ya Yérusalém a too jôé na: Yekôlia.
Guiziga: Oziyas mici ar buyo, naɓa naŋ ti vi kuruˀ nga merkeɗe, a zum buyo vi kukur zlum nga cuw a Zeruzaleme. Mumuŋ i zuŋ Zeruzalem, a zilaka Yekoliya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Uzziya woodi duuɓi sappo e joweego, saa'i o laamo. O laami haa Urusaliima duuɓi cappanɗe jowi e ɗiɗi. Innde daada maako, Yekoliya mo Urusaliima.
Fulfulde_DC: Uzziya woodi duuɓi sappo e joweego, saa'i o laamo. O laami haa Urusaliima duuɓi cappanɗe jowi e ɗiɗi. Innde daada maako, Yekoliya mo Urusaliima.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ozias a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-zua-yiitoo sɛn Jerusalɛm. Nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ duka so nɛ́ Yɛkɔlia zɔŋa Jerusalɛm.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ozias a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-zua-yiitoo sɛn Jerusalɛm. Nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ duka so nɛ́ Yɛkɔlia zɔŋa Jerusalɛm.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma nda kelete meghe Oziyas ne, meŋe ŋkwaŋeghəmbe va ta ŋkɛ, pa ŋkɛ menete va mbe meghe mcɛfemsə bakeghəmbe mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm. Wəzha ta ka Zhɛrəzalɛm meghekɛ, Yekoliya sləa nta.
Tupurri: Kiñgi Osiyas hay hwal ti hiira'a, de maga aà kol ti wañ mono, day aà kal joñ wañ Jerusalem kiñgi do dwee ti äoge. Ëu man äe hay ga Yekoliya ma Jerusalem.

Francais: Il fit ce qui est droit aux yeux de Yahweh, selon tout ce qu'avait fait Amasias, son père.
Anglais: And he did that which was right in the sight of the  Lord , according to all that his father Amaziah did.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam li slen ma ɗigera vok ir Ma-Vatɗina, ŋray ca kaw ki bulum Amatsiya li nala.
Bulu: A nga bo mam me ne mvaé mimfaʼa mise, aval ésaa wé Amatsia a nga bo.
Guiziga: Oziyas a gi gwat mikkaslsla a mihiri ngi Bumbulvuŋ, rak rak ati cine naŋ Amasiya miga zleˀe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi ko fottani Jawmiraawo, bana ko baaba maako Amasiya waɗno fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi ko fottani Jawmiraawo, bana ko baaba maako Amasiya waɗno fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ozias dee mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a ti GASA WAN, kànà hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Amasia dáà kɔ̧-a̧ dee so ga.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ozias dee mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a ti GASA WAN, kànà hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Amasia dáà kɔ̧-a̧ dee so ga.
Kapsiki_DC: Wəsə nya zlama Mahwətə te yamene Oziyas, tɛfɛa tɛfɛa kala yitenyɛ Amasiya.
Tupurri: AÀ joñ fen ma de deele nen Manwur go ti ngeeln wo äuy do maga pan äe Amatsiya hay joñ no lay no.

Francais: Il fut disposé à honorer Dieu pendant la vie de Zacharie, qui lui apprenait à craindre Dieu ; et dans le temps qu'il honorait Yahweh, Dieu le fit prospérer.
Anglais: And he sought God in the days of Zechariah, who had understanding in the visions of God: and as long as he sought the  Lord , God made him to prosper.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam ka so tuwamu kay gar Lawna hay buur ma irita vi Zakariya sa ma ka hiɗi yalda kay wi slen ma vokŋa vi Lawna; hay li ma nam ka gar Ma-Vatɗin kayni, Lawn wulum kulo voko.
Bulu: A nga jeñe Zambe melu Zakari a nga vee, amu nye a nga yeʼele nye nkoone Zambe woñ, nté ôse a nga jeñe Nti, Zambe a nga bo na e mame mé me ke ôsu.
Guiziga: Ti Zakari misi ar siifa na, ara dubuna zluwun ti Buymisemuŋ da Oziyasa, yo Oziyas vuna kwana ara sipa Buymisemuŋ. Ti Oziyas miteŋteŋ avu Bumbulvuŋ na, Buymisemuŋ a ga ɓa gwat naŋ maga gar na, a gi kasl kasla.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Saa'i Zekariya, ekkitinɗo mo hulugo Allah  ɗonno geeto tawon, Uzziya ɗakkotiri bee Allah Jawmiraawo. Ngam maajum Allah hokki mo hayru.
Fulfulde_DC: Saa'i Zekariya, ekkitinɗo mo hulugo Allah  ɗonno geeto tawon, Uzziya ɗakkotiri bee Allah Jawmiraawo. Ngam maajum Allah hokki mo hayru.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ kia Sɔ̧ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Zakarii wi nɛ̀ usa yuwar yuu Sɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ ɓɔna nɛ̀ yí in ŋgimbi n'aa ɓɔna so nɛnɛ tɛ mboozu ha̧ GASA WAN mbɛt. Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, Sɔ̧ dee ha̧ mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ gasi gasi siti.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ kia Sɔ̧ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Zakarii wi nɛ̀ usa yuwar yuu Sɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ ɓɔna nɛ̀ yí in ŋgimbi n'aa ɓɔna so nɛnɛ tɛ mboozu ha̧ GASA WAN mbɛt. Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, Sɔ̧ dee ha̧ mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ gasi gasi siti.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa nza Zakari nya kenza kafate ghena nyi ghweneke Shala mba teghweme ne, pa Oziyas ntsəte geva kezha ɗepete ɗe ta Shala Mahwətə, pa Shala shɛ kemanakɛ te kema te kema.
Tupurri: AÀ haç see äe kië Baa de wur maga Sakari je maga hay de ti ngeel ndar nen waçaçre Baa hay tenen caw ëa mono. Day, tum de maga aà hay kië Baa mono, Baa kal joñge ga joñre äen mo see ne hen were.

Francais: Il partit en guerre contre les Philistins ; il renversa le mur de Geth, le mur de Jabnia et le mur d'Azot, et construisit des villes dans le territoire d'Azot et parmi les Philistins.
Anglais: And he went forth and warred against the Philistines, and brake down the wall of Gath, and the wall of Jabneh, and the wall of Ashdod, and built cities about Ashdod, and among the Philistines.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam kali goyo kay dur sa Filistina, nam co baŋana hay gulmunna vi Gat, hay gulmunna vi Yabne, hiɗi gulmunna vi Asdod. Nam in hoyok-ziyna hay nagata vi Asdod, jar sa Filistina kaw.
Bulu: A nga ke wosane Befilisteñ a tyame minkaʼalé ya Gat, Yabné a Asdôd; a nga lôñe bitison e mefôla ya Asdôd a si Befilisteñ.
Guiziga: Oziyas aru nga gi vurum ati Filistihey, a mbizla mohol ngi walahay Gat, ngi Yapne waɗ ngi Asdoto. A ndir walahayay gun gun ti mohol angi hirwuy Asdoto, waɗ angi hirwuy Filisti.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Uzziya yehi, haɓi bee Filisti'en, waɗi ceekgol nder mahi taariiɗi Gaat e Yabne e Asdod. Nden o nyiɓi berniiji nder Asdod, non boo caka Filisti'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Uzziya yehi, haɓi bee Filisti'en, waɗi ceekgol nder mahi taariiɗi Gaat e Yabne e Asdod. Nden o nyiɓi berniiji nder Asdod, non boo caka Filisti'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ baa biro dúk nɛ̀ o be Filistii ɓɛɛ a̧ gbin garo Gat, in wan mɛ Yabne bá nɛ̀ wan mɛ Asdod mbɛt. A̧ ɗafa ɗoŋ o ye tɛ zika nú Asdod in sɛn nú Filistii mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ baa biro dúk nɛ̀ o be Filistii ɓɛɛ a̧ gbin garo Gat, in wan mɛ Yabne bá nɛ̀ wan mɛ Asdod mbɛt. A̧ ɗafa ɗoŋ o ye tɛ zika nú Asdod in sɛn nú Filistii mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Cape Oziyas yitea mpa le ka Filisti: pa ŋzlamte zlia Gat, ŋa Yabnɛ le ŋa Asdod, zhɛne pa ŋate zli yitea meleme nyi dzeyi yitea Asdod ba'a nya ketene hɛɗia ka Filisti.
Tupurri: AÀ raw kalge go ma dur jar Filisteçeç wo, day aà kal caa ywaale ti kor ma Gad no, ti kor ma Yabene no, de kor ma Asdod no. AÀ kal boor äi leege wo äi sir ma Asdod ti holañ jar Filisteçeç wo.

Francais: Dieu l'aida contre les Philistins, contre les Arabes qui habitaient à Gur-Baal, et contre les Maonites.
Anglais: And God helped him against the Philistines, and against the Arabians that dwelt in Gur–baal, and the Mehunims.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Lawn gutum hay ɓam sa Filistina, hay ɓam sa Arabna sa ka lakay ziy hay Gur-Baal, hay ɓam sa Mawonitna kaw.
Bulu: Zambe a nga volô nye a wosane Befilisteñ, Bearabe be nga too Gur-Baal a Bemaonit.
Guiziga: Taŋ makiɗam vu ati Filistihey, Arapay misi ti hayay a Gur-Baˀal waɗ ati Meˀunihey na, Buymisemuŋ a so jiniˀis aseˀeŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Allah walli mo haɓugo bee Filisti'en e Arab'en jooɗiiɓe haa Gur-Ba'al e Me'uni'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Allah walli mo haɓugo bee Filisti'en e Arab'en jooɗiiɓe haa Gur-Ba'al e Me'uni'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɔ̧ gbaka a̧ tɛ bíí o be Filistii, in o be Arab nɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Gur-Bal gú nɛ̀ o be Mɛɔnii mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɔ̧ gbaka a̧ tɛ bíí o be Filistii, in o be Arab nɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Gur-Bal gú nɛ̀ o be Mɛɔnii mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Shala kemanakɛ mbe mpa ta nci le ka Filisti, ka Arab nyi mbe Gəwr-Ba'al ba'a ka Mɛwən.
Tupurri: Baa kal kañge äe ti jar Filisteçeç wo, ti jar Arab wo, maga hay de tiñ Gur-Baal mono, day ti jar Maon wo.

Francais: Les Ammonites faisaient des présents à Ozias, et sa renommée parvint jusqu'à l'entrée de l'Egypte, car il devint très puissant.
Anglais: And the Ammonites gave gifts to Uzziah: and his name spread abroad even to the entering in of Egypt; for he strengthened himself exceedingly.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa Amonna ka tar vulda mi Oziyas, selem ma tiyna kali goyo ta-ta hay vun Egipte goŋ', kay gaŋeraŋa valamu ka wuli kulo ŋolo.
Bulu: Beamônite fe be nga yaʼan Ozias toya . Jôé dé e nga wum a kui minné ya Ejipte amu ngule jé é nga dañe dañe bete yôp.
Guiziga: Mizli Meˀunihey vuna, a wurkaka buutu taŋ da Oziyas misi slimiɗ naŋ mazil sesẽŋ ar maakway ngi Ezipte, asi Oziyas a tiri le i mbur migidaŋ haɗa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammooni'en njoɓi Uzziya jomorgol. Innde maako saŋkiti haa yotti nastirde Misra, ngam baawɗe maako ɓesdi masin.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammooni'en njoɓi Uzziya jomorgol. Innde maako saŋkiti haa yotti nastirde Misra, ngam baawɗe maako ɓesdi masin.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hegɔ o be Mɛɔnii gboo garama ha̧ Ozias, ɓɛɛ nin-a hur hɔ si nú Egiptɛ mɛ, wen a̧ kpaa so ŋgai nɛ̀ dɔka-a nyɛmna.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hegɔ o be Mɛɔnii gboo garama ha̧ Ozias, ɓɛɛ nin-a hur hɔ si nú Egiptɛ mɛ, wen a̧ kpaa so ŋgai nɛ̀ dɔka-a nyɛmna.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa le ka Mawon kaŋki nda jaɓeregwale. Pa Oziyas kemave berete kwele kwele, pa sləa ŋkɛ dzemtenyɛ pa kwa ghala le ka Ɛzhipte.
Tupurri: Jar Amoñ hay wo joñ feçeçre haçge ne Osiyase, day ëu äe kal rage wo haçaç ti jeñ ngeel ma Ejipte wo. Werga eegre äen hay geçeç go ciñ haçaç.

Francais: Ozias bâtit des tours à Jérusalem sur la porte de l'angle, sur la porte de la vallée et sur l'angle, et il les fortifia.
Anglais: Moreover Uzziah built towers in Jerusalem at the corner gate, and at the valley gate, and at the turning of the wall, and fortified them.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Oziyas in gulmunna hay Yerusalem kat vun-galana vi gefna, kat vun-galana vi lokŋa, kat vun-galana vi Gaŋŋa, nam lum dono'o kaw.
Bulu: Ozias a nga lôñ azomezome menda asu benonô e Yérusalém. A nga lôñ ôzomezome nda wua e mbé abuʼu nkaʼalé, wu ôvok e mbé mbiʼili a wu ôvok e vôme mimfine mibaé mia tôban; a a nga bômane azomezome menda te a alem.
Guiziga: Oziyas a ndir hay migilahay a Zeruzaleme: a hirnga mizlingre ngir ngi zlirɗi, a mizlingre ng'ar Sozo, waɗ ar mohol mumusl le gar, waɗ gun gun taŋ ti mohol.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Uzziya nyiɓi cuuɗi towɗi cemmbiɗɗi haa Urusaliima, dow Dammugal Toldu e Dammugal Waadiwol e talkumoore mahol, semmbiɗini ɗi.
Fulfulde_DC: Uzziya nyiɓi cuuɗi towɗi cemmbiɗɗi haa Urusaliima, dow Dammugal Toldu e Dammugal Waadiwol e talkumoore mahol, semmbiɗini ɗi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ozias mboo kusa ŋgárá-pɛm-mɔ sɛn Jerusalɛm sɛn zu nutua mɛ Mgbii-aa in wan mɛ si kɔ̧ Gboŋgo in see zu fara nɛ̀ garo suia si zan  sɛnɛ mbɛt, ɓɛɛ a̧ mbo garo zik nɛ̀ wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ozias mboo kusa ŋgárá-pɛm-mɔ sɛn Jerusalɛm sɛn zu nutua mɛ Mgbii-aa in wan mɛ si kɔ̧ Gboŋgo in see zu fara nɛ̀ garo suia si zan  sɛnɛ mbɛt, ɓɛɛ a̧ mbo garo zik nɛ̀ wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ ŋate cɛ nyi bebiya bebiya keya ŋkwa mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm, te ghəa mɛ degha nya te megwekwe ta zli, tsagha laka mɛ degha ta zlərə ba'a te ŋkwa nya nza gwekwe va zli.
Tupurri: Osiyas boor tiñ ma kluuri wo ti jag tiñ ma de heer coçoç no, ti jag tiñ Por no, day ti ngeel maga korn hay wo de naa coçoç ni mono, day fer joñ rage kiñkiñ.

Francais: Il bâtit des tours dans le désert, et il creusa beaucoup de citernes, parce qu'il avait là de nombreux troupeaux, ainsi que dans la Séphéla et sur les plateaux, et des laboureurs et des vignerons dans les montagnes et au Carmel, car il aimait l'agriculture.
Anglais: Also he built towers in the desert, and digged many wells: for he had much cattle, both in the low country, and in the plains: husbandmen also, and vine dressers in the mountains, and in Carmel: for he loved husbandry.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam in simdira hay fulda kaw, jugoɗ kaara ŋolo kaw, kay nam ka hiɗi farayn ŋolo hay lokŋa, hay fulda kaw, sum sa zum sinena hiɗi sa pi gulda-guldana hay hiɗiyta vi Karmel ŋolo kaw, kay namu min zumna.
Bulu: A nga lôñ alem e nkôte si a faʼa abui menjeñ, amu a nga bili abui mimbame biyem éfuse si ba loone Seféla a e minjeʼese ya fefele mañ, a nga bili fe besenane si a bebaʼale mefube mindik e minkô a e Karmel, amu a mbe a nyekeʼe ésaé mefup.
Guiziga: Yo a ndir hay migilahay a wuzlaɓuh mikirɗak kirɗaka ma, a li futuŋhoy mbeˀ mbeˀ, asi naŋ ti ginewey haɗi. Yo naŋ da ti mizli muhufoy ar Hirwuy-Mukutuk, yo ar li micayya, waɗ naŋ da ti muhuva gudubunoy a muwãhay waɗ a Karmel. Asi mike na, Oziyas i mbur mawuɗ hufu.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O nyiɓi cuuɗi towɗi cemmbiɗɗi nder ladde boo, o wasi gaawi ɗuuɗɗi, ngam o mari dabbaaji ɗuuɗɗi nder lesdi towndiije e dow yayre. O woodi remooɓe gese e hakkilanooɓe inabooje haa kooseeje e jarne, ngam o yiɗi ndemri.
Fulfulde_DC: O nyiɓi cuuɗi towɗi cemmbiɗɗi nder ladde boo, o wasi gaawi ɗuuɗɗi, ngam o mari dabbaaji ɗuuɗɗi nder lesdi towndiije e dow yayre. O woodi remooɓe gese e hakkilanooɓe inabooje haa kooseeje e jarne, ngam o yiɗi ndemri.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ mboo ŋma ŋgárá-pɛm-mɔ sɛn ŋga-gbárà, ɓɛɛ a̧ za̧ o kɔ̧-yì nɛ̀ dɔka-a mbɛt, wen a̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o gíí mɔ-dai nyɛmna. A̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o wi-wa-fɔ mbɛt sɛn ká̧ nù mɛ ɗɔɔ in sɛn tɔyɛɛ gɔn-see-nù, bá nɛ̀ o wi-de-tom-dɔ̧ɔ̧ sɛn zu kaya in sɛn Karmɛl, wen a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so tom-fɔ nyɛmna.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ mboo ŋma ŋgárá-pɛm-mɔ sɛn ŋga-gbárà, ɓɛɛ a̧ za̧ o kɔ̧-yì nɛ̀ dɔka-a mbɛt, wen a̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o gíí mɔ-dai nyɛmna. A̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o wi-wa-fɔ mbɛt sɛn ká̧ nù mɛ ɗɔɔ in sɛn tɔyɛɛ gɔn-see-nù, bá nɛ̀ o wi-de-tom-dɔ̧ɔ̧ sɛn zu kaya in sɛn Karmɛl, wen a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so tom-fɔ nyɛmna.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋate yɛ cɛ keya ŋkwa te hɛɗi nyi te ɓerama ɓiyitsa, pa late ghwa kwele kwele, kwa nza ŋkɛ ne, kwele kwele wəshi ve mbe meleme nyi kwake te ŋwela ba'a pelɛ wəmbəa ŋkwa. Kwele kwele ka wəza ba'a ka hetəsə yɛməa rɛzɛŋe nyi kemene nda slene dzeme hwa ghweme ba'a mbe wəvea rɛzɛŋe, kwa nza ŋkɛ kwele kwele ɗehwe ghena ta wəza ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ boor tiñ gorge ma kluuri wo ti puuli, day teer gutug wo ni ngaäa lay werga aà hay de horog wo wo ti Sefala ni ngaäa de ful ma ti jeñn wo ni, de jar jeëge wo, jar gor ti pay tlalum wo wo ciñ ti huuli ma Karmel wo, werga aà hay da soñ debañe.

Francais: Ozias avait une armée de guerriers qui allaient au combat par troupes, comptées d'après leur dénombrement par le secrétaire Jéhiel et le commissaire Maasias, sous les ordres de Hananias, l'un des chefs du roi.
Anglais: Moreover Uzziah had an host of fighting men, that went out to war by bands, according to the number of their account by the hand of Jeiel the scribe and Maaseiah the ruler, under the hand of Hananiah, one of the king's captains.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Oziyas ka hiɗi sojena sa li duura, sa cuk goy kuɗ tuwsiya, nisi ɓuraway goyo kuɗ ŋaɓta ta sa ma ɗota Yeyel hiɗi sa ma sunda Maaseya ŋaɓa' goyta, nisi ka lakay gaa kuɗ gaŋeraŋa vi Hananiya, kep jar sa ministrena vi mulla.
Bulu: Ozias a nga bili nkane bita ô too ngu asu mewosan, ô too nkabane minsamba, avalʼane ésaé élañe bôt e bôte bana be nga bo é mbe: Yeiél ñyeme bekalate Maaséya ngovina a Anania wua ya bivete bezimbi bi njô bôt.
Guiziga: Oziyasa, naŋ da ti sojehey mindilaka gi vurumo le, yo a ndilaka le ngi bi ng'ar vurumo. A wuɗkaka taŋ le taˀ taˀ weˀe avu hil taŋ ng'ar slra, Yehiyel, mbur mutoho gwat ngi buy waɗ Maˀaseya, mbur miji kaw ngi zlili muslufaka taŋ na, yo mawa soje tayna i Hananiya, mbur ngi wuzla madiɗa ngi soje ngi buyoy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Uzziya woodi jama'aare honooɓe taaskaniiɓe konu fodde limgal muuɗum'en nde Ye'iyel, binndoowo e Ma'aseya, saraakiijo mooɓti ɓe. Ɓe ɗiɗo fuu ɓe kuuwi dow ardaaŋgal Hananiya, gooto nder mawɓe laamiiɗo.
Fulfulde_DC: Uzziya woodi jama'aare honooɓe taaskaniiɓe konu fodde limgal muuɗum'en nde Ye'iyel, binndoowo e Ma'aseya, saraakiijo mooɓti ɓe. Ɓe ɗiɗo fuu ɓe kuuwi dow ardaaŋgal Hananiya, gooto nder mawɓe laamiiɗo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ozias a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ gíí wi-biro nɛ̀ iŋa dee biro in wen nɛ́ɛ́ biro mbɛt, tɛ dùk-aa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o tom nɛ̀ wi-yɔr-mɔ Yeiɛl in ŋma wi-gɔn-kita Masɛya yɔra so. Nɛ́ Hanania, ŋma gasawi ko wannu a̧ duka so zu o wi-biro nɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ozias a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ gíí wi-biro nɛ̀ iŋa dee biro in wen nɛ́ɛ́ biro mbɛt, tɛ dùk-aa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o tom nɛ̀ wi-yɔr-mɔ Yeiɛl in ŋma wi-gɔn-kita Masɛya yɔra so. Nɛ́ Hanania, ŋma gasawi ko wannu a̧ duka so zu o wi-biro nɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Zhili nyi kenza wərə dzemte mpa ya va Oziyas. Kewəvəsə kewəvəsə hɛ kala nya neheve mbeli se te rafe nya rafete hɛ ka rafe wəshi, yɛ Yɛyiyɛl le Masɛya kala nya gezete nda Hananiya, wəndə kwelea ka sewajɛa meghe ke hɛ.
Tupurri: Osiyas hay de sode ma durgi wo, maga laa wo go durgi mokay diñ do maga je yerge Yeyel wo de komiser Maaseyahu hay wo kee rage nono. Sen äuy diñ ti jag Haniyahu ga diñ minisdir po yoo mani wañn wo.

Francais: Le nombre total des chefs de maisons, vaillants guerriers, était de deux mille six cents.
Anglais: The whole number of the chief of the fathers of the mighty men of valour were two thousand and six hundred.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa ŋulona vi jafna noŋ kaf, sum sa jufayna sa donona, ŋaɓta visi co noŋ pet birim-ma' hiɗi kis-karkiya.
Bulu: Biwôlô bezimbi bite bi too éjôé bivete menda me bôt toyini ébaé a mintete misaman,
Guiziga: Soje miwirwir tayna, a wuɗkaka taŋ vur buy ngi sukwi ngi sukwi, a gam jom gar mizli durmuk cuw ti skat skat merkeɗe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limgal baaba-ci'e'en , honooɓe semmbiɗɓe fuu waɗi ujine ɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe njoweego (2.600).
Fulfulde_DC: Limgal baaba-ci'e'en , honooɓe semmbiɗɓe fuu waɗi ujine ɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe njoweego (2.600).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Dɔka o gasawi nú-gara lɛŋ nɛ̀ yaa so zu o ŋga wi-biro nɔ‘i nɛ́ booro-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Dɔka o gasawi nú-gara lɛŋ nɛ̀ yaa so zu o ŋga wi-biro nɔ‘i nɛ́ booro-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma zhilia ghɛ nyi te ghəa ka katsala ka sewajɛa nyi ne, 2.600 hɛ.
Tupurri: Ngaäa wañre ma ti feelen wo lag lage, bogawla soden wo, hay wo ndar äog ti äe kiskis hiira'a.

Francais: Ils commandaient à une armée de trois cent sept mille cinq cents hommes, qui faisaient la guerre avec une grande puissance, pour soutenir le roi contre l'ennemi.
Anglais: And under their hand was an army, three hundred thousand and seven thousand and five hundred, that made war with mighty power, to help the king against the enemy.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa duura sa donona sa jufay ŋolla birim kis-ɦidi diram siɗiya, kalam kis-vasl ka gaa kuɗ gaŋeraŋa visiya, nisi ka gut mulla kay dur sa gawta.
Bulu: bi mbe bôte toyini mintete mila a zamgbwa a bôte mintete mitan; be mbe njalan a ngu, nkômesane ya wosane besiñe be njô bôt.
Guiziga: A wam soje durmuk skat skat makir ti durmuk tarnaˀ ti soje skat skat zlum, mindilaka gi vurumo le ti gidaŋ, ko ti gambara ngi vu, t'ada sek ngi tiɓa hirnga ngi buy avu mesene naŋhay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jama'aare konu ɗowtani ɓe. Limgal maare, worɓe ujine teemeɗɗe tato e njoweeɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe njowo (307.500). Baawɗe maɓɓe ke'i wallugo laamiiɗo, to o waɗi haɓre bee konne'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Jama'aare konu ɗowtani ɓe. Limgal maare, worɓe ujine teemeɗɗe tato e njoweeɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe njowo (307.500). Baawɗe maɓɓe ke'i wallugo laamiiɗo, to o waɗi haɓre bee konne'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O ŋga wi-biro nɛ́ booro-gɔmŋmaa-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ nɛ̀ nyɛma so mɛ bi biro nɛ̀ ŋgai in nɛ̀ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi wen pɛma wannu wen o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O ŋga wi-biro nɛ́ booro-gɔmŋmaa-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ nɛ̀ nyɛma so mɛ bi biro nɛ̀ ŋgai in nɛ̀ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi wen pɛma wannu wen o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ka katsala kɛfia ka sewajɛ nyi le berete ba'a ɗeke ɗeke kampa le ka ghema ta meghe 307.500 ya te dzeve ta nci.
Tupurri: Sode maga aà hay wo waçë waçaçre äaara mono, hay wo ndar kiskis swa' ti renam ti äe kiskis dwee, ga wo de eegre, bogawla ma kay wañ ti je hee no.

Francais: Ozias leur procura, à toute cette armée, des boucliers, des lances, des casques, des cuirasses, des arcs et des frondes pour lancer des pierres.
Anglais: And Uzziah prepared for them throughout all the host shields, and spears, and helmets, and habergeons, and bows, and slings to cast stones.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay li duura, Oziyas garsi marayna, kawayna, bogorayna, ŋoŋŋa, ɓarawna hiɗi tiwlekŋa.
Bulu: Eyoñ ése ba ke bita, Ozias a mbe a vaʼa be biben, mekoñ, mefôʼôlô bityé, mengômesane bityé, bilaé a mekôʼô me toloo.
Guiziga: Taŋ mira bam ng'ar vurum gar na, buy Oziyas a wuɗuka taŋ mbarayay, ziwitey, jiiku ngi gandafay, libitihey, lekey waɗ ɗugur ngi vehvehluhoy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Uzziya hokki ɓe fuu maɓɓe bawarɗe e labbe e kufneeje njamndi e sulkeeji e lagaaje e kaa'e cakkinteeɗe bee piwlol.
Fulfulde_DC: Uzziya hokki ɓe fuu maɓɓe bawarɗe e labbe e kufneeje njamndi e sulkeeji e lagaaje e kaa'e cakkinteeɗe bee piwlol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ́ɛ́ biro, Ozias ha̧ so nɛ́ o ŋgee, o sɛ́ɛ̀, o laasɔ̧i̧-boi, o laa-boi, o kusaa in o ta-birndiŋ ha̧ wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ́ɛ́ biro, Ozias ha̧ so nɛ́ o ŋgee, o sɛ́ɛ̀, o laasɔ̧i̧-boi, o laa-boi, o kusaa in o ta-birndiŋ ha̧ wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Mbe nyama nyama ta və nya dzemte mpa hɛ ne, kafə nda yɛ gelə, yɛ megha, yɛ derə kwenə, yɛ rəbəci, yɛ gwecɛ ba'a yɛ kwa beza pelɛ meghe ke hɛ.
Tupurri: Osiyas hay de haç feçeçre ne hara ma haçge ne soden wo äuy: Gidigli wo, jawre wo, tilgi wo, ngoñ wo, toñwaa wo, de huuli ma jwag garfuçyda wo.

Francais: Il fit construire à Jérusalem des machines inventées par un ingénieur, et destinées à être placées sur les tours et sur les angles des murs, pour lancer des flèches et de grosses pierres. Sa renommée s'étendait jusqu'au loin, car il fut merveilleusement aidé, jusque là qu'il devint puissant.
Anglais: And he made in Jerusalem engines, invented by cunning men, to be on the towers and upon the bulwarks, to shoot arrows and great stones withal. And his name spread far abroad; for he was marvellously helped, till he was strong.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Oziyas gar sa ma yal kepe, nam kot keken kep hay Yerusalem, kay tunum kulo kay simdira, kulo kay yam gef-ziyna kaw, kay gi ɓarawta hiɗi hiɗiy ma ŋulona. Selem ma tiyna mer goy ŋolo, nam fi gutda ŋolo, ta-ta nam muɗ mulda valam goy dono'o.
Bulu: A nga kôme beta beminsini, asu ya telé be azomezome menda benonô, a mekuʼu mimfin, be volôʼô asu ya wua mekoñe bilaé a beta mekok . Duma dé e nga ke ôyap, amu a nga bili abui mvolan akekui a yemeteya éjôé jé.
Guiziga: A Zeruzaleme, Oziyas a ɗiyi masiney taˀ taˀ a hirngi hay migilahay waɗ a zlirɗihey ngi moholoy mira zliram tuwa, hĩˀĩ ngi mula luvutoy ati ngi hiziga ɗugur madiɗahay. Slimiɗ naŋ a zil, hã aru kileŋ. Asi Buymisemuŋ a jina Oziyasa le haɗi, hã a tiri buy migidaŋ haɗa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Huuwooɓe annduɓe mbaɗani mo piɗirɗe kuri e cakkinirɗe kaa'e mawɗe. O darni ɗe haa Urusaliima dow cuuɗi towɗi cemmbiɗɗi e tolɗi mahol. Habaru maako saŋkiti daayiiɗum, ngam Allah hokki mo ballal kaayeefiiwal, haa o laati baawɗo.
Fulfulde_DC: Huuwooɓe annduɓe mbaɗani mo piɗirɗe kuri e cakkinirɗe kaa'e mawɗe. O darni ɗe haa Urusaliima dow cuuɗi towɗi cemmbiɗɗi e tolɗi mahol. Habaru maako saŋkiti daayiiɗum, ngam Allah hokki mo ballal kaayeefiiwal, haa o laati baawɗo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛn Jerusalɛm, a̧ dee o ŋma boi-biro nɛ̀ ya kɔ‘i sɛn zu garo zu tua-pɛm-mɔ in nɛ̀ war mgbii-aa wen pi̧i̧ góò in o gasa ta. Nin-a hura dam fara lɛŋ, wen Sɔ̧ gbaka so a̧ nɛ̀ dɔka-a; hegɔ a̧ kpaa ŋgai nɛ̀ de-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛn Jerusalɛm, a̧ dee o ŋma boi-biro nɛ̀ ya kɔ‘i sɛn zu garo zu tua-pɛm-mɔ in nɛ̀ war mgbii-aa wen pi̧i̧ góò in o gasa ta. Nin-a hura dam fara lɛŋ, wen Sɔ̧ gbaka so a̧ nɛ̀ dɔka-a; hegɔ a̧ kpaa ŋgai nɛ̀ de-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm ne, kagezla kweci wəmata kehe have ba'a kebeza pelɛ nyi jama jama nyi ncake nde nca wəshi Oziyas kezha ve hɛ pelɛ yɛ ŋkwa keya ŋkwa ba'a te yɛ megwekwe ta zli. Pa zləvəa Oziyas dzemte cakeɗake, kwa nza ŋkɛ nahe Shala kekemanakɛ ŋkɛ kameŋele ba'a nahe ŋkɛ kezhɛrenyɛ berete ma.
Tupurri: AÀ hay joñ masiñ wo Jerusalem, maga joñ ra diñ je el äili, ma kañge ti ngeel ma de boorge de geçeçre de hulugn wo, ma jwag waa wo de ma legad huuli ma kluuri wo. Ëu äe kal rage wo go ti ngeel ma haçaç haçaç wo äuy, werga aà hay kayn go de el tu señ nen maga se kal coä wañ äe no.

Francais: Mais lorsqu'il fut devenu puissant, son coeur s'éleva jusqu'à la ruine. Péchant contre Yahweh, son Dieu, il entra dans le temple de Yahweh pour brûler des parfums sur l'autel des parfums.
Anglais: But when he was strong, his heart was lifted up to his destruction: for he transgressed against the  Lord  his God, and went into the temple of the  Lord  to burn incense upon the altar of incense.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May hay li ma mulda valam muɗawa ŋolo, nam muɗ subur tuwamu, ta-ta suburta min bam goyo. Nam muɗ bay-ɗigere kat Ma-Vatɗina Lawna valamu, nam kal kalafi hay Tempella vi Ma-Vatɗina kay ŋal urdina kulo kay giwin-ma-ɗifinna vi urdina.
Bulu: Eyoñ a maneya yemete éjôé jé, nleme wé ô nga bo mebun a kui vôme ya dutu nye na a jañele ényiñe jé. A nji fe wulu ane Nti, e Zambe wé, a yene mvaé; a nga nyiin e Nda Zambe Nti, asu ya ve mimbon mi ne mbamba menyum e ataʼa metunaʼa beôlobinda yôp.
Guiziga: Naŋ migidaŋ haɗa tuwa na, a zla huhumo vu a mevele, hã ara zizaŋ, a zla gi teŋteŋ a mbuŋ Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ naŋ mata: a ci ng'ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ nga wura mukuturɓuy ar li gi mikuli ti urdi.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa nde o laati baawɗo, o mawniti haa o waɗi kalluɗum. O yewi umroore Allah Jawmiraawo maako, ngam o nasti nder haykaliiru, haa o wula uurle dow gulduɗum.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa nde o laati baawɗo, o mawniti haa o waɗi kalluɗum. O yewi umroore Allah Jawmiraawo maako, ngam o nasti nder haykaliiru, haa o wula uurle dow gulduɗum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ozias kpaa ŋgai, ɓɛɛ ku̧ naŋ gasa zu. A̧ dee ŋgazu in GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ yɔ kɔya-tɛ-a. Ŋma wese, a̧ yee kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN mɛ dɔ fuu-nyama sɛn zu  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ .
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ozias kpaa ŋgai, ɓɛɛ ku̧ naŋ gasa zu. A̧ dee ŋgazu in GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ yɔ kɔya-tɛ-a. Ŋma wese, a̧ yee kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN mɛ dɔ fuu-nyama sɛn zu  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ .
Kapsiki_DC: Ama pa berete nya ve ndeke nda kele ghə nya kevate teɗe te, pa ɗema nza dɛŋe dɛŋe te Shala Mahwətə ta ŋkɛ: ma te kwete hɛ, lahwe dzekinyɛ mbe ghɛa Shala katere 'wərdə te reghwetɛ ketere 'wərdə.
Tupurri: Ama de maga aà coä wañ äen coä mokay no, jiili äe kal kañ wer äe mañ ti see äe ciñ, haçaç kol kañ wer äe go. AÀ kal ndar gog see Manwuri, Baa äe no. AÀ raw kalge äi tiñ mani Manwurn ma roë feçeçre foçoçre no ti ngeel sië jag ma roë feçeçre foçoçre no no.

Francais: Le prêtre Azarias entra après lui, avec quatre-vingts prêtres de Yahweh, hommes courageux;
Anglais: And Azariah the priest went in after him, and with him fourscore priests of the  Lord , that were valiant men:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mul-ma-ɗifinna Azarya kalis kalaf kuɗumu, hiɗi muliyan-sa-ɗifinna vi Ma-Vatɗin kuɗum dok-glafandi,
Bulu: ntuni Azariahu a nga nyiine nye mvus a betuni be Nti, bôte mewôme muam,
Guiziga: masay Azariya, a ci aseˀeŋ, mizli gambara masayay da Bumbulvuŋ, kukur dangafaɗ sek aseˀeŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Azariya limanjo e liman'en Jawmiraawo cappanɗe njoweetato, worɓe suusɓe, tokki laamiiɗo nder suudu.
Fulfulde_DC: Azariya limanjo e liman'en Jawmiraawo cappanɗe njoweetato, worɓe suusɓe, tokki laamiiɗo nder suudu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Azaria yee Tua ɗoŋ-aa in o ŋma dɔka wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ko GASA WAN ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Azaria yee Tua ɗoŋ-aa in o ŋma dɔka wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ko GASA WAN ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi.
Kapsiki_DC: Shilimə wəndə kwelea ka dzeghe Shala Azariya le kweci ka dzeghe Shala nyi kebeghe ŋkɛ deghesemsə nyi sahwe hwəa nci mbe kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Je sië jag Asaryahu raw kalge wo wer äe de jar sië jag Manwur wo wer do nenma'a,

Francais: ils s'opposèrent au roi Ozias et lui dirent: "Ce n'est pas à toi, Ozias, d'offrir des parfums à Yahweh, mais aux prêtres, fils d'Aaron, qui ont été consacrés pour brûler des parfums. Sors du sanctuaire, car tu as péché, et cela ne tournera pas à ton honneur devant Yahweh Dieu."
Anglais: And they withstood Uzziah the king, and said unto him, It appertaineth not unto thee, Uzziah, to burn incense unto the  Lord , but to the priests the sons of Aaron, that are consecrated to burn incense: go out of the sanctuary; for thou hast trespassed; neither shall it be for thine honour from the  Lord  God.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: sum sa jufayna sa donona, tun caw tel Oziyas, nisi di talamu: May ŋal urdin tam Ma-Vatɗina kayni mi naŋɗi, may ŋalam si muliyan-sa-ɗifinna gurona vi Aaron, sa vuli goyo kay ŋalamu. Kalaŋay goy hay liyn ma peldetna pa, kay naŋu bay-ɗigere, kayni as vulaŋ suburta vok Ma-Vatɗin Lawnɗi.
Bulu: biwôlô bi bôt, mbe be nga tebe njô bôt Ozias e ngame yat a jô nye na: Sake wo Ozias wo yiane diʼi Nti beôlobinda, ve betuni, e bone bʼAron, mbe be nga teléban na be bo ésaé te. Kôlôʼô Nda Zambe amu ô nji bo zôsôô e mise me Nti, a jame te da ye suʼulan asu duma dôé e mise me Nti.
Guiziga: A cicam zlak avu buy Oziyasa, a ɓakaŋ: «Mawura mukuturɓuy da Bumbulvuŋ i ka ta Oziyas, amma i masay, ziri ngi Aroŋhoy, mihĩˀĩ vurˀe! Bi tir hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ avra, asi ki gi teŋteŋ ta! Ki gi hana i slra ngi hirya hay mipal hana, avu Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ, i slra ngi ɗuvuw hirnga ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ndartani mo, ɓe mbi'i: “Uzziya, haanaay a wula uurle ngam Jawmiraawo, sey liman'en danygol Haruna, senaaɓe ngam kuugal maajum. Wurta nokkuure seniinde ngam a yewi umroore maako. Ɗum heɓantaa ma maŋngu yeeso Jawmiraawo Allah” .
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ndartani mo, ɓe mbi'i: “Uzziya, haanaay a wula uurle ngam Jawmiraawo, sey liman'en danygol Haruna, senaaɓe ngam kuugal maajum. Wurta nokkuure seniinde ngam a yewi umroore maako. Ɗum heɓantaa ma maŋngu yeeso Jawmiraawo Allah” .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa nɛka ti wannu Ozias, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Wannu, ɛnɛ bo nɛ̀ yuwar mɛ dɔ fuu-nyama ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ̀ tɛ‘nɛ́ na; mɔ‘i nɛ́ tom ko o bezaŋ Arɔŋ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ̀‘i hoka wa wen-aa. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó kɔ̧ sa̧a̧-fara’ɛ, wen ɛ́nɛ́ de nɛ ndiŋ a sɛnɛ! Mɔ‘i beka duk nɛ́ zɔnamɔ wen'nɛ́ sɛn ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ na.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa nɛka ti wannu Ozias, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Wannu, ɛnɛ bo nɛ̀ yuwar mɛ dɔ fuu-nyama ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ̀ tɛ‘nɛ́ na; mɔ‘i nɛ́ tom ko o bezaŋ Arɔŋ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ̀‘i hoka wa wen-aa. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó kɔ̧ sa̧a̧-fara’ɛ, wen ɛ́nɛ́ de nɛ ndiŋ a sɛnɛ! Mɔ‘i beka duk nɛ́ zɔnamɔ wen'nɛ́ sɛn ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ na.»
Kapsiki_DC: Slete hɛ kwa kema ta meghe Oziyas, ma ke hɛ shɛ: «Hweŋkwa va gha katere nda 'wərdə le ghəa ŋa ke Mahwətə we, kaŋa ka dzeghe Shala nyi kahwelefefia Aron nyi keveyi geva tekeleke kezha gheŋkɛ ŋkɛ. Jive ŋa mbe ŋkwa nya keveyi geva nya tekele, kwa nza ŋkɛ ne, wəsə nya wale wale yamene na, nya keɗema kavate zləvə te gha kwa kema ta Shala Mahwətə.»
Tupurri: ga wo diñ jar bogawla wo maga kal wo giñ wañ Osiyase, day wiin wo ga: Sen bay diñ joñre ma äo Osiyas ma roë feçeçre foçoçre no ne Manwur wa, ama aà diñ joñre ma jar sië jag jar ni AÈron wo, maga hay wo go de lagge ma roë rage sagsag mono. Kal go ti ngeel ma bay ëag no, werga ndo diñ je ndar goge, sen bay diñ mo maga kol ge ma haç togoëge ne ndo pel Manwuri, Baa wa.

Francais: Ozias, qui tenait un encensoir à la main pour offrir des parfums, fut saisi de colère et, comme il s'irritait contre les prêtres, la lèpre se leva sur son front, en présence des prêtres, dans la maison de Yahweh, devant l'autel des parfums.
Anglais: Then Uzziah was wroth, and had a censer in his hand to burn incense: and while he was wroth with the priests, the leprosy even rose up in his forehead before the priests in the house of the  Lord , from beside the incense altar.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ɦiyda kal hay dik Oziyas, nam ka hiɗi va ma ŋal urdin hayna hay ɓalamu. Hay li ma nam muɗ ɦiya kat muliyan-sa-ɗifinna, moy-kuturuna tun hay vokomu, hay li ma muliyan-sa-ɗifinna ka lakay galam lak, hay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina, goboy hiɗi giwin-ma-ɗifinna ma ŋal urdina.
Bulu: Nde ôlun ô nga bi Ozias, a tele a bili ésua ba diʼi mbon ô ne mbamba menyum e mo. A ngenan a wôʼô betuni ôlun, nde zam é nga kubu nye asu, betuni be too, e Nda Nti, e fefel ataʼa metunaʼa beôlobinda.
Guiziga: Oziyas a ro kaw ti gwat ngi wura urdi zleˀe a haŋ, a zla ji mevel ar masayay tuwa. Naŋ muro ar mevel tuwa na, kukula a midibiɗe, daˀ a mbuŋ masayaya, ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ, gweˀ avu li gi mikuli ti urdi.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Uriya, jogiiɗo uurorgo haa juŋngo mum, tikki. Nde o ɗon tikkana liman'en, saɗawre naŋngi haa tiinde maako, yeeso liman'en dariiɓe nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo baŋnge gulduɗum.
Fulfulde_DC: Uriya, jogiiɗo uurorgo haa juŋngo mum, tikki. Nde o ɗon tikkana liman'en, saɗawre naŋngi haa tiinde maako, yeeso liman'en dariiɓe nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo baŋnge gulduɗum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: See Ozias nyima, ɓɛɛ ká mɔɔ-dɔ-fuu-nyama ɓɔna so kɔ̧ er-a. Ɓɛɛ sɛn tɛ ŋgimbi nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ zu o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, zɛɛ doko ku̧u̧naŋ gboa-a sɛn sɔnti-a nɛ̀ yí-wa sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN, ká̧ fara-dɔ-fuu-nyama.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: See Ozias nyima, ɓɛɛ ká mɔɔ-dɔ-fuu-nyama ɓɔna so kɔ̧ er-a. Ɓɛɛ sɛn tɛ ŋgimbi nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ zu o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, zɛɛ doko ku̧u̧naŋ gboa-a sɛn sɔnti-a nɛ̀ yí-wa sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN, ká̧ fara-dɔ-fuu-nyama.
Kapsiki_DC: Mɓɛke Oziyas nya kehimte geva takwa katetere 'wərdə hwepete wənə va ka dzeghe Shala. Taghanyɛ mbe cɛa shɛnyɛ, vare reghwetɛ ketere 'wərdə ba'a te kema ta ka dzeghe Shala, zlayɛ zlayɛ derena ncanyɛ kwa kema ve.
Tupurri: Wañ Osiyas hay de mo ma roë feçeçre do kay, raw roë jag jiili go. De maga aà roë jag jiili go ne jar sië jagn wo ti mokay no, ci kal caage äe go pele, nen jar sië jagn wo ni lage äi tiñ mani Manwur no, ti jeñ ngeel sië jag ma roë feçeçre foçoçre no no.

Francais: Le grand prêtre Azarias et tous les prêtres s'étant tournés vers lui, voici qu'il avait la lèpre au front. Ils le mirent précipitamment dehors, et lui-même se hâta de sortir, parce que Yahweh l'avait frappé.
Anglais: And Azariah the chief priest, and all the priests, looked upon him, and, behold, he was leprous in his forehead, and they thrust him out from thence; yea, himself hasted also to go out, because the  Lord  had smitten him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mul-ma-ɗifinna Azarya hiɗi muliyan-sa-ɗifinna kaf muɗ irsi kiramu, nisi ɗuw kayni moy-kuturun ka hay vokomu. Nisi gum iram goy jiy koloyo, nam kay tuwam kaw li tuwam koloyo kay kal goy jiya, kay Ma-Vatɗina watamawa.
Bulu: Ane ntuni nnen Azariahu a betuni bese be nga kôñelane be nye, ateme na zam é too nye asu. Nde be nga jiʼa kuli nye atan, a émiene fe a nga bo avôle ya kui atan, amu Nti a nga bibi nye.
Guiziga: masay Azariya, madiɗa ati masayay gar, ara purakaŋ, keɗ na, kukula a midibiɗe! A ɓuloko di kutum tir haya, joˀ naŋ vuna kwana, a wuso vu ng'avra, asi Bumbulvuŋ a gaŋ kukula le.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Azariya, hooreejo liman'en e liman'en woɗɓe fuu ngayliti haa maako, ngi'i saɗawre haa tiinde maako. Law ɓe ngurtini mo haykaliiru. Kaŋko bee hoore maako boo o yaawɗi wurtaago, ngam Jawmiraawo ukkani mo nyawu maajum.
Fulfulde_DC: Azariya, hooreejo liman'en e liman'en woɗɓe fuu ngayliti haa maako, ngi'i saɗawre haa tiinde maako. Law ɓe ngurtini mo haykaliiru. Kaŋko bee hoore maako boo o yaawɗi wurtaago, ngam Jawmiraawo ukkani mo nyawu maajum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Azaria in o dɔka wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ zɔka mɔ sitɛ-a, ɓɛɛ zɛɛ doko kpee sɔnti-a lɛŋ. Wa ira a̧ gbonɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbo nɛ̀ haya-a wen a̧ iŋa'e GASA WAN pi̧i̧ zɛɛ doko tɛ-wi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Azaria in o dɔka wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ zɔka mɔ sitɛ-a, ɓɛɛ zɛɛ doko kpee sɔnti-a lɛŋ. Wa ira a̧ gbonɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbo nɛ̀ haya-a wen a̧ iŋa'e GASA WAN pi̧i̧ zɛɛ doko tɛ-wi.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Azariya, wəndə kwelea ka dzeghe Shala le kweci ka dzeghe Shala nyi kenewe, nakɛ derena kenca kwa kema ve. Kahe kahe hɛ kelakave, ma kwa fate ŋkɛ le ghəa ŋkɛ nahe Mahwətə keɗate, pa ntsəte geva kashave mbe ŋkwa nya wɛŋe.
Tupurri: Asaryahu, je moobe ma joñ sië jagn wo de jar sië jagn wo äuy kal wo koge äe, kona diñ maga ci hay go de caage äe pele. AÀ kal wo äo'ge äe wo go siigi deparday, se de see äe hay mbe go temge lay werga Manwur hay caa ci äe go.

Francais: Le roi Ozias fut lépreux jusqu'au jour de sa mort, et il demeura dans une maison écartée, comme lépreux, car il fut exclu de la maison de Yahweh. Joatham, son fils, était à la tête de la maison du roi, jugeant le peuple du pays.
Anglais: And Uzziah the king was a leper unto the day of his death, and dwelt in a several house, being a leper; for he was cut off from the house of the  Lord : and Jotham his son was over the king's house, judging the people of the land.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla Oziyas mus hiɗi moy-kuturuna ta-ta hay buur ma mitta valamu, nam mus hay ziyda ta goy ŋayaya ki sa ma kuturuna nala. Kay nam digiɗiy goyo hay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina. Goora valamu Yotam ka musi vo hay ziyna kay ŋom mulda, nam ka ti mulda kay sum sa kay nagata.
Bulu: Njô bôt Ozias a mbe nkôkone zam a kui e môs a nga wu, a a nga tabe e ngume nda ane nzezam, amu be nga kuli nye atane ya Nda Nti. E mone wé Yôtam a mbe njôô ya nda njô bôt, a jôʼô fe bôte be nga too si ya Yuda.
Guiziga: Buy Oziyas a ndir ti kukula hã avu muc naŋ. Naŋ misi ti kukula tuwa na, sey a cifi pal naŋ ar hay naŋ baˀ avu mizli, asi a cifakaŋ baˀ avu hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ. Mangal naŋ Yotam, madiɗa ngi hay naŋ buyo, a wa mizli ngi si ruwuyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Saɗawre accaay laamiiɗo Uzziya haa yotti nyalaade maayde muuɗum. O jooɗi nder suudu wiccitiindu, o heɓaay nastugo haykaliiru Jawmiraawo, ngam o kuturuujo. Ɓiyiiko Yotam laati kaliifaajo laamorde, kaŋko waɗanta yimɓe lesdi kiita.
Fulfulde_DC: Saɗawre accaay laamiiɗo Uzziya haa yotti nyalaade maayde muuɗum. O jooɗi nder suudu wiccitiindu, o heɓaay nastugo haykaliiru Jawmiraawo, ngam o kuturuujo. Ɓiyiiko Yotam laati kaliifaajo laamorde, kaŋko waɗanta yimɓe lesdi kiita.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Zɛɛ doko ɓɔna tɛ wannu Ozias hɔ wese fio kɔ̧-a̧. Hegɔ wen zu zɛɛ‘i, a̧ ɔ so kɔ̧ ŋma tua ɛ̀nɛ́-a, wen wa foo a̧ nyɛi̧ nɛ̀ Tua ko GASA WAN. Bem kɔ̧-a̧ Yotam nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ gasawi zu o bíí nutua ko wannu ɔɔ wan zu nù.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Zɛɛ doko ɓɔna tɛ wannu Ozias hɔ wese fio kɔ̧-a̧. Hegɔ wen zu zɛɛ‘i, a̧ ɔ so kɔ̧ ŋma tua ɛ̀nɛ́-a, wen wa foo a̧ nyɛi̧ nɛ̀ Tua ko GASA WAN. Bem kɔ̧-a̧ Yotam nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ gasawi zu o bíí nutua ko wannu ɔɔ wan zu nù.
Kapsiki_DC: Mba meghe Oziyas le derena pa te mte ta ŋkɛ. Ma va zereghwea shɛ ne, ntishɛ ŋkɛ cakeɗake le kweci mbeli, kaɗema hweŋkwa kese kadzembe ghɛa Mahwətə ve zhɛkwa. Yotam, wəzege ta ŋkɛ nya te ghəa ghɛa meghe, yanza hweŋkwa ve kasleke hɛɗi.
Tupurri: Wañ Osiyas hay go de ci ye' haçaç wur huli äe, aà hay go äi tiñ maga go de caa nen sar do je ci nono, werga aà hay go de caa nen see tiñ mani Manwur no. Je ni äe Yotam maga hay diñ je waçaç waçaçre tiñ mani wañn cici mono hay waçaç waçaçre jar ma äi sir no.

Francais: Le reste des actes d'Ozias, les premiers et les derniers, Isaïe, fils d'Amos, le prophète les a écrits.
Anglais: Now the rest of the acts of Uzziah, first and last, did Isaiah the prophet, the son of Amoz, write.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Caw lopna vi Oziyas ma hinina, ma jewna hiɗi ma cawna kaw, nam ka ɗoy kay sa ma jobta Esaya, goora vi Amos.
Bulu: Mimboon mi Ozias mivok mi ya atataʼa a mi mia suʼulan, nkulu mejô Ezayi, e mone Amots, a nga tili mie.
Guiziga: Is ngi slra ngi Oziyasa, zle angi zli virzi naŋ hã avu kiɗa mi naŋ na, mijiviɗ Ezay, mangal ngi Amot a toho le.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Luttuɗum haala Uzziya e kuuɗe mum fuu, diga fuɗɗoode haa timmoode, annabi Esaaya ɓii Amoosa winndi ɗum.
Fulfulde_DC: Luttuɗum haala Uzziya e kuuɗe mum fuu, diga fuɗɗoode haa timmoode, annabi Esaaya ɓii Amoosa winndi ɗum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wi-tɔ̧-wen  oi nú Sɔ̧ Esaii bem ko Amɔs yɔra oi o tom ko Ozias tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ-a hɔ sɔŋkur-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wi-tɔ̧-wen  oi nú Sɔ̧ Esaii bem ko Amɔs yɔra oi o tom ko Ozias tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ-a hɔ sɔŋkur-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma nyi ketene slene ta Oziyas, se nyi keghate pa te kwa keɗaŋe ne, nde mɛ ŋkwa Ɛzayi wəzege ta Amots nde rafete hɛ.
Tupurri: Te joñre mani Osiyas wo no, ma tañgun wo de ma blam taw wo no, hay yer ra diñ Esay je ndar nen waçaçre ma jag Baa go, je ni Amots no.

Francais: Ozias se coucha avec ses pères dans le champ de la sépulture des rois, car on disait : "Il est lépreux." Joatham, son fils, régna à sa place.
Anglais: So Uzziah slept with his fathers, and they buried him with his fathers in the field of the burial which belonged to the kings; for they said, He is a leper: and Jotham his son reigned in his stead.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Oziyas miti kuɗ sumiyamu, nisi pum kat sumiyamu hay sinena ma pi muliyan, kay nisi di ala nam kuturu'u. Goora valamu Yotam ti mulda hay baŋalamu.
Bulu: Ane Ozias a nga bômbô vôme wua ba bʼésaa, be nga jame nye ba bʼésaa afube mesoñe bejô bôt: amu be mbe be jôʼô na: A ne nzezam. Ane Yôtam, e mone wé a nga jôô éjiane jé.
Guiziga: Ti Oziyas mumuc na, a dikakaŋ aciki dideˀ naŋhay, angi li ngi zivi ngi buyoy, asi a ɓam na: «Naŋ i misi kukula!» Dar mangal naŋ Yotam a zum buy ar li naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Uzziya maayi, ɓe uwi mo baŋnge genaale kaakiraaɓe maako nder hawriire laamiiɓe, ngam ɓe mbi'i: “O kuturuujo.” Ɓiyiiko Yotam laami haa pellel maako .
Fulfulde_DC: Uzziya maayi, ɓe uwi mo baŋnge genaale kaakiraaɓe maako nder hawriire laamiiɓe, ngam ɓe mbi'i: “O kuturuujo.” Ɓiyiiko Yotam laami haa pellel maako .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa guna Ozias in o dáà kɔ̧-a̧ ɓɛɛ bó nɛ́ sɛn fara gun o wannu na, wen wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e ndé, a̧ nɛ́ wi-doko; ɓɛɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Yotam ɔ wan oi-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa guna Ozias in o dáà kɔ̧-a̧ ɓɛɛ bó nɛ́ sɛn fara gun o wannu na, wen wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e ndé, a̧ nɛ́ wi-doko; ɓɛɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Yotam ɔ wan oi-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa mte ŋkɛ ne, pa mbeli lamte hwa kwele ta ka meghe, ama kwa nza ŋkɛ kande derena ne, kese mbeli kala kwa kwele ta ka yita ta nci we. Yotam, wəzege ta ŋkɛ nde kelete meghe te ŋkwa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Osiyas raw sugi go äiñ paçaçre äe wo, day aè raw teege äe see paçaçre äe wo äil pay ngeel tipaale mani wañren wo, werga aè hay waçaçge ti äe ga: AÀ go de ci. Je ni äe Yotam kal joñ wañ ti ngeel äe.

Francais: Joatham avait vingt-cinq ans lorsqu'il devint roi, et il régna seize ans à Jérusalem. Sa mère s'appelait Jérusa, fille de Sadoc.
Anglais: Jotham was twenty and five years old when he began to reign, and he reigned sixteen years in Jerusalem. His mother's name also was Jerusha, the daughter of Zadok.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yotam ka hiɗi busat dok-ma' yam vasl hay li ma nam tun mulu. Nam ti mulda ir busat doogo yam karkiya hay Yerusalem. Sulum semda va' Yerusa, na' ti goota vi Sadok.
Bulu: Yôtam a nga bili mimbu mewôm mebaé a mitan éyoñ a nga tebe njô bôt. A nga jôô mimbu awôm a misaman e Yérusalém. Nyia a mbe jôé na Yéruka, ngone Sadok.
Guiziga: Yotam micifi buy madiɗa na, naɓa naŋ ti vi kukur cuw nga zlum, a zum buy a Zeruzaleme vi kuruˀ nga merkeɗe. A zilaka mumuŋ naŋ Yerusa, zuŋ ngi Sadok.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yotam woodi duuɓi noogas e jowi, saa'i o laamo. O laami haa Urusaliima duuɓi sappo e joweego. Innde daada maako, Yeruusa ɓii Cadok.
Fulfulde_DC: Yotam woodi duuɓi noogas e jowi, saa'i o laamo. O laami haa Urusaliima duuɓi sappo e joweego. Innde daada maako, Yeruusa ɓii Cadok.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yotam a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ de pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk tɛ wan sɛn Jerusalɛm. Nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ Yɛrusa, boko-bem ko Sadɔk.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yotam a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ de pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk tɛ wan sɛn Jerusalɛm. Nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ Yɛrusa, boko-bem ko Sadɔk.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma nda dzembe meghe Yotam ne, bakemsə mcɛfeghəmbe va ta ŋkɛ, pa ŋkɛ menete va meŋe ŋkwaŋeghəmbe te meghe mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm. Sləa meghekɛ ne, Yerəwsha nya wəzha ta Sadok.
Tupurri: Kiñgi Yotam hay do äog ti dwee de maga aà kol ti wañ mono, day kal joñ wañ Jerusalem kiñgi hwal ti hiira'a. Ëu man äe hay ga Yerusa may ma Sadog.

Francais: Il fit ce qui est droit aux yeux de Yahweh, selon tout ce qu'avait fait Ozias, son père; seulement il n'entra point dans le temple de Yahweh; mais le peuple se corrompait encore.
Anglais: And he did that which was right in the sight of the  Lord , according to all that his father Uzziah did: howbeit he entered not into the temple of the  Lord . And the people did yet corruptly.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam li slen ma ɗigera vok ir Ma-Vatɗina, ŋray ca ki bulum Oziyas li nala. May nam min kal hay Tempella vi Ma-Vatɗinɗi. Suw kayni lo, sumun ka li tuwsi liwisi.
Bulu: A nga bo mam me ne mvaé e mise me Nti, foʼo vʼane ésaa wé Ozias a nga bo. Ve da a nji ke nyiin e Nda Zambe Nti. Nalé fe na bôt be nga ke ôsu a bo abé .
Guiziga: Yotam a gi gwat mikaslsla a mihiri ngi Bumbulvuŋ, heˀ kaɓa cine naŋ Oziyas, manja a ci ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ ɓula. Amma mizli a ndiram i mihiryahay le na si.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi ko fottani Jawmiraawo, bana baaba maako Uzziya waɗno fuu, bilaa woofugo bee nastugo nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo, ammaa ummaatoore tokki waɗugo kalluɗum.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi ko fottani Jawmiraawo, bana baaba maako Uzziya waɗno fuu, bilaa woofugo bee nastugo nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo, ammaa ummaatoore tokki waɗugo kalluɗum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yotam dee mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a ti GASA WAN, kànà hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Ozias dee so ga; a̧ yɔ kaya mɛ ye Tua ko Sɔ̧ na. Mɔ kpɔk, dukbíí nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ yaa kànà tɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ siti.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yotam dee mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a ti GASA WAN, kànà hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Ozias dee so ga; a̧ yɔ kaya mɛ ye Tua ko Sɔ̧ na. Mɔ kpɔk, dukbíí nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ yaa kànà tɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ siti.
Kapsiki_DC: Wəsə nya ɗe Mahwətə yamenete Yotam, tɛfɛa tɛfɛa kala nya se yitenyɛ Oziyas kamene, kaɗema kese kedzembe ghɛa Shala. Ama mbeli le ŋa nci ne, kehite dzeghwa ta nci hɛ we.
Tupurri: AÀ joñ fen ma de deele nen Manwur go ti ngeeln wo äuy do maga pan äe Osiyas hay joñ no lay no. Diñ ga ane aà kal äi tiñ mani Manwurn gaè. De dañge äuy pa mono, jarn hay glub wo go pa so yaw.

Francais: Joatham bâtit la porte supérieure de la maison de Yahweh, et fit beaucoup de constructions sur le mur d'Ophel.
Anglais: He built the high gate of the house of the  Lord , and on the wall of Ophel he built much.
