BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Wulin kayni, gurona vanu, hingi ŋel-vunda goyo; kay Ma-Vatɗin vilekgi kayni kay nigi ma lak vok iramu, kay li sunda valamu, ki sa sunda valam nala, kay ŋal urdin talamu.
Bulu: Eyoñe ji a bone bam, te beta biane mam éngbwemese, amu Nti a nga tobe mia na mi tebe ôsu vié a saane nye, na mi bo bebo bisaé bé a ve nye beôlobinda.
Guiziga: Ziri ɗuwoy, wurenna, ki slam himaˀ ta, asi Bumbulvuŋ a wini di i kum ngi cici a mbuŋ naŋ, ngi gaŋ mezegwel, ngi gaŋ slra waɗ ngi wuraŋ urdi.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓikkoy am, laate on tiɗɗiniiɓe, ngam Jawmiraawo suɓi on on ndaro yeeso maako, on kuuwana mo, on ngulana mo dokke.”
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓikkoy am, laate on tiɗɗiniiɓe, ngam Jawmiraawo suɓi on on ndaro yeeso maako, on kuuwana mo, on ngulana mo dokke.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war-a k’ɛ́nɛ́ o wiyɛ, k’ɛ́nɛ́ o nya'm, k’ɛ́nɛ́ ir tɛ‘nɛ́ ir de nɛ̀ mɔ na, wen nɛ́ ɛnɛ a̧ GASA WAN hoka mɛ yor ti a̧, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ɗafi a̧, dɔ nɛ̀ fuu-nyama, zɔn nɛ̀ a̧.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war-a k’ɛ́nɛ́ o wiyɛ, k’ɛ́nɛ́ o nya'm, k’ɛ́nɛ́ ir tɛ‘nɛ́ ir de nɛ̀ mɔ na, wen nɛ́ ɛnɛ a̧ GASA WAN hoka mɛ yor ti a̧, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ɗafi a̧, dɔ nɛ̀ fuu-nyama, zɔn nɛ̀ a̧.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma gheyɛ gɛ ŋwalea ɗa, mba yɛ kenza kaka pele se, kwa nza ŋkɛ gheyɛ yantave Mahwətə kaslete kwa kema ta ŋkɛ, nyi kehi hi kamene nda slene ba'a katere 'wərdə kazləvəa ŋkɛ.»
Tupurri: Patalam no, weere äi wo, men wee joñre ma bay faagen go. Werga Manwur hay hoo nday go maga nday mo lag pel äe ti joñre ne hene, ma joñge diñ weere joçoçre äe, day ma roë feçeçre foçoçre no ne hene.

Francais: Alors les lévites se levèrent : Mahath, fils d'Amasaï, Joël, fils d'Azarias, des fils des Caathites; des fils de Mérari, Cis fils d'Abdi, Azarias, fils de Jalaléel ; des Gersonites, Joah, fils de Zemma, Eden, fils de Joah;
Anglais: Then the Levites arose, Mahath the son of Amasai, and Joel the son of Azariah, of the sons of the Kohathites: and of the sons of Merari, Kish the son of Abdi, and Azariah the son of Jehalelel: and of the Gershonites; Joah the son of Zimmah, and Eden the son of Joah:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ki kayn nala sa Levitna yaw kulo'o, Mahat goora vi Amasay, Jowel goora vi Azariya, jar gurona vi sa Kehatna, jar gurona vi Merari, Kis goora vi Abdi, Azariya goora vi Yehalelel, jar gurona vi Gerson, Yowah goora vi Zimma, Eden goora vi Yowah;
Bulu: Nde Belévit ba be nga kôlô si na be bo ésaé: mfaʼa bone be Kehat: Mahat e mone Amasayi; Yôél e mone Azariahu, mfaʼa bone be Merari: Kis e mone Abdi, Azariahu e mone Yehaléleél; mfaʼa ya bone be Gerson: Yôa e mone Zima; Eden e mone Yôa;
Guiziga: Akẽh na, levihey a slikiɗam dedeŋ a mbuŋ: asi muy ngi Kehata, i ti: Mahat mangal ngi Amasay, Zowel mangal ngi Azariya. Asi muy ngi Merariheye, i ti: Kis, mangal ngi Abidi waɗ Azariya, mangal ngi Yehalelel. Asi muy ngi Gersoŋhoyo, i ti: Yoˀa, mangal ngi Zima waɗ Eden, mangal ngi Yoˀa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lewi'en huuwooɓe ngoni: Nder danygol Kahat, Mahat ɓii Amasay e Yo'el ɓii Azariya. Nder danygol Meraari, Kis ɓii Abdi e Azariya ɓii Yehallelel. Nder danygol Gersom, Yo'ahak ɓii Zimma e Eden ɓii Yo'ahak.
Fulfulde_DC: Lewi'en huuwooɓe ngoni: Nder danygol Kahat, Mahat ɓii Amasay e Yo'el ɓii Azariya. Nder danygol Meraari, Kis ɓii Abdi e Azariya ɓii Yehallelel. Nder danygol Gersom, Yo'ahak ɓii Zimma e Eden ɓii Yo'ahak.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi ka Lɛvi nyi kedzete kema nyi: Mahat, wəzege ta Amasay ba'a Zhowɛl, wəzege ta Azariya kwa yita ta Kɛhat, Kish, wəzege ta Abdi ba'a Azariya, wəzege ta Yehalɛlɛl kwa yita ta Merari, Yowa, wəzege ta Zima ba'a Ɛdɛn wəzege ta Yowa kwa yita ta Gɛrshon,
Tupurri: Do kay nono, jar Lefid kal wo go pudgi ciñ: Matad je ni Amasay no, Jowel je ni Asaniyahu no, ti moobe mani Kehad no. Kis je ni Abdi no, wo de Asariyahu je ni Yehalleleel wo ti moobe mani Merari. Yowa je ni Simma, Eden je ni Yowa no, ti moobe mani Gersom no.

Francais: des fils d'Elisaphan, Samri et Jahiel; des fils d'Asaph, Zacharias et Mathanias;
Anglais: And of the sons of Elizaphan; Shimri, and Jeiel: and of the sons of Asaph; Zechariah, and Mattaniah:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: jar gurona vi Elisafan, Simri hiɗi Yeyel; jar gurona vi Asaf, Zakariya hiɗi Mattaniya;
Bulu: mfaʼa bone be Elisafan: Simri a Yeiél; mfaʼa bone bʼAsaf: Zakari a Mataniahu;
Guiziga: Asi muy ngi Elisafaŋhaya, i ti: Simri ati Yeˀiyel. Asi muy ngi Asafaya, i ti: Zakari ati Mataniya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder danygol Elicafan boo, Simiri e Ye'iyel. Nder danygol Asaf, Zekariya e Mattaniya.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder danygol Elicafan boo, Simiri e Ye'iyel. Nder danygol Asaf, Zekariya e Mattaniya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: Shimri ba'a Yɛyiyɛl kwa yita ta Ɛlisafan, Zakari ba'a Mataniya kwa yita ta Asaf,
Tupurri: Simri wo de Yeyel ti moobe mani Elitsafan no. Sakari wo de Mattaniya no ti moobe mani Asaf no.

Francais: des fils d'Héman, Jahiel et Seméï; et des fils d'Idithun, Séméïas et Oziel.
Anglais: And of the sons of Heman; Jehiel, and Shimei: and of the sons of Jeduthun; Shemaiah, and Uzziel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: jar gurona vi Heman, Yehiyel hiɗi Simey; jar gurona vi Yedutun, Semayeya hiɗi Uziyel.
Bulu: mfaʼa bone be Eman: Yehiél a Simeyi; a mfaʼa bone be Yedutun: Semaéya a Uziél.
Guiziga: Asi muy ngi Hemana, i ti: Yeˀiyel ati Simey. Asi muy ngi Yedutuŋhoyo, i ti: Semaya ati Uziyel.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder danygol Heman, Yehiyel e Sim'i. Nder danygol Yedutuun, Sema'ya e Uzziyel.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder danygol Heman, Yehiyel e Sim'i. Nder danygol Yedutuun, Sema'ya e Uzziyel.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: Yɛhiyɛl ba'a Shimɛyi kwa yita ta Hɛman, Shemaya ba'a Əwziyɛl kwa yita ta Yedəwtəwn.
Tupurri: Yehiyel wo de Semey ti moobe mani Heman no. Semeya wo de Usiyel ti moobe mani Yedutun no.

Francais: Ils réunirent leurs frères et, après s'être sanctifiés, ils vinrent, selon l'ordre du roi, d'après les paroles de Yahweh, pour purifier la maison de Yahweh.
Anglais: And they gathered their brethren, and sanctified themselves, and came, according to the commandment of the king, by the words of the  Lord , to cleanse the house of the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi tok guro-biyosina, bugol li tuwsi goy peldet lina, nisi co'o kay muz ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗin goyo, kuɗ yoboyna vi Ma-Vatɗina ma mulla di tisiya.
Bulu: Be nga sulane bobenyañe bap, a éyoñ be maneya tune bebien, be nga zu tune Nda Nti avalʼabendé njô bôt é mbe a avalʼane mejô me Nti me mbe.
Guiziga: A kusoko sukum taŋhaya, a tiram taŋ pal. A dirba nah, a ram nga bi ti  dili   ngir hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ, kaɓa buy miɓa, yo kaɓa mingiɓi ngi Bumbulvuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kamɓe ɓe mooɓti banndiraaɓe maɓɓe, ɓe ceni ko'e maɓɓe. Nden ɓe njehi haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo, ngam haa ɓe laɓɓina ndu, bana laamiiɗo umruno ɓe fodde wolde Jawmiraawo.
Fulfulde_DC: Kamɓe ɓe mooɓti banndiraaɓe maɓɓe, ɓe ceni ko'e maɓɓe. Nden ɓe njehi haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo, ngam haa ɓe laɓɓina ndu, bana laamiiɗo umruno ɓe fodde wolde Jawmiraawo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa mɔi̧a ŋmaa nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa, wa  ɗafa  war-tɛ-wa ɓɛɛ wa bur war Tua ko GASA WAN mbɛt, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen ko wannu in nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN kɔ̧a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa mɔi̧a ŋmaa nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa, wa  ɗafa  war-tɛ-wa ɓɛɛ wa bur war Tua ko GASA WAN mbɛt, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen ko wannu in nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN kɔ̧a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛtɛ hɛ tsenete ka menəhɛ nci, pɛtɛ hɛ yaɓemte ghəa nci. Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ, kala ghena nya gezeke meghe ba'a kala ɗe ta Mahwətə, cape hɛ kadzembe ghɛa Shala kezha yaɓe.
Tupurri: AÀ kal wo tay heçeçre äaaran wo no, day blam maga saara façaç see äaara go façaç mono, aà kal wo nduugi façaç tiñ mani Manwurn go, ti jag wañ, day do maga waçaçre Manwur de dage nono.

Francais: Les prêtres entrèrent dans l'intérieur de la maison de Yahweh pour la purifier; ils firent sortir dans le parvis de la maison de Yahweh toutes les impuretés qu'ils trouvèrent dans le temple de Yahweh, et de là les lévites les prirent pour les emporter dehors à la vallée de Cédron.
Anglais: And the priests went into the inner part of the house of the  Lord , to cleanse it, and brought out all the uncleanness that they found in the temple of the  Lord  into the court of the house of the  Lord . And the Levites took it, to carry it out abroad into the brook Kidron.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Muliyan-sa-ɗifinna cuk kalaf hay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina kay muza' goyo; slen ma liwisna ma nisi fum hay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗin kaf nisi yawamay goyo, ta-ta tam slen ma hay wur-daŋŋa vi ziyna vi mulla kaw, sum sa Levitna yawam hay ɓisiya kay naram goy jiya hay zulla vi Sedron.
Bulu: Betuni be nga nyiin e nda Nti été mfaʼa ya tune je; be nga vaa e biôm bise bi ne mvin be nga koone bie e nda Nti été a kui minseñe ya Nda Nti, e vôme Belévit be nga nyoñe bie a kee bie atan ôtôñe Sédroñ.
Guiziga: Masayay a cam ng'ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ, ɓa a bam ti  dili   ngi haya, yo gwat misi  dili  hey, taŋ mulumaka taŋ gar ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ na, a boko taŋ nga wazlaray. A dirba nah, levihey a hilaka taŋ, a bam taŋ, ara zliɗaka taŋ ar hurjijiŋ a Sedroŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Liman'en boo nasti ndu, laɓɓini ndu. Ko soɓi nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo fuu, ɓe ngurtini ɗum haa daldal maaru. Lewi'en ɓofti ɗum, njahri ɗum yaasi haa Waadiwol Kederon.
Fulfulde_DC: Liman'en boo nasti ndu, laɓɓini ndu. Ko soɓi nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo fuu, ɓe ngurtini ɗum haa daldal maaru. Lewi'en ɓofti ɗum, njahri ɗum yaasi haa Waadiwol Kederon.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ yee kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN ha̧ wa mɛ bur war-a, ɓɛɛ wa pɛ o ndiŋmɔ nɛ̀ wa kpaa kɔ̧ gasa bɛr-tua ko GASA WAN gbonɛ si nú zala. O be Levii kaia mɔɔ nɔ‘i gbonɛ saaye nɛ́ɛ̀ a kɔ̧ gboŋgo Sɛdrɔŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ yee kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN ha̧ wa mɛ bur war-a, ɓɛɛ wa pɛ o ndiŋmɔ nɛ̀ wa kpaa kɔ̧ gasa bɛr-tua ko GASA WAN gbonɛ si nú zala. O be Levii kaia mɔɔ nɔ‘i gbonɛ saaye nɛ́ɛ̀ a kɔ̧ gboŋgo Sɛdrɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Shilimə ka dzeghe Shala mbe cɛ kezha yaɓe ŋkwa nya mbe: kəliɓə hɛ fəakave wəshi kwa wale wale nyi sləyi hɛ mbe ghɛa Shala kashave pelɛke te ŋwela. Kəliɓə ka Lɛvi fəte hɛ shave mbe meleme kalə kabete hɛ kwa zlərəa Sɛdron.
Tupurri: Jar sië jagn kal wo laage äil tiñ mani Manwurn ma façaçge äe go. AÀ hoo wo feçeçre ma de demge maga saara da' ra wo äil tiñ mani Manwurn wo ni go, haçaç go äi feele tiñ mani Manwur no, ti ngeel maga jar Lefid yaçaçn wo ni, ma hoo rage wo go laage äi tu ma Sedron no.

Francais: Ils commencèrent à purifier le premier jour du premier mois ; le huitième jour du mois, ils entrèrent dans le portique de Yahweh, et ils mirent huit jours à purifier la maison de Yahweh; le seizième jour du premier mois, ils avaient achevé.
Anglais: Now they began on the first day of the first month to sanctify, and on the eighth day of the month came they to the porch of the  Lord : so they sanctified the house of the  Lord  in eight days; and in the sixteenth day of the first month they made an end.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi tun caw li Tempella goy peldete hay buurta jewta vi til ma jewna; hay buurta glafandita vi tilla, nisi cuk kalaf hay diɓira vi Ma-Vatɗina, nisi li buur glafandi kay li ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗin goy peldete; hay buurta doogo yam karkiyata vi til ma jewn kayni, nisi vat lopnawa.
Bulu: Be nga taté ntunane Nda Nti e môs ôsu ya ngon ôsu; e môse muame be nga kui mbé si ya Nda Zambe; ntunan Nda Nti ôbien ô nga tabe fe melu muam, e ngone melu awôm a mesaman nye ésaé ése é nga man.
Guiziga: A zlaka tiram ti hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ pal na, ti hin mudumbuŋ ngi kiya. Ar hin midangafaɗ naŋ na, a ndiloko le ar jawleeru ngi Bumbulvuŋ. A gam hin dangafaɗ ar li tiri ti hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ pala. Ar hin mukuruˀ nga merkeɗ ngi kiya mudumbuŋ hana na, a kiɗaka mi ngi slra le.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder lewru aranndu, nyannde go'oore ɓe puɗɗi cenki haykaliiru. Nyannde joweetataɓre ɓe keɓi nastugo zawleeru haykaliiru Jawmiraawo. Nden ɓe ceni haykaliiru nyalɗe joweetati. Nyannde sappo e joweego'oore kuugal maɓɓe timmi.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder lewru aranndu, nyannde go'oore ɓe puɗɗi cenki haykaliiru. Nyannde joweetataɓre ɓe keɓi nastugo zawleeru haykaliiru Jawmiraawo. Nden ɓe ceni haykaliiru nyalɗe joweetati. Nyannde sappo e joweego'oore kuugal maɓɓe timmi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa ku̧u̧ so naŋ  ɗafa  war mɔ tɛ kuti wese tɛ kuti fio-zɛ; ɓɛɛ tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar ɔɔ-zɛ, wa hɔa tɛ nutua nɛ̀‘i ye nɛnɛ si kɔ̧ gɔna-bɛr-tua ko GASA WAN. Bura war Tua ko GASA WAN dea tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar; hegɔ, nɛ́ tɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk ɔɔ-zɛ tɛ fio-zɛ a̧ tom-aa kaɗa nɛnɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa ku̧u̧ so naŋ  ɗafa  war mɔ tɛ kuti wese tɛ kuti fio-zɛ; ɓɛɛ tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar ɔɔ-zɛ, wa hɔa tɛ nutua nɛ̀‘i ye nɛnɛ si kɔ̧ gɔna-bɛr-tua ko GASA WAN. Bura war Tua ko GASA WAN dea tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar; hegɔ, nɛ́ tɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk ɔɔ-zɛ tɛ fio-zɛ a̧ tom-aa kaɗa nɛnɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ ghate yaɓe ta ŋkɛ te kwa ghate ta hɛ mbe tere kwa ghate. Ma mbe kwa deghese ta hɛ ne, hwa'a kwa dapa ta ghɛa Mahwətə. Hɛ deghese menete hɛ kayaɓe cɛ shɛ zhɛkwa, ma te kwa meŋe ŋkwaŋeghəmbe ta hɛa tere ne, nahe slenea shɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ tï¡ï¡ wo wer façaç tiñ Baan go diñ nen naw ma tañgun äil few ma tañgu no. Wur naw ma de nenma' äil fewn mono, aà kal wo laage äil jewlere mani Manwur no, day joñ wo naw façaç tiñ mani Manwurn nenma'a. Wur naw ma de hwal ti hiira' äil fewn mono, saara hay tawn go.

Francais: Ils se rendirent ensuite chez le roi Ezéchias et dirent: "Nous avons purifié toute la maison de Yahweh, l'autel des holocaustes et tous ses ustensiles, et la table de proposition et tous ses ustensiles.
Anglais: Then they went in to Hezekiah the king, and said, We have cleansed all the house of the  Lord , and the altar of burnt offering, with all the vessels thereof, and the shewbread table, with all the vessels thereof.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugolda nisi cuk kalaf tam mulla Ezekiyas, nisi di'e: Ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina numa muza'awa goyo, giwin-ma-ɗifinna ma ŋat farayna hiɗi sle ma li lop hiɗi namna kaf, tablena hiɗi fun ma zlarayna hiɗi slen ma li lop hiɗi namna kaf.
Bulu: Ane be nga ke be njô bôt Ezékias a jô nye na: Bi maneya tune Nda Nti ése, ataʼa metunaʼa mimvean ba diʼi ngumba a biôm mebelan bise yʼété, e tawôlô ba beté minnoñ mi belet a biôme mebelan bise yʼété.
Guiziga: Dar akẽh na, a ram ngi hay buy Ezekiyasa, a ɓakaŋ na: «Buy, i bam ti  dili   ngir hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ le gar, waɗ ngir li gi mikuli mizlam zlam wãˀa, jom ati ngi gwat ngi slra naŋhaya, ngi tabul ngi pi ɗafahay jom ati ngi gwat ngi slra naŋhaya,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe nasti saare laamiiɗo, ɓe mbi'i mo: “Min laɓɓini haykaliiru Jawmiraawo fuu, non boo hirsirde guleteeɗi bee kuuwruɗe maare fuu e taabal tamseeje jo'inteeɗe bee kuuwruɗe maare fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe nasti saare laamiiɗo, ɓe mbi'i mo: “Min laɓɓini haykaliiru Jawmiraawo fuu, non boo hirsirde guleteeɗi bee kuuwruɗe maare fuu e taabal tamseeje jo'inteeɗe bee kuuwruɗe maare fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O be Levii nɛ̀ɛ́ tɛ ko wannu Ezɛkias, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ɛɛ bura war Tua ko GASA WAN lɛŋ, fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧, taŋe e brɛt zu-a ha̧ Sɔ̧, in o mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ lɛŋ,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O be Levii nɛ̀ɛ́ tɛ ko wannu Ezɛkias, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ɛɛ bura war Tua ko GASA WAN lɛŋ, fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧, taŋe e brɛt zu-a ha̧ Sɔ̧, in o mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ lɛŋ,
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ, cape ka Lɛvi kalə sha meghe Ɛzɛkiyas, ma ke hɛ shɛ: «Maze yawe, nahe ghen'yɛ keyaɓemte ghɛa Mahwətə pɛtɛ, pa le reghwetɛ kedzeghe melɛ kwa tere tere ba'a le tabele nya bete ɗafa nyi keleke nda mbeli ke Shala mbeli te, pɛtɛ le wəshi kemene slene ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ kal wo laage blam sen liñ ni wañ, Esekiyase, day wo ga: Wuur façaç tiñ mani Manwurn we go, ngeel sië jag maga aè roë mo äen go äuy mono, de feçeçre joñre äen wo äuy, table maga aà sra' hole peçeç wo ni mono de feçeçre joñre äen wo äuy.

Francais: Et tous les ustensiles que le roi Achaz avait profanés pendant son règne, lors de ses transgressions, nous les avons remis en état et purifiés ; ils sont devant l'autel de Yahweh."
Anglais: Moreover all the vessels, which king Ahaz in his reign did cast away in his transgression, have we prepared and sanctified, and, behold, they are before the altar of the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Numa kotomawa goy ŋaa'a hay liyamna, slen kaf ma mulla Ahaz hay bay-ɗigerta valamu muɗum liwisi hay li ma nam ka ti mulda kaw, numa muzumawa goy ŋaa'a. Nam ka tani vok giwin-ma-ɗifinna vi Ma-Vatɗina.
Bulu: Bi maneya kôm a tune biôm bise njô bôt Akaz, ékotekote jé été, a ndaman étyi éyoñ a nga jôô: bi ne ôsu ataʼa metunaʼa.
Guiziga: waɗ ngi gwatay, buy Ahas mizliɗa taŋ lambaˀ zleˀe ti ziriɗa mi naŋ ar zuma buyo. Gwat tayna, i ɗiyaka taŋ le ar li taŋhaya, yo i tiram taŋ le pal. I paka taŋ le sek a mbuŋ li gi mikuli da Bumbulvuŋ.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kuuje ɗe laamiiɗo Akas soɓnino wakkati laamu mum fuu nde o yewno umroore Allah, min taaskitini ɗe, min ceni ɗe. Ɗe ɗon ndari yeeso hirsirde Jawmiraawo.”
Fulfulde_DC: Kuuje ɗe laamiiɗo Akas soɓnino wakkati laamu mum fuu nde o yewno umroore Allah, min taaskitini ɗe, min ceni ɗe. Ɗe ɗon ndari yeeso hirsirde Jawmiraawo.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: gú nɛ̀ o mɔ nɛ̀ wannu Ahaz ɗaŋa war-a ŋgimbi n'aa ee nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ duk. Ɛɛ kaia wa a si ɗoŋ woyo, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ ɗafi wa; mɔɔ nɔ‘i a̧a̧ ti fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧ ha̧ GASA WAN.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: gú nɛ̀ o mɔ nɛ̀ wannu Ahaz ɗaŋa war-a ŋgimbi n'aa ee nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ duk. Ɛɛ kaia wa a si ɗoŋ woyo, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ ɗafi wa; mɔɔ nɔ‘i a̧a̧ ti fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧ ha̧ GASA WAN.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma wəshi nyi keveyi geva tekeleke kaŋa Shala nyi zhɛremte nyi meghe Ahaz wale wale mbe və nya nza meghea ŋkɛ wale wale ne, pɛtɛ hiyi hɛ ghen'yɛ te ŋkwa nci kaveyi hɛ tekeleke zhɛkwa. Wa nyi hɛ nyi kwa kema ta reghwetɛa Mahwətə.»
Tupurri: Wuur fer feçeçre maga wañ Ahas hay dem ra go ti wur maga se ti wañ de ndarge gog äen wo we ti ngeel äe de ele. AÀ wo de laage pel ngeel sië jag mani Manwur no.

Francais: Le roi Ezéchias, s'étant levé de bon matin, assembla les chefs de la ville et monta à la maison de Yahweh.
Anglais: Then Hezekiah the king rose early, and gathered the rulers of the city, and went up to the house of the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla Ezekiyas fok kulo graw culum, nam tok sa ŋulona vi hoyok-ziyna, nam kal kalaf hay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina.
Bulu: Ndibe tyé, njô bôt Ezékias a nga kôlô si a sulane bivete ya tison a bet e Nda Nti.
Guiziga: Prik prik ngi li naŋ muwun na, buy Ezekiyas a cikila buyoy ngir walahaya, a jiɗam ng'ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ bummoˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jaŋngo man, laamiiɗo Hezekiya dawi cub, mooɓti mawɓe berniwol, yehi haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo.
Fulfulde_DC: Jaŋngo man, laamiiɗo Hezekiya dawi cub, mooɓti mawɓe berniwol, yehi haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɛ bin mɛ tutuyɛ sut, wannu Ezɛkias mɔi̧a o gasawi saaye, ɓɛɛ a̧ daŋ si kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɛ bin mɛ tutuyɛ sut, wannu Ezɛkias mɔi̧a o gasawi saaye, ɓɛɛ a̧ daŋ si kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.
Kapsiki_DC: Masheke masheke te hendɛ ta ŋkwa, pa meghe Ɛzɛkiyas tsenete mbelia jama nyi te ghəa meleme, tarame hɛ pelɛ ghɛa Mahwətə.
Tupurri: Esekiyas kal urgi go ciñ de jag toñ mbuhu, kal tay ti wañre ma äi leegen wo, kal rawge äi tiñ mani Manwur no.

Francais: Ils présentèrent sept taureaux, sept béliers, sept agneaux et sept boucs, en sacrifice pour le péché, pour le royaume, pour le sanctuaire et pour Juda. Le roi dit aux prêtres, fils d'Aaron, de les offrir sur l'autel de Yahweh.
Anglais: And they brought seven bullocks, and seven rams, and seven lambs, and seven he goats, for a sin offering for the kingdom, and for the sanctuary, and for Judah. And he commanded the priests the sons of Aaron to offer them on the altar of the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi mar luway-jufayn siɗiya, fok-gamalan siɗiya, guro fok-dimin siɗiya, fok-ŋekŋ siɗiya kaw, kay lum ɗifin kay mulda, kay liyn ma peldetna, kay Yuda kaf kaw. Mulla di tam sa muliyan-sa-ɗifinna gurona vi Aaron ala nisi ma lum ɗifini kulo kay giwin-ma-ɗifinna vi Ma-Vatɗina.
Bulu: Nde be nga kee beyôm benyak zamgbwa, beyôm mintômba zamgbwa, bitoñ mintômba zamgbwa a beyôm bikela zamgbwa asu mimveane ya njaman abé; be nga ve biôm bite asu nda njô bôt, nda é nʼétyi a asu ayoñe Yuda. Ane njô bôt a nga jô betuni, bone bʼAron na be ve bie e ataʼa metunaʼa Nti.
Guiziga: A soko ti gusoŋ tarnaˀ, zlengerek tarnaˀ, ziri tumuŋhoy tarnaˀ, bazuway tarnaˀ, ɓa a gam taŋ mikuli ngi pula mungra ngi mizli ngi hay buyoy, ngi hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ waɗ ngi mizli Zudahaya. Buy a ɓa masayay, dideˀ ngi Aroŋhoyo, ɓa a gam taŋ mikuli ar li gi mikuli da Bumbulvuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ngaddi ga'i kalhali joweeɗiɗi e jawɗi baali joweeɗiɗi e njawkoy njoweeɗiɗoy e jawɗi be'i joweeɗiɗi kirseteeɗi ngam ittuki hakkeeji nder laamu e suudu seniindu e Yahuuda fuu. Hezekiya umri liman'en danygol Haruna lii'ano ɗi Jawmiraawo dow hirsirde.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ngaddi ga'i kalhali joweeɗiɗi e jawɗi baali joweeɗiɗi e njawkoy njoweeɗiɗoy e jawɗi be'i joweeɗiɗi kirseteeɗi ngam ittuki hakkeeji nder laamu e suudu seniindu e Yahuuda fuu. Hezekiya umri liman'en danygol Haruna lii'ano ɗi Jawmiraawo dow hirsirde.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa kaia o wiwii ndai mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, vala sami mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo,  be-sami  mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo in vala gbadua mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo mbɛt ha̧ nɛ̀ ha̧a̧mɔ-gaŋmɔ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ nú tua ko wannu in  sa̧a̧-fara  in zu o be Juda. Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o bezaŋ Arɔŋ mɛ dɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ zu  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧  ko GASA WAN.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa kaia o wiwii ndai mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, vala sami mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo,  be-sami  mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo in vala gbadua mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo mbɛt ha̧ nɛ̀ ha̧a̧mɔ-gaŋmɔ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ nú tua ko wannu in  sa̧a̧-fara  in zu o be Juda. Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o bezaŋ Arɔŋ mɛ dɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ zu  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧  ko GASA WAN.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ fəke mcɛmcɛli mberefaŋe, gamea lɛmə mberefaŋe, zhɛgwəa lɛmə timɛti mberefaŋe ba'a zhɛfa lɛmə mberefaŋe kezha dzeghe melɛ keyaɓe jaɗafa va Shala. Ma nda dzeghekɛ geva melɛ nyi ne, kezha mbelia ghɛa meghe, ŋkwa nya keveyi geva tekeleke kaŋa Shala ba'a ka Zhəwda pɛtɛ. Pa meghe ndeke nda hweŋkwa ke ka dzeghe Shala nyi kahwelefefia Aron kadzeghe melɛ te reghwetɛa Mahwətə.
Tupurri: AÀ kal nduugi de blore dere ma joñ siigi jag go ti älagge renam, weere saçaçre renam de toloñre renam, ma joñ siigi jag go ti wañ no, ti tiñ ma bay ëagn wo de Juda. Wañ wii jar sië jag jar ni AÈron wo ga aà mo joñ wo siigi jag sen wo ti ngeel sië jag mani Manwur no.

Francais: Ils immolèrent les boeufs, et les prêtres recueillirent le sang, qu'ils répandirent sur l'autel; ils immolèrent les béliers, et répandirent le sang sur l'autel; ils immolèrent les agneaux, et répandirent le sang sur l'autel.
Anglais: So they killed the bullocks, and the priests received the blood, and sprinkled it on the altar: likewise, when they had killed the rams, they sprinkled the blood upon the altar: they killed also the lambs, and they sprinkled the blood upon the altar.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Muliyan-sa-ɗifinna ŋat luwayna, nisi vi busuwna, yamam kulo kay giwin-ma-ɗifinna; nisi ŋat fok-gamalana, yamam busuwam kulo kay giwin-ma-ɗifinna, nisi ŋat guro fok-dimina, yamam busuwam kulo kay giwin-ma-ɗifinna kaw.
Bulu: Nde betuni be nga tyiʼi beyôm benyak, be nyoñe metyi a miame me ataʼa metunaʼa yôp; be nga tyiʼi fe beyôm mintômba a miame metyi yʼété ataʼa metunaʼa yôp; be nga tyiʼi bitoñ mintômba a miame metyi yʼété ataʼa metunaʼa yôp.
Guiziga: A slaka ˀay ngi gusoŋhoy tuwa, masayay a tiɓaka pumbuso, a paka ng'ar li gi mikuli. A slaka ˀay ngi izimey waɗ ngi zlengerekey tuwa, masayay a tiɓaka pumbus taŋhaya, a paka ng'ar li gi mikuli.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe kirsi ga'i go. Liman'en koo'i ƴiiƴam maaji, mbicci ɗam haa hirsirde. Nden ɓe kirsi jawɗi baali, ɓe mbicci ƴiiƴam maaji haa hirsirde. Nden ɓe kirsi njawkoy, ɓe mbicci ƴiiƴam maakoy haa hirsirde.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe kirsi ga'i go. Liman'en koo'i ƴiiƴam maaji, mbicci ɗam haa hirsirde. Nden ɓe kirsi jawɗi baali, ɓe mbicci ƴiiƴam maaji haa hirsirde. Nden ɓe kirsi njawkoy, ɓe mbicci ƴiiƴam maakoy haa hirsirde.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa gɔna o ndai, ɓɛɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ɗu tɔk-aa gbai a zu  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ . Wa gɔna o vala sami in o  be-sami  mbɛt, ɓɛɛ wa gbai tɔk-aa a zu  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ .
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa gɔna o ndai, ɓɛɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ɗu tɔk-aa gbai a zu  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ . Wa gɔna o vala sami in o  be-sami  mbɛt, ɓɛɛ wa gbai tɔk-aa a zu  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ .
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ka dzeghe Shala slamte ghə te mcɛmcɛli nyighɛ. Pa hɛ taweve mimi kayisəte te reghwetɛ. Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ, pa hɛ slamte ghə te game lɛmə, kakwa keɗaŋe zhɛgwəa lɛmə timɛti: tsagha shɛ yisə mimi ka dzeghe Shala te reghwetɛ.
Tupurri: Jar sië jagn kal wo ngaë dere no, yaçaç ci no, kal wo jwedge äe ti ngeel sië jag no. AÀ kal wo ngaë gamlaren wo no, kal wo jwed ci ti ngeel sië jag no. AÀ kal wo ngaë weere saçaçren wo no, kal wo jwed ci ti ngeel sië jag no.

Francais: Puis ils firent approcher les boucs pour le péché devant le roi et l'assemblée, et tous posèrent la main sur eux.
Anglais: And they brought forth the he goats for the sin offering before the king and the congregation; and they laid their hands upon them:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugolda nisi mar fok-ŋekŋa ma kay sulukŋa vok mulla vi tokŋa, mulla hiɗi sumun tun ɓisi kalamu.
Bulu: Be nga zuu fe beyôm bikela asu njaman abé ôsu be njô bôt a ékôane bôt ése be ve beté mo map e be be.
Guiziga: A dirba nah, bazuwayay ngi gi mikuli ngi pula mungra na, a soko taŋ nga mbuŋ buy ati zigiduwo, dar buy ati zigiduwo, a bucaka haŋ ar taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓaawo man ɓe ngaddi jawɗi be'i kirseteeɗi ngam ittuki hakkeeji, ɓe ndarni ɗi yeeso laamiiɗo e mooɓtiiɓe fuu. Kamɓe ɓe njowi juuɗe maɓɓe dow maaji.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓaawo man ɓe ngaddi jawɗi be'i kirseteeɗi ngam ittuki hakkeeji, ɓe ndarni ɗi yeeso laamiiɗo e mooɓtiiɓe fuu. Kamɓe ɓe njowi juuɗe maɓɓe dow maaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko o vala gbadua wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ, wa kaia wa nɛnɛ a ti wannu in ti gíí o be  Israɛl  nɛ̀ mɔi̧a; ɓɛɛ wannu in o ŋma bíí e er zu wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko o vala gbadua wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ, wa kaia wa nɛnɛ a ti wannu in ti gíí o be  Israɛl  nɛ̀ mɔi̧a; ɓɛɛ wannu in o ŋma bíí e er zu wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwetere wəmbəa ŋkɛ, pa hɛ fəke zhɛfa lɛmə kedzeghe melɛ keyaɓe jaɗafa kadzete kema ta yɛ meghe le tsene ta mbeli. Pa yɛ meghe le kweci mbeli dedapeyi dzeve te hɛ.
Tupurri: Blam aè kal ya' togloñre ma joñ siigi jag go ti älaggen wo pel wañ wo de tayge no, maga kal wo kañ do äaara ti äaara.

Francais: Les prêtres les égorgèrent et avec leur sang ils firent l'expiation à l'autel, faisant l'expiation pour tout Israël; car c'était pour tout Israël que le roi avait ordonné l'holocauste et le sacrifice pour le péché.
Anglais: And the priests killed them, and they made reconciliation with their blood upon the altar, to make an atonement for all Israel: for the king commanded that the burnt offering and the sin offering should be made for all Israel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Muliyan-sa-ɗifinna ŋatamu, yamam busuwam kulo'o kay giwin-ma-ɗifinna kay ɗifin ma kay sulukŋa, ki poora kay sa Israyel kaf, kay mulla di ala ɗifin ma ŋal-goyna hiɗi ɗifin ma kay sulukŋa nam ma li kay sa Israyel kaf.
Bulu: Nde betuni be nga tyiʼi be tyiñ a miame metyi map ataʼa metunaʼa yôp, asu njaman abé Israél ase; amu njô bôt a nga jô na, mvean wo diʼibane ngumba a mvean asu njaman abé bi ne asu Israél ase.
Guiziga: Masayay, a slaka ˀay taŋ, a tiɓaka pumbus taŋ, a paka ng'ar li gi mikuli ɓa ngi zuɓa mungra ngi Israyeley gar, vur mike na, mikuli mizlam zlam ati mikuli ngi pula mungra, buy miɓi ɓa a gaka na, vur Israyeley gar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden liman'en kirsi ɗi, lii'i ɗi bee ƴiiƴam maaji haa hirsirde ngam ittuki hakkeeji Isra'iila fuu. Ngam laamiiɗo umruno ɓe lii'o guleteeɗi e kirseteeɗi man ngam daliila yimɓe Isra'iila fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden liman'en kirsi ɗi, lii'i ɗi bee ƴiiƴam maaji haa hirsirde ngam ittuki hakkeeji Isra'iila fuu. Ngam laamiiɗo umruno ɓe lii'o guleteeɗi e kirseteeɗi man ngam daliila yimɓe Isra'iila fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ gɔna o gbadua nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ gbai tɔk-aa a zu  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧  wen ha̧ o be  Israɛl  nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ mɛ kpa ea-ɗaŋmɔ. Wannu ha̧a̧ so kànà nú‘e, o dùk ha̧a̧mɔ nɔ‘i yiitoo'i,  dɔɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧  in ha̧a̧mɔ-gaŋmɔ, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen zu o be  Israɛl .
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ gɔna o gbadua nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ gbai tɔk-aa a zu  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧  wen ha̧ o be  Israɛl  nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ mɛ kpa ea-ɗaŋmɔ. Wannu ha̧a̧ so kànà nú‘e, o dùk ha̧a̧mɔ nɔ‘i yiitoo'i,  dɔɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧  in ha̧a̧mɔ-gaŋmɔ, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen zu o be  Israɛl .
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ka dzeghe Shala slamte ghə te hɛ, kayisəyi mimia nci te reghwetɛ kezha kelemte beze ghena ta pɛtɛa ka Israyɛl Shala te wənə. Kwa nza ŋkɛ ne, nahe meghe kegezete kezha dzeghe melɛ mbeli keghə keghə bake kezha mbeli pɛtɛ.
Tupurri: Jar sië jagn kal wo ngaë rage go day kal wo joñ ci äaaran ti ngeel sië jagn do siigi jag maporge go ti sir Israyel äuy. Werga wañ hay waçaç go ga siigi jag maga aè roë mo äen go äuy de siigi jag ma ti älaggen mokay joñ ge diñ ma Israyel äuy.

Francais: Il fit placer les lévites dans la maison de Yahweh avec des cymbales, des cithares et des harpes, selon l'ordre de David, de Gad, le voyant du roi, et de Nathan le prophète; car cet ordre venait de Yahweh, par l'organe de ses prophètes.
Anglais: And he set the Levites in the house of the  Lord  with cymbals, with psalteries, and with harps, according to the commandment of David, and of Gad the king's seer, and Nathan the prophet: for so was the commandment of the  Lord  by his prophets.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam lak sa Levitna hay ziyna vi Ma-Vatɗina hiɗi kaway-ma-cina, dilla hiɗi dil ŋulona, kuɗ hagata ta David hiɗi Gad, sa ma wi vokomna vi mulla hiɗi sa ma jobta Natan vul tisiya. Kay kayni ti dita vi Ma-Vatɗina, ta nam vula'a hay vun sa jobta valamu.
Bulu: Ane a nga telé Belévit e nda Nti be bili biwoé, memvet a bingombé, avalʼane mebendé me David, Gad ñyene mame njô bôt, a nkulu mejô Natan me mbe; amu abendé te é mbe di Nti nde a nga kalan anyu bekulu mejô bé.
Guiziga: Buy a cifa leviheye ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ, ti jãwjãway, ti gujuvuroy waɗ garayahay a haŋ, kaɓa ɓi ngi Davit miɓa ati ngi Gat, mbur mupur waɗ ngi mijiviɗ Nataŋ. Asi ɓi miɓa nah na, i ɓi ngi Bumbulvuŋ mubo tivi mijiviɗ naŋhay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hezekiya darni Lewi'en haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo bee koŋsiije e moolooji e garayaaji fodde umroore Daawuda e Gada gi'anoowo Daawuda e annabi Natan ngam umroore nde iwi diga Jawmiraawo bee kunnduɗe annabi'en muuɗum.
Fulfulde_DC: Hezekiya darni Lewi'en haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo bee koŋsiije e moolooji e garayaaji fodde umroore Daawuda e Gada gi'anoowo Daawuda e annabi Natan ngam umroore nde iwi diga Jawmiraawo bee kunnduɗe annabi'en muuɗum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ kaia o be Levii a kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ o sɔkɔ, o kunde, in o koloŋ er-wa nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko David, in ko o  wi-tɔ̧-wen  oi nú Sɔ̧ ko wannu, Gad in Nataŋ. Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen tɛɛ so nɛ̀ tɛ GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ o  wi-tɔ̧-wen  oi nú Sɔ̧ we ɗoŋ-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ kaia o be Levii a kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ o sɔkɔ, o kunde, in o koloŋ er-wa nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko David, in ko o  wi-tɔ̧-wen  oi nú Sɔ̧ ko wannu, Gad in Nataŋ. Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen tɛɛ so nɛ̀ tɛ GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ o  wi-tɔ̧-wen  oi nú Sɔ̧ we ɗoŋ-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa meghe veyi ka Lɛvi mbe ghɛa Mahwətə le wəshi ketsa ta nci: yɛ gagera, yɛ ŋgwəleŋə ba'a getsepele, kala nya ghena nya gezeke David ba'a ka mɛ ŋkwa ta meghe, yɛ Gad le Natan. Kwa nza ŋkɛ ne, va Mahwətə ghena shɛ, laka mɛa ka mɛ ŋkwa ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ kal lag jar Lefid wo äi tiñ mani Manwurn de kondoloñ wo, de mandilna wo, de dilna wo do ti jag Dafidi, ti jag Gad je ko nen mani wañn wo de Natan je ndar nen waçaçre ma jag Baa go no. Werga aà hay diñ waçaçre maga Manwur go de waçaçge äe ne jar ndar nen waçaçre äen wo jage.

Francais: Les lévites prirent place avec les instruments de David, et les prêtres avec les trompettes.
Anglais: And the Levites stood with the instruments of David, and the priests with the trumpets.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa Levitna lak gaa'a hiɗi sle ma gi nulla vi David hay ɓisiya, muliyan-sa-ɗifinna hiɗi togolomna may.
Bulu: Belévit be nga tebe be bili bibômebômé bi David, a betuni ki be bili metoñ.
Guiziga: Leviheye, ti taŋ micifam jojoˀ ti gwat ngi dunguroy, Davit miɗiya taŋ tuwa, yo masayaya kwana, ti za raˀahaya na,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lewi'en ndari ton bee kuuje gimruɗe ɗe Daawuda waɗno, liman'en boo bee algaytaaji.
Fulfulde_DC: Lewi'en ndari ton bee kuuje gimruɗe ɗe Daawuda waɗno, liman'en boo bee algaytaaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o be Levii baa fara nɛ̀ o mɔɔ-mbɛr nɛ̀ David dee so, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ kaia mbia kaɗi,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o be Levii baa fara nɛ̀ o mɔɔ-mbɛr nɛ̀ David dee so, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ kaia mbia kaɗi,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ka Lɛvi dzete ŋkwa nci le wəshi ketsa nyi meghwete David, ba'a ka dzeghe Shala laka ŋa nci bela le yɛ veke.
Tupurri: Jar Lefid kal wo lagge de feçeçre joçoç mani Dafid wo no, jar sië jagn kal wo lagge de coçoçn wo lay.

Francais: Et Ezéchias dit d'offrir l'holocauste, sur l'autel. Au moment où commença l'holocauste, commencèrent aussi le chant de Yahweh et le son des trompettes, accompagnés avec les instruments de David, roi d'Israël.
Anglais: And Hezekiah commanded to offer the burnt offering upon the altar. And when the burnt offering began, the song of the  Lord  began also with the trumpets, and with the instruments ordained by David king of Israel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ezekiyas di kay nisi ma li ɗifin ma ŋal-goyna kulo kay giwin-ma-ɗifinna. Hay li ma nisi tun caw li ɗifin ma ŋal-goyna, nisi tun caw gi nulla tam Ma-Vatɗina, hiɗi togolomna, tapay hiɗi sle ma gi nulla vi David, mulla vi Israyel.
Bulu: Ane Ezékias a nga jô na be ve mvean wo diʼibane ngumba ataʼa metunaʼa yôp. Eyoñe mvean wo diʼibane ngumba wo taté, éyoñe te fe nyiane bia asu Nti ô nga taté a metoñ a bibômebômé bi David njô bôte ya Israél.
Guiziga: Ezekiyas a ɓa mizli, a gam mikuli mizlam zlam ar li gi mikuli, yo hirak ti taŋ mira zlaka gi mikuli mizlam zlam tuwa na, a zlaka zli dimis ngi hunuma Bumbulvuŋ ya, a faka za raˀahaya asi gwat ngi kiɗ ngi dunguroy, Davit, buy Israyel miɗiya taŋ tuwa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Hezekiya umri lii'aago guleteeɗi dow hirsirde. Saa'i liman'en puɗɗi lii'aago ɗi, yimooɓe puɗɗi yimango Jawmiraawo e fuufugo algaytaaji, bee kuuje gimruɗe ɗe Daawuda, laamiiɗo Isra'iila.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Hezekiya umri lii'aago guleteeɗi dow hirsirde. Saa'i liman'en puɗɗi lii'aago ɗi, yimooɓe puɗɗi yimango Jawmiraawo e fuufugo algaytaaji, bee kuuje gimruɗe ɗe Daawuda, laamiiɗo Isra'iila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ezɛkias tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ dɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ sɛn  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ . Ŋgimbi nɛ̀  dɔɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧  ku̧u̧ naŋ, wa ŋmaa nú-wa tɛ gima zɔn nɛ̀ GASA WAN, dɔm nɛ̀ mbia in mbɛr nɛ̀ o kunde nɛ̀ David wannu  Israɛl  dee so.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ezɛkias tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ dɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ sɛn  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ . Ŋgimbi nɛ̀  dɔɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧  ku̧u̧ naŋ, wa ŋmaa nú-wa tɛ gima zɔn nɛ̀ GASA WAN, dɔm nɛ̀ mbia in mbɛr nɛ̀ o kunde nɛ̀ David wannu  Israɛl  dee so.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Ɛzɛkiyas gezete kezha dzeghe melɛ kwa tere tere te reghwetɛ. Vəa ŋkwa nya ghate geva dzeghe melɛ, ntake mbeli kagha cimə te zləvəa Mahwətə, zlaɓe le vɛ ta yɛ veke ba'a wəshi ketsa ta David, meghea ka Israyɛl.
Tupurri: Esekiyas kal waçaçge ga joñ siigi jag maga aè roë mo äen go äuy ti ngeel sië jag no. Day de maga siigi jag maga aè roë mo äen go äuy tï¡ï¡ wer mono, siñ mani Manwur kal tï¡ï¡ wer lay de coçoç ma wer äen wo, de feçeçre joçoç mani Dafid wañ Israyeln wo no.

Francais: Toute l'assemblée se prosterna, on chanta le cantique et l'on sonna des trompettes, le tout jusqu'à ce que l'holocauste fut achevé.
Anglais: And all the congregation worshipped, and the singers sang, and the trumpeters sounded: and all this continued until the burnt offering was finished.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sumun kaf dab voksi gaa'a, nisi gi nulla, nisi buw togolomna, ta-ta vatta vi ɗifinna tuwa.
Bulu: Ane ékôane bôt ése é nga kute meboñe si, be nga yia jia a loñe metoñ akekui mvean wo diʼibane ngumba ô maneya dik.
Guiziga: Mizli mukos kos gar tuwa huruk huruk a ruwuy, dimis ara zli, yo za ra ara fi, hã tay mi ngi mikuli ngi zlum ti zlumo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jama'aare fuu sujidi, yimooɓe ngimi, fuufooɓe puufi algaytaaji, bana nii ɓe fuu ɓe tokki waɗugo haa liman'en timmini lii'aago guleteeɗi.
Fulfulde_DC: Jama'aare fuu sujidi, yimooɓe ngimi, fuufooɓe puufi algaytaaji, bana nii ɓe fuu ɓe tokki waɗugo haa liman'en timmini lii'aago guleteeɗi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Giiwi nɛ̀ mɔi̧a lɛŋ hira si ɗɔɔ gú nù, ɓɛɛ ká o wi-bii-gima a̧ bíí gima dɔm nɛ̀ mbia'i hegɔ hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ dɔɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ kaɗa nɛnɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Giiwi nɛ̀ mɔi̧a lɛŋ hira si ɗɔɔ gú nù, ɓɛɛ ká o wi-bii-gima a̧ bíí gima dɔm nɛ̀ mbia'i hegɔ hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ dɔɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ kaɗa nɛnɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛtɛa tsene ta mbeli megwəɗəŋə, vəa ŋkwa nya tsa wəshi ka tsa wəshi le yɛ ka vɛ veke pa nda kiɗimte dzeghe melɛ mbeli.
Tupurri: Taygen äuy kal le' mondra, aè kal 'waa siñ, day aè kal 'waa coçoç, sen do deñ no äuy haçaç de maga siigi jag maga aè roë mo äen go äuy le' jag go ëa.

Francais: Quand l'holocauste fut achevé, le roi et tous ceux qui étaient avec lui fléchirent le genou et adorèrent.
Anglais: And when they had made an end of offering, the king and all that were present with him bowed themselves, and worshipped.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma nisi vat lopna vi ɗifin ma ŋal-goyna vatna, mulla hiɗi sum sa kuɗumna kaf girif gaa'a, nisi dab voksi gaa'a.
Bulu: Eyoñe mvean wo diʼibane ngumba ô maneya veban, njô bôt a bôte bese ba be be be nga too be nga luu mesu si a kañ.
Guiziga: Mikuli mikiɗ mi na, buy ati mizli misi akẽh gar, a huruk hurukam dilak dilak, a hurkom a ruwuy a ruwuy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde ɓe timmini ɗum, laamiiɗo e wonduɓe bee muuɗum fuu tuggi koppi, cujidani Jawmiraawo.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde ɓe timmini ɗum, laamiiɗo e wonduɓe bee muuɗum fuu tuggi koppi, cujidani Jawmiraawo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ kaɗa dɔɔ kpoo-sɔ̧, wannu in o bíí nɛ̀ yaa in a̧ gbɛɛ zugur nú bá yí-wa gu nù.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ kaɗa dɔɔ kpoo-sɔ̧, wannu in o bíí nɛ̀ yaa in a̧ gbɛɛ zugur nú bá yí-wa gu nù.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa kiɗi ŋkɛ ne, pa yɛ meghe le mbeli nyi tagha pɛtɛ gwəɗəŋə ntiŋə ghə mbe hɛɗi.
Tupurri: De maga aè taw joñge siigi jag maga aè roë mo äen go äuy mono, wañ de jar maga hay wo see äe ni mo äuy kal wo laage gesiñ le' mondra.

Francais: Le roi Ezéchias et les chefs dirent aux lévites de célébrer Yahweh avec les paroles de David et d'Asaph le voyant, et ils célébrèrent avec joie, et, s'inclinant, ils adorèrent.
Anglais: Moreover Hezekiah the king and the princes commanded the Levites to sing praise unto the  Lord  with the words of David, and of Asaph the seer. And they sang praises with gladness, and they bowed their heads and worshipped.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugolda mulla Ezekiyas hiɗi sa ministrena valamu di tam sa Levitna kay subur Ma-Vatɗina hiɗi yoboyna vi David hiɗi sa ma wi vokomna Asaf, nisi suburumu hiɗi firit haysi ŋolo, nisi her gaa'a, girifa kaw.
Bulu: Eyoñe te njô bôt a bivet be nga jô Belévit na be kañe Nti a mejô me David a ma me ñyene mam Asaf; nde be nga kañe nye a mevak be nga vitibi a kute meboñe si.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, buy Ezekiyas ati buyoy a ɓaka leviheye, ɓa a hunumaka Buymisemuŋ ti dimis ngi Davit ati ngi Asaf, mbur mupur na. Dar levihey a hunumakaŋ ti mumul, a huruk hurukam, a hurukom a mbuŋ Buymisemuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamiiɗo Hezekiya e mawɓe fuu umri Lewi'en ɓe ngimana Jawmiraawo gimi Daawuda e Asaf, gi'oowo. Ɓe ngimi bee seyo, ɓe turi, ɓe cujidi.
Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo Hezekiya e mawɓe fuu umri Lewi'en ɓe ngimana Jawmiraawo gimi Daawuda e Asaf, gi'oowo. Ɓe ngimi bee seyo, ɓe turi, ɓe cujidi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu Ezɛkias in o gasawi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o be Levii mɛ bìì gima nɛ̀ David in wi-de-tom oi nú Sɔ̧ Asaf dee so wen zɔna GASA WAN. Wa bia gima zɔn nɛ̀ a̧ nɛ̀ desee, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ zugur-wa nù, ba yí-wa gu nù.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu Ezɛkias in o gasawi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o be Levii mɛ bìì gima nɛ̀ David in wi-de-tom oi nú Sɔ̧ Asaf dee so wen zɔna GASA WAN. Wa bia gima zɔn nɛ̀ a̧ nɛ̀ desee, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ zugur-wa nù, ba yí-wa gu nù.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Yɛ meghe le mbelia jama geze nda ke ka Lɛvi katsahe Mahwətə zhɛkwa le cimə nyi ncake yɛ David le nde mɛ ŋkwa Asaf. Ntake ka Lɛvi kagha cimə le zlama, vəkwə hɛ ntiŋə ghə mbe hɛɗi kahawe va Mahwətə.
Tupurri: Blam äe wañ Esekiyas de minisdirn wo kal wo wii jar Lefid wo ga aà mo togoë wo Manwur de waçaçre mani Dafidn wo de Asaf je ko nen no. AÀ kal wo togoëge äe go de baage de fruygi, kal wo jel ti gesiñ kal wo le' mondra.

Francais: Alors Ezéchias prit la parole et dit: "Maintenant, vous vous êtes consacrés de nouveau à Yahweh, approchez-vous, présentez des sacrifices et des actions de grâce dans la maison de Yahweh." Et l'assemblée présenta des sacrifices et des actions de grâces, et tous ceux dont le coeur était généreux offrirent des holocaustes.
Anglais: Then Hezekiah answered and said, Now ye have consecrated yourselves unto the  Lord , come near and bring sacrifices and thank offerings into the house of the  Lord . And the congregation brought in sacrifices and thank offerings; and as many as were of a free heart burnt offerings.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugolda Ezekiyas sli ditiya nam di'e: Wulin kayni Ma-Vatɗin tungiyawa hay lopna valamu, nala nigiyay goboyo, margi farayna, ligi ɗifin ma hot gi-deɓta tam Lawna hay ziyda valamu. Tokŋa mar farayna, nisi li ɗifin ma suburta, sum sa diksi min vulda kaf li ɗifin ma ŋal-goyna.
Bulu: Ane Ezékias a nga nyoñe nkobô a jô na: Eyoñe ji, amu mi ntoo ntelan asu Nti, subaʼane bebé, a zaʼane bityiʼa , mi ve Nda Nti mimveane ya mvean akéva. Eyoñe te ékôane bôt é nga zuu bityiʼa a ve mimvean asu ékañaʼa a ba bese be mbe minlem ékekaé be nga ve mimvean mia diʼibane ngumba.
Guiziga: Ezekiyas a zla mingiɓi, a ɓi: «Wurenna, ani kum gar ti gwatay a haŋ ngi vul da Bumbulvuŋ so, girjohoko, gwat ngi mikuli ngi jumoˀay ati ngi hunuma Bumbulvuŋ, soko taŋ ng'ar hay naŋ. Dar mizli a soko ti gwat ngi mikulihey ati gwat ngi vul ngi hunuma Buymisemuŋ, yo mizli misi ti mevel mezlehey gar na, a soko ti ginew ngi mikuli ngi zlum zlam zlam wãˀa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓaawo man Hezekiya wi'i: “Jonta on ceni ko'e mon ngam Jawmiraawo. Ɓadite, ngadde kirseteeɗi mon e dokke gettooje mon haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo.” Jama'aare waddi kirseteeɗi e dokke gettooje, saahiiɓe boo ngaddi guleteeɗi:
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓaawo man Hezekiya wi'i: “Jonta on ceni ko'e mon ngam Jawmiraawo. Ɓadite, ngadde kirseteeɗi mon e dokke gettooje mon haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo.” Jama'aare waddi kirseteeɗi e dokke gettooje, saahiiɓe boo ngaddi guleteeɗi:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ezɛkias tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ giiwi woyo: «Kinii, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ mɔ mɛ ha̧ a̧a̧ er'nɛ́ nɛ̀ dɔka-a wen ha̧a̧-a̧ ha̧ GASA WAN ga, ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗɔ́lí pii ti, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí o ha̧a̧mɔ-gaŋmɔ in o ha̧a̧mɔ-zɔnamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛnɛ pii kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.» O bíí lɛŋ kaia o ha̧a̧mɔ tɛnɛ. O wi nɛ̀ see-wa hu̧i̧a̧ ha̧a̧ o kpoo-sɔ̧ mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ezɛkias tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ giiwi woyo: «Kinii, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ mɔ mɛ ha̧ a̧a̧ er'nɛ́ nɛ̀ dɔka-a wen ha̧a̧-a̧ ha̧ GASA WAN ga, ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗɔ́lí pii ti, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí o ha̧a̧mɔ-gaŋmɔ in o ha̧a̧mɔ-zɔnamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛnɛ pii kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.» O bíí lɛŋ kaia o ha̧a̧mɔ tɛnɛ. O wi nɛ̀ see-wa hu̧i̧a̧ ha̧a̧ o kpoo-sɔ̧ mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa meghe Ɛzɛkiyas zhɛne kakelete ghena, ma ke sha mbeli: «Tsetsenya, ma gheyɛ mbeli nyi nza wəshi yitea dzeve va gheyɛ kave nda ke Mahwətə ne, fəke mə wəshi kedzeghe melɛ kejikə geva ba'a kwa tsa hana kadzembe ghɛa Shala!» Pa mbeli fəke wəshi keseɗa kezha dzeghe melɛ shɛhɛ. Pa mbeli nyi nza zlama va hɛ dzeghekɛ melɛ kwa tere tere.
Tupurri: Do kay nono Esekiyas kal mañ waçaçre, day ga: Patala de maga aè lag nday go diñ ma Manwur so mono, ya' wee see äay ni nday aà wee de feçeçre sië jag no, joñ wee siigi jag ma joñ suse' äi tiñ mani Manwur no. Taygen kal nduugi de feçeçre sië jag wo no, kal wo joñ siigi jag ma haç togoëge, day jar maga jiili äaara hay da haçge mono, kal wo joñ siigi jag maga aè roë mo äen go äuy mono.

Francais: Le nombre des holocaustes qu'offrit l'assemblée fut de soixante dix boeufs, cent béliers et deux cents agneaux : tout cela pour un holocauste à Yahweh.
Anglais: And the number of the burnt offerings, which the congregation brought, was threescore and ten bullocks, an hundred rams, and two hundred lambs: all these were for a burnt offering to the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Faray ma nisi maramu kay ŋalam ɗifini noŋ pet kayni, luwayn dok-siɗiya, fok-gamalan kis, guro fok-dimin kis ma'; kaf kayni nisi ŋalam ɗifini tam Ma-Vatɗina.
Bulu: Mimvean mia diʼibane ngumba ékôane bôt é nga soo mie mi mbe: benyak mewôme zamgbwa, beyôm mintômba ntet, bitoñ mintômba mintete mibaé; biôm bite bise bi too asu mimvean mia diʼibane ngumba ba ve Nti.
Guiziga: Gwat taŋ migam di mikuli mizlam zlama jom gar na, sla kukur tarnaˀ, zlengerek skat, ziri tumuŋhoy skat skat cuw, a gam taŋ mikuli zlam zlam gar taŋ da Bumbulvuŋ.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa limgal guleteeɗi ɗi jama'aare nde'e waddani Jawmiraawo: Ga'i cappanɗe joweeɗiɗi e jawɗi baali teemerre e njawkoy teemeɗɗe ɗiɗoy.
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa limgal guleteeɗi ɗi jama'aare nde'e waddani Jawmiraawo: Ga'i cappanɗe joweeɗiɗi e jawɗi baali teemerre e njawkoy teemeɗɗe ɗiɗoy.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kpoo-sɔ̧ lɛŋ nɛ̀ o bíí kaia tɛnɛ duka nɛ́ ndai ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, vala sami gɔmŋmaa,  be-sami  gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo nɛ̀ wa  dɔɔ  nɛ̀ kpoo-sɔ̧ lɛŋ ha̧ GASA WAN.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kpoo-sɔ̧ lɛŋ nɛ̀ o bíí kaia tɛnɛ duka nɛ́ ndai ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, vala sami gɔmŋmaa,  be-sami  gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo nɛ̀ wa  dɔɔ  nɛ̀ kpoo-sɔ̧ lɛŋ ha̧ GASA WAN.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma pɛtɛa nci ne, mberefaŋemsə mcɛmcɛli, gwəmsə game lɛmə ba'a gwəmsə bake zhɛgwəa lɛmə timɛti nyi dzeghekɛ melɛ kwa tere tere mbeli le hɛ,
Tupurri: Ngaäa horog maga taygen hay nduu de äe ma joñ siigi jag maga aè roë mo äen go äuy mono, hay wo do renam diñ dere, gamlare kisi, weere saçaçre kiskis äoge. Sen wo mo deñ äuy diñ siigi jag maga aè roë mo äen go äuy ne Manwuri.

Francais: On consacra en outre six cents boeufs et trois mille brebis.
Anglais: And the consecrated things were six hundred oxen and three thousand sheep.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugolda nisi yaw luwayn kis-karkiya, fukunayna birim ɦidi, nisi cukum ɗifin kaf.
Bulu: Be nga beta fe ve benyak mintete misaman, bikela a mintômba toyini éla.
Guiziga: Mikuli mekelemeye kwana, sla skat skat merkeɗ, tumuŋ ati ˀawaya durmuk makir.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ceni boo kirseteeɗi maɓɓe, ga'i teemeɗɗe joweego (600) e dammooji ujine tati (3.000).
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ceni boo kirseteeɗi maɓɓe, ga'i teemeɗɗe joweego (600) e dammooji ujine tati (3.000).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O oi saɗi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ nɛ́ o ndai gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk in o sami booro-taar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O oi saɗi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ nɛ́ o ndai gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk in o sami booro-taar.
Kapsiki_DC: tsagha mcɛmcɛli gwəmsə ŋkwaŋe ba'a yɛ timɛti le kwi 3.000 kezha kweci melɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ kal laa horog ma tigriñ go lag sar kiskis hiira' ga diñ dere, fiiri wo ndar swa'a.

Francais: Mais les prêtres, étant en petit nombre, ne purent dépouiller tous les holocaustes; leurs frères, les lévites, les aidèrent jusqu'à ce que l'ouvrage fut fini et jusqu'à ce que les autres prêtres se fussent sanctifiés, car les lévites avaient mis plus de sincérité de coeur que les prêtres à se sanctifier.
Anglais: But the priests were too few, so that they could not flay all the burnt offerings: wherefore their brethren the Levites did help them, till the work was ended, and until the other priests had sanctified themselves: for the Levites were more upright in heart to sanctify themselves than the priests.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May muliyan-sa-ɗifinna kiɗa goyo, nisi may as kay za farayn goy kafɗi; nala ɓosiyosina sa Levitna gutsiya, ta-ta lopna vat goyo, ta-ta muliyan-sa-ɗifinna segena li tuwsi goy peldete tuwa, kay sa Levitna var hiɗi diksi kay li tuwsi goy peldete suw muliyan-sa-ɗifinna.
Bulu: Ve betuni be mbe tyôtyoé be nji bo nguleya soé betit ba diʼibane ngumba bikôp; nde bobenyañe bap, Belévit, be nga volô be akekui na ésaé é man, a ke fe kui na betuni bevok be mane tuneban, amu Belévit mbe be nga semé ajô ya tune bebien a dañe betuni.
Guiziga: Masayay misi akẽh taŋ haɗa ta, a suwutaka ginew ngi zlum zlam zlamaya gar gu ta. Vurˀe, sukum taŋ levihey a jinaka taŋ ar slra taŋ, hã avu kiɗa mi naŋ, yo hã masayay migam gwat ɓa a tiram taŋ pala. Asi mike na, leviheye taŋ wirwir haɗa ngi gi gwat ɓa a tiram taŋ pala.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa limgal liman'en he'aay ɓolugo dabbaaji guleteeɗi fuu. Ngam maajum banndiraaɓe maɓɓe Lewi'en mballi ɓe, haa ɓe timmini kuugal man, haa liman'en boo ceni ko'e muuɗum'en. Ngam Lewi'en ceni ko'e muuɗum'en bee tiinaare ko ɓuri liman'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa limgal liman'en he'aay ɓolugo dabbaaji guleteeɗi fuu. Ngam maajum banndiraaɓe maɓɓe Lewi'en mballi ɓe, haa ɓe timmini kuugal man, haa liman'en boo ceni ko'e muuɗum'en. Ngam Lewi'en ceni ko'e muuɗum'en bee tiinaare ko ɓuri liman'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ dɔk so wen ɓaa o saɗi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ lɛŋ na ga, o nya-wa, o be Levii gbaka wa hɔ ŋgimbi kaɗa tom, pɛm nɛ̀  ɗafa  war-tɛ ko o ŋma wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ sɛ. Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, o be Levii dee wɔ ɗafa war-tɛ gan ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ dɔk so wen ɓaa o saɗi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ lɛŋ na ga, o nya-wa, o be Levii gbaka wa hɔ ŋgimbi kaɗa tom, pɛm nɛ̀  ɗafa  war-tɛ ko o ŋma wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ sɛ. Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, o be Levii dee wɔ ɗafa war-tɛ gan ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ka dzeghe Shala nyi tagha ne, dewə hɛ kezha kwaɓe hweta kənəa wəshi keseɗa kedzeghe melɛ kwa tere tere. Vatse nda se ka menəhɛ nci ka Lɛvi kakemane hɛ kezha kiɗi slene, nda teyaɓemte geva kweci ka dzeghe Shala. Kwa nza ŋkɛ za ma ka Lɛvi ɗehwe se yitea yaɓe geva ke ka dzeghe Shala.
Tupurri: Ama jar sië jagn hay bay wo ngaäa wa, day kaçaç wo ma sooë feçeçre siigi jag maga aè roë mo äen go äuy mo gaè. Heçeçre äaara jar Lefid kal wo kay rage haçaç taw wo joñren go, haçaç nen maga jar sië jag ma lan façaç wo see äaara go. Werga jar Lefid hay wo de dage jiili ma façaç see äaara go de dañ jar sië jag wo no.

Francais: Il y avait d'ailleurs beaucoup d'holocaustes, outre les graisses des sacrifices pacifiques et les libations pour les holocaustes.
Anglais: And also the burnt offerings were in abundance, with the fat of the peace offerings, and the drink offerings for every burnt offering. So the service of the house of the  Lord  was set in order.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ɗifin ma ŋal-goyna ay ŋolo hay na'ta, hiɗi mul-sliwna ma li ɗifinna vi lop ma slugona, hiɗi mul ma yamam goyna vi ɗifin ma ŋal-goyna. Ki kayn nala dakka ta hay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina nisi hot tuna'awa.
Bulu: Mimvean ba diʼi ngumba mi mbe foʼo abui, ô laté fe mevoñe bityiʼa ya nlatane ngbwa a binyunyui bia tôñe mvean wo diʼibane ngumba. Nalé ate nkañan e Nda Nti ô nga beta teléban.
Guiziga: Gisiŋ, Mikuli ngi zlum zlam zlamaya, taŋ haɗa, jom ati mungul ngi gi mikuli ngi ngiɓiˀay waɗ mbaazla ngi pusl asi mikuli mizlam zlama. A ɗiyaka slra ngi gi ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ kahana.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Fakat guleteeɗi ɗuuɗi masin, non boo ɓellere kirsaaɗi ngam kawtal yimɓe e dokke dufeteeɗe lii'aaɗe hawtaade bee guleteeɗi. Bana non Hezekiya mo'iniri kuugal dewal haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo.
Fulfulde_DC: Fakat guleteeɗi ɗuuɗi masin, non boo ɓellere kirsaaɗi ngam kawtal yimɓe e dokke dufeteeɗe lii'aaɗe hawtaade bee guleteeɗi. Bana non Hezekiya mo'iniri kuugal dewal haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wi ha̧ so kànà o nɔ̧́ kpoo-sɔ̧ sɛn zu fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧ mbɛt e see zu o ha̧a̧mɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ lɛŋ, bá nɛ̀ dɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɛt. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ wa ɗafa nɛ̀ yuwar gasa GASA WAN sɛn kɔ̧ Tua kɔ̧-a̧ woyo.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wi ha̧ so kànà o nɔ̧́ kpoo-sɔ̧ sɛn zu fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧ mbɛt e see zu o ha̧a̧mɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ lɛŋ, bá nɛ̀ dɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɛt. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ wa ɗafa nɛ̀ yuwar gasa GASA WAN sɛn kɔ̧ Tua kɔ̧-a̧ woyo.
Kapsiki_DC: Kadzevare wəshi keseɗa kedzeghe melɛ kwa tere tere nyi kwele kwele ba'a yɛ tɛ nyi fəke mbeli ne, nahe ŋkɛ kehite geva katere merege mbeli te reghwetɛ zhɛkwa kezha melɛ kejikə ghə. Tsetse zhɛne mbeli kahite səkwə ghə mbe ghɛa Mahwətə.
Tupurri: Feçeçre sië jag maga aè roë mo go äen go äuy hay wo ngaäa, de noo äaara ma joñ joñ siigi jag taygen wo, de siigi jag de yii ma wer siigi jag maga aè roë mo äen go äuy mono. Diñ do kay nono ga aè fer tosge tosge äi tiñ mani Manwurn mono.

Francais: Ainsi fut rétabli le service de la maison de Yahweh. Ezéchias et tout le peuple se réjouirent de ce que Dieu avait préparé pour le peuple, car la chose s'était faite subitement.
Anglais: And Hezekiah rejoiced, and all the people, that God had prepared the people: for the thing was done suddenly.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ezekiyas hiɗi sumun kaf li firiya kay mige Lawn kot slenawa kaf kay sumuna, kay van kayni nam li koloy wit'.
Bulu: Ezékias a bôte bese be nga vak amu Zambe a nga kôme mam mese asu ayoñ, amu jame te é nga boban atemetem.
Guiziga: Ezekiyas ati mizli gar, ara mumulom asi gwat Buymisemuŋ miga vur taŋ gar, asi gwatay a gam kutum kutum si.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hezekiya e yimɓe fuu ceyori ko Allah tabitini ngam yimɓe, ngam ɗum fuu ɗum waɗi law.
Fulfulde_DC: Hezekiya e yimɓe fuu ceyori ko Allah tabitini ngam yimɓe, ngam ɗum fuu ɗum waɗi law.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ezɛkias in dukbíí kpaa desee wen nɛ Sɔ̧ dea ha̧ mɔ‘i mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧ nɛ̀ haya-a, zik mɔ na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ezɛkias in dukbíí kpaa desee wen nɛ Sɔ̧ dea ha̧ mɔ‘i mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧ nɛ̀ haya-a, zik mɔ na.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwele kwele zlamate zlama yɛ Ɛzɛkiyas le mbeli pɛtɛ te wəsə nya pelave nda Shala ke hɛ kamene, kwa nza ŋkɛ kese wəsəa shɛ kadera we.
Tupurri: Esekiyas de ngaäan äuy joñ wo suse' ti maga Baa hay kne' feçeçre go ne ngaäan mono, werga mo maga joñ mokay hay hoo mbe nen jar do pad tu señ.

Francais: Ezéchias envoya des messagers dans tout Israël et Juda, et il écrivit des lettres à Ephraïm et à Manassé, les invitant à venir à la maison de Yahweh à Jérusalem, pour célébrer la Pâque en l'honneur de Yahweh, le Dieu d'Israël.
Anglais: And Hezekiah sent to all Israel and Judah, and wrote letters also to Ephraim and Manasseh, that they should come to the house of the  Lord  at Jerusalem, to keep the passover unto the  Lord  God of Israel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ezekiyas gi sunda hay Israyel hiɗi Yuda noŋ kafe, nam ɗo ɗerwelda kaw kat jafna vi Efrayim hiɗi Manase, kay nisi ma co hay ziyna vi Ma-Vatɗina, hay Yerusalem, kay li yuldeta vi Paskata, kay subur sem Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vi Israyel.
Bulu: Ane Ezékias a nga lôme bôt e Israél ase a Yuda. A nga tili fe bekalate Efrayim a Manasé na be zu Nda Nti e Yérusalém a bo abôʼô Pak asu duma Nti, Zambe Israél.
Guiziga: Ezekiyas a zilo Israyeley ati Zudahaya gar, hã a tuh letir da mizli Efrayimey ati Manasehey, ɓa a soko ng'ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ a Zeruzalem, ɓa a gam muguzlum Pak ngi Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ngi Israyeleye.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hezekiya neldi ewnaandu haa Isra'iila e Yahuuda fuu. O winndani le'i Efrayim e Manassa bataakeeji haa yimɓe ngara haa Urusaliima, ɓe mbaɗa juulde Paska ngam Jawmiraawo, Allah Isra'iila.
Fulfulde_DC: Hezekiya neldi ewnaandu haa Isra'iila e Yahuuda fuu. O winndani le'i Efrayim e Manassa bataakeeji haa yimɓe ngara haa Urusaliima, ɓe mbaɗa juulde Paska ngam Jawmiraawo, Allah Isra'iila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Ɛzɛkiyas hekakɛ ka Israyɛl le Zhəwda pɛtɛ. Pa le palepa rafete nda ŋkɛ ke ka Ɛfrayim ba'a ka Manasɛ yitea se hɛ kadzembe ghɛa Mahwətə mbe kezha mene gəsəkə Pakea Mahwətə, Shala ta ka Israyɛl.
Tupurri: Esekiyas kal laa jar wo go äi sir Israyel wo de Juda äuy. AÀ hay de yer leder ne Efrayim wo de Manase lay maga aà mo nduu wo äi tiñ mani Manwurn Jerusalem ma joñ few Pag ma haç togoëge ne Manwuri, Baa mani Israyel no.

Francais: Le roi, ses chefs et toute l'assemblée de Jérusalem, avaient tenu conseil, afin que la Pâque fut célébrée au second mois;
Anglais: For the king had taken counsel, and his princes, and all the congregation in Jerusalem, to keep the passover in the second month.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla, sa ministrena valamu hiɗi tokŋa kaf li ŋra-vunda hay Yerusalem kay li yuldeta vi Paskata hay til ma ma'na,
Bulu: Njô bôt, bivete bié a ékôane bôt ése be nga bo ékôan e Yérusalém asu ya telé abôʼô Pak e ngone baa,
Guiziga: Naɓa buy ati mizli hirnga naŋhay waɗ jum ngi mizli ngi Zeruzaleme, a tiɓaka wuluk ngi gi muguzlum Paka le ar kiya mucuw naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamiiɗo e mawɓe mum e jama'aare haa Urusaliima fuu narri waɗugo juulde man nder lewru ɗiɗaɓru.
Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo e mawɓe mum e jama'aare haa Urusaliima fuu narri waɗugo juulde man nder lewru ɗiɗaɓru.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: Pa yɛ meghe le mbelia jama ta ŋkɛ ba'a ka Zhɛrəzalɛm pɛtɛ tsate kezha mene gəsəkə Pakea shɛ mbe kwa bake ta tere.
Tupurri: Wañ de minisdir äen wo no, de taygen äuy hay joñ wo go nen joñ ndalge ti holañ äaara Jerusalem nen maga aè de ma joñfew Pag nen few ma de äog no.

Francais: car on n'avait pu la faire en son temps, parce que les prêtres ne s'étaient pas sanctifiés en assez grand nombre, et que le peuple ne s'était pas rassemblé à Jérusalem.
Anglais: For they could not keep it at that time, because the priests had not sanctified themselves sufficiently, neither had the people gathered themselves together to Jerusalem.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kay nisi asay kay li yuldeta hay liyna valamɗi, kay mige, muliyan-sa-ɗifinna sa tuwsi li goy peldetna may asay ŋolɗi, sumun may tokay hay Yerusalemɗi kaw.
Bulu: amu be nji bo nguleya jeme de éyoñ ja yian, amu valé betuni be ngenan teke tune bebien abime tañe bôt da yian, a na valé bôt be ngenan teke sulan e Yérusalém.
Guiziga: Asi mike na, taŋ migaka zleˀe ar hin naŋ kaslsla gu ta na, asi masayaya, mitiram taŋ pal na, taŋ pireˀe, yo mizli a kusom a Zeruzaleme t'aruŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe mbaawaayno waɗugo nde nder saa'iire umraande, ngam limgal liman'en senɓe ko'e muuɗum'en he'aayno, yimɓe boo mooɓtaakino haa Urusaliima tawon .
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe mbaawaayno waɗugo nde nder saa'iire umraande, ngam limgal liman'en senɓe ko'e muuɗum'en he'aayno, yimɓe boo mooɓtaakino haa Urusaliima tawon .

Francais: La chose parut juste aux yeux du roi et de toute l'assemblée.
Anglais: And the thing pleased the king and all the congregation.

Francais: Ils décidèrent de faire passer une proclamation dans tout Israël, depuis Bersabée jusqu'à Dan, pour que l'on vint à Jérusalem célébrer la Pâque en l'honneur de Yahweh, le Dieu d'Israël; car ils ne l'avaient plus célébrée en grand nombre, selon qu'il est écrit.
Anglais: So they established a decree to make proclamation throughout all Israel, from Beer–sheba even to Dan, that they should come to keep the passover unto the  Lord  God of Israel at Jerusalem: for they had not done it of a long time in such sort as it was written.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nala nisi fi varta kay siwel labara goy hay Israyel kaf, fokay hay Ber-Seba pa ta-ta hay Dan, kay sumun ma co hay Yerusalem li yuldeta vi Paskata kay subur sem Ma-Vatɗina, Lawna vi Israyel. Kay sumun ŋolo may li yuldeta vi Paskata ki ɗoy hay ɗerwelda nalaɗi.
Bulu: nde be nga tyiʼi na be kate foé e Israél ase, ataté Birséba a kui Dañ, na bôt be zu Yérusalém a jem abôʼô Pak asu duma Nti, Zambe Israél. Amu jama bôt a nji fe beta jeme de aval e ne ntilan.
Guiziga: A zlaka ɓa ɓi nah bal bal asi ruwuy Israyel gar, zle a Ber-seba hã a Daŋ. A ziloko mizli nga Zeruzalem ngi gi muguzlum Pak ngi Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ngi Israyel, asi mizli magaka zleˀe kaɓa mutohoko ɓi naŋ na, taŋ haɗi ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam maajum ɓe narri neldugo ewnaandu nder lesdi Isra'iila fuu, diga Biirsaba haa yotto Dan, yimɓe ngara haa Urusaliima, mbaɗa juulde Paska ngam Jawmiraawo, Allah Isra'iila. Naane ɓe meeɗaayno waɗugo nde tawon bee jama'aare ɗuuɗnde fodde umroore deftere.
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam maajum ɓe narri neldugo ewnaandu nder lesdi Isra'iila fuu, diga Biirsaba haa yotto Dan, yimɓe ngara haa Urusaliima, mbaɗa juulde Paska ngam Jawmiraawo, Allah Isra'iila. Naane ɓe meeɗaayno waɗugo nde tawon bee jama'aare ɗuuɗnde fodde umroore deftere.

Kapsiki_DC: pa hɛ tsahwe kezha ghwene ŋkwa kalə te hɛɗi pɛtɛa ka Israyɛl, se Bɛrshɛba hwa'a mbe Dan yitea se mbeli kadzembe Zhɛrəzalɛm kamene gəsəkə Pakea Mahwətə, Shala ta ka Israyɛl. Kwa nza ŋkɛ kezhɛne mbeli kwele kwele kamenete kala nya kerafete geva we.
Tupurri: AÀ kal wo waçaçge ga sii waçaçren mokay wo go äi sir Israyel äuy, tï¡ï¡ wer le Beer-Seba ka' haçaç wo go kañge Dañe, maga jar mo nduu Jerusalem ma joñ few Pag ma haç togoëge ne Manwuri, Baa mani Israyel no. Werga jar hay bay age joñge äe ngaäa do maga aà go de yerge no wa.

Francais: Les coureurs allèrent avec les lettres du roi et de ses chefs dans tout Israël et Juda, pour dire d'après l'ordre du roi: "Enfants d'Israël, revenez à Yahweh, le Dieu d'Abraham, d'Isaac et d'Israël, et il reviendra à ceux qui restent à ceux d'entre vous qui ont échappé à la main des rois d'Assyrie.
Anglais: So the posts went with the letters from the king and his princes throughout all Israel and Judah, and according to the commandment of the king, saying, Ye children of Israel, turn again unto the  Lord  God of Abraham, Isaac, and Israel, and he will return to the remnant of you, that are escaped out of the hand of the kings of Assyria.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa jaŋ labara kali hiɗi ɗerwelda vi mulla hiɗi sa ministrena valamu kaw hay Israyel hiɗi Yuda kafe, kuɗ va ma mulla di tisiya, nisi di'e: Gurona vi Israyel, hotgiyay tam Ma-Vatɗina, Lawna vi Abraham, Isaak hiɗi Israyel, kay nam kaw ma hotay kirgiya, nigi caw sum sa hin goy kuɗ muliyana vi Asiriya.
Bulu: Ane minlôman mi nga wulu e si ése ya Israél a Yuda, be bili bekalate njô bôt a nga mane san ba be bivete bié; be nga yôtan aval ane njô bôt a nga bendé na: A bone bʼIsraél, bulaʼane be Nti, e Zambe Abraham, Izak a Israél, nalé nye fe a ye bulane be mia, a mia mebukaʼa me nga fam e mo bejô bôte ya Asiri.
Guiziga: Letirey buy ati mizli hirnga naŋhay mutohoko taŋ tuwa, mijiviɗey a ram taŋ da mizli ngi si ruwuy Israyel ati Zuda zlar gar, a tilam mi ti ɓi ngi buyo da mizli, a ɓaka taŋ: «Israyeley, kum mulohoko tisi haŋ ngi buy Asirihey na, moko a muŋ ng'avu Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ngi Abraham, ngi Izak waɗ ngi Zakopo, ɓa naŋ kwana, a mo ng'avu kum aya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yaawɗotooɓe njehi nder lesdi Isra'iila e Yahuuda fuu, bee bataakeeji laamiiɗo e mawɓe mum. Ɓe ngooyni umroore laamiiɗo, ɓe mbi'i: “Onon yimɓe Isra'iila, lorte haa Jawmiraawo Allah Ibrahiima e Isiyaaku e Isra'iila, haa o lortano on, onon luttuɓe, daɗɓe juuɗe laamiiɓe Assuura.
Fulfulde_DC: Yaawɗotooɓe njehi nder lesdi Isra'iila e Yahuuda fuu, bee bataakeeji laamiiɗo e mawɓe mum. Ɓe ngooyni umroore laamiiɗo, ɓe mbi'i: “Onon yimɓe Isra'iila, lorte haa Jawmiraawo Allah Ibrahiima e Isiyaaku e Isra'iila, haa o lortano on, onon luttuɓe, daɗɓe juuɗe laamiiɓe Assuura.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O betom kaia o kalata nɛ̀ wannu in o gasawi yɔra, ɓɛɛ pɛsi dam nú  Israɛl  in Juda lɛŋ, tɔ̧ nɛ̀ nú tom’ɛ ha̧ o bíí: «Ɛnɛ o be  Israɛl  nɛ̀ mɔ hɔɔ yɔɔ zu'nɛ́ wen nɛ̀ o be Asirii hu̧r'nɛ́ na’ɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ tɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko Abraham, Sɔ̧ ko Izak in Sɔ̧ ko Jakob; hegɔ a̧ tɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ‘nɛ́.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O betom kaia o kalata nɛ̀ wannu in o gasawi yɔra, ɓɛɛ pɛsi dam nú  Israɛl  in Juda lɛŋ, tɔ̧ nɛ̀ nú tom’ɛ ha̧ o bíí: «Ɛnɛ o be  Israɛl  nɛ̀ mɔ hɔɔ yɔɔ zu'nɛ́ wen nɛ̀ o be Asirii hu̧r'nɛ́ na’ɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ tɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko Abraham, Sɔ̧ ko Izak in Sɔ̧ ko Jakob; hegɔ a̧ tɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ‘nɛ́.
Kapsiki_DC: Cape mbeli nyi ghwenakɛ nyi mbeli dzeyi mbe hɛɗia Israyɛl le Zhəwda pɛtɛ le palepa nyi dɛkate dzeve yɛ meghe le mbelia jama ta ŋkɛ te. Kala nya gezeke meghe, ma ke hɛ zlapete: «Ka Israyɛl gheyɛ nyi kembele ŋayɛ va ka meghea ka Asiri, zhɛne mə geva kase sha Mahwətə, Shala ta Abraham, Izak le Zhakob, nda tezhɛre ŋayɛ geva ŋkɛ kase.
Tupurri: Jar soole kal wo rawge de leder ma wañn wo de minisdir äen wo go äi sir Juda wo de sir Israyel äuy. Do maga wañ waçaç go nono, aà wo ga: Jar ni Israyel wo, fer wee le see Manwuri, Baa mani Abraham no, Baa mani Isagn wo de mani Israyel no, nen maga aà mo fer le see äay, nday maga nday gwa'a, day yaçaç go do wañ Asiri mono.

Francais: Ne soyez pas comme vos pères et comme vos frères, qui ont péché contre Yahweh, le Dieu de leurs pères, et qu'il a livrés à la désolation, comme vous le voyez.
Anglais: And be not ye like your fathers, and like your brethren, which trespassed against the  Lord  God of their fathers, who therefore gave them up to desolation, as ye see.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nigi ma li ki sumaygiya hiɗi guro-biyogin naɗi, nisi min vi kuɗ Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vi sumaysiɗi, kuɗ na'ta kayni nam vulsi goy vun-lawta, ki nigi ka wi nala.
Bulu: Mi nji yiane bo ane bʼésoo benan a bobenyoñe benan, mbe be nga bo Nti, e Zambe bʼésaa babe melo, ajô te a nga wua be e njuʼu été avale mi lôô di.
Guiziga: Ki gam kaɓa cine kumoy ati sukum kumoy na ta, Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ngi dideˀ taŋhaya, taŋ a gam teŋteŋ ava ta, mbak hã a vula taŋ, ɓa mizli a ngizlaka taŋ, kaɓa kum mapuraka ani na.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Taa laate bana baabiraaɓe mon e banndiraaɓe mon yewɓe umroore Jawmiraawo Allah kaakiraaɓe muuɗum'en. Kamɓe, Jawmiraawo acci ɓe ɓe kalka, bana ko ngi'oton.
Fulfulde_DC: Taa laate bana baabiraaɓe mon e banndiraaɓe mon yewɓe umroore Jawmiraawo Allah kaakiraaɓe muuɗum'en. Kamɓe, Jawmiraawo acci ɓe ɓe kalka, bana ko ngi'oton.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: K’ɛ́nɛ́ de mɔ hee mɛ̀ nɛ́ ko o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ in o zɔmwi k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ dee so ŋgazu in GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko o dáà kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ ká a̧ de ha̧ o wisɛn mɛ mbɔli wa hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ iŋa’ɛ ga na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: K’ɛ́nɛ́ de mɔ hee mɛ̀ nɛ́ ko o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ in o zɔmwi k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ dee so ŋgazu in GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko o dáà kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ ká a̧ de ha̧ o wisɛn mɛ mbɔli wa hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ iŋa’ɛ ga na.
Kapsiki_DC: Yipəma ghəa ŋayɛ yɛ le ka yitehɛ ŋayɛ ba'a ka menəhɛ ŋayɛ nyi kebezemte nda ghena ke Mahwətə, Shala ta ka shihɛ nci ma. Nahe Shala kezamte sebe te hɛ, kala nya newe nya yɛ.
Tupurri: Joñ wee do paçaçre äay wo de heçeçre äay maga hay wo ndar gog see Manwuri, Baa mani paçaçre äaaran wo no day se kal haç rage nen lawge do maga nday de koge äe no haç' wa.

Francais: Ne roidissez donc pas votre cou, comme l'ont fait vos pères ; donnez la main à Yahweh, venez à son sanctuaire, qu'il a sanctifié pour toujours, et servez Yahweh, votre Dieu, afin que le feu de sa colère se détourne de vous.
Anglais: Now be ye not stiffnecked, as your fathers were, but yield yourselves unto the  Lord , and enter into his sanctuary, which he hath sanctified for ever: and serve the  Lord  your God, that the fierceness of his wrath may turn away from you.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kuɗ ta wulinta, nigi ma so dekdelgi goy ki sumaygi naɗi; vigi ɓigi mi Ma-Vatɗina, nigiyay hay liyna valam ma peldetna, ma nam lumawa goy peldete kay dok-doko, sungi Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vigiya, kay ɦiyda valam ta ŋolda ma vi tuwa' goy tigiya.
Bulu: Eyoñe ji te boone melo ane bʼésoo benan; suʼane miabebiene si be Nti, zaʼan e nda jé é nʼétyi a nga mane tune nnôm éto, a boʼone Nti, e Zambe wônan bisaé, nalé ate mbia ayaa wé a ye kôlô be mia.
Guiziga: Wurenna so na, ki cinam takaɓa cine kumoy na mata. Vulam haŋ ng'avu Bumbulvuŋ, a ram ng'ar hay naŋ, naŋ mitiri di pal ngi caˀa na, yo gam gawla ngi Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ kumo, ɓa mevele mufõh fõh ar kum na, a tisli.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jonta kam, taa caatine ko'e mon bana kaakiraaɓe mon. Ɗowtane Jawmiraawo, ngare haa haykaliiru maako ndu o seni haa foroy. Njaggane Allah Jawmiraawo mon, ngam haa tikkere maako saatunde acca on.
Fulfulde_DC: Jonta kam, taa caatine ko'e mon bana kaakiraaɓe mon. Ɗowtane Jawmiraawo, ngare haa haykaliiru maako ndu o seni haa foroy. Njaggane Allah Jawmiraawo mon, ngam haa tikkere maako saatunde acca on.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kinii, k’ɛ́nɛ́ de ŋgazu hee o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ ga na; ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbó zu ha̧ GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ pii tɛ  sa̧a̧-fara  kɔ̧-a̧ n'aa  ɗafa  war-a ha̧ mɛ duk nɛ̀ sa̧a̧-a̧ ɓɔnsɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé tom ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́; hegɔ, ŋga nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ zu'nɛ́‘i tɛ ga̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kinii, k’ɛ́nɛ́ de ŋgazu hee o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ ga na; ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbó zu ha̧ GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ pii tɛ  sa̧a̧-fara  kɔ̧-a̧ n'aa  ɗafa  war-a ha̧ mɛ duk nɛ̀ sa̧a̧-a̧ ɓɔnsɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé tom ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́; hegɔ, ŋga nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ zu'nɛ́‘i tɛ ga̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Mba yɛ zhɛrete ghəa ŋayɛ kaka fama ghena kala ka shihɛ ŋayɛ: ɓelaheyi mə geva yitea Mahwətə, zhɛneke mə geva kadzembe ŋkwa ŋkɛ nya wɛŋe, nya veyi ŋkɛ tekeleke kaghala ghala. Nza mə kaka mene slene ta Shala Mahwətə ta ŋayɛ yitea zhɛremte hwepe wənəa ŋkɛ nya wəba nya ŋkɛ kənəa gheyɛ.
Tupurri: Patalam no, joñ wee nen hig jiili äay go do paçaçre äay wo no wa. Coñ wee do ne Manwuri, see wee le äi tiñ äe ma bay ëag maga aà go de façaçge äe ma tum mono, day ni nday joñ wee peele ne Manwuri, maga äil äe ma de ngal wuu ngiiln mo coo ne nday ti.

Francais: Car si vous revenez à Yahweh, vos frères et vos fils trouveront miséricorde auprès de ceux qui les ont emmenés captifs, et il ne détournera pas sa face de vous, si vous revenez à lui."
Anglais: For if ye turn again unto the  Lord , your brethren and your children shall find compassion before them that lead them captive, so that they shall come again into this land: for the  Lord  your God is gracious and merciful, and will not turn away his face from you, if ye return unto him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: La nigi hotay tam Ma-Vatɗina, ɓosiyogina hiɗi gurona vigiya ma fi slugota vok ir sum sa yawsi gorvona, nala nisi ma hotay hay nagat tani; kay Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vigiya nam li slugota, nam wi haw sana, nam may muɗ iram goy kigiɗi, la nigi hotay talamu.
Bulu: Nge mia bulane be Nti, bobenyoñ a bone benan ba ye yene mvam e be ba be nga kee be minkôm, a ba ye bulan zu e si mi too nyô; amu Nti, e Zambe wônan a ye bo te lume mia mvus nge mia bulane be nye, amu a ne mvam a nkoone bôt éngôngo.
Guiziga: Naŋ kine, da ki moko le ng'avu Bumbulvuŋ na, naɓa sukum kumoy ati ziri kumoy mijahay nga hirwur mulak na, mizli miji taŋhay vuna, a sa puraka taŋ ircece, yo a sa pulaka taŋ, a moko nga hirwuy hana a muŋ. Asi Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ kumo, naŋ mezle haɗa, yo a pur ircece. Da ki moko le ng'ava na, naŋ anta sa mbiɗi duba avu kumo ta.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: To on lortake haa maako, nden kam banndiraaɓe mon e ɓikkoy mon keɓan mo'ere haa dahɓe ɓe, ɓe ngarta haa lesdi ndi'i. Ngam Allah Jawmiraawo mon o marɗo enɗam e hinnuye. To on lortake haa maako, nden kam o yeesitittaa, o accataa on.”
Fulfulde_DC: To on lortake haa maako, nden kam banndiraaɓe mon e ɓikkoy mon keɓan mo'ere haa dahɓe ɓe, ɓe ngarta haa lesdi ndi'i. Ngam Allah Jawmiraawo mon o marɗo enɗam e hinnuye. To on lortake haa maako, nden kam o yeesitittaa, o accataa on.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ tɛ GASA WAN, o wi nɛ kaia so o nya'nɛ́ in o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ tɛ de ko ha̧ wa, ɓɛɛ ee wa mɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ nù'ɛ, wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ wi-e-ɗaŋmɔ in wan-de-ko, ɓɛɛ a̧ beka e'nɛ́ duk na, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ pia ɗoŋ pii tɛ a̧.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ tɛ GASA WAN, o wi nɛ kaia so o nya'nɛ́ in o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ tɛ de ko ha̧ wa, ɓɛɛ ee wa mɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ nù'ɛ, wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ wi-e-ɗaŋmɔ in wan-de-ko, ɓɛɛ a̧ beka e'nɛ́ duk na, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ pia ɗoŋ pii tɛ a̧.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kezhɛneke geva yɛ kase sha Mahwətə, katezhɛ heli mbeli nyi kefəhwe ka menəhɛ ŋayɛ ba'a ŋwale tezhilia ŋayɛ yitea hɛ, katepele nda hweŋkwa hɛ ke hɛ kazhɛne geva kadzete hɛɗi nya. Kwa nza ŋkɛ kwele kwele zhɛ heli ba'a ganyɛa mehele va Shala Mahwətə ta ŋayɛ, katezhɛre ŋayɛ wəmbə ŋkɛ kezhɛneke geva yɛ kase shɛ we.»
Tupurri: Hayga nday fer we le see Manwur no, heçeçre äay wo de weere äay da'ge wo koge decoo yañ äiñ jar maga hay wo wo go de hoo rage ti dañgay mono, day aà fer ge wo yañ le äi sir sen lam no. Werga Manwuri, Baa äayn joñ äil de el yañ see äay, aà diñ je ko decoo jare, day ngië gi faale ne nday gaa, hayga nday fer wee le see äe no.

Francais: Les coureurs passèrent ainsi de ville en ville dans le pays d'Ephraïm et de Manassé, et jusqu'à Zabulon ; mais on se riait d'eux et on se moquait d'eux.
Anglais: So the posts passed from city to city through the country of Ephraim and Manasseh even unto Zebulun: but they laughed them to scorn, and mocked them.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa jaŋ labar kaf jik hay hoyok-ziyna kaf ma hay nagat vi Efrayim hiɗi Manase kaf, ta-ta hay Zabulon. May sumun ka cen kuɗsiya, ka burahsiya kaw.
Bulu: Bemate mimbi be nga lôt e tison ése yʼEfrayim a Manasé a kui Zabuloñ. Ve bôt be nga woé a kpweʼele be.
Guiziga: Mijiviɗeye, a ram vur walahay vur walahay angi hirwuy Efrayim ati Manase zlar gar, hã sesẽŋ a Zabuloŋ, amma mizli a singiram ar taŋ, yo a puraka ɓi taŋ ka ɓi ngi sefel.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yaawɗotooɓe go njehi haa gure fuu nder lesdi Efrayim e Manassa, koo nder lesdi Zabulon boo. Ammaa yimɓe njali ɓe, njanci ɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Yaawɗotooɓe go njehi haa gure fuu nder lesdi Efrayim e Manassa, koo nder lesdi Zabulon boo. Ammaa yimɓe njali ɓe, njanci ɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O betom nɛ̀ɛ̀ dam tɛ ye nú Efraim in nú Manase kpɔk kpɔk lɛŋ hegɔ hɔ nɛnɛ nú Zabulɔŋ mɛ, ɓɛɛ o bíí mam wa, zɛkɛɗi nɛ̀ wen kɔ-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O betom nɛ̀ɛ̀ dam tɛ ye nú Efraim in nú Manase kpɔk kpɔk lɛŋ hegɔ hɔ nɛnɛ nú Zabulɔŋ mɛ, ɓɛɛ o bíí mam wa, zɛkɛɗi nɛ̀ wen kɔ-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbeli nyi ghweneghe nyi le ghena ntəsləmte hɛɗia Ɛfrayim ba'a ŋa Manasɛ, kadzeghwa kemeleme kemeleme, kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ, hwa'a hɛ mbe hɛɗia Zabəlon. Ama ntake mbeli kaŋ'wəshi ba'a kayiɗə hɛ.
Tupurri: Jar soolen kal wo rañ äi leegen wo do kay no, cegaë wo äi leege ma la, cegaë wo äi leege ma la, äi sir ni jar Efrayim wo de jar ni Manase, haçaç go ni jar ni Sabulon wo, ama aà hay wo fegge ti äaara, hay wo las rage.

Francais: Quelque, hommes seulement d'Aser, de Manassé et de Zabulon s'humilièrent et vinrent à Jérusalem.
Anglais: Nevertheless divers of Asher and Manasseh and of Zebulun humbled themselves, and came to Jerusalem.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May hiɗi kayni kaf, sum sara'a hay jafna vi Aser, Manase hiɗi Zabulon hot yisi gaa'a, nisi co hay Yerusalem.
Bulu: Ve da bôte bʼéziñe ya meyoñ Azér, Manasé a Zabuloñ be nga yeme bikobe biap a ke Yérusalém.
Guiziga: Ti nah gar na, mizli mekelemey ar sukwi ngi Aser, ngi Manase ati ngi Zabuloŋ, a sinaka malambaˀ taŋ le, a ram nga Zeruzaleme.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Sey woɗɓe nder le'i Aser e Manassa e Zabulon tan leestini ko'e muuɗum'en, ngari haa Urusaliima.
Fulfulde_DC: Sey woɗɓe nder le'i Aser e Manassa e Zabulon tan leestini ko'e muuɗum'en, ngari haa Urusaliima.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɔ kpɔk, wen'i yee tɛ o ŋma bíí tɛ zuduk ko Asɛr in ko Manase bá nɛ̀ ko Zabulɔŋ, ɓɛɛ o wi nɔ‘i gar pii Jerusalɛm.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɔ kpɔk, wen'i yee tɛ o ŋma bíí tɛ zuduk ko Asɛr in ko Manase bá nɛ̀ ko Zabulɔŋ, ɓɛɛ o wi nɔ‘i gar pii Jerusalɛm.
Kapsiki_DC: Ya tsagha ŋkɛ ne, pa kweci mbeli mbe hwelefe ta Asɛr, Manasɛ ba'a Zabəlon ɗepete fete ta nci, cape hɛ se kadzembe Zhɛrəzalɛm.
Tupurri: Ti ngeel sen ni mo ta' jar po yoo jar ni Aser wo de Manase de jar Sabulon wo, kal wo fer ti äaara gesiñ, kal wo nduugi Jerusalem.

Francais: Dans Juda aussi, la main de Dieu s'étendit pour leur donner un même coeur et leur faire exécuter l'ordre du roi et des chefs, selon la parole de Yahweh.
Anglais: Also in Judah the hand of God was to give them one heart to do the commandment of the king and of the princes, by the word of the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay Yuda kaw Ma-Vatɗina li lopo kay vulsi dikga kepta kay nisi ma hum kuɗ dita vi mulla hiɗi sa lopna valamu, kuɗ yoboyna vi Ma-Vatɗina
Bulu: E Yuda fe wo Zambe ô nga bo ésaé ya ve bôt avale nleme da ya bo abendé njô bôt a bivete bié avalʼane nkobô Nti ô mbe.
Guiziga: Asi ruwuy Zuda kwana, Buymisemuŋ ara gi slra, ɓi ngi buy ati mizli hirnga naŋhay miɓaka na, ɓa mizli, jom ˀay purla, a gaka kaɓa Bumbulvuŋ miɓa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder lesdi Yahuuda kam, juŋngo Jawmiraawo huuwi, hokki yimɓe fuu ɓernde woore haa ɓe tokko umroore laamiiɗo e mawɓe mum fodde wolde Jawmiraawo.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder lesdi Yahuuda kam, juŋngo Jawmiraawo huuwi, hokki yimɓe fuu ɓernde woore haa ɓe tokko umroore laamiiɗo e mawɓe mum fodde wolde Jawmiraawo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛn nù Juda mbɛt, GASA WAN dee ha̧ o bíí mɛ mbo zu tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko wannu nɛ̀ o gasawi tɔ̧ wen-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛn nù Juda mbɛt, GASA WAN dee ha̧ o bíí mɛ mbo zu tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko wannu nɛ̀ o gasawi tɔ̧ wen-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te hɛɗia Zhəwda perə ne, nahe Mahwətə kemene slene hwa mbelia nyi keyɛte kanya kwetɛŋe kamene slene le ghena ta ŋkɛ nya gezeke yɛ meghe le mbelia jama.
Tupurri: Äi sir Juda mo lay no, do Manwur kal joñ joñre ma haç jiili ne hara boñ maga aà mo joñ wo fen ma ti jag wañ wo de minisdirn wo no, do maga waçaçre mani Manwurn de dage nono.

Francais: Un peuple nombreux se réunit à Jérusalem pour célébrer la fête des Azymes au second mois : ce fut une immense assemblée.
Anglais: And there assembled at Jerusalem much people to keep the feast of unleavened bread in the second month, a very great congregation.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: sumun ŋolo tok tuwsi hay Yerusalem kay li yuldeta vi fun-bay-kufna hay til ma ma'na, dakka na'ta sumun dak haya' ŋolo.
Bulu: Ezuʼu bôt é nga sulane Yérusalém asu ya jem abôʼô belet é ne te mvusan e ngone baa: ésulane te é mbe anen.
Guiziga: Angi kiya mucuw naŋ ngi vi na, mizli a kusom haɗi a Zeruzaleme ngi gi muguzlum ngi ɗaf manja ˀis a ra: mizli a kusom haɗi teˀe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe kawti haa Urusaliima nder lewru ɗiɗaɓru, ngam waɗugo juulde tamseeje ɗe ufnaaka, jama'aare ɗuuɗnde masin.
Fulfulde_DC: Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe kawti haa Urusaliima nder lewru ɗiɗaɓru, ngam waɗugo juulde tamseeje ɗe ufnaaka, jama'aare ɗuuɗnde masin.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bíí nɛ̀ dɔka-a mɔi̧a sɛn Jerusalɛm wen dee gbaŋa  brɛt  nɛ̀ hao bo sɛnɛ na tɛ yiitoo fio-zɛ. Dukbíí nɛ̀ dɔka-a mɔi̧a bó nɛ́ mɔɔ tɔ̧ na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bíí nɛ̀ dɔka-a mɔi̧a sɛn Jerusalɛm wen dee gbaŋa  brɛt  nɛ̀ hao bo sɛnɛ na tɛ yiitoo fio-zɛ. Dukbíí nɛ̀ dɔka-a mɔi̧a bó nɛ́ mɔɔ tɔ̧ na.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwele kwele mbeli nyi ketsenete geva mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm, te kwa bake ta tere mbe va kezha mene gəsəkəa ɗafa nyi ɗema tenjɛne hwe. Nahe ŋkɛ kenza katsene nya wəba tsape.
Tupurri: Jar wo ngaäa kal wo tayge Jerusalem ma joñ few hole peçeç ma bay defoçoçre non nen few ma de äog no. Sen hay joñ diñ tayge ti ma kluu debañ.

Francais: S'étant levés, ils firent disparaître les autels qui étaient à Jérusalem; ils firent aussi disparaître tous les autels des parfums, et ils les jetèrent dans la vallée du Cédron.
Anglais: And they arose and took away the altars that were in Jerusalem, and all the altars for incense took they away, and cast them into the brook Kidron.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi yaway kulo'o, giwin-ma-ɗifinna ma hay Yerusalem nisi tom goyo, liyn ma ŋal urdina hay kaf nisi tom goyo, cukum goy hay zulla vi Sedron.
Bulu: Bôt be nga kôlô si a tyam metaʼa metunaʼa me mbe Yérusalém, a tyame fe bisua ba diʼi beôlobinda a wua bie mbiʼili sédroñ.
Guiziga: A zlaka a wahaka li gi mikulihey misi a Zeruzaleme, waɗ li gi mikuli ngi urdi ngi wur ti wuroyo, ara zliɗaka taŋ ng'ar hurjijiŋ a Sedroŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe puɗɗiri bee ittugo kirsirɗe nder Urusaliima e gulduɗe uureteeɗum fuu, ɓe cakkini ɗe nder waadiwol Kederon.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe puɗɗiri bee ittugo kirsirɗe nder Urusaliima e gulduɗe uureteeɗum fuu, ɓe cakkini ɗe nder waadiwol Kederon.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa yee tɛ gbina o  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧  nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so sɛn Jerusalɛm, in o fara-dɔ-fuu-nyama, ɓɛɛ wa kai nɛ́ɛ̀ a kɔ̧ gboŋgo Sɛdrɔŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa yee tɛ gbina o  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧  nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so sɛn Jerusalɛm, in o fara-dɔ-fuu-nyama, ɓɛɛ wa kai nɛ́ɛ̀ a kɔ̧ gboŋgo Sɛdrɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ ghate kafefelaŋe reghwetɛ nyi dzeyi mbe meleme ba'a yɛ reghwetɛ ketere 'wərdə, tetereke hɛ betakɛ hɛ kwa zlərəa Sɛdron.
Tupurri: AÀ kal wo pudgi, kal wo älag ngeel sië jag maga hay wo äi leege Jerusalem wo go, day älag wo ngeel roë feçeçre foçoçre non wo go, lag wo ra go äi tu ma Sedron no.

Francais: Ils immolèrent ensuite la Pâque, le quatorzième jour du second mois. Les prêtres et les lévites, pris de confusion, se sanctifièrent, et offrirent des holocaustes dans la maison de Yahweh.
Anglais: Then they killed the passover on the fourteenth day of the second month: and the priests and the Levites were ashamed, and sanctified themselves, and brought in the burnt offerings into the house of the  Lord .
