BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay buurta doogo yam fiɗita vi til ma ma'na, nisi ŋat fok-dimi ma Paskana. Muliyan-sa-ɗifinna hiɗi sa Levitna, hay li ma zulot visiya, nisi li tuwsi goy peldete. Nisi li ɗifin ma ŋal-goyna hay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina.
Bulu: Wôna be nga wôé Pak  e ngone baa é too melu awôm a menyin. Amu ôsone betuni a Belévit be nga wôk, nde be nga tune bebien. Be nga ve mimvean ba diʼi ngumba e Nda Nti été.
Guiziga: Ar hin mukuruˀ nga mufaɗ ngi kiya mucuw naŋ na, a slaka ˀay ngi ginew ngi Pakaya. Masayay ati leviheye, mesem a ga taŋ, a tiram, taŋ pal, a ram ara gaka mikuli mizlam zlamaya ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nyannde sappo e nayaɓre nder lewru ɗiɗaɓru, ɓe kirsi njawkoy Paska. Liman'en e Lewi'en cemti, ceni ko'e muuɗum'en, njahri guleteeɗi haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo.
Fulfulde_DC: Nyannde sappo e nayaɓre nder lewru ɗiɗaɓru, ɓe kirsi njawkoy Paska. Liman'en e Lewi'en cemti, ceni ko'e muuɗum'en, njahri guleteeɗi haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa dee gbaŋa  Paska  tɛ ɓu-zua-naar ɔɔ-zɛ tɛ yiitoo fio-zɛ. Wese'i, o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii nɛ̀ foe baa so,  ɗafa  war-tɛ, ɓɛɛ kai o kpoo-sɔ̧ tɛnɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa dee gbaŋa  Paska  tɛ ɓu-zua-naar ɔɔ-zɛ tɛ yiitoo fio-zɛ. Wese'i, o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii nɛ̀ foe baa so,  ɗafa  war-tɛ, ɓɛɛ kai o kpoo-sɔ̧ tɛnɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.
Kapsiki_DC: Te kwa meŋe wəfaɗeghəmbe ta hɛ te tere shɛnyɛ, pa hɛ sleslamte ghə te wəshi keseɗa yitea gəsəkə Pake. Pa ka dzeghe Shala le ka Lɛvi nyi shewə va hawe yaɓemte ghəa nci kezha ɗepe dzeghe melɛ kwa tere tere mbe ghɛa Mahwətə.
Tupurri: AÀ kal wo ngaë feçeçre ma joñ few Pagn wo wur naw ma de hwal ti naa äil few ma de äog no. Jar sië jagn wo de jar Lefid hay mbuë wo soçoçre, kal wo façaç see äaara go. AÀ kal joñ feçeçre sië jag maga aè roë mo äen go äuy äi tiñ mani Manwur no.

Francais: Ils occupaient leur place ordinaire, selon leur règlement, selon la loi de Moïse, l'homme de Dieu ; et les prêtres répandaient le sang qu'ils recevaient de la main des lévites.
Anglais: And they stood in their place after their manner, according to the law of Moses the man of God: the priests sprinkled the blood, which they received of the hand of the Levites.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi ka lakay hay liyna visi ma nisi ka lak hayam dok-dokŋa, ŋray ca kuɗ va ma vun-ma-gatna vi Musus sana vi Lawna di'e. Muliyan-sa-ɗifinna ka yam busuwn goyo, nisi ka vi busuw namna hay ɓam sa Levitna.
Bulu: Be nga too éto jap be wôʼô zu ba tabe, avalʼane atiñe Môze, môta Zambe e né, a betuni be nga miam e metyi be nga nyoñe mo Belévit.
Guiziga: A roko dedeŋ ar li taŋ ar li taŋ, kaɓa mutohoko ar ɓimujuwa ngi Moyis, mbur ngi Buymisemuŋ: levihey a tiɓaka pumbus ngi ginewey magam taŋ mikuli, a vulaka da masayay, joˀ taŋ kwana, a paka ng'ar li gi mikuli.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ndari haa nokkuure maɓɓe bana ko woowa fodde ko tawreeta Muusa, goɗɗo Allah umruno ɓe. Liman'en njaɓi ƴiiƴam kirsaaɗi haa juuɗe Lewi'en, mbicci ɗam haa hirsirde.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ndari haa nokkuure maɓɓe bana ko woowa fodde ko tawreeta Muusa, goɗɗo Allah umruno ɓe. Liman'en njaɓi ƴiiƴam kirsaaɗi haa juuɗe Lewi'en, mbicci ɗam haa hirsirde.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kóó o ndé duk nɛ́ fara-tom kɔ‘i nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ Heembea ko Moisɛ, bíí ko Sɔ̧. O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ gbai kɔ‘i nɛ́ tɔk saɗi nɛ̀ o be Levii ɗafi nɛ̀ sɔ̧ a zu  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ .
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kóó o ndé duk nɛ́ fara-tom kɔ‘i nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ Heembea ko Moisɛ, bíí ko Sɔ̧. O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ gbai kɔ‘i nɛ́ tɔk saɗi nɛ̀ o be Levii ɗafi nɛ̀ sɔ̧ a zu  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ .
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ dzete ŋkwa slene ta nci nya ghalanza, kala nya gezete wəsə mahalegəa Moyize, wəndəa Shala: pa ka Lɛvi ndeke nda mimia wəshi keseɗa nyi dzeghekɛ melɛ mbeli le hɛ ke ka dzeghe Shala, pa ka dzeghe Shala yisəate te reghwetɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ kal wo lagge ti ngeel äaara ma seäaa, do maga jag liñgi mani Moyis je mani Baan hay go de ngaäge äe nono, day jar sië jagn hay wo jwed ci maga saara hay wo yaçaçge äe le do jar Lefid wo mono.

Francais: Comme il y avait dans l'assemblée une foule de gens qui ne s'étaient pas sanctifiés, les lévites étaient chargés d'immoler les victimes pascales pour tous ceux qui n'étaient pas purs, afin de les consacrer à Yahweh.
Anglais: For there were many in the congregation that were not sanctified: therefore the Levites had the charge of the killing of the passovers for every one that was not clean, to sanctify them unto the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay sumun ka ŋolo hay tokŋa bay li tuwsi goy peldete, sa Levitna va' tisi kay ŋat fok-dimi ma Paskana kay sumun kaf sa tuwsi may li goy peldetɗina, kay nisi min vulsi goy ɗifini mi Ma-Vatɗina.
Bulu: Amu e bôt be nji ke tune bebien be mbe abui ésulan été, nde Belévit be nga tebe na ba tyiʼi biyeme ya Pak asu bôte bese be mbe mfuban , ane be ne tune be mfaʼa Nti,
Guiziga: Asi mike, mizli haɗi a wuzla kuso, mitiram taŋ pal ta tuwa na, a ndilaka ngi gi slra mipal da Bumbulvuŋ ta, dar levihey a slaka ˀay ngi ginew ngi mikulihey ar deɗe taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe nder jama'aare cenaayno ko'e muuɗum'en. Ngam maajum Lewi'en kirsi njawkoy Paska ngam soɓɓe fuu, ceni koy ngam Jawmiraawo.
Fulfulde_DC: Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe nder jama'aare cenaayno ko'e muuɗum'en. Ngam maajum Lewi'en kirsi njawkoy Paska ngam soɓɓe fuu, ceni koy ngam Jawmiraawo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o bíí nɛ̀ dɔka-a mgbara giiwi  ɗafi  so war-tɛ-wa na ga, o be Levii gɔna o saɗi oi nú o wi nɔ‘i nɛ̀ nyɛm so mɛ de sa̧a̧ tom ko GASA WAN na'i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o bíí nɛ̀ dɔka-a mgbara giiwi  ɗafi  so war-tɛ-wa na ga, o be Levii gɔna o saɗi oi nú o wi nɔ‘i nɛ̀ nyɛm so mɛ de sa̧a̧ tom ko GASA WAN na'i.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa nza ŋkɛ kwele kwele mbeli hwa tsene ta mbeli nyi keyaɓekɛma geva, vatse nza ka Lɛvi kasla ghə te wəshi keseɗa te ŋkwa nyi keɗema wɛŋe wɛŋe kezha mene slene nya wɛŋe kazləvəa Mahwətə.
Tupurri: Do maga jar hay wo yoo taygen ni debañ maga hay bay wo go de façaçge wa mono, jar Lefid kal wo ya'ge ngaë horog siigi jag few Pagn wo ne jar maga hay bay wo go de façaçge wa mo äuy, nen maga aà mo hay wo go diñ ma Manwur sagsage.

Francais: Car une grande partie du peuple, une foule de ceux d'Ephraïm, de Manassé, d'Issachar et de Zabulon ne s'étaient pas purifiés, et ils mangèrent la Pâque sans se conformer à ce qui est écrit. Mais Ezéchias pria pour eux, en disant :
Anglais: For a multitude of the people, even many of Ephraim, and Manasseh, Issachar, and Zebulun, had not cleansed themselves, yet did they eat the passover otherwise than it was written. But Hezekiah prayed for them, saying, The good  Lord  pardon every one
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay gal ma ŋolla vi sumuna, ŋolo kuɗ jafna vi Efrayim, Manase, Isakar hiɗi Zabulon kaf bay li tuwsi goy peldete. Nisi ti Paskata bay li kuɗ va ma ɗoyna, kuɗ na'ta kayni Ezekiyas siɗaw kisiya hay li ma nam di'e: Ma-Vatɗina, naŋu ma ŋaa ŋolo, vulaŋ gida,
Bulu: amu beta ngabe ya bôt, abui ya ba yʼEfrayim, Manasé, Isakar a Zabuloñ be nji ke tune bebien. Be nga di Pak, teke tôñ aval é ne ntilan, ajô te Ezékias a nga yeʼelan asu dap a jôʼô na: A Nti, ô ne mvam , jaméʼé
Guiziga: Mizli haɗi a zuɓaka  dili   taŋhay avra ta, vendeke naŋ i mizli Efrayimey, Manasehey, Isakaray waɗ Zabuloŋhoy, amma a zumam ɗaf ngi Paka gbaˀ na si, a gaka kaɓa mutoho ɓi naŋ na ta. Dar Ezekiyas a dir dibiɗ vur taŋ, a ɓi: «Bumbulvuŋ mezle, anja ki pula mungra ngi
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɗum laati non ngam ɓurna ummaatoore, waato yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe iwɓe lesdi Efrayim e Manassa e Issakar e Zabulon cenaayno ko'e muuɗum'en. Ɓe nyaami jawgel Paska, ammaa naa fodde umroore deftere. Hezekiya torani ɓe Jawmiraawo, wi'i: “Jawmiraawo booɗɗo yaafano koo moy
Fulfulde_DC: Ɗum laati non ngam ɓurna ummaatoore, waato yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe iwɓe lesdi Efrayim e Manassa e Issakar e Zabulon cenaayno ko'e muuɗum'en. Ɓe nyaami jawgel Paska, ammaa naa fodde umroore deftere. Hezekiya torani ɓe Jawmiraawo, wi'i: “Jawmiraawo booɗɗo yaafano koo moy
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Dɔka o bíí mgbara o be Efraim, o be Manase, o bíí ko Isakar in o be Zabulɔŋ  ɗafi  so war-tɛ-wa na; mɔ kpɔk, wa nyɔŋa mɔ tɛ gbaŋa  Paska , ɓɛɛ bó nɛ́ heembea usa hegɔ na. Zu mɔ‘i, Ezɛkias aia nú kɔfi nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Dɔka o bíí mgbara o be Efraim, o be Manase, o bíí ko Isakar in o be Zabulɔŋ  ɗafi  so war-tɛ-wa na; mɔ kpɔk, wa nyɔŋa mɔ tɛ gbaŋa  Paska , ɓɛɛ bó nɛ́ heembea usa hegɔ na. Zu mɔ‘i, Ezɛkias aia nú kɔfi nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
Kapsiki_DC: Ma wəba ta mbeli, halama ka hwelefefia Ɛfrayim, Manasɛ, Isakar ba'a Zabəlon ne, keyaɓekɛ ghəa nci hɛ we, ama ya tsagha ŋkɛ ne, nahe hɛ kezehwe wəsə kezemea gəsəkə Pake, ya hweŋkwa ɗema va hɛ kazeme kala nya kerafete geva. Ama pa Ɛzɛkiyas səkwəte ghə kezha hɛ, ma ke: «Pa Mahwətə nya ndeɗea mehele kelemte nda fete ta nci te wənə
Tupurri: Werga te ngaäan wo debañ, yoo jar ni Efrayim wo, jar ni Manase wo, jar ni Isakar wo de jar ni Sabulon wo hay bay wo go de façaç see äaara wa. AÀ ree wo hole few Pag no, see wo ti jag fen maga hay go de yerge mo gaa, diñ wersen Esekiyas kal tosge ti äaara, kal waçaçge ga: Daga Manwur maga de el mo fug äil go

Francais: "Que Yahweh, qui est bon, pardonne à tous ceux qui ont appliqué leur coeur à chercher Dieu, Yahweh, le Dieu de leurs pères, quoiqu'ils n'aient pas la pureté requise au sanctuaire !"
Anglais: That prepareth his heart to seek God, the  Lord  God of his fathers, though he be not cleansed according to the purification of the sanctuary.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: mi nisi kaf sa vul diksi goyo kay garaŋ naŋ Lawna, Ma-Vatɗina, Lawna vi sumaysiya, bay li muzta-peldetta goy jewe!
Bulu: ba bese ba ve nleme wobe na be jeñe Zambe Nti, Zambe bʼésaa bap, teke taté tune bebien!
Guiziga: mizli gar mutumom vu ti mevel purla ngi sipuw ka Buymisemuŋ, ka Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ngi dideˀ taŋhay na, ko da taŋ ti hereweɗ a mbuŋ gwat muvuku vu taŋ tekeɗe kwana, pula taŋ mungra taŋ na takwa!»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: mo ɓernde mum anniyi ɗowtanaago Jawmiraawo Allah kaakiraaɓe mum, koo to o senaaka bana ko umroore dow senaare ƴami.”
Fulfulde_DC: mo ɓernde mum anniyi ɗowtanaago Jawmiraawo Allah kaakiraaɓe mum, koo to o senaaka bana ko umroore dow senaare ƴami.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko o zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ; nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́, kóó nɛ̀ oi war-tɛ o wi nɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ sa̧ na’ɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa ha̧ wa, wen wa ha̧a̧ see-wa nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ wen kia mɔ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧a̧.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko o zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ; nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́, kóó nɛ̀ oi war-tɛ o wi nɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ sa̧ na’ɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa ha̧ wa, wen wa ha̧a̧ see-wa nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ wen kia mɔ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧a̧.»
Kapsiki_DC: ke mbeli nyi kentsəte geva le wənəa nci pɛtɛ kazele Shala, Mahwətə nya kaShala ta ka shihɛ nci, ya ghenci yaɓemtema geva ba'a veyima geva tekeleke.»
Tupurri: ne jar maga men wo jiili äaara ma ferge kië Baa, Manwuri, Baa mani paçaçre äaaran wo mono ti, jar maga see wo ti jag façaçge go ma bay ëagn gaa mono.

Francais: Yahweh exauça Ezéchias et pardonna au peuple.
Anglais: And the  Lord  hearkened to Hezekiah, and healed the people.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma-Vatɗina hum Ezekiyas, nam vul gid mi sumuna.
Bulu: Nde Nti a nga wôʼô Ezékias a nyii bôt.
Guiziga: Bumbulvuŋ a cine diradibiɗ ngi Ezekiyasa le, a ga bonoy da mizli mata.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jawmiraawo jaɓi tornde Hezekiya, ukkanaay ɓe sarru .
Fulfulde_DC: Jawmiraawo jaɓi tornde Hezekiya, ukkanaay ɓe sarru .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN kpɛka akamɔ ko Ezɛkias, ɓɛɛ a̧ pi̧ bɔnɛ zu dukbíí na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN kpɛka akamɔ ko Ezɛkias, ɓɛɛ a̧ pi̧ bɔnɛ zu dukbíí na.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Mahwətə fate səkwə ghə ta Ɛzɛkiyas, pa sərəakɛ ɗa mbeli.
Tupurri: Manwur kal laa waçaçre Esekiyas no, kal men jar no.

Francais: Et les enfants d'Israël qui se trouvèrent à Jérusalem célébrèrent la fête des Azymes pendant sept jours avec une grande joie, et chaque jour les lévites et les prêtres louaient Yahweh avec les instruments puissants, en l'honneur de Yahweh.
Anglais: And the children of Israel that were present at Jerusalem kept the feast of unleavened bread seven days with great gladness: and the Levites and the priests praised the  Lord  day by day, singing with loud instruments unto the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ki kayn nala sa Israyella sa ka hay Yerusalem li yuldeta vi fun-bay-kufna ir buur siɗiya, hiɗi firita ŋolo. Hay buurta kaf sa Levitna hiɗi muliyan-sa-ɗifinna ka subur sem Ma-Vatɗina dono ŋolo hiɗi slen ma gi nulla kaf.
Bulu: Nalé ate bone bʼIsraél be nga too Yérusalém be nga bo abôʼô fembé é ne te mvusan tañe melu zamgbwa a mevaʼa abui. Môs ôse Belévit a betuni be nga kañe Nti a ngul ése ya bibômebômé biap asu duma dé.
Guiziga: Israyeley misi a Zeruzaleme, a gaka muguzlum ngi Peŋ manja ˀis ara ti mumul haɗa, hã hin tarnaˀa. Naɓa levihey ati masayaya kwana, vur hin gar na, ara hunumaka Bumbulvuŋ ti gwat ngi dunguroy mahurumom haɗa, mihĩˀĩ vurˀe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nyalɗe joweeɗiɗi yimɓe Isra'iila wonɓe haa Urusaliima mbaɗi juulde tamseeje ɗe ufnaaka. Ɓe mbaɗi nde bee seyo maŋngo. Nyalaade fuu Lewi'en e liman'en maŋgti Jawmiraawo bee kuuje gimruɗe iidooje.
Fulfulde_DC: Nyalɗe joweeɗiɗi yimɓe Isra'iila wonɓe haa Urusaliima mbaɗi juulde tamseeje ɗe ufnaaka. Ɓe mbaɗi nde bee seyo maŋngo. Nyalaade fuu Lewi'en e liman'en maŋgti Jawmiraawo bee kuuje gimruɗe iidooje.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O be  Israɛl  nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so Jerusalɛm dee gbaŋa  brɛt  nɛ̀ hao bo sɛnɛ na tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ̀ gasa desee, ɓɛɛ ko o be Levii in o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, wa zɔna GASA WAN dam ɗoŋ wese nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ̀ o mɔɔ-dɔm in o mɔɔ-mbɛr nɛ̀‘i dee so wen-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O be  Israɛl  nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so Jerusalɛm dee gbaŋa  brɛt  nɛ̀ hao bo sɛnɛ na tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ̀ gasa desee, ɓɛɛ ko o be Levii in o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, wa zɔna GASA WAN dam ɗoŋ wese nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ̀ o mɔɔ-dɔm in o mɔɔ-mbɛr nɛ̀‘i dee so wen-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ka Israyɛl nyi mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm menete gəsəkəa ɗafa nyi ɗema tenjɛne hwe kahɛ mberefaŋe le zlama nya wəba. Keveci keveci ka Lɛvi le ka dzeghe Shala katsahe Mahwətə le wəshi ketsa kwa berete.
Tupurri: Do kay nono, jar Israyel maga hay wo Jerusalem mono, kal wo joñ few hole peçeç ma bay defoçoçre non de fruygi nen naw renam. Nen naw tum mokay jar Lefid wo de jar sië jagn hay wo togoë Manwur go de eegre äaara äuy de feçeçre joçoç äaaran wo ma haç togoëge ne hene.

Francais: Ezéchias parla au coeur de tous les lévites, qui montraient une grande intelligence pour le service de Yahweh. Ils mangèrent les victimes de la fête pendant sept jours, offrant des sacrifices pacifiques et louant Yahweh, le Dieu de leurs pères.
Anglais: And Hezekiah spake comfortably unto all the Levites that taught the good knowledge of the  Lord : and they did eat throughout the feast seven days, offering peace offerings, and making confession to the  Lord  God of their fathers.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ezekiyas law hay dik sa Levitna kaf, sa ka poŋ ir ŋolo kay slena vi Ma-Vatɗina, nisi ti sliw sle ma ŋatamna ir buur siɗiya, nisi li ɗifinna vi lop ma slugona, subur sem Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vi sumaysiya kaw.
Bulu: Ane Ezékias a nga sek e Belévit bese be nga bili mbamba ñwôʼane ya ésaé Nti. Tañe melu zangwa be nga di e ngab é ne be mvean; be nga ve fe bityiʼa ya nlatane ngbwa, be kañe Nti, Zambe bʼésaa bap.
Guiziga: Levihey mupulaka mevel taŋ le mbak kuy kuy da Bumbulvuŋ gar na, mingiɓi ngi Ezekiyas a ci le a mevel taŋ. Joˀ a ram ti gi muguzlumo hã hin tarnaˀ, a roko gam mikuli ngi ngiɓiˀay, yo ara gaka sise da Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ngi dideˀ taŋhaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hezekiya suusɗini ɓerɗe Lewi'en, ngam ɓe fuu ɓe paami kuugal Jawmiraawo booɗɗum. Nyalɗe joweeɗiɗi ɓe nyaami nder juulde man, ɓe lii'i kirsaaɗi ngam kawtal yimɓe, ɓe ngetti Jawmiraawo Allah kaakiraaɓe maɓɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Hezekiya suusɗini ɓerɗe Lewi'en, ngam ɓe fuu ɓe paami kuugal Jawmiraawo booɗɗum. Nyalɗe joweeɗiɗi ɓe nyaami nder juulde man, ɓe lii'i kirsaaɗi ngam kawtal yimɓe, ɓe ngetti Jawmiraawo Allah kaakiraaɓe maɓɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wen ko Ezɛkias baa see o be Levii lɛŋ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ desee zu GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ wa de gbaŋa siti tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ha̧ nɛ̀ mɔ-gaŋmɔ, gasi nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko o dáà kɔ-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wen ko Ezɛkias baa see o be Levii lɛŋ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ desee zu GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ wa de gbaŋa siti tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ha̧ nɛ̀ mɔ-gaŋmɔ, gasi nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko o dáà kɔ-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Ɛzɛkiyas gezete nda ghena kemtsehe berete ke ka Lɛvi nyi keveyi geva tsape kezha slene ta Mahwətə. Kashikwə zake ne, nda ɗafa ta gəsəkə yazeme mbeli, kadzeghe melɛ kejikə geva ba'a kagha cimə ketsahe Mahwətə, Shala ta ka shihɛ nci.
Tupurri: Esekiyas hay fer waçaçre ma le'ge ne jar Lefid wo jag jiili de ele, maga hay wo go de naa nen see äaara de lagge ma Manwur mono. AÀ ree wo naèy feçeçre sië jagn wo nen naw renam. Joñ wo siëgi jag tayge wo, day togoë wo Manwuri, Baa mani paçaçre äaaran wo no.

Francais: Toute l'assemblée fut d'avis de célébrer sept autres jours, et ils célébrèrent sept autres jours joyeusement ;
Anglais: And the whole assembly took counsel to keep other seven days: and they kept other seven days with gladness.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sumun kaf vunsi ŋra'a kay li yuldeta hay buur mara siɗiya lo, buur hena ma siɗiyana nisi li yuldet hayamu hiɗi firita.
Bulu: Ekôane bôt ése é nga kui tyiñe ya beté melu mʼabôʼô mefe zamgbwa, a be nga bo abôk melu zamgbwa a mevaʼa mese,
Guiziga: A dirba nah, mizli gar mukusomo, a hĩyãka le, ɓa a gam hin tarnaˀ mekelem ava ma, a gam hin tarnaˀ ava ma ar li gi muguzlumo ti mumul.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden yimɓe jama'aare fuu annini tokkitingo juulde nde nyalɗe joweeɗiɗi goɗɗe. Ɓe mbaɗi nde bee seyo,
Fulfulde_DC: Nden yimɓe jama'aare fuu annini tokkitingo juulde nde nyalɗe joweeɗiɗi goɗɗe. Ɓe mbaɗi nde bee seyo,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Giiwi nɛ̀ mɔi̧a kɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗɔaa mɛ de gbaŋa siti tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo woyo. Duka nɛ́ mɔɔ desee nyɛmna zaŋ zɛ nɔ‘i,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Giiwi nɛ̀ mɔi̧a kɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗɔaa mɛ de gbaŋa siti tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo woyo. Duka nɛ́ mɔɔ desee nyɛmna zaŋ zɛ nɔ‘i,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa tsene ta mbeli ɗehwe kamtsehe hɛa gəsəkə kahɛ mberefaŋe zhɛkwa. Ma kwa bake ta shikwəa shɛ ne, le zlama menete geva ŋkɛ,
Tupurri: Taygen äuy kal tay jag ga joñ naw ma tigriñ haç togoëge ni renam, day saara kal joñ naw haç togoëge äe ni renam de fruygi.

Francais: car Ezéchias, roi de Juda, avait donné à l'assemblée mille taureaux et sept mille brebis, et les chefs lui avaient donné mille taureaux et dix mille brebis, et des prêtres en grand nombre s'étaient sanctifiés.
Anglais: For Hezekiah king of Judah did give to the congregation a thousand bullocks and seven thousand sheep; and the princes gave to the congregation a thousand bullocks and ten thousand sheep: and a great number of priests sanctified themselves.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kay Ezekiyas mulla vi Yuda tar luway-takalin kisi birim kep, fukunayn birim siɗiya, sa ministrena valamu kaw tar luwayn kisi birim kepe, fukunayn birim doogo. Muliyan-sa-ɗifinna ŋolo li tuwsi goy peldete.
Bulu: amu njô bôt Ezékias, njô bôte ya Yuda, a nga kandé biyem asu ésulan: beyôm benyak toyini, mintômba, bikela toyini zamgbwa, a bivet bi nga kandé asu ésulan: beyôm benyak toyini, mintômba a bikela toyini awôm. Abui betuni be nga tune bebien.
Guiziga: Asi mike na, Ezekiyas, buy Zuda, a vul vur mizli mukos kos vuna, gusoŋ durmuk waɗ tumuŋ ati ˀaway durmuk tarnaˀa, yo mizli hirnga naŋhay na kwana, a vulam le vur mizli mukos kos vuna ya, gusoŋ durmuk waɗ tumuŋ ati ˀaway durmuk kuruˀ ma. Masayay a bam tiram le, taŋ pal.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ngam Hezekiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda hokki ɓe ga'i kalhali ujineere (1.000) e dammooji ujine sappo (10.000). Mawɓe boo ndokki yimɓe ga'i kalhali ujineere (1.000) e dammooji ujine sappo (10.000). Liman'en ɗuuɗɓe ceni ko'e muuɗum'en boo.
Fulfulde_DC: ngam Hezekiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda hokki ɓe ga'i kalhali ujineere (1.000) e dammooji ujine sappo (10.000). Mawɓe boo ndokki yimɓe ga'i kalhali ujineere (1.000) e dammooji ujine sappo (10.000). Liman'en ɗuuɗɓe ceni ko'e muuɗum'en boo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: wen wannu Ezɛkias ha̧a̧ so wiwii ndai booro in o sami booro-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ha̧ giiwi; ɓɛɛ o dita-bíí ha̧ kɔ‘i wiwii ndai booro mbɛt in o sami booro-ɓu. O dɔka o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧  ɗafa  war-tɛ mbɛt tɛ ŋgimbi'i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: wen wannu Ezɛkias ha̧a̧ so wiwii ndai booro in o sami booro-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ha̧ giiwi; ɓɛɛ o dita-bíí ha̧ kɔ‘i wiwii ndai booro mbɛt in o sami booro-ɓu. O dɔka o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧  ɗafa  war-tɛ mbɛt tɛ ŋgimbi'i.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa nza ŋkɛ nahe meghe Ɛzɛkiyas kendeke nda yɛ sla slibə, timɛti 7.000 ke tsene ta mbeli. Pa mbelia jama ndeke nda yɛ sla slibə ba'a timɛti 10.000. Ɓiyitsa ne, pa ka dzeghe Shala yaɓemte geva kwele kwele.
Tupurri: Werga Esekiyas wañ Juda hay de haç blore dere ne taygen ndare, haç fiiri wo ni ndar renam, day minisdir hay haç wo blore dere ndare, haç wo fiiri wo ndar hwale. Jar sië jag wo ngaäa debañ hay façaç wo see äaara go.

Francais: Toute l'assemblée de Juda, les prêtres et les lévites, toute l'assemblée venue d'Israël et les étrangers venus du pays d'Israël ou établis en Juda se livrèrent à la joie.
Anglais: And all the congregation of Judah, with the priests and the Levites, and all the congregation that came out of Israel, and the strangers that came out of the land of Israel, and that dwelt in Judah, rejoiced.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Tokŋa vi Yuda kaf, muliyan-sa-ɗifinna hiɗi sa Levitna, sumun kaf sa may hay Israyel pa hiɗi sum sa pulla sa may hay nagata vi Israyel pa hiɗi sa lakay hay Yuda kaw li firi ŋolo.
Bulu: Ane ékôane bôt ése ya Yuda, betuni a Belévit, e bôte bese be nga so Israél a mintabe mi nga so, be nga vak abui.
Guiziga: Jum ngi mizli Zudahay gar ara mumulom. Naŋ kine, ti masayay, levihey, jum ngi mizli musoko ti Israyel gar, mizli misi ti hayay musoko tisi ruwuy Israyel, misi ti hay taŋhay a Zuda gar na, ara mumulom.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jama'aare Yahuuda fuu seyi, non boo liman'en e Lewi'en e jama'aare warɓe diga Isra'iila fuu, waato hoɗɓe iwɓe lesdi Isra'iila e jooɗiiɓe haa lesdi Yahuuda.
Fulfulde_DC: Jama'aare Yahuuda fuu seyi, non boo liman'en e Lewi'en e jama'aare warɓe diga Isra'iila fuu, waato hoɗɓe iwɓe lesdi Isra'iila e jooɗiiɓe haa lesdi Yahuuda.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bíí nù Juda lɛŋ kpaa desee gu nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o be Levii, in o bíí nɛ̀ tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn wen gbaŋa'i, sɛka o ŋma bíí nɛ̀ pia nù Juda mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bíí nù Juda lɛŋ kpaa desee gu nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o be Levii, in o bíí nɛ̀ tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn wen gbaŋa'i, sɛka o ŋma bíí nɛ̀ pia nù Juda mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛtɛ mbeli le zlama: ka Zhəwda, ka dzeghe Shala ba'a ka Lɛvi, tsagha mbeli nyi kese mbe hɛɗia Israyɛl nyi kese deke kezha gəsəkə ba'a nyi kesenji kanza mbe Zhəwda.
Tupurri: Tayge jar Juda wo äuy, jar sië jagn wo de jar Lefid wo, ngaäa maga hay nduu le Israyel mo äuy, waare maga nduu wo le Israyel mo äuy, noga hay wo de lagge Juda mo äuy, haç wo see äaara joñ fruygi.

Francais: Il y eut à Jérusalem de grandes réjouissances, au point que depuis le temps de Salomon, fils de David, roi d'Israël, rien de semblable n'avait eu lieu dans Jérusalem.
Anglais: So there was great joy in Jerusalem: for since the time of Solomon the son of David king of Israel there was not the like in Jerusalem.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Firit li ŋolo hay Yerusalem. Tun caw hay liyna vi Salomon goora vi mulla David mulla vi Israyel pa, va mara ma ki kayn nala bay li hay Yerusalem tuwa.
Bulu: Beta mevak me nga boban e Yérusalém. Ataté melu me Solômon e mone David, njô bôte ya Israél, jôm avale te é nji tame boban e Yérusalém.
Guiziga: Mumul a gi haɗa a Zeruzaleme, asi diga ti hin ngi Salomoŋ, mangal ngi Davit, buy Israyel na, a gam muguzlum misi kanah a Zeruzaleme ɗaˀ ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Seyo maŋngo waɗi haa Urusaliima, irin maago meeɗaay laataago ton diga zamanu Suleymaanu ɓii Daawuda, laamiiɗo Isra'iila.
Fulfulde_DC: Seyo maŋngo waɗi haa Urusaliima, irin maago meeɗaay laataago ton diga zamanu Suleymaanu ɓii Daawuda, laamiiɗo Isra'iila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gasa desee batɛ duka nɛ́ ko o bíí Jerusalɛm, wen sɛn ɗoŋ ŋgimbi ko Salomɔŋ, bem ko David, wannu  Israɛl , pɛrti gbaŋa hegɔ de sɛn Jerusalɛm na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gasa desee batɛ duka nɛ́ ko o bíí Jerusalɛm, wen sɛn ɗoŋ ŋgimbi ko Salomɔŋ, bem ko David, wannu  Israɛl , pɛrti gbaŋa hegɔ de sɛn Jerusalɛm na.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma zlama shɛ ne, tekeleke wəba ŋkɛ sha ka Zhɛrəzalɛm, kwa nza ŋkɛ ghala se te vəa Salomon wəzege ta David meghea ka Israyɛl ne, kegha mbeli kamenete hwelefe ta gəsəkəa shɛ we.
Tupurri: Fruygi hay joñ Jerusalem kluu debañ. Le ti wur naw mani Salomoñ je ni Dafid wañ Israyeln ka' haçaç mokay te mo ma de mañ sen mokay hay bay de joñge Jerusalem wa.

Francais: Les prêtres lévitiques se levèrent et bénirent le peuple, et leur voix fut entendue ; leur prière arriva jusqu'à la sainte demeure de Yahweh, jusqu'au ciel.
Anglais: Then the priests the Levites arose and blessed the people: and their voice was heard, and their prayer came up to his holy dwelling place, even unto heaven.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Muliyan-sa-ɗifinna hiɗi sa Levitna yaway kulo'o, nisi gi bol kay sumuna. Ma-Vatɗina humsi delsiya, siɗawta visi co ta-ta hay liyn ma musta valamu hay Wuralawna.
Bulu: Nde betuni a Belévit be nga kôlô si a botan ékôane bôt. Metyiñe map me nga wôʼé a meyeʼelane map me nga ke a kui éto yʼétyi Nti é ne yôb été.
Guiziga: A dirba nah na, Levihey masayay a slikiɗam, a ɗuwulaka mi da mizli. ˀAy ngi diradibiɗ taŋ a ndil sesẽŋ a muŋ, ar li Buymisemuŋ mipal misi anga, a tiɓa diradibiɗ taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Haa timmoode, liman'en e Lewi'en ummi barkiɗini ummaatoore. Do'aare maɓɓe yotti joonde Jawmiraawo seniinde haa asama, o jaɓi nde.
Fulfulde_DC: Haa timmoode, liman'en e Lewi'en ummi barkiɗini ummaatoore. Do'aare maɓɓe yotti joonde Jawmiraawo seniinde haa asama, o jaɓi nde.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ mɔ kaɗa lɛŋ kaɗi, o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o be Levii kura ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ tok de yoŋgo zu dukbíí. Kɔfa-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa daŋa hɔ yiwese tɛ  sa̧a̧-fara  ko GASA WAN.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ mɔ kaɗa lɛŋ kaɗi, o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o be Levii kura ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ tok de yoŋgo zu dukbíí. Kɔfa-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa daŋa hɔ yiwese tɛ  sa̧a̧-fara  ko GASA WAN.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa keɗaŋe, pepelɛhetɛme ka dzeghe Shala le ka Lɛvi sate te ŋkwa, pa wəpikɛ mbeli. Pa səkwə ta nci dzeme pelɛ ŋkwa nya keveyi geva tekeleke kaŋa Shala pela ghweme, pa Shala fate.
Tupurri: Jar sië jagn wo de jar Lefid kal wo go pudgi ciñ, day kal wo kañ bosa' ne ngaäan ti. AÀ laa geçeçge äaara, day tosge äaaran joñ nen dayge go haçaç ti ngeel ma bay ëag mani Manwurn wo go ciñ.

Francais: Lorsque tout cela fut terminé, tous ceux d'Israël qui se trouvaient là partirent pour les villes de Juda, et ils brisèrent les stèles, coupèrent les aschérahs, et renversèrent les hauts lieux et les autels dans tout Juda et Benjamin, et dans Ephraïm et Manassé, jusqu'à complète destruction. Puis tous les enfants d'Israël retournèrent dans leurs villes, chacun dans son domaine.
Anglais: Now when all this was finished, all Israel that were present went out to the cities of Judah, and brake the images in pieces, and cut down the groves, and threw down the high places and the altars out of all Judah and Benjamin, in Ephraim also and Manasseh, until they had utterly destroyed them all. Then all the children of Israel returned, every man to his possession, into their own cities.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma slen kayni kaf vatawa, nisi sa Israyella kaf sa ay hay liy namna kali hay hoyok-ziyna vi Yuda kaf, sle ma sli tuw sana ma inina nisi tom gaa'a, naga ma inina ma yum Asera* nisi tom gaa'a, liyn ma ɗiŋiriŋŋa kaf nisi tom gaa'a, giwin-ma-ɗifinna ma hay Yuda hiɗi Benyamin, ma hay Efrayim hiɗi Manase kaw nisi tom gaa'a. Bugol kayni sum sa Israyel kaf hotay hay hoyok-ziyna visiya, gigekaw hay liyna valamu valamu.
Bulu: Eyoñe mam mete me nga man, bôte bese ya Israél be nga too be nga so e bitisone ya Yuda a buʼu mekône mʼazezambe a baʼé fe mekône mʼAkéra, a sôʼôlô bito bise ya bikôndôʼô yôbe si; nalé fe metaʼa metunaʼa ya Yuda ase a Bényamin, Efrayim a Manasé. Eyoñe te bone bʼIsraél bese be nga bulan e bitisone biap.
Guiziga: A dirba muguzlum mikiɗ mi na, Israyeley misi akẽh gar a ram ng'ar walahay Zudahay, ara wahaka ɗugur mikaˀka haya, a bukoko kuli ɓamtalaya, a wahaka li miɗingir ɗingir magam mikulihey ar taŋ ati li gi mikuliheye, waɗ susuyum susuyum taŋ leɗeɗ wãˀ asi ruwuy Zuda, Benjameŋ waɗ asi ruwuy Efrayim ati Manase ma. A dirba nah, Israyeley gar a mam ng'ar walahay taŋhay a muŋ, mbur gar ngi hay naŋ ngi hay naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde juulde nde'e fuu timmi, Isra'iila'en wonɓe haa Urusaliima njehi nder gure Yahuuda, pusi daŋraŋge ɗowanteeɓe, pe'i suuraaji Asera, mbili nokkuuje towɗe e kirsirɗe fuu, koo toy nder lesdi Yahuuda e Benyamin e Efrayim e Manassa. Nden Isra'iila'en fuu kooti berniiji muuɗum'en, koo moy haa maral mum.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde juulde nde'e fuu timmi, Isra'iila'en wonɓe haa Urusaliima njehi nder gure Yahuuda, pusi daŋraŋge ɗowanteeɓe, pe'i suuraaji Asera, mbili nokkuuje towɗe e kirsirɗe fuu, koo toy nder lesdi Yahuuda e Benyamin e Efrayim e Manassa. Nden Isra'iila'en fuu kooti berniiji muuɗum'en, koo moy haa maral mum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ gbaŋa kaɗa lɛŋ, o be  Israɛl  nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so hi̧i̧ lɛŋ pɛsa dam tɛ o ye nù Juda mɛ gbin o ta-zu-nù, ɓir nɛ̀ o te nɛ̀‘i gasi gasi, ɗaŋ nɛ̀ o  kusa-fara  in o fara-ɗafi géé-sɔ̧ yinɛ sɛn nù Juda in nú Bɛnjamin ká bá nɛ̀ Efraim in Manase lɛŋ. Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, o be  Israɛl  sii ɗoŋ, kóó o ndé sitɛ ye kɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ gbaŋa kaɗa lɛŋ, o be  Israɛl  nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so hi̧i̧ lɛŋ pɛsa dam tɛ o ye nù Juda mɛ gbin o ta-zu-nù, ɓir nɛ̀ o te nɛ̀‘i gasi gasi, ɗaŋ nɛ̀ o  kusa-fara  in o fara-ɗafi géé-sɔ̧ yinɛ sɛn nù Juda in nú Bɛnjamin ká bá nɛ̀ Efraim in Manase lɛŋ. Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, o be  Israɛl  sii ɗoŋ, kóó o ndé sitɛ ye kɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa nahe gəsəkə ne, cape ka Israyɛl nyi tagha pɛtɛ kadzeyi mbe yɛ meleme ta Zhəwda, pa hɛ mpəmte yɛ gɛaŋa nyi mɓeyi mbeli, tsaslemte selə nyi keveyi geva tekeleke, ŋzlamte yɛ ŋkwa kedzeghe melɛ ba'a yɛ reghwetɛa nci. Tsetse menete hɛ te hɛɗia meghea Zhəwda pɛtɛ, mbe hwelefe ta ka Bɛnjamɛn, Ɛfrayim ba'a Manasɛ, kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ, cape yayata wəndə kalə sha ghɛa ŋkɛ mbe meleme ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: De maga sen mo deñ äuy le' jag go mono, jar Israyel maga hay wo ti ngeel ni äuy mono kal wo rawge äi leege ma Judan wo, day kal wo mbug huuli ma de jagge ti keçeçn wo go, car wo koore Aseran wo go, day srog wo ngeel sië jag ma de farge ciñn wo go äuy, de ngeel sië jag ma Judan wo de mani Benjame no, de mani Efrayimn wo de mani Manse no. Blam äe jar Israyel kal wo ferge äi leege äaaran wo, wosela ti ngeel maga diñ ma äe mono.

Francais: Ezéchias établit les divisions des prêtres et des lévites d'après leurs classes, -- chacun des prêtres et des lévites selon ses fonctions, -- pour les holocaustes et les sacrifices pacifiques, pour le service du culte, pour les chants et les louanges, aux portes du camp de Yahweh.
Anglais: And Hezekiah appointed the courses of the priests and the Levites after their courses, every man according to his service, the priests and Levites for burnt offerings and for peace offerings, to minister, and to give thanks, and to praise in the gates of the tents of the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ezekiyas poŋ ir muliyan-sa-ɗifinna hiɗi sa Levitna kuɗ vokŋa visiya visiya, gigekaw hay lopna valamu valamu, muliyan-sa-ɗifinna hiɗi sa Levitna hay lopna vi ɗifin ma ŋal-goyna, hiɗi ɗifinna vi lop ma slugona, kay li sunda, kay tiy semda hiɗi suburta, hay vun-galana vi kaŋŋa vi Ma-Vatɗina.
Bulu: Ane Ezékias a nga telé betuni a Belévit ane minsamba miap mi né, môt ase avalʼane ésaé jé é né, betuni a Belévit asu mimvean ba diʼi ngumba, mimvean ya nlatane ngbwa, ésaé nkañan, asu mebôk a bia ya ékañaʼa, e mimbé ya minkane mi Nti.
Guiziga: Ezekiyas a cifa masayay ati leviheye, mizli ti hunum taŋ ti hunum taŋ, bac nga hirnga hunum taŋ vuna ma na, a vula slra ngi mburo ngi mburo. A vul da masayay ati leviheye, i slra ngi mikuli mizlam zlam, mikuli ngi ngiɓiˀay, slra ngi mezegweley, gi sise ati ngi hunuma Bumbulvuŋ a mizlingre walahay guɗuk ngi Bumbulvuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamiiɗo Hezekiya darni geɓe liman'en e Lewi'en fodde geɓe muuɗum'en, koo moy haa kuugal mum: Ngam lii'aneeki guleteeɗi e kirsaaɗi ngam kawtal yimɓe bee Allah, ngam dewal e gime gettooje e maŋgtooje haa dammuɗe caŋngeeje Jawmiraawo.
Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo Hezekiya darni geɓe liman'en e Lewi'en fodde geɓe muuɗum'en, koo moy haa kuugal mum: Ngam lii'aneeki guleteeɗi e kirsaaɗi ngam kawtal yimɓe bee Allah, ngam dewal e gime gettooje e maŋgtooje haa dammuɗe caŋngeeje Jawmiraawo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ezɛkias kɛ̧ɛ̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii nɛ̀ dùk-aa, ɓɛɛ usi yuwar tom kɔ-wa ha̧ wa. War ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii, kɔ-wa nɛ́  dɔɔ  kpoo-sɔ̧ in ha̧a̧ mɔ-gaŋmɔ, tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧ sɛn tɛ zɔnamɔ in tu̧u̧ tɛ GASA WAN sɛn kɔ̧  sa̧a̧-fara .
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ezɛkias kɛ̧ɛ̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii nɛ̀ dùk-aa, ɓɛɛ usi yuwar tom kɔ-wa ha̧ wa. War ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii, kɔ-wa nɛ́  dɔɔ  kpoo-sɔ̧ in ha̧a̧ mɔ-gaŋmɔ, tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧ sɛn tɛ zɔnamɔ in tu̧u̧ tɛ GASA WAN sɛn kɔ̧  sa̧a̧-fara .
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Ɛzɛkiyas nteyi wəvəsə ka dzeghe Shala le ka Lɛvi, kandeke nda slene ke yayata nci mbe wəvəsəa nci. Mbe ŋkwa nya keveyi geva tekeleke kaŋa Mahwətə ne, ka dzeghe Shala le ka Lɛvi ka mene slene ta dzeghe melɛ kwa tere tere le nyi kejikə ŋkwa, le slene ta səkwə ghə nya tsahe Mahwətə ba'a katsa nda hana mbeli hwe.
Tupurri: Esekiyas kal lag jar sië jagn wo go ti carge äaara taë taë, wosela see joñre äe, jar sië jagn wo de jar Lefid wo diñ ma joñ siëgi jag maga aè roë mo äen go äuy mono, de siëgi jag taygen wo no, de joñre no, ma joñ fewn wo de togoëgen wo, jag tiñ kañ mani Manwur wo no.

Francais: Il fournit aussi de ses biens la portion du roi pour les holocaustes, pour les holocaustes du matin et du soir et pour les holocaustes des sabbats, des nouvelles lunes et des fêtes, comme il est écrit dans la loi de Yahweh.
Anglais: He appointed also the king's portion of his substance for the burnt offerings, to wit, for the morning and evening burnt offerings, and the burnt offerings for the sabbaths, and for the new moons, and for the set feasts, as it is written in the law of the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla vul galla vi farayna valamu kay li ɗifin ma ŋal-goyna, ɗifin ma ŋal-goyna ma graw culumta hiɗi ma vulatitna, hiɗi ɗifin ma ŋal-goyna kay sabatna, kay til ma wulina, kay buur ma ŋulona, ki ɗoy hay vun-ma-gatna vi Ma-Vatɗin nala.
Bulu: Njô bôt a nga ve ngab akume dap asu mimvean mia diʼibane ngumba, mi ya mametyé a mamengôʼé, a mi ya Sabat, meté me ngon a mebôk , aval é ne ntilan e metiñ me Nti.
Guiziga: Buy a wuɗ cah avu zlili naŋ, ɓa ngi gi mikuli mizlam zlamay, magaka taŋ ti miprik waɗ ti pastaˀa, magaka taŋ tapas sabat, tapas kiya muslo le, waɗ tapas muguzlum mekelemeye, kaɓa mutohoko ɓi nah ar ɓimujuwa ngi Bumbulvuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamiiɗo hokki yeɓre jawdi mum ngam guleteeɗi fajiri e kiikiiɗe e guleteeɗi nyalɗe ciwtorɗe e juulɗe lewru hesru e juulɗe goɗɗe, bana ko tawreeta Jawmiraawo umri .
Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo hokki yeɓre jawdi mum ngam guleteeɗi fajiri e kiikiiɗe e guleteeɗi nyalɗe ciwtorɗe e juulɗe lewru hesru e juulɗe goɗɗe, bana ko tawreeta Jawmiraawo umri .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu mbɛt baa ŋma mbɔi kɔ‘i e wen ɗafa sɔ̧ wan mɛ tuyɛ in mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ sɛka wan mɛ wese-ɔm-tɛ in wan mɛ gbaŋa mbe-yi-zɛ bá nɛ̀ o géé gbaŋa hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ yɔra so zaŋ Heembea ko GASA WAN ga.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu mbɛt baa ŋma mbɔi kɔ‘i e wen ɗafa sɔ̧ wan mɛ tuyɛ in mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ sɛka wan mɛ wese-ɔm-tɛ in wan mɛ gbaŋa mbe-yi-zɛ bá nɛ̀ o géé gbaŋa hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ yɔra so zaŋ Heembea ko GASA WAN ga.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa meghe kelete kwete bela ta wəshia ŋkɛ kezha melɛ kwa tere tere nyi mene mbeli masheke le tɛhwɛɗi, tsagha le nyi mene mbeli te veci kezhɛne mpi, le ŋa kwa ghate ta hɛ mbe tere ba'a hwa kweci gəsəkə, kala nya gezete wəsə mahalegəa Mahwətə.
Tupurri: Wañ kal haçge see te feçeçre mani äen wo ma joñ siigi jag maga aè roë mo äen go äuy mono, siigi jag maga aè roë mo äen go äuy ma de jag toñ wo de ma de law, de siigi jag maga aè roë mo äen go äuy ma wur Saban wo no, de kolge few ciñ wo no, de few ma kluuri wo do maga aà de yerge äil jag liñgi mani Manwurn nono.

Francais: Et il dit au peuple qui habitait Jérusalem de donner la portion des prêtres et des lévites, afin qu'ils s'attachassent fortement à la loi de Yahweh.
Anglais: Moreover he commanded the people that dwelt in Jerusalem to give the portion of the priests and the Levites, that they might be encouraged in the law of the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nam di tam sumuna, tam sum sa hay Yerusalemna kaw, kay nisi ma vul galla vi muliyan-sa-ɗifinna hiɗi sa Levitna goyo, kay nisi ma lak ɗeŋe hay gatta vi Ma-Vatɗina.
Bulu: A nga jô ayoñ a e bôt be too Yérusalém na be ve e ngap ja yiane betuni a Belévit.
Guiziga: Dar buy a ɓa mizli Zeruzalemeye, ɓa a vulaka mi ngi masayay ati leviheye, ɓa a vulaka vu taŋ taˀ kuy kuy ngi sipa ɓimujuwa ngi Bumbulvuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Hezekiya umri yimɓe Urusaliima ndokka liman'en e Lewi'en ko haandani ɓe, ngam haa ɓe tabito nder tawreeta Jawmiraawo.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Hezekiya umri yimɓe Urusaliima ndokka liman'en e Lewi'en ko haandani ɓe, ngam haa ɓe tabito nder tawreeta Jawmiraawo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o be Jerusalɛm mɛ ha̧ war mɔ ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii ha̧ wa, wen ha̧ wa mɛ kpa war mɛ ha̧ ŋgai tɛ-wa tɛ tom nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ Heembea ko GASA WAN.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o be Jerusalɛm mɛ ha̧ war mɔ ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii ha̧ wa, wen ha̧ wa mɛ kpa war mɛ ha̧ ŋgai tɛ-wa tɛ tom nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ Heembea ko GASA WAN.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa meghe gezete nda ke ka Zhɛrəzalɛm pɛtɛ kezha ve nda wəshi nyi kehi va hɛ ke ka dzeghe Shala le ka Lɛvi, yitea ndeke nda ghə hɛ ke wəsə mahalegəa Mahwətə.
Tupurri: AÀ kal wii ngaäa no, de jar ma äi leege Jerusalem wo ga aà mo haç wo feçeçre mani jar sië jagn wo go de mani jar Lefid wo no, nen maga aà mo lag wo ti jag liñgi mani Manwurn ngiñ.

Francais: Lorsque cet ordre fut répandu, les enfants d'Israël offrirent en abondance les prémices du blé, du vin nouveau, de l'huile, du miel et de tous les produits des champs; ils apportèrent aussi en abondance la dîme de tout.
Anglais: And as soon as the commandment came abroad, the children of Israel brought in abundance the firstfruits of corn, wine, and oil, and honey, and of all the increase of the field; and the tithe of all things brought they in abundantly.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma labar kayni biya goy biyana, sum sa Israyella vul vun-jaf ma jewna vi alkamarena, vinna ma jibetna, mula, yumda, hiɗi vuɗna vi sle ma hay sinen kaf, nisi vulum ŋolo; gal-ma-doogona vi slen kaf nisi maram ŋolo. Gal-ma-doogona vi sle hegen kaf kaw nisi maram ŋolo.
Bulu: Eyoñ nkobô wuna ô nga mialan, bone bʼIsraél be nga ve bembômô be fôn, mfefé woon, mbon, wôé a biôm bise bia yô afan abui abui; be nga soo fe ngab awômô ya biôme bise.
Guiziga: Taŋ misinaka ɓimujuwa nah sin si na, Israyeley a soko ti mudumbuŋ ngi alkamari taŋhaya ciɗngim ciɗngim, mbaazla, mal, mam ati gwat ngi migam mekelemey gar si. Yo a soko ti mukuruˀ ngi gwat taŋhaya tiɗeˀe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde umroore nde'e yotti Isra'iila'en, ɓe ngaddi dokke ɗuuɗɗe, haa aartuɗum ɓenndugo: Alkamaari e inaboojam kesam e nebbam e njumri e ƴaamle gese e zakka  kuuje fuu .
Fulfulde_DC: Nde umroore nde'e yotti Isra'iila'en, ɓe ngaddi dokke ɗuuɗɗe, haa aartuɗum ɓenndugo: Alkamaari e inaboojam kesam e nebbam e njumri e ƴaamle gese e zakka  kuuje fuu .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ nɛ̀ o be  Israɛl  zia wen'i kaɗi, wa ŋmara zu-nyɔnɔ, zu alkamaari, dɔ̧ɔ̧, nɔ̧́, gɔrɔ in zu o mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ kpɛɛfɔ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wa kai zu mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛnɛ wen ha̧a̧-a̧ ha̧ Sɔ̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ nɛ̀ o be  Israɛl  zia wen'i kaɗi, wa ŋmara zu-nyɔnɔ, zu alkamaari, dɔ̧ɔ̧, nɔ̧́, gɔrɔ in zu o mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ kpɛɛfɔ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wa kai zu mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛnɛ wen ha̧a̧-a̧ ha̧ Sɔ̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa fate ghena shɛ mbeli ne, pa ka Israyɛl fəke kwa ghate ta wəshi nyi wəzate hɛ kwele kwele: yɛ ha, tɛ, n'yi, mze ba'a kweci wəshi nyi wəzate hɛ keghə keghə, tsagha kwa meŋe ta bela ta wəshi nyi meneke hɛ te wəve.
Tupurri: De maga waçaçre sen mokay la wo go dusgi mono, jar Israyel kal wo haç jag coore ble äaara wo no, de yii ma defay, de noo yoçoçre de feçeçre maga aè daë ra le mbasga debañ debañ. AÀ nduu wo de dim feçeçre äaaran wo äuy debañ debañ lay.

Francais: Les enfants d'Israël et de Juda qui demeuraient dans les villes de Juda donnèrent, eux aussi, la dîme des boeufs et des brebis, et la dîme des choses saintes qui étaient consacrées à Yahweh, leur Dieu, et l'on en fit plusieurs tas.
Anglais: And concerning the children of Israel and Judah, that dwelt in the cities of Judah, they also brought in the tithe of oxen and sheep, and the tithe of holy things which were consecrated unto the  Lord  their God, and laid them by heaps.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nala kaw, gurona vi Israyel hiɗi gurona vi Yuda sa ka lakay ziy hay hoyok-ziyna vi Yuda vul gal-ma-doogona vi luwayna hiɗi fukunayna, gal-ma-doogona vi sle ma peldetna ma vuli goy tam Ma-Vatɗina Lawna visiya. Nisi pi muɗak goy dak-dak.
Bulu: Avale te fe bone bʼIsraél a Yuda be nga too e bitisone ya Yuda be nga ve ngab awômô ya beta mimbame biyem a bone mimbame biyem, a ngab awômô ya biôm bi nʼétyi mbie bi nga veban asu Nti e Zambe wop, a mbie be nga bo abui mevis.
Guiziga: Israyel ati Zudahay misi ar walahay Zudahaya, taŋ kwana, a vulaka mukuruˀ ngi slahay, tumuŋhoy ati ngi ˀawaya waɗ ngi gwat muvulahay le da Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ taŋ na ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimɓe Isra'iila e Yahuuda, jooɗiiɓe nder gure Yahuuda, kamɓe boo ɓe ngaddi zakka na'i maɓɓe e dammooji maɓɓe e zakka kuuje ɗe ɓe ceni ngam Allah Jawmiraawo maɓɓe. Ɓe mbaagi ɗe baagaaje ɗuuɗɗe.
Fulfulde_DC: Yimɓe Isra'iila e Yahuuda, jooɗiiɓe nder gure Yahuuda, kamɓe boo ɓe ngaddi zakka na'i maɓɓe e dammooji maɓɓe e zakka kuuje ɗe ɓe ceni ngam Allah Jawmiraawo maɓɓe. Ɓe mbaagi ɗe baagaaje ɗuuɗɗe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bíí tɛ geɗek ye Juda in o be  Israɛl  mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn kaia ha̧a̧mɔ, o sami in o ndai gú nɛ̀ o ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ-wa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ tɛnɛ ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa. Wa mɔi̧a dùk-aa gbisi gbol-gbol.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bíí tɛ geɗek ye Juda in o be  Israɛl  mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn kaia ha̧a̧mɔ, o sami in o ndai gú nɛ̀ o ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ-wa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ tɛnɛ ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa. Wa mɔi̧a dùk-aa gbisi gbol-gbol.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbeli nyi mbe meleme kwa Zhəwda, ka Israyɛl le ka Zhəwda fəke kwa meŋe ta bela ta wəshi keseɗa ta nci perə, yɛ sla ba'a timɛti, tsagha le wəshi gəmə nyi keveyi geva tekeleke kaŋa Shala Mahwətə ta nci. Təɗəmə mbeli tsenete wəshi keghə keghə.
Tupurri: De ngaäge do sen no lay jar Israyel wo de jar Juda maga hay wo de tiñ äi leege ma Judan wo mono, kal wo haç dim horog äaara ma kluuri wo de ma kleere wo, de dim feçeçre ma bay ëagn wo maga hay wo go de haçge sagsag ne Manwuri, Baa äaara no, maga aè kal bag ti äe go taë taë.

Francais: On commenta à former les tas au troisième mois, et on les acheva au septième mois.
Anglais: In the third month they began to lay the foundation of the heaps, and finished them in the seventh month.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi tun caw pi muɗakŋa hay til ma ɦidina, nisi vat goy hay til ma siɗiyana.
Bulu: Be nga taté mbôane mevis e ngone lale, a man e ngone zamgbwale.
Guiziga: A zlaka cikila gwata zikitiŋ zikitiŋ ar kiya mimakir naŋ, a sa kiɗ mi ar kiya mitarnaˀ naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lewru tataɓru ɓe puɗɗi waagugo baagaaje, nder lewru joweeɗiɗaɓru ɓe timmini waagugo ɗe.
Fulfulde_DC: Lewru tataɓru ɓe puɗɗi waagugo baagaaje, nder lewru joweeɗiɗaɓru ɓe timmini waagugo ɗe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛn tɛ taar fio-zɛ, wa ku̧u̧ naŋ mɔi̧a dùk-aa a nɛ̀ war-a, ɓɛɛ wa kaɗi tom-aa tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo fio-zɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛn tɛ taar fio-zɛ, wa ku̧u̧ naŋ mɔi̧a dùk-aa a nɛ̀ war-a, ɓɛɛ wa kaɗi tom-aa tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo fio-zɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbeli ghate katsene wəshi təɗəmə təɗəmə mbe tere kwa mahekene, mbe kwa mberefaŋe ta tere kiɗimte hɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ tï¡ï¡ wer bag ti feçeçren nen few ma de swa' no, day aè äo' ti äe go nen few ma de renam no.

Francais: Ezéchias et les chefs vinrent et, ayant vu les tas, ils bénirent Yahweh et son peuple d'Israël.
Anglais: And when Hezekiah and the princes came and saw the heaps, they blessed the  Lord , and his people Israel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ezekiyas hiɗi sa ministrena valamu co'o kay ɗuw muɗak ma piyna, nisi subur Ma-Vatɗina, nisi gi bol kay sa Israyella kaw.
Bulu: Ane Ezékias ba be bivete bié be nga zu yene mevis a botane Nti a ayoñe bôte dé Israél.
Guiziga: Ezekiyas ati mizli hirnga naŋhay musoko puraka gwatay mizikitiŋ zikitiŋ tuwa na, a gaka sise da Bumbulvuŋ waɗ da Israyel, mizli naŋhaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde Hezekiya e mawɓe mum ngari, ndaari baagaaje man, ɓe ngetti Jawmiraawo e barkiɗini yimɓe mum Isra'iila'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde Hezekiya e mawɓe mum ngari, ndaari baagaaje man, ɓe ngetti Jawmiraawo e barkiɗini yimɓe mum Isra'iila'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Ezɛkias in o gasawi tɛɛ zɔk mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ̀ wa kaia tɛnɛ‘i, wa zɔna GASA WAN in dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧  Israɛl .
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Ezɛkias in o gasawi tɛɛ zɔk mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ̀ wa kaia tɛnɛ‘i, wa zɔna GASA WAN in dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧  Israɛl .
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa se yɛ meghe Ɛzɛkiyas le mbelia jama ta ŋkɛ kanewe wəshi nyi fəke mbeli ne, pa hɛ tsate nda hana ke Mahwətə ba'a ke ka Israyɛl mbelia ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Esekiyas de minisdirn wo, kal wo nduugi ko bagge ti feçeçren wo no, aà kal wo joñ suse' ne Manwuri, de jar äe Israyel wo.

Francais: Et Ezéchias interrogea les prêtres et les lévites au sujet de ces tas.
Anglais: Then Hezekiah questioned with the priests and the Levites concerning the heaps.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ezekiyas job muliyan-sa-ɗifinna hiɗi sa Levitna kay muɗak namna ma molina.
Bulu: Nde Ezékias a nga sili betuni a Belévit minsili ajô mevise mese.
Guiziga: Ezekiyas a cufuɗa masayay ati leviheye vur gwat mizikitiŋ zikitiŋhey tuwa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hezekiya ƴami liman'en e Lewi'en haala baagaaje ɗe'e.
Fulfulde_DC: Hezekiya ƴami liman'en e Lewi'en haala baagaaje ɗe'e.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ezɛkias aka o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii zu mɔi̧a o ha̧a̧mɔ nɔ‘i,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ezɛkias aka o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii zu mɔi̧a o ha̧a̧mɔ nɔ‘i,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa meghe 'yɛwete va ka dzeghe Shala le ka Lɛvi te ghəa wəshi gəmə shɛhɛ.
Tupurri: Esekiyas kal wii jag jar sië jagn wo de jar Lefid wo ti waçaçre feçeçre ma de bag tinn mo deñ no.

Francais: Le grand prêtre Azarias, de la maison de Sadoc, lui répondit : "Depuis qu'on a commencé d'apporter les dons prélevés dans la maison de Yahweh, nous avons mangé, nous nous sommes rassasiés, et nous en avons laissé beaucoup, car Yahweh a béni son peuple, et le reste est cette grande quantité."
Anglais: And Azariah the chief priest of the house of Zadok answered him, and said, Since the people began to bring the offerings into the house of the  Lord , we have had enough to eat, and have left plenty: for the  Lord  hath blessed his people; and that which is left is this great store.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mul ŋol ma-ɗifinna Azariya ma hay jafna vi Sadok hotom dita: Hay li ma sumun tun caw mar vulda hay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗin pa, sumun ka ti'e, ka hob kaw, ma suw goyna nam ŋol noŋo, kay Ma-Vatɗina gi bolawa kay sumuna valamu; may ma suw goyna ka molay goy tan kayn mi namu.
Bulu: Eyoñe te ntuni nnen Azariahu ya nda Sadok a nga yalane nye na: Nté ane be nga taté na ba zuu biôm ba kandé e Nda Nti, bi kusa di biôm mebum me kui bia minlem, mebukaʼa me ne fe vʼabui abui, amu Nti a maneya botan e bôte bé; abime da bebe yôp nde é ne ntaʼane mevise ma.
Guiziga: masay Azariya, madiɗa, muy ngi Sadok, a mbiɗaŋ di: «Diga mizli mizlaka so ti gwat ngi migam taŋhay ng'ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ na, i zumam hã i mbam, is naŋ a ndir lambaˀ, asi Bumbulvuŋ a ɗuwula mi le da mizli naŋhaya, mizikitiŋ zikitiŋ hana i is naŋ mindir.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Azariya, hooreejo liman'en mo danygol Cadok, jaabi mo: “Diga yimɓe puɗɗi waddugo dokke muuɗum'en haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo, min nyaami, min kaari, ɗuuɗɗum lutti boo, ngam Jawmiraawo barkiɗini yimɓe muuɗum. Ndaa ko lutti, ɗum ɗuuɗɗum masin.”
Fulfulde_DC: Azariya, hooreejo liman'en mo danygol Cadok, jaabi mo: “Diga yimɓe puɗɗi waddugo dokke muuɗum'en haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo, min nyaami, min kaari, ɗuuɗɗum lutti boo, ngam Jawmiraawo barkiɗini yimɓe muuɗum. Ndaa ko lutti, ɗum ɗuuɗɗum masin.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Azaria, tɛ nutua ko Sadɔk kifi nú ha̧ a̧ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ ndɛma zu-nyɔnɔ pii kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN, ɛɛ nyɔŋ mɔ zaŋ yɛ sur nɛ̀ de-a, ɓɛɛ oi-aa ɓɔna nɛ̀ dɔka-a mbɛt, wen GASA WAN toka de yoŋgo zu dukbíí kɔ‘i. O wan nɛ̀ ya mbɔɗɔnu’ɛ, nɛ́ oi-aa nɛ̀ ɓɔna.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Azaria, tɛ nutua ko Sadɔk kifi nú ha̧ a̧ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ ndɛma zu-nyɔnɔ pii kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN, ɛɛ nyɔŋ mɔ zaŋ yɛ sur nɛ̀ de-a, ɓɛɛ oi-aa ɓɔna nɛ̀ dɔka-a mbɛt, wen GASA WAN toka de yoŋgo zu dukbíí kɔ‘i. O wan nɛ̀ ya mbɔɗɔnu’ɛ, nɛ́ oi-aa nɛ̀ ɓɔna.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke wəndə kwelea ka dzeghe Shala Azariya, mbe yita ta Sadok zhɛnete nda: «Ma ghala ghate mbeli kakele wəshi nyi kelemte hɛ shave mbe wəshia nci kadzeki ghɛ Mahwətə ne, behe behe ghen'yɛ va wəshi kezeme, ba'a nahe ghen'yɛ kekemave kwele ma, kwa nza ŋkɛ nahe Mahwətə kewəpikɛ mbelia ŋkɛ. Ma wəshi nyi tetene nyi teke ne, nyi kewəbamte wəba.»
Tupurri: Do kay nono, Asariyahu je moobe ma joñ sië jag no, je ma ti moobe mani Sadogn raw fer waçaçre ne hen ga: De wur maga aè tï¡ï¡ wer nduëgi de feçeçre ma fargen wo äi tiñ mani Manwurn ni mo haç' no, reege kal mbe joñge deñ, haçaç aè wuu go te äe gwa' mbe wo go ni deñ, werga Manwur de kañ bosa' ne jar äen wo ti. Ma te äe maga gwaë go ni mono, de bag ti see äay mo deñ diñ se.

Francais: Ezéchias dit de préparer des chambres dans la maison de Yahweh, et on les prépara.
Anglais: Then Hezekiah commanded to prepare chambers in the house of the  Lord ; and they prepared them,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ezekiyas vul hagata kay nisi ma kot ziy ma gurayna kalaf hay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina; nisi kotomu kaw.
Bulu: Ane Ezékias a nga ve abendé na be kôme bitune bi nda e Nda Nti; nde be nga kôme bie.
Guiziga: Ezekiyas a ɓa mizli, ɓa a ɗiyam hayay a ciki hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ, ɓa ngi wi vu ti gwatay anga, joˀ mizli a ɗiyaka taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamiiɗo umri ɓe taaskitina cigorɗi nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo. Ɓe taaskitini ɗi,
Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo umri ɓe taaskitina cigorɗi nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo. Ɓe taaskitini ɗi,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ezɛkias tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ ɗafi de fara-a-nyɔŋmɔ sɛn ká̧ Tua ko GASA WAN. Ɗoŋ nɛ̀ wa ɗafa fara kaɗi,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ezɛkias tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ ɗafi de fara-a-nyɔŋmɔ sɛn ká̧ Tua ko GASA WAN. Ɗoŋ nɛ̀ wa ɗafa fara kaɗi,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa meghe gezete nda ke mbeli kahi yɛ cɛ kebete wəshi takwa takwa yitea ghɛa Shala. Ma kwa himte geva hɛ,
Tupurri: Esekiyas kal waçaçge ga kne' tiñ wo ti tiñ mani Manwur no, day aè kal kne' tiñ sen wo no.

Francais: On y apporta fidèlement les dons prélevés, la dîme et les choses consacrées. Le lévite Chonénias en eut l'intendance, et Sémei, son frère, venait en second.
Anglais: And brought in the offerings and the tithes and the dedicated things faithfully: over which Cononiah the Levite was ruler, and Shimei his brother was the next.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hiɗi diksi kep nisi mar vulda, gal-ma-doogona hiɗi slen ma peldetna. Sa ma Levitna Konanya ka ŋom slena, sa ma ma'na ma tapay talamna mi ɓasulumna Simey.
Bulu: Ane be nga soo biôme bi mbe nkandan, ngab awômô a biôme bi nʼétyi avale bi mbe. Mone lévit jôé na Kônaniahu nye a nga baʼale bie, ba monyañe wé Siméyi a too baʼa.
Guiziga: Gwatay mizli mawuɗam avu gwat ngi migamay, mukuruˀ ngi gwatay ati gwat muvulahay le da Buymisemuŋ tuwa, a soko taŋ ng'ara so. Konaniya, mbur levi, a wunakaŋ naŋ i miji kaw ngi gwatay, mijingaˀ naŋ kwana, i sukum naŋ Simey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ɓe ngaddi dokke e zakka e kuuje cenaaɗe nder maaji bee hoolaare. Ɓe kalfini ɗum haa Konaniya, Lewiijo. Deerɗiiko Sim'i laati ɗiɗaɓo.
Fulfulde_DC: ɓe ngaddi dokke e zakka e kuuje cenaaɗe nder maaji bee hoolaare. Ɓe kalfini ɗum haa Konaniya, Lewiijo. Deerɗiiko Sim'i laati ɗiɗaɓo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: wa kaia o zu-nyɔnɔ in o ŋma dɔka ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ̀ ɔ sa̧a̧ nɛnɛ a hi̧i̧ nɛ̀ yuwar-a. Nɛ́ Kɔnania ŋma be Levii á̧ duka zu mɔɔ nɔ‘i in nya kɔ̧-a̧ Simɛi, gbama wi-de-tom in a̧ zu mɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: wa kaia o zu-nyɔnɔ in o ŋma dɔka ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ̀ ɔ sa̧a̧ nɛnɛ a hi̧i̧ nɛ̀ yuwar-a. Nɛ́ Kɔnania ŋma be Levii á̧ duka zu mɔɔ nɔ‘i in nya kɔ̧-a̧ Simɛi, gbama wi-de-tom in a̧ zu mɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: wərə mbeli kakele wəshi nyi kelemte mbeli mbe wəshi nyi meneke mbeli te wəve ba'a kweci wəshi nyi keveyi geva keghə keghə kaŋa Shala. Pa mbeli veyi Konaniya kawəndə nya te ghəa wəshia shɛhɛ ba'a wəza meghekɛ Shimɛyi kasləwəfəa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ kal hoo feçeçre fargen wo wo ni keëede, dimn wo de feçeçre ma bay ëag wo no. Je Lefid Konanyahu hay ko faage äe, wo de weegemi Simey maga hay diñ je de äog äe.

Francais: Jahiel, Azarias, Nahath, Asaël, Jérimoth, Jozabad, Eliel, Jesmachias, Mahath et Banaïas étaient surveillants sous l'autorité de Chonénias et de son frère Séméi, d'après la disposition du roi Ezéchias et d'Azarias, chef de la maison de Dieu.
Anglais: And Jehiel, and Azaziah, and Nahath, and Asahel, and Jerimoth, and Jozabad, and Eliel, and Ismachiah, and Mahath, and Benaiah, were overseers under the hand of Cononiah and Shimei his brother, at the commandment of Hezekiah the king, and Azariah the ruler of the house of God.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yehiyel, Azazya, Nahat, Asayel, Yerimot, Yozabad, Eliyel, Yismakya, Mahat hiɗi Benaya kayn si sa ɗuw slena, nisi ka gaa kuɗ gaŋeraŋa vi Konanya hiɗi ɓasulumna Simey, kuɗ va ma mulla hiɗi Azarya ma ŋom ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina di'e.
Bulu: Yehiél, Azaziahu, Nahat, Asaél, Yérimôt, Yôzabad, Eliél, Yismakiahu, Mahat a Benayahu, be mbe befombô ésaé, Kônaniahu a monyañe Simeyi be too be bivet, avalʼane abendé njô bôt Ezékias a Azariahu, évete ya nda Zambe é mbe.
Guiziga: Buy Ezekiyas waɗ masay Azariya, madiɗa, buy ngi hay ngi Buymisemuŋ, a juwaka ɓi nah na, Konaniya ati Simeye, mijigina gwatay macinam tivi taŋ i ti: Yehiyel, Azaziya, Nahat, Asayel, Yerimot, Yosabat, Eliyel, Ismakiya, Mahat waɗ Benaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yehiyel e Azaziya e Nahat e Asa'el e Yerimot e Yozabat e Eliyel e Ismakiya e Mahat e Benaya laati aynooɓe dow ardaaŋgal Konaniya e deerɗum Sim'i. Ɗum fuu ɗum laati dow umroore laamiiɗo Hezekiya e Azariya, kaliifaajo haykaliiru Jawmiraawo.
Fulfulde_DC: Yehiyel e Azaziya e Nahat e Asa'el e Yerimot e Yozabat e Eliyel e Ismakiya e Mahat e Benaya laati aynooɓe dow ardaaŋgal Konaniya e deerɗum Sim'i. Ɗum fuu ɗum laati dow umroore laamiiɗo Hezekiya e Azariya, kaliifaajo haykaliiru Jawmiraawo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu Ezɛkias in gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Azaria wi-duk-zu Tua ko Sɔ̧ hoka Kɔnania in Simɛi mɛ duk zu Yehiɛl, Azaria, Nahat, Asahɛl, Yɛrimɔt, Yozabad, Eliɛl, Ismakia, Mahat in Bɛnaya.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu Ezɛkias in gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Azaria wi-duk-zu Tua ko Sɔ̧ hoka Kɔnania in Simɛi mɛ duk zu Yehiɛl, Azaria, Nahat, Asahɛl, Yɛrimɔt, Yozabad, Eliɛl, Ismakia, Mahat in Bɛnaya.
Kapsiki_DC: Kala nya zəzəte yɛ meghe Ɛzɛkiyas le wəndə kwelea ka dzeghe Shala Azariya, nya nza ghɛa Shala te dzeve ve, yɛ Konaniya le Shimɛyi kanewe ghweme te ka ya wəshi nyi: Yɛhiyɛl, Azariya, Nahat, Asayɛl, Yerimot, Yozabad, Ɛliyɛl, Ismakiya, Mahat ba'a Benaya.
Tupurri: Yeliyel, Asasyahu, Nahad, Asayel, Yerimod, Yosabad, Eliyel, Yismakiyahu, Mahad wo de Benayahu hay wo diñ jar ko nen feçeçre no, day de waçaç waçaçre äaara diñ Konanyahu wo de weegemi, ti jag maga wañ Esekiyas de Asariyahu je ma pel tiñ mani Baan hay waçaçn wo go mono.

Francais: Le lévite Coré, fils de Jemma, qui était portier à l'orient, était préposé aux dons volontaires faits à Dieu, pour distribuer ce qui était prélevé pour Yahweh et les choses très saintes.
Anglais: And Kore the son of Imnah the Levite, the porter toward the east, was over the freewill offerings of God, to distribute the oblations of the  Lord , and the most holy things.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa ma Levitna Kore, goora vi Yimna, ma ŋom vun-gala ma gal kuɗuwna, namu mi ma ŋom vulda kuɗ minda ta la' tam Lawna, kay ɓuraw slen ma vulum tam Ma-Vatɗina hiɗi slen ma suwi peldetna.
Bulu: Mone Lévit jôé na Koré, e mone Yimna, mbaʼale mbé ya jôp da tôô, a nga baʼale mimvean mia veban ane nlem wo kômbô, mie be nga ve Zambe, asu ya kabe biôm ba kandé mfaʼa Nti a biôme bia dañ étyi.
Guiziga: Kore, mbur levi, mangal ngi Imna, mijigina mizlingre vay ngi si pas ngi miprike, slra nga naŋ i gi welele ti gwat mizli muvulaka le da Buymisemuŋ, yo gwat muvula le da Bumbulvuŋ ati gwat mipal wãˀ na, mawuɗoka taŋ i naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Koore ɓii Yimna Lewiijo, aynoowo dammugal fuunaaŋgewal halfitinaama dokke ɗe yimɓe lii'ani Allah Jawmiraawo, ngam o sennda ɗe.
Fulfulde_DC: Koore ɓii Yimna Lewiijo, aynoowo dammugal fuunaaŋgewal halfitinaama dokke ɗe yimɓe lii'ani Allah Jawmiraawo, ngam o sennda ɗe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kore ŋma be Levii, bem ko Imna wi-pɛm-nú garo nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese duk so kɔ‘i zu o ha̧a̧mɔ ha̧ Sɔ̧, kɛ̧ nɛ̀ mɔ nɛ̀‘i ha̧a̧ ha̧ GASA WAN in o mɔ nɛ̀ ɔ sa̧a̧ nyɛmna.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kore ŋma be Levii, bem ko Imna wi-pɛm-nú garo nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese duk so kɔ‘i zu o ha̧a̧mɔ ha̧ Sɔ̧, kɛ̧ nɛ̀ mɔ nɛ̀‘i ha̧a̧ ha̧ GASA WAN in o mɔ nɛ̀ ɔ sa̧a̧ nyɛmna.
Kapsiki_DC: Nde Lɛvi Korɛ, wəzege ta Imna ba'a nde ya mɛa degha laka bela kesame ta veci ya te ghəa wəshi gəmə nyi keleke nda mbeli ke Shala. Gheŋkɛa shɛ nde nehe nda wəshi nyi keveyi geva tekeleke kaŋa Shala ba'a wəshi nyi keveyi geva kaŋa ŋkɛ nahe.
Tupurri: Kore, je Lefid no, je ni Yimna je gor ti tiñ ma nen wern hay diñ je ëaw haçge maga jar haçn wo de dage äaara ne Baa mono, ma äes feçeçre ma de farge ne Manwur mono, de feçeçre ma bay ëag has debañ wo no.

Francais: A sa disposition se tenaient fidèlement, dans les villes des prêtres, Eden, Benjamin, Jésué, Séméias. Amarias et Sèchénias, pour faire les distributions à leurs frères, grands et petits, selon leurs classes :
Anglais: And next him were Eden, and Miniamin, and Jeshua, and Shemaiah, Amariah, and Shecaniah, in the cities of the priests, in their set office, to give to their brethren by courses, as well to the great as to the small:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay hoyok-ziy ma li ɗifin hayna, Eden, Minyamin, Yosuwa, Semayeya, Amarya hiɗi Sekaniya, nisi ka lakay kuɗ gaŋeraŋa valamu, kay li ɓurawt tam ɓosiyosin hay liya'a, li ɓurawta tam sa ŋulona hiɗi sa gurayn kaf kuɗ vokŋa visiya visiya.
Bulu: E bitisone betuni: Eden, Minyamin, Yasua, Semaéyahu, Amariahu a Sekaniahu be nga tele nye mefefe asu ya kabe bobenyañe biôme mvoʼé , benya bôtô a bongô, avalʼane minsamba miap mi né,
Guiziga: Mizli macinam ti vaˀa ar walahay ngi masayaya, i ti: Eden, Miniyamin, Yesuwa, Semaya, Amariya waɗ Sekaniya. Mizli, sey a wunkaka gwat ngi zum da sukum taŋhaya ti jiviɗ naŋ kasl kasl, vur hunum taŋ vur hunum taŋ, wal wal anta ar wala ngi mizli micawwahay ati ziri ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Eden e Minyamin e Yeesu'a e Sema'ya e Amariya e Sekaniya mballiri mo bee hoolaare nder berniiji ɗi liman'en njooɗi. Ɓe cenndani banndiraaɓe maɓɓe Lewi'en dokke haa ndotti'en e haa sukaaɓe fodde geɓe muuɗum'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Eden e Minyamin e Yeesu'a e Sema'ya e Amariya e Sekaniya mballiri mo bee hoolaare nder berniiji ɗi liman'en njooɗi. Ɓe cenndani banndiraaɓe maɓɓe Lewi'en dokke haa ndotti'en e haa sukaaɓe fodde geɓe muuɗum'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ Edɛn, Miniamin, Yesua, Sɛmaya, Amaria in Sɛkania duka kɛ̧ nɛ̀ mɔ ha̧ o nya-wa nɛ̀ see kpɔk, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ duka-a kɔ-wa. Kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-mɔ bo na, kóó nɛ́ gasawi, kóó nɛ́ obem.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ Edɛn, Miniamin, Yesua, Sɛmaya, Amaria in Sɛkania duka kɛ̧ nɛ̀ mɔ ha̧ o nya-wa nɛ̀ see kpɔk, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ duka-a kɔ-wa. Kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-mɔ bo na, kóó nɛ́ gasawi, kóó nɛ́ obem.
Kapsiki_DC: Mbe yɛ meleme ta ka dzeghe Shala ne, yɛ Ɛdɛn, Miniyamin, Yɛshəwa, Shemaya, Amariya ba'a Shekaniya yanza hɛ zlaɓe kezha nehe nda wəshi kezeme le hweŋkwa ke ka menəhɛ nci, mbelia jama keɗema ŋwale, kala nza ta wəvəsəa nci.
Tupurri: Äi leege mani jar sië jagn wo mono, Eden, Minyamin, Josuwe, Semayahu, Amaryahu wo de Sekanyahu hay wo de lagge ti jeñ äe ni ma äes feçeçren go ne heçeçre äaaran wo, jar kluuri wo de weere kleere wo, go ti carge äaara taëtaë mono.

Francais: excepté aux mâles enregistrés, de trois ans et au-dessus, à tous ceux qui entraient dans la maison de Yahweh, selon le besoin de chaque jour, pour faire leur service selon leurs fonctions et leurs classes.
Anglais: Beside their genealogy of males, from three years old and upward, even unto every one that entereth into the house of the  Lord , his daily portion for their service in their charges according to their courses;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May tam sum sa ŋaɓay goyo, tun caw tam busat ɦidi pa ta-ta kulo kalam ɗawn ɦawaɗi, may tam nisi sa cuk kalaf hay buurta kaf hay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina kay li lopna, kuɗ vurnata vi ŋomda ta tuni kisita, kuɗ vokŋa visi kafe.
Bulu: Ataté ba be mbe nlañan be too mimbu mila a lôte valé, a kui ba bese be mbe be nyiʼine Nda Nti môs ôse asu ya bo ésaé, avalʼane biyoñ bi ésaé biap a minsamba miap bi né;
Guiziga: Mbak mizli mutohoko slimiɗ taŋ hanayna le ma na, ziri misi ti vihey, zle avu makir malla mufuna le, yo mizli masoko vur hin gar ng'ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ, ti hunum taŋ ti hunum taŋ gar na, a lumam gwat lum le ngi ga slra taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Koo moy gorko mo duuɓi tati e ko ɓuri mo innde muuɗum winndaama nder deftere asli, non boo yahanɓe haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo ngam kuuɗe muuɗum'en fodde geɓe muuɗum'en nyalaade nyalaade
Fulfulde_DC: Koo moy gorko mo duuɓi tati e ko ɓuri mo innde muuɗum winndaama nder deftere asli, non boo yahanɓe haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo ngam kuuɗe muuɗum'en fodde geɓe muuɗum'en nyalaade nyalaade
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bo nɛ wa duka kɛ̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ o wi nɛ̀ nɛ́ kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN, in o wi nɛ̀‘i yɔra nin-wa ɓɛɛ na, ɓɛɛ ha̧ o wan nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ taar in o wan nɛ̀ de tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧ dam ɗoŋ wese kpɔk kpɔk lɛŋ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bo nɛ wa duka kɛ̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ o wi nɛ̀ nɛ́ kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN, in o wi nɛ̀‘i yɔra nin-wa ɓɛɛ na, ɓɛɛ ha̧ o wan nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ taar in o wan nɛ̀ de tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧ dam ɗoŋ wese kpɔk kpɔk lɛŋ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Deke ke mbeli nyi rafete nyighɛ mbeli, pa le ŋwale tezhili nyi nza va ta nci mahekene kajive te kema nehe nda hɛ nahe we, ama pa le nyi kese keveci keveci kala nza ta wəvəsəa nci kamene slene ta səkwə ghə mbe ghɛa Shala.
Tupurri: Bay diñ ne ma twerpiiri maga aè hay kee ra tï¡ï¡ wer ti kiñgi swa' raw ciñ mo tawa wa, ama ne jar maga hay wo le laage ti joñre maga kol ti äaara ti naw tum äi tiñ mani Manwurn ma joñ joñre äaara maga gorgen de kolge diñ ti äaara day ti carge äaara taëtaë mono.

Francais: Le registre des prêtres était dressé d'après leurs maisons paternelles, et les lévites étaient inscrits à partir de vingt ans et au-dessus, selon leurs fonctions et leurs classes.
Anglais: Both to the genealogy of the priests by the house of their fathers, and the Levites from twenty years old and upward, in their charges by their courses;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Tam muliyan-sa-ɗifinna sa ŋaɓay goyo kuɗ ziyna visiya visiya, tam sa Levitna sa busata visi dok-ma' pa ta-ta kulo vok ɗaw, kuɗ vurnata vi ŋomda ta tuni kisita hiɗi vokŋa visi kafe,
Bulu: be nga ve fe betuni be mbe nlañan, ane menda me bôte map me né, nalé fe Belévit, ataté mimbu mewôm mebaé, a lôte valé, avalʼane biyoñ bi ésaé biap bi ne ntelan a avalʼane minsamba miap mi né,
Guiziga: A tohoko masayaya, vur hay ngi cine taŋ ngi cine taŋ, yo ngi leviheye, zle ti vi kukur cuw hã nga mbuŋ, ti ngay taŋ, ti hunum taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e liman'en ɓe inɗe muuɗum'en mbinndaama nder deftere asli fodde ci'e muuɗum'en e Lewi'en ɓe mari duuɓi noogas e ko ɓuri, ɓe inɗe maɓɓe mbinndaama fodde kuugal maɓɓe,
Fulfulde_DC: e liman'en ɓe inɗe muuɗum'en mbinndaama nder deftere asli fodde ci'e muuɗum'en e Lewi'en ɓe mari duuɓi noogas e ko ɓuri, ɓe inɗe maɓɓe mbinndaama fodde kuugal maɓɓe,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wi yɔr so nin o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nutua kɔ-wa; war ko o be Levii, o wan nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo yaknɛ siti, wi yɔra nin-wa nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ gíí-wa in dùk-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wi yɔr so nin o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nutua kɔ-wa; war ko o be Levii, o wan nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo yaknɛ siti, wi yɔra nin-wa nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ gíí-wa in dùk-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Kala nza ta peləa nci rafete ka dzeghe Shala mbeli, ama ka Lɛvi ne, se te va bakemsə kajive te kema rafe hɛ mbeli kala slene ta nci ba'a wəvəsəa nci.
Tupurri: Haç ne jar sië jag maga aè hay kee ra ti feele äaara wo, ne jar Lefid maga kiñgi äaara hay go do äog raw ciñ, diñ see maga gorgen de kolge ti äaara mono, de carge äaara go taë taë no.

Francais: Le registre comprenait tous leurs enfants, leurs femmes, leurs fils et leurs filles. toute l'assemblée; car dans leur fidélité ils s'occupaient saintement des saintes offrandes.
Anglais: And to the genealogy of all their little ones, their wives, and their sons, and their daughters, through all the congregation: for in their set office they sanctified themselves in holiness:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: tam nisi sa jar tapna kaf, sa ŋaɓay goyo hiɗi gurona visi sa gurayn kaf, boyna visiya, gurona visi sa jufayna hiɗi sa boyna, kay tuwsi vuli goy kafe kay li lop hay liyn ma peldetna.
Bulu: be nga ve fe ékôane bôt ése é nga lañeban, a bendaé bap bese e binga bap, bobefame bap a bobebinga, amu be nga ve bebien ngumba asu ésaé ya vôm a nʼétyi.
Guiziga: A tohoko taŋ jom ati mizli ngi hayaya gar: ngwasay, ziri mizile ati mongosohoyo waɗ mizli migweˀ ngi vi taŋhaya, misi zliv, gwat muvula le da Buymisemuŋ na, a zumaka zuy ar pas gar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ɓe fuu ɓe mbinndaama hawtaade bee rewɓe maɓɓe e ɓikkoy maɓɓe e jama'aare fuu, ngam haani ɓe ceno ngam huuwugo kuuɗe maɓɓe ceniiɗe nder hoolaare.
Fulfulde_DC: ɓe fuu ɓe mbinndaama hawtaade bee rewɓe maɓɓe e ɓikkoy maɓɓe e jama'aare fuu, ngam haani ɓe ceno ngam huuwugo kuuɗe maɓɓe ceniiɗe nder hoolaare.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yɔra nin bíí duka so nɛ́ mɔ wen bíí nutua nɛ̀ oi-aa: okoo, be-wiwii in be-okoo gú nɛ̀ o bíí nɛ̀ a̧a̧ in wa nɛ̀ war-tɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ nyɛma mɛ nyɔŋ sa̧a̧ ha̧a̧mɔ in wa mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yɔra nin bíí duka so nɛ́ mɔ wen bíí nutua nɛ̀ oi-aa: okoo, be-wiwii in be-okoo gú nɛ̀ o bíí nɛ̀ a̧a̧ in wa nɛ̀ war-tɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ nyɛma mɛ nyɔŋ sa̧a̧ ha̧a̧mɔ in wa mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛtɛ le mbeli nyi ki ghɛa nci rafete hɛ mbeli, mi, ŋwale tezhili le ŋwalea kwɛ ba'a mbeli pɛtɛ nci nyi nza hweŋkwa va hɛ keveci keveci kazeme nyi wəshi keveyi geva tekeleke kaŋa Shala.
Tupurri: Haç ne jar ma yoo taygen wo äuy maga aè hay kee ra de weere äaara ma kleere wo äuy, de naare äaara wo, weere äaara ma twerpiiri wo de mayre äaara wo, werga aà hay wo go de men see äaara ti joñre ti ngeel ma bay ëagn sagsag bay ndar goge.

Francais: Et pour les fils d'Aaron, les prêtres qui demeuraient dans le territoire de la banlieue de leurs villes, il y avait dans chaque ville des hommes désignés par leurs noms pour distribuer les portions à tout mâle parmi les prêtres et à tous les lévites inscrits.
Anglais: Also of the sons of Aaron the priests, which were in the fields of the suburbs of their cities, in every several city, the men that were expressed by name, to give portions to all the males among the priests, and to all that were reckoned by genealogies among the Levites.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay gurona vi Aaron, muliyan-sa-ɗifinna sa lakay goy kawiya'a, vun hoyok-ziy ma ŋulona, hay hoyok-ziyn kaf sum segen ka'a yiy goy hiɗi sesiya kay ɓuraw galla vi sumun kaf jar muliyan-sa-ɗifinna hiɗi sa Levitna sa ŋaɓay goyna.
Bulu: Mfaʼa bone bʼAron, betuni mbe be nga too afan, mefôla ma bômane bitisone biap, tison ése é nga bili mingum mi bôt, be loʼone be a môé map, asu ya ve bôte bese mengap e betuni été; be nga ve fe Belévit be nga lañeban mengap.
Guiziga: yo a tohoko ziri ngi Aroŋhoy, masayaya, misi angi prok ngi walahay taŋhaya. A wunam mizli, daɗ daɗ ti zlimiɗ taŋhaya, ngi wunka gwat ngi zum da mizli gar a wuzla masayaya waɗ da mizli gar mutohoko slimiɗ taŋhaya le a wuzla leviheye.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder berniiji fuu, woodi worɓe ewnaaɓe bee inɗe muuɗum'en, halfitinaaɓe senndugo dokke haa liman'en nder danygol Haruna jooɗiiɓe haa durduɗe taariiɗe berniiji muuɗum'en. Kamɓe ɓe ngeɗani ɗe worɓe fuu nder ci'e liman'en, non boo winndaaɓe fuu haa defte asli Lewi'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder berniiji fuu, woodi worɓe ewnaaɓe bee inɗe muuɗum'en, halfitinaaɓe senndugo dokke haa liman'en nder danygol Haruna jooɗiiɓe haa durduɗe taariiɗe berniiji muuɗum'en. Kamɓe ɓe ngeɗani ɗe worɓe fuu nder ci'e liman'en, non boo winndaaɓe fuu haa defte asli Lewi'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ o bezaŋ Arɔŋ nɛ̀ ɔ kɔ-wa nɛ̀ zaŋbɛɛ sɛn ká̧ o ye-ɗafi-sɔ̧, wa hoka so o ŋma bíí wen tom kɛ̧ɛ̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ wa, in ha̧ o be Levii lɛŋ nɛ̀‘i yɔra nin-wa kaɗi mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ o bezaŋ Arɔŋ nɛ̀ ɔ kɔ-wa nɛ̀ zaŋbɛɛ sɛn ká̧ o ye-ɗafi-sɔ̧, wa hoka so o ŋma bíí wen tom kɛ̧ɛ̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ wa, in ha̧ o be Levii lɛŋ nɛ̀‘i yɔra nin-wa kaɗi mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ka dzeghe Shala nyi kahwelefefia Aron, nyi mbe meleme nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ dzeyi yitea yɛ meleme ta ka dzeghe Shala ne, le kweci mbeli nyi ntave mbeli shɛ tekeleke kezha nehe nda ŋa nci wəshi kezeme ke hɛ mbe yayata meleme, tsagha kaŋa ka Lɛvi nyi kerafete geva mbe palepa.
Tupurri: Ma jar ni AÈron wo, jar sië jagn wo, maga hay wo go de lagge mbasga jag äi leege äaaran wo mono, jar po hay yañ wo äi leege ma hun wo la äuy maga aè go de kañ ëu äaara, ma äes mo ma wosela äuy go ne hene yoo jar sië jagn wo, day ne jar Lefid maga aè hay kee ra go mo äuy.

Francais: Voilà ce que fit Ezéchias dans tout Juda ; il fit ce qui est bon, ce qui est droit et ce qui est vrai devant Yahweh, son Dieu.
Anglais: And thus did Hezekiah throughout all Judah, and wrought that which was good and right and truth before the  Lord  his God.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni mi slen ma Ezekiyas lum hay Yuda kafna, nam la' ti ŋaata, ɗigerta hiɗi gasita kaw vok ir Ma-Vatɗina, Lawna valamu.
Bulu: E jam Ezékias a nga bo e Yuda ase été nde le; a nga bo ane mvaé, zôsôô a bebela bi né, e mise me Nti, e Zambe wé.
Guiziga: Ezekiyas a gakahana asi ruwuy Zuda gar, a gi di i gwat mezle, gwat mikaslsla, ti jiviɗ mijeŋŋe a mbuŋ Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Koo toy nder lesdi Yahuuda, laamiiɗo Hezekiya huuwi kuuɗe booɗɗe, darnuɗe e gooŋgaaje yeeso Allah Jawmiraawo mum.
Fulfulde_DC: Koo toy nder lesdi Yahuuda, laamiiɗo Hezekiya huuwi kuuɗe booɗɗe, darnuɗe e gooŋgaaje yeeso Allah Jawmiraawo mum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ezɛkias dee mɔ hegɔ dam nù Juda lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧ duk nɛ̀ de-a, in nɛ̀ yuwar-a, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ kpɛk.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ezɛkias dee mɔ hegɔ dam nù Juda lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧ duk nɛ̀ de-a, in nɛ̀ yuwar-a, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ kpɛk.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa menete ŋkɛ kala nya mbe hɛɗia ŋkɛ ne, wəsə nya tiɗiɗi le nya megela yamenete Ɛzɛkiyas kwa kema Shala Mahwətə ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Mokay diñ fen maga Esekiyas joñn äi sir Juda mo äuy no. AÀ joñ diñ fen ma de ele, fen ma de deele ti cwaçy äe pel Manwuri, Baa äe no.

Francais: Dans toute oeuvre qu'il entreprit pour le service de la maison de Dieu, pour la loi et les commandements, en recherchant son Dieu, il agit de tout son coeur et il prospéra.
Anglais: And in every work that he began in the service of the house of God, and in the law, and in the commandments, to seek his God, he did it with all his heart, and prospered.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay lopn kaf ma nam lumu kay dakka hay ziyda vi Lawna, kay gatta hiɗi vun-ma-gatna, hay li ma nam gar minda vi Lawna, nam lum kayn hiɗi dikam kaf, lopna valam tuɗ ŋaa'a kaw.
Bulu: Esaé ése a nga bo été asu nkañane ya Nda Zambe, metiñ a mebendé, a jeñe Zambe, a nga bo je a e nleme wé ôse, a mam me nga wulu nye mvoʼé .
Guiziga: Gwat naŋ maga gar vur slra ngi hay ngi Buymisemuŋ, vur ɓimujuwa ati ɓimuɗuva gar na, a ga ti sipa Buymisemuŋ naŋ ti mevel purla, yo a ga le kasl kasl.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ko o annini waɗugo ngam daliila kuugal haa haykaliiru Allah fuu malla ngam ɗowtanaago Allah nder tawreeta e umrooje mum, o waɗani ɗum Allah maako bee ɓernde woore, ɗum waɗi barka boo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ko o annini waɗugo ngam daliila kuugal haa haykaliiru Allah fuu malla ngam ɗowtanaago Allah nder tawreeta e umrooje mum, o waɗani ɗum Allah maako bee ɓernde woore, ɗum waɗi barka boo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi n'aa ku̧u̧ naŋ ɗafa Tua ko GASA WAN, a̧ kia mɛ de nɛ́ mɔ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ kɔ̧a̧. Hegɔ, a̧ kia Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ see kpɔk, ɓɛɛ mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ hɔ gba̧a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi n'aa ku̧u̧ naŋ ɗafa Tua ko GASA WAN, a̧ kia mɛ de nɛ́ mɔ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ kɔ̧a̧. Hegɔ, a̧ kia Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ see kpɔk, ɓɛɛ mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ hɔ gba̧a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe wəshi nyi menete pɛtɛ kezha slene ta ghɛa Shala, kezha wəsə mahalegə ba'a ghena nyi gezeke ŋkɛ ne, nahe ntsə geva kazele ɗe ta Shala le wənəa ŋkɛ pɛtɛ, vatse ndeke nda berete Shala.
Tupurri: Ti joñre maga aà hay mañn äuy ti ngeel tosge ma äi tiñ mani Baan äuy mono, ti jag liñgin wo de waçaçre liñgin äuy ma ferge kië Baa äen mono, aà joñn go diñ de jiili äe äuy, day se kal seege ne hen were.

Francais: Après ces choses et ces actes de fidélité, Sennachérib, roi d'Asssyrie, se mit en marche et, étant entré en Juda, il campa contre les villes fortes, dans le dessein de s'en emparer.
Anglais: After these things, and the establishment thereof, Sennacherib king of Assyria came, and entered into Judah, and encamped against the fenced cities, and thought to win them for himself.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugol slen kayni hiɗi lopna vi vida, Sankerib mulla vi Asiriya co'o, nam kal kulo hay Yuda, nam ŋuy hoyok-ziy ma donona, vul hagata kay nisi ma co gulmunna.
Bulu: Eyoñe mam mete a mbamba mimboon mite bi maneya, njô bôte ya Asiri, Senakérib, a nga zu Yuda a vule minkane ya wosane bitison ya Yuda bi bili alem na a nyoñe bie.
Guiziga: A dirba ɓi tayna mucohom ati slrahay, Ezekiyas miga taŋ ti biga gi teŋteŋ naŋ a mbuŋ Buymisemuŋ na, Senakerip, buy Asiri, aru nga kiɗa vu ati walahay mugunohoy le ti mohol misi asi ruwuy Zuda, a wuɗ ɓa a tiɓa taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓaawo kuuɗe Hezekiya gooŋgaaje ɗe'e, Sanherib, laamiiɗo Assuura nasti lesdi Yahuuda, saŋngini kommbi berniiji cemmbiɗɗi, umri honooɓe mum nyaama ɗi.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓaawo kuuɗe Hezekiya gooŋgaaje ɗe'e, Sanherib, laamiiɗo Assuura nasti lesdi Yahuuda, saŋngini kommbi berniiji cemmbiɗɗi, umri honooɓe mum nyaama ɗi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ mboozu ko Ezɛkias ha̧ GASA WAN, Senakerib wannu Asirii baa zu dúk nɛ̀ o ye-ŋgárá nù Juda wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ ba.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ mboozu ko Ezɛkias ha̧ GASA WAN, Senakerib wannu Asirii baa zu dúk nɛ̀ o ye-ŋgárá nù Juda wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ ba.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa sebe ta nya ncɛte ghəa ŋkɛ Ɛzɛkiyas kawəndə nya dɛŋe dɛŋe te Shala ne, pa Sɛnakɛrib, meghea ka Asiri se kadzembe hɛɗia Zhəwda. Pa ŋkɛ menete ghedəkwəa mbelia ŋkɛ yitea meleme nyi berete berete nyi zəzəte ŋkɛ kaŋzla.
Tupurri: Blam feçeçre se maga hay joñ wo mo deñ äuy de joñre debay ndarge gog sen wo mo deñ äuy no, Senakerib wañ Asiri kal nduugi, raw kalge wo Juda, raw cir ti äi leege ma kiñ kiñn wo go, day kal haç faage ga srog glig äaaran wo go.

Francais: Quand Ezéchias vit que Sennachérib était venu et qu'il se tournait contre Jérusalem pour l'attaquer,
Anglais: And when Hezekiah saw that Sennacherib was come, and that he was purposed to fight against Jerusalem,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma Ezekiyas wi ala Sankerib coya, nam min ŋuy Yerusalem kaw,
Bulu: Eyoñ Ezékias a nga yen ane Senakérib a zu, a bili ôvañe ya wosane Yérusalém,
Guiziga: Ezekiyas mupura Senakirip ara so ti wuluk ngi kiɗa vu ati Zeruzaleme na,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde Hezekiya yi'i Sanherib wari, annini haɓugo bee Urusaliima,
Fulfulde_DC: Nde Hezekiya yi'i Sanherib wari, annini haɓugo bee Urusaliima,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Ezɛkias zɔka'e Senakerib tɛɛ mɛ bi Jerusalɛm,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Ezɛkias zɔka'e Senakerib tɛɛ mɛ bi Jerusalɛm,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa nakɛ Ɛzɛkiyas takwa takwa Sɛnakɛrib yitea Zhɛrəzalɛm kala wəsə kempa le ne,
Tupurri: De maga Esekiyas wo koge ga Senakerib de nduugi day aà de ëiggi patala ga se le' Jerusalem mono,

Francais: il tint conseil avec ses chefs et ses hommes vaillants, afin de couvrir les eaux des sources qui étaient hors de la ville, et ils lui prêtèrent secours.
Anglais: He took counsel with his princes and his mighty men to stop the waters of the fountains which were without the city: and they did help him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ezekiyas ŋra vunam hiɗi sa ŋulona valamu hiɗi sa ŋulona vi duura kaw, kay kaara ma goy bugol hoyok-ziyn kaf nisi ma tosom goyo.
Bulu: nde a nga bo ésok ba be bivete bié a mimbene mié ya mewosan, ane be ne dibe menjeñe mendim me ne e Yérusalém atan.
Guiziga: a kiɗam slir ati mizli hirnga naŋhay waɗ madiɗa ngi soje naŋhaya, ɓa a dislaka jiviɗ ngi yam miviɗiviɗihey misi a duba gala na, joˀ mizli a jinakaŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: __Error__
Fulfulde_DC: __Error__
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: a̧ baa keta in o gasawi gú nɛ̀ o gasa wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ wen kpee zu-zer nɛ̀ ɓir nɛ̀ ɗoŋ ye. Wa kpɛka,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: a̧ baa keta in o gasawi gú nɛ̀ o gasa wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ wen kpee zu-zer nɛ̀ ɓir nɛ̀ ɗoŋ ye. Wa kpɛka,
Kapsiki_DC: pa gezete nda ke mbelia jama ta ŋkɛ ba'a ke ka sewajɛa ŋkɛ kezha zhiɓəmte ɗasle nyi pelɛke te wəmbəa meleme. Pa yɛte zəzə ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Kal joñ ndalge de wañre äen wo de blumri äen wo no, nen maga ndeb kaçaçge bii maga wo wo go faale äi leegen wo go.

Francais: Un peuple nombreux se rassembla, et ils couvrirent tontes les sources et le ruisseau qui coulait au milieu du pays, en disant : "Pourquoi les rois d'Assyrie, en venant ici, trouveraient-ils des eaux abondantes?"
Anglais: So there was gathered much people together, who stopped all the fountains, and the brook that ran through the midst of the land, saying, Why should the kings of Assyria come, and find much water?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi gutumu, sumun ŋolo tok tuwsiya, kaara hiɗi niy-ma-riŋŋa ma ka riŋ hay liyna visi kaf nisi tosom goyo. Kay nisi di ala: Hay li ma sum sa Siriyan co tan ɗawni, a nisi fi niyn voksi kiɗi-kiɗi' kayn kay mige?
Bulu: Ane be nga volô nye a nsamba bôt ô nga sulan; nde be nga dibe menjeñ mendim mese a ôtôñ ô mbe ô lôtôk e temeteme si éte. Be nga sili na: Amu jé bejô bôte ya Asiri ba ye koon abui mendim éyoñ ba ye suan?
Guiziga: Mizli a kusom kweslekwesle, a dislaka miviɗiviɗi ngi yamaya gar ati zlazlar maɓul ti ruwuyo, a ɓam na: «Anja Asirihey masa ndiloko na, a lumam yam aka haɗa ta.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: __Error__
Fulfulde_DC: __Error__
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ bíí nɛ̀ dɔka-a mɔi̧ mɛ kpe o be-zer in o yì nɛ̀ fok zu nù‘i tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «Bo nɛ ɔ dee ha̧ o wannu Asirii mɛ hɔ hɛ̧ɛ̧, ɓɛɛ wa kpaa yì nɛ̀ dɔka-a na.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ bíí nɛ̀ dɔka-a mɔi̧ mɛ kpe o be-zer in o yì nɛ̀ fok zu nù‘i tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «Bo nɛ ɔ dee ha̧ o wannu Asirii mɛ hɔ hɛ̧ɛ̧, ɓɛɛ wa kpaa yì nɛ̀ dɔka-a na.»
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ tsenete geva kwele kwele ba'a zhizhiɓəmte pɛtɛa yɛ ɗasle, tsagha le ntsə ta yɛmə nya kehwɛ dzeyi mbe hɛɗi. Kwa nza ŋkɛ ma ke hɛ: «Yagha ka Asiri kakemave yɛmə kwele kwele kese hɛ.»
Tupurri: AÀ kal wo kayge äe, day ngaäa jar kal tayge le, aà kal wo ndeb kaçaçge biin wo äuy de bii yuuri maga yuu ti holañ ngeel ma äañ sen ni mono. AÀ day ga diñ wer may ga wañre ma Asiri nduugi wo mokay la da' wo mbaara bii ga tu mo ne?

Francais: Ezéchias prit courage; il rebâtit toute la muraille qui était en ruine et restaura les tours ; il bâtit l'autre mur en dehors, fortifia Mello dans la cité de David; il fit fabriquer une quantité d'armes et de boucliers.
Anglais: Also he strengthened himself, and built up all the wall that was broken, and raised it up to the towers, and another wall without, and repaired Millo in the city of David, and made darts and shields in abundance.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ezekiyas muɗ mulda valam ŋolo; ir gulmun ma munina nam hot inim kulo'o, ŋram kulo hiɗi simdir ca, nam in gulmun mara goy bugolomu, nam kot tuw gulmunna ma tam ziyna vi Davidna, nam gar sle-ma-duura hiɗi marayn ŋolo kaw.
Bulu: Ajô te Ezékias a nga yemete éjôé jé; a nga beta lôñ akaʼa ése e nga too ntyaman, a bete de a kui azomezome menda bemombô ba tabe; a nga lôñ ataʼa afe atan; a nga beta kôme Milô e tisone David été ngu; a nga bo bôte na be lui nye abui mekoñ a biben.
