Anglais: And prayed unto him: and he was entreated of him, and heard his supplication, and brought him again to Jerusalem into his kingdom. Then Manasseh knew that the  Lord  he was God.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam siɗaw tam Ma-Vatɗina, Ma-Vatɗin hum siɗawta valamu, Ma-Vatɗin hum giɗel-delta valamu, hotomay hay Yerusalem hay mulda valamu. Ki kayn nala Manase wi ala Ma-Vatɗina nam mi Lawna.
Bulu: a a nga yeʼelane nye. Nde a nga kañese, ve wôʼô meyeʼelane mé a bo nye na a beta zu e Yérusalém a kee éjôé ôsu. Eyoñe te Manasé a nga yeme na Nti Nye a ne Zambe.
Guiziga: Dar a tumbuloŋ. Bumbulvuŋ a pulaŋ vu, a cinaŋ tumbul naŋ, dar a mi di nga Zeruzalem a muŋ, ɓa a zumabuy naŋ. Akẽh so na, Manase a si na le muduba, Bumbulvuŋ i Buymisemuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Allah jaɓi tornde maako, woonani mo, wartiri mo haa Urusaliima, hokkiti mo laamu boo. Nden Manassa annditi Jawmiraawo woni Allah fakat.
Fulfulde_DC: Allah jaɓi tornde maako, woonani mo, wartiri mo haa Urusaliima, hokkiti mo laamu boo. Nden Manassa annditi Jawmiraawo woni Allah fakat.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ kɔfa GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ see GASA WAN ga̧. GASA WAN zia kɔfamɔ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ fo a̧ sinɛ ɗoŋ sɛn Jerusalɛm mɛ ɔ wan woyo. Hegɔ Manase iŋa'e, GASA WAN nɛ́ Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ mbetɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ kɔfa GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ see GASA WAN ga̧. GASA WAN zia kɔfamɔ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ fo a̧ sinɛ ɗoŋ sɛn Jerusalɛm mɛ ɔ wan woyo. Hegɔ Manase iŋa'e, GASA WAN nɛ́ Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ mbetɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ səkwəte Mahwətə kezha zhɛakɛ heli ŋkɛ yite. Pa Shala fate səkwə ta ŋkɛ ba'a zhɛneyi ŋkɛ te meghea ŋkɛ mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm. Se mɛa və nyagha, nahe Manasɛ keɗepete deke Mahwətə ya kaShala nya kaganda.
Tupurri: AÀ raw tosge äe, day Manwur raw laa tosge äen lay. AÀ raw laa kamkam äe no, raw ferge äe le Jerusalem ti wañ äe no. Diñ do kay nono ga Manase raw koge ga Baan diñ Manwuri.

Francais: Après cela, il bâtit un mur extérieur à la cité de David, à l'occident, vers Gihon dans la vallée, jusqu'à l'entrée de la porte des poissons, de manière à entourer Ophel, et il l'éleva à une grande hauteur. Il mit aussi des chefs militaires dans toutes les villes fortes, en Juda.
Anglais: Now after this he built a wall without the city of David, on the west side of Gihon, in the valley, even to the entering in at the fish gate, and compassed about Ophel, and raised it up a very great height, and put captains of war in all the fenced cities of Judah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugol kayni, nam in gulmunna goy ŋor hoyok-ziyna vi David, hay gal ma vulatina vi Gihon, hay lokŋa, ta-ta co tam vun-galana vi kulufna. Nam ŋuyi tam Ofel, nam wulum kulo fiyok ŋolo, nam lak sa ŋulona vi sojena hay hoyok-ziyna vi Yuda kafe.
Bulu: Eyoñe mam mete me maneya a nga lôñ akak atane ya tisone David, e Gihôn mfaʼa jôp da tôô, e mbiʼili, a kui anyiine mbé bekos; akaʼa te e mbe e bômaʼan Ofel, a a nga bete de ôyabe yôb abui; a nga futi bivete bezimbi e bitisone bise ya Yuda bi bili alem.
Guiziga: A dirba nah na, Manase a ndir mohol migila haɗi, gun gun hirnga ngi walahay ngi Davite, tisi pas ngi pastaˀ ngi miviɗiviɗi ngi Gihoŋ, a sipa sozo ngi Sedroŋ silaɓɓa, ara guno di a Ofel, a ndil di sesẽŋ a mizlingre kilifey. Ar walahay Zuda muguno ti moholoy gar na, Manase a cifi madiɗa ngi sojehey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓaawo man Manassa nyiɓti mahol Berniwol Daawuda yaasiwol, diga hiirnaaŋge Gihon nder waadiwol haa yotti Dammugal Liɗɗi, ngol taari towndiire Ofel, o towni ngol masin. O jo'ini mawɓe honooɓe nder berniiji cemmbiɗɗi nder lesdi Yahuuda fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓaawo man Manassa nyiɓti mahol Berniwol Daawuda yaasiwol, diga hiirnaaŋge Gihon nder waadiwol haa yotti Dammugal Liɗɗi, ngol taari towndiire Ofel, o towni ngol masin. O jo'ini mawɓe honooɓe nder berniiji cemmbiɗɗi nder lesdi Yahuuda fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hɔ-ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, Manase mboo gasa kusa garo zik nɛ̀  ye  ko David nɛ̀ war yee-wese ha̧ zu-zer Gihɔŋ si kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Sɛdrɔŋ, hɔ sɛn nú tua ko o Zoro, ɓɛɛ ɓir si Ofɛl; a̧ dee nɛ̀ kusa-a. A̧ aa o gasa wi-biro dam o ye-ŋgárá Juda lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hɔ-ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, Manase mboo gasa kusa garo zik nɛ̀  ye  ko David nɛ̀ war yee-wese ha̧ zu-zer Gihɔŋ si kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Sɛdrɔŋ, hɔ sɛn nú tua ko o Zoro, ɓɛɛ ɓir si Ofɛl; a̧ dee nɛ̀ kusa-a. A̧ aa o gasa wi-biro dam o ye-ŋgárá Juda lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa sebe ta ghena nyi ne, pa Manasɛ ŋate zli pelɛke yitea meleme ta David kebiyanyɛ kadzeme yitea ghweme. Kadzeyi zlia shɛ laka bela kepəkwə ta veci sha hələa Gihon, kadzawa kwa zlərəa Sɛdron hwa'a laka mɛa degha ta kelepe, kwa ntəsləte Ofɛl ŋkɛ. Pa fəyi mbelia jama ta ka sewajɛ mbe meleme nyi berete berete nyi mbe Zhəwda perə.
Tupurri: Blam sen mokay no, aà kal boo kor go nen faale äi leege mani Dafid no, Gihon wo nen pel no kay no, ti log no haçaç go mañ ti jag tiñ ceçeçn wo no. AÀ hay de yiñ ti Ofel, day aà kal geçeçge äe go ciñ haçaç. AÀ raw kañ wañre sode wo go äi leege Juda ma kiñkiñn wo äuy.

Francais: Il fit disparaître de la maison de Yahweh les dieux étrangers et l'idole, ainsi que tous les autels qu'il avait bâtis sur la montagne de la maison de Yahweh et à Jérusalem, et il les jeta hors de la ville.
Anglais: And he took away the strange gods, and the idol out of the house of the  Lord , and all the altars that he had built in the mount of the house of the  Lord , and in Jerusalem, and cast them out of the city.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Lawayn ma pulla ma ka hay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina hiɗi va ma sli tuw san naana nam yawam goy hay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina, hiɗi giwin-ma-ɗifinna kaf ma nam inim kulo hay hiɗiyta vi ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina hay Yerusalem, nam cukum goy gine'e hiɗi hoyok-ziyna.
Bulu: A nga vaa bezambe bikuu a éveʼela jé e Nda Nti, nalé fe metaʼa metunaʼa mese a nga lôñ e nkôle ya Nda Nti a e Yérusalém; a nga wua me e tison atan.
Guiziga: Manase a bi ti kulihey ati gwat miciɗahay tuwa tir hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ avra. A waha li gi mikulihey naŋ mindira taŋ a muwã ngi hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ waɗ a Zeruzaleme, ara zliɗa taŋ nga duba gala.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O wurtini labbi jananni e suura lawru diga haykaliiru Jawmiraawo. O itti kirsirɗe ɗe o nyiɓno haa hooseere haykaliiru Jawmiraawo e Urusaliima. O wudini kuuje ɗe'e fuu yaasi berniwol.
Fulfulde_DC: O wurtini labbi jananni e suura lawru diga haykaliiru Jawmiraawo. O itti kirsirɗe ɗe o nyiɓno haa hooseere haykaliiru Jawmiraawo e Urusaliima. O wudini kuuje ɗe'e fuu yaasi berniwol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ kaia o gɔni sɔ̧, o géé-sɔ̧ gbonɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbin o fara-ɗafi-wa nɛ wa dee so zu kaya, fara nɛ̀ Tua ko GASA WAN a̧a̧ sɛnɛ‘i in o wan mɛ saaye Jerusalɛm lɛŋ kai a taŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ kaia o gɔni sɔ̧, o géé-sɔ̧ gbonɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbin o fara-ɗafi-wa nɛ wa dee so zu kaya, fara nɛ̀ Tua ko GASA WAN a̧a̧ sɛnɛ‘i in o wan mɛ saaye Jerusalɛm lɛŋ kai a taŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa fəmte wəshi zhɛrete mbeli kashala shave mbe ghɛa Shala le wəsə nya feɗete ŋkɛ kashala kaveyi mbe. Pa mpəmte yɛ reghwetɛ nyi pate ŋkɛ pelɛ ghweme ta ghɛa Shala ba'a mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm, pa betakɛ kwetiɓəa nci pelɛke pelɛke ta meleme.
Tupurri: AÀ hoor baa ma waaren wo de foto maga se hay lag ra äi tiñ mani Manwurn mono go, de ngeel sië jag maga se hay boor ra ti huuli ti tiñ mani Manwurn wo de Jerusalem mono go, day kal lag rage wo go faale äi leege no.

Francais: Il rebâtit l'autel de Yahweh et y offrit des sacrifices de paix et d'actions de grâces, et il dit à Juda de servir Yahweh, le Dieu d'Israël.
Anglais: And he repaired the altar of the  Lord , and sacrificed thereon peace offerings and thank offerings, and commanded Judah to serve the  Lord  God of Israel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam hot in giwin-ma-ɗifinna vi Ma-Vatɗina, nam li ɗifinna vi lop ma slugona hiɗi ɗifin ma gi-deɓta kulo kalamu, nam di tam jafna vi Yuda kay nisi ma sun Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vi Israyel.
Bulu: A nga lôñ ataʼa metunaʼa Nti, a nga tyiʼi mimveane ya nlatane ngbwa a mvean akéva été yôp, a a nga jô Yuda na a bo Nti, Zambe ya Israél ésaé.
Guiziga: A ndira li gi mikuli ngi Bumbulvuŋ hiri naŋ a muŋ. Joˀ a gi mikuli ngi ngiɓiˀay waɗ ngi hunuma Buymisemuŋ angaŋ. A ɓa Zudahaya ɓa a huruk hurukam a mbuŋ Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ngi Israyel.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden o nyiɓti hirsirde Jawmiraawo, o lii'ani mo kirseteeɗi ngam kawtal yimɓe e kirseteeɗi yettoore dow hirsirde man. O umri yimɓe Yahuuda ɓe njaggano Jawmiraawo Allah Isra'iila.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden o nyiɓti hirsirde Jawmiraawo, o lii'ani mo kirseteeɗi ngam kawtal yimɓe e kirseteeɗi yettoore dow hirsirde man. O umri yimɓe Yahuuda ɓe njaggano Jawmiraawo Allah Isra'iila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ mboo  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧  ko GASA WAN woyo; a̧ ha̧a̧ mɔ-gaŋmɔ in o wan mɛ zɔnamɔ ha̧ Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ nú wen ha̧ o be Juda mɛ gasi nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko  Israɛl .
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ mboo  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧  ko GASA WAN woyo; a̧ ha̧a̧ mɔ-gaŋmɔ in o wan mɛ zɔnamɔ ha̧ Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ nú wen ha̧ o be Juda mɛ gasi nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko  Israɛl .
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ zhɛne reghwetɛa Mahwətə te ŋkwa ŋkɛ, dzeghekɛ nda melɛ kejikə ghə ba'a melɛ ketsa hana ba'a gezete nda ke ka Zhəwda kahawe va Shala Mahwətə ta Israyɛl.
Tupurri: AÀ kal ferge boo ngeel sië jag mani Manwur no, kal joñ siigi jag tayge wo de siigi jag suse'e, day kal wii jar Juda wo ga aà mo joñ wo peele ne Manwuri, Baa mani Israyel no.

Francais: Le peuple sacrifiait bien encore sur les hauts lieux, mais seulement à Yahweh, son Dieu.
Anglais: Nevertheless the people did sacrifice still in the high places, yet unto the  Lord  their God only.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay na'ta sumun ka li ɗifin kayn kulo kay liyn ma ɗiŋiriŋŋa, may nisi ka lum kayni tam Ma-Vatɗina Lawna visiya.
Bulu: Ve bôt be nga ke ôsu a beta tyiʼi biôm e bito bikôndôʼô yôp, ve be tyiʼi bie foʼo vʼasu Nti e Zambe wop.
Guiziga: Mizli ara gam mikuli ar li miɗingir ɗingirey vuna aruŋ ngbaŋ, amma a gaka ti slimiɗ ngi Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ taŋ ɓula.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ummaatoore kam tokki lii'aago kirseteeɗi haa nokkuuje towɗe nder lesdi, ammaa ngam Allah maare tan.
Fulfulde_DC: Ummaatoore kam tokki lii'aago kirseteeɗi haa nokkuuje towɗe nder lesdi, ammaa ngam Allah maare tan.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Zu-a'i, o giiwi duka kànà tɛ ɗafa sɔ̧ sɛn zu o  kusa-fara , ɓɛɛ ɗafa sɔ̧‘i duka nɛ wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa kpɔk ɓɛɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Zu-a'i, o giiwi duka kànà tɛ ɗafa sɔ̧ sɛn zu o  kusa-fara , ɓɛɛ ɗafa sɔ̧‘i duka nɛ wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa kpɔk ɓɛɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ndagwara mba kweci mbeli kadzeghe melɛ dzeme hwa kweci kələŋə nyi keveyi geva tekeleke te hɛɗia shɛ, ama deke kazləvəa Shala Mahwətə ta nci.
Tupurri: Jarn hay wo mbaara joñ siëgi jag ti ngeel sië jag ma de farge ciñn wo ëa pa, ama diñ ma haç togoëge ne Manwuri, Baa tawa so ane.

Francais: Le reste des actes de Manassé, sa prière à son Dieu, et les paroles des voyants qui lui parlèrent au nom de Yahweh, le Dieu d'Israël, voici que cela se trouve dans les actes des rois d'Israël.
Anglais: Now the rest of the acts of Manasseh, and his prayer unto his God, and the words of the seers that spake to him in the name of the  Lord  God of Israel, behold, they are written in the book of the kings of Israel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Caw lopna vi Manase ma hinina, siɗawta valamu tam Lawna valamu, hiɗi yoboyna vi sa wi voksina ma nisi di talamu hay sem Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vi Israyel, kayni ka ɗoy hay lopna vi muliyana vi Israyel.
Bulu: Mimboon mivoʼo Manasé, meyeʼelan a nga yeʼelane Zambe wé, mejô beyene mam be nga kobô nye a jôé Nti, Zambe Israél, me ne ntilan, e mimboone bejô bôte ya Israél.
Guiziga: Is ngi slra ngi Manase miga taŋ, diradibiɗ da Buymisemuŋ, waɗ mingiɓi ngi mizli mupuroy maɓakaŋ taŋ ti slimiɗ ngi Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ngi Israyel na, t'ada angi ɗerewol ngi slra ngi buy madiɗa ngi Israyeley.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Luttuɗum haala Manassa e kuuɗe e tornde mum nde o tori Allah e habaruuji yi'ooɓe wolwanɓe mo bee innde Jawmiraawo Allah Isra'iila, ɗum winndaama nder Habaruuji Laamiiɓe Isra'iila.
Fulfulde_DC: Luttuɗum haala Manassa e kuuɗe e tornde mum nde o tori Allah e habaruuji yi'ooɓe wolwanɓe mo bee innde Jawmiraawo Allah Isra'iila, ɗum winndaama nder Habaruuji Laamiiɓe Isra'iila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Oi nyɛrɛ tom ko Manase, kɔfa-sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ in o wen ko o  wi-tɔ̧-wen  oi nú Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ duka tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ a̧a̧ sɛn zaŋ Kalata ko o wannu  Israɛl .
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Oi nyɛrɛ tom ko Manase, kɔfa-sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ in o wen ko o  wi-tɔ̧-wen  oi nú Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ duka tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ a̧a̧ sɛn zaŋ Kalata ko o wannu  Israɛl .
Kapsiki_DC: Ma nyi ketene slene ta Manasɛ ne, nahe hɛ kenza kerafe rafe mbe palepa ta slene ta ka meghea ka Israyɛl. Mbe palepa shɛ səkwə ghə nya menete nda ŋkɛ ke Shala ta ŋkɛ ba'a ghena nyi gezete nda ka mɛ ŋkwa se va Mahwətə, Shala ta ka Israyɛl.
Tupurri: Te joñre Manasen wo no, tosge äe maga aà tos Baa äen mono, de waçaçre maga jar ko nen waçë wo ne hen ti ëu Manwuri, Baa mani Israyeln mono, sen wo de yerge äil joñre wañre ma Israyel wo no.

Francais: Sa prière et la manière dont il fut exaucé, ses péchés et ses infidélités; les places où il bâtit les hauts lieux et dressa des aschérahs et des images avant de s'être humilié, voici que cela est écrit dans les Paroles de Hozaï.
Anglais: His prayer also, and how God was entreated of him, and all his sin, and his trespass, and the places wherein he built high places, and set up groves and graven images, before he was humbled: behold, they are written among the sayings of the seers.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Siɗawta valamu hiɗi humda ta Lawn humumu, sulukŋa valamu hiɗi bay-ɗigerta valamu, liyn ma nam in liyn ma ɗiŋiriŋŋa haya, ma nam in naga ma yum Asera* haya, hiɗi slen ma sli tuw sana jew a nam hot yalam gaa'a, kayni ka ɗoy hay ɗerwelda vi Hosay.
Bulu: Meyeʼelane mé a avale Zambe a nga yalane nye, abé dé a melo mé, mevôm a nga lôñe bito bikôndôʼô yôp a telé mekôn mʼAkéra a biveʼela bi ngunemelan , te na a sili émiene si, mam mete me ne ntilan e kalate Hôzayi.
Guiziga: Dira dibiɗ naŋ, yo Buymisemuŋ micinaŋ di, ɓi ngi mungra naŋhay gar ati gi teŋteŋ naŋ ta gar ti naŋ mihin hirnga zleˀe t'aruŋ, waɗ lihey naŋ mindir li miɗingir ɗingirey ngi gi mikuli ar taŋ, naŋ mingi kuli ɓamtalay ati gwat miciɗa ti ciɗey gar na, i mutoho taŋ le ar Slra ngi Hozay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Tornde laamiiɗo e jaawaabu Allah e haala hakkeeji mum e no o yewri umroore Allah e nokkuuje towɗe ɗe o nyiɓi e suuraaji Asera e labbi ɗi o waɗi hiddeko o leestina hoore maako, ɗum winndaama nder Habaruuji Hosay.
Fulfulde_DC: Tornde laamiiɗo e jaawaabu Allah e haala hakkeeji mum e no o yewri umroore Allah e nokkuuje towɗe ɗe o nyiɓi e suuraaji Asera e labbi ɗi o waɗi hiddeko o leestina hoore maako, ɗum winndaama nder Habaruuji Hosay.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nyɛrɛ kɔfa-sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ in ee ɗaŋmɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ ee ha̧ a̧, o nyɛrɛ zu dee ɗaŋmɔ in o ŋgazu kɔ̧-a̧, o  kusa-fara  n'aa ɗafa, o te nɛ‘i gasi gasi in o mboo-mɔ yɔra sɛn zaŋ Kalata ko Hozai.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nyɛrɛ kɔfa-sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ in ee ɗaŋmɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ ee ha̧ a̧, o nyɛrɛ zu dee ɗaŋmɔ in o ŋgazu kɔ̧-a̧, o  kusa-fara  n'aa ɗafa, o te nɛ‘i gasi gasi in o mboo-mɔ yɔra sɛn zaŋ Kalata ko Hozai.
Kapsiki_DC: Səkwə ghə ta ŋkɛ ba'a tsema tsema fate Shala, ghena ta fete nyi menete ŋkɛ ba'a nzama ta ŋkɛ dɛŋe dɛŋe te Shala, sləa kələŋə nyi ŋate ŋkwa kadzeghe melɛ ŋkɛ hwe, yɛ selə le yɛ pa ta wəshi nyi zhɛrete mbeli kashala, nda teɗepete fete nyi menete ŋkɛ kwa kema ta Shala ne, pɛtɛa hɛ kerafete geva mbe slene ta Hozay.
Tupurri: Tosge äe no, de faage maga aè joñ nen laa tosge äen mono, älagge äen wo de ndarge gog äe no, ngeel maga aà hay boor ngeel sië jag ma de farge ciñn wo ni mono, de ngeel maga aà hay cor koore Aseran wo ni, de foton wo blam ferge ti see äe gesiñn mokay no, sen wo wo de yerge äil kefder mani Hosay no.

Francais: Manassé se coucha avec ses pères, et on l'enterra dans sa maison. Amon, son fils, régna à sa place.
Anglais: So Manasseh slept with his fathers, and they buried him in his own house: and Amon his son reigned in his stead.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Manase mit kuɗ sumiyamu, nisi pum hay ziyna valamu, goora valamu Amon ti mulda hay baŋalamu.
Bulu: Manasé a nga bômbô vôme wua ba bʼésaa, be nga jame nye e nda jé. E mone wé Amon a nga jôô éjiane jé.
Guiziga: Manase mumuc na, a dikakaŋ a hay naŋ. Mangal naŋ Amoŋ a zum buy ar li naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Manassa maayi, ɓe uwi mo nder saare maako. Ɓiyiiko Amon laami haa pellel maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Manassa maayi, ɓe uwi mo nder saare maako. Ɓiyiiko Amon laami haa pellel maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Manase fea si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ sɛn kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧; hegɔ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Amɔŋ ɔɔ wan oi-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Manase fea si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ sɛn kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧; hegɔ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Amɔŋ ɔɔ wan oi-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa mte Manasɛ ne, pa mbeli lamte te wəvea ŋkɛ. Amon, wəzege ta ŋkɛ nde kelete meghe te ŋkwa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Manase kal sugi go äiñ paçaçre äe wo, day aè raw teege äe liñ ni äe. Je ni äe Amoñ kal joñ wañ ti ngeel äe.

Francais: Amon avait vingt-deux ans lorsqu'il devint roi, et il régna deux ans à Jérusalem.
Anglais: Amon was two and twenty years old when he began to reign, and reigned two years in Jerusalem.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Amon ka hiɗi busat dok-ma' yam ma' hay li ma nam tun mulu; nam ti mulda ir busat ma' hay Yerusalem.
Bulu: Amon a nga bili mimbu mewôm mebaé a mibaé, éyoñ a nga tebe njô bôt; a nga jôô mimbu mibaé e Yérusalém.
Guiziga: Amoŋ micifi buy madiɗa na, naɓa naŋ ti vi kukur cuw nga cuw, a zum buy a Zeruzaleme vi cuw.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Amon woodi duuɓi noogas e ɗiɗi, saa'i o laamo. O laami haa Urusaliima duuɓi ɗiɗi.
Fulfulde_DC: Amon woodi duuɓi noogas e ɗiɗi, saa'i o laamo. O laami haa Urusaliima duuɓi ɗiɗi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Amɔŋ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-yiitoo ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan sɛn Jerusalɛm pɛ yiitoo.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Amɔŋ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-yiitoo ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan sɛn Jerusalɛm pɛ yiitoo.
Kapsiki_DC: Va ta Amon bakemsə bakeghəmbe nda kelete meghe ŋkɛ. Pa ŋkɛ menete va bake mbe meghe mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm.
Tupurri: Kiñgi Amoñ hay do äog ti äoge, de maga aà kol ti wañ mono, day aà kal joñ wañ Jerusalem kiñgi äoge.

Francais: Il fit ce qui est mal aux yeux de Yahweh, comme avait fait Manassé, son père; Amon sacrifia à toutes les images qu'avait faites Manassé, son père, et il les servit;
Anglais: But he did that which was evil in the sight of the  Lord , as did Manasseh his father: for Amon sacrificed unto all the carved images which Manasseh his father had made, and served them;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam li slen ma joona vok ir Ma-Vatɗina, ki bulum Manase li nala, slen ma sli tuw sana ma bulum Manase kotomna, nam li ɗifin talam kaf, girifimu kaw.
Bulu: A nga bo mam me nʼabé e mise me Nti, aval ésaa wé Manasé a nga bo; a nga tyiʼi bengunemelane bese ésaa wé a nga bo biôm a kañese be.
Guiziga: A gi gwat malambaˀ a mihiri ngi Bumbulvuŋ, kaɓa cine naŋ Manase. Amoŋ a gi mikuli, yo a huruk huruk a mbuŋ kulihey, cine naŋ miciɗa taŋ na ceke.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi kalluɗum yeeso Jawmiraawo, bana baaba maako Manassa waɗno. Amon rewi labbi cehaaɗi fuu ɗi Manassa sehino, o lii'ani ɗi kirseteeɗi boo.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi kalluɗum yeeso Jawmiraawo, bana baaba maako Manassa waɗno. Amon rewi labbi cehaaɗi fuu ɗi Manassa sehino, o lii'ani ɗi kirseteeɗi boo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ dee ɗaŋmɔ sɛn yí GASA WAN hee dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Manase ga. Amɔŋ ɗafa o géé-sɔ̧ nɛ̀ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Manase mboo so ɓɛɛ a̧ gasi wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ dee ɗaŋmɔ sɛn yí GASA WAN hee dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Manase ga. Amɔŋ ɗafa o géé-sɔ̧ nɛ̀ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Manase mboo so ɓɛɛ a̧ gasi wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Wəsə nya kehitema geva sha Mahwətə yamenete ŋkɛ kala yitenyɛ Manasɛ: ntake kadzeghe nda melɛ ke wəshi nyi zhɛrete mbeli kala Shala nyi menete yitenyɛ ba'a kahawe va hɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ joñ fen ma de älagge nen Manwuri, do maga pan äe Manse hay joñ nono. AÀ hay joñ siigi jag ne foto maga pan äe Manse hay joñ ra mo äuy, day hay goñ ra lay.

Francais: et il ne s'humilia pas devant Yahweh, comme s'était humilié Manassé, son père ; car lui, Amon, multiplia le péché.
Anglais: And humbled not himself before the  Lord , as Manasseh his father had humbled himself; but Amon trespassed more and more.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam may hot yalam gaa vok Ma-Vatɗina ki bulum Manase hot yalam gaa naɗi, kay namu Amon li tuwam joo suwa.
Bulu: A nji suu émiene si ôsu Nti avale Manasé ésaa wé a nga bo, ve nye, Amon, a nga bo mame ya dañe ve émiene mekua.
Guiziga: Amma naŋ a hin hirnga a mbuŋ Bumbulvuŋ kaɓa cine naŋ Manase mihin na ta. Amoŋ a gi mungra fineˀ ngi cine ma jaka.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O leestinaay hoore maako yeeso Jawmiraawo bana baaba maako leestiniri nde. Amon ɗuɗɗini aybeeji mum.
Fulfulde_DC: O leestinaay hoore maako yeeso Jawmiraawo bana baaba maako leestiniri nde. Amon ɗuɗɗini aybeeji mum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɔ kpɔk, a̧ gbar ɗaŋmɔ ti GASA WAN hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ dee so ga na. Ɗaŋmɔ ko Amɔŋ gana zu ko dáà kɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɔ kpɔk, a̧ gbar ɗaŋmɔ ti GASA WAN hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ dee so ga na. Ɗaŋmɔ ko Amɔŋ gana zu ko dáà kɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama keɗepete fete ta ŋkɛ kwa kema ta Mahwətə kala nya menete Manasɛ we. Nya tekeleke ma ne, pa ŋkɛ menete jaɗafa kwele ma zhɛkwa ke ŋa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ fer ti see äe gesiñ pel Manwuri, do maga pan äe Manase hay joñ no gaa, werga Amoñ de see äe kol joñ see äe de älagge de dañge pa yaw.

Francais: Ses serviteurs conspirèrent contre lui et le mirent à mort dans sa maison.
Anglais: And his servants conspired against him, and slew him in his own house.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa sunda valamu fok lawt kalamu, nisi cum goyo hay ziyna valamu.
Bulu: Bebo bisaé bé be nga bôndé feʼe ya bo nye abé a wôé nye e nda jé.
Guiziga: Gawla naŋhay a gam gidiɓi a hirnga naŋ, a kiɗaka vagay a hay naŋ tehhe a muŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jaggiiɓe maako tuurtani mo. Ɓe mbari mo nder suudu maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Jaggiiɓe maako tuurtani mo. Ɓe mbari mo nder suudu maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ baa ɗaŋ keta zu a̧, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ a̧ sɛn kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ baa ɗaŋ keta zu a̧, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ a̧ sɛn kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbelia jama ta ka sewajɛa ŋkɛ tsate ghena yite, peslekɛ ŋkɛ ki ghɛa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Weere joçoçre äen mañ wo äaale äe, kal wo 'warge äe go liñ ni äe.

Francais: Mais le peuple du pays frappa tous ceux qui avaient conspiré contre le roi Amon, et le peuple du pays établit roi à sa place Josias, son fils.
Anglais: But the people of the land slew all them that had conspired against king Amon; and the people of the land made Josiah his son king in his stead.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May sum sa hay nagatna ci sum sa fok lawt kalamna goy kafe, sum sa hay nagatna tun goora valamu Yosiyas mulu hay baŋalamu.
Bulu: Ve bôte ya si Yuda be nga wôé ba bese be nga bôndé feʼe ya bo njô bôt Amon abé , a be nga telé mone wé Yôzias éjiane jé.
Guiziga: Amma mizli Zudahay a kiɗaka mizli migam gidiɓi ar buy Amoŋ tuwa vagay vagay cek. Dar a cam mangal naŋ Zoziyas ar li naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa yimɓe lesdi Yahuuda mbari tuurtuɓe dow laamiiɗo Amon. Nden ɓe laamini ɓiyiiko Yusiya haa pellel maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa yimɓe lesdi Yahuuda mbari tuurtuɓe dow laamiiɗo Amon. Nden ɓe laamini ɓiyiiko Yusiya haa pellel maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɛ ɗoŋ, o be Juda gbɛɛ o wi nɛ̀ baa ɗaŋ keta zu Amɔŋ, ɓɛɛ wa de wan ha̧ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Josias.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɛ ɗoŋ, o be Juda gbɛɛ o wi nɛ̀ baa ɗaŋ keta zu Amɔŋ, ɓɛɛ wa de wan ha̧ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Josias.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama pa ka Zhəwda mpəmte mbeli nyi kepeslekɛ meghe Amon, ntave Zhoziyas, wəzege ta ŋkɛ te ŋkwa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Ama ngaäa ma äi sirn kal wo iid jar maga hay mañ wo äaale wañ Amoñ mo äuy go, day ngaäa ma äi sirn kal wo kañ Josiyas je ni äen wañ ti ngeel äe.

Francais: Josias avait huit ans lorsqu'il devint roi, et il régna trente et un an à Jérusalem.
Anglais: Josiah was eight years old when he began to reign, and he reigned in Jerusalem one and thirty years.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yosiyas ka hiɗi busat glafandi hay li ma nam tun mulu. Nam ti mulda ir busat dok-ɦidi yam kep hay Yerusalem.
Bulu: Yôzias a nga bili mimbu muam éyoñ a nga tebe njô bôt a a nga jôô mimbu mewôm mela a wua e Yérusalém.
Guiziga: Zoziyas micifi buy madiɗa na, naɓa naŋ ti vi dangafaɗa, a zum buyo vi kukur makir ngaŋ kaˀ a Zeruzaleme.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yusiya woodi duuɓi joweetati, saa'i o laamo. O laami haa Urusaliima duuɓi cappanɗe tati e go'o .
Fulfulde_DC: Yusiya woodi duuɓi joweetati, saa'i o laamo. O laami haa Urusaliima duuɓi cappanɗe tati e go'o .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Josias a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan pɛ ɓu-taar-zua-kpɔk sɛn Jerusalɛm.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Josias a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan pɛ ɓu-taar-zua-kpɔk sɛn Jerusalɛm.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma nda kelete meghe Zhoziyas ne, deghese va ta ŋkɛ, pa ŋkɛ menete va mahekenemsə kwetɛŋeghəmbe te meghe mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm.
Tupurri: Kiñgi Josiyas hay nenma'a, de maga aà kol ti wañ mono, day aà kal joñ wañ Jerusalem kiñgi do swa' ti boñ.

Francais: Il fit ce qui est droit aux yeux de Yahweh, et il marcha dans les voies de David, son père, et il ne s'en détourna ni à droite ni à gauche.
Anglais: And he did that which was right in the sight of the  Lord , and walked in the ways of David his father, and declined neither to the right hand, nor to the left.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam li slen ma ɗigera vok ir Ma-Vatɗina, nam poy hay hagata vi bulumu David. Nam may cal goy gal gulɗi, gal jufɗi kaw.
Bulu: A nga bo mam me ne mvaé e mise me Nti a wulu e mezene me David ésaa wé. Teke liʼi me mbo nnôm nge mbo ngal.
Guiziga: A gi gwat mikaslsla a mihiri ngi Bumbulvuŋ. A sipi di i sar ngi dideˀ naŋ Daviti, ko a ngizli avu gwat ngi gi naŋ neˀ le ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi ko fottani Jawmiraawo, o tokki laabi kaaka maako Daawuda, o selaay ɗi sam.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi ko fottani Jawmiraawo, o tokki laabi kaaka maako Daawuda, o selaay ɗi sam.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ dee mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a ti GASA WAN, kànà hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ zɔmdáa kɔ̧-a̧ David dee so ga; a̧ ba ŋma yuwar si wiiko kóó si gale na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ dee mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a ti GASA WAN, kànà hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ zɔmdáa kɔ̧-a̧ David dee so ga; a̧ ba ŋma yuwar si wiiko kóó si gale na.
Kapsiki_DC: Wəsə nya ɗe Mahwətə yamenete ŋkɛ. Tɛfɛa tɛfɛa kala shinyɛ David se ŋkɛ kadzeghwa, kaɗema kezlakemte ya te kwa zeme ya te kwa gwela.
Tupurri: AÀ joñ fen ma de deele nen Manwuri, day see diñ ti faage mani pan äe Dafid no. AÀ joñ nen celge go ti äañ ware, noga ti äañ guur gaè.

Francais: La huitième année de son règne, lorsqu'il était encore un adolescent, il commença à rechercher le Dieu de David, son père, et, la douzième année, il commença à purifier Juda et Jérusalem des hauts lieux, des aschérahs, des images sculptées et des images fondues.
Anglais: For in the eighth year of his reign, while he was yet young, he began to seek after the God of David his father: and in the twelfth year he began to purge Judah and Jerusalem from the high places, and the groves, and the carved images, and the molten images.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay busata valam ta glafandita hay mulda, ki nam ka joriyo tuwa, nam tun caw gar Lawna vi bulumu David, hay busata doogo yam ma'ta, nam tun caw por Yuda hiɗi Yerusalem goyo, kay liyn ma ɗiŋiriŋŋa ma hayna, nagan ma yum Asera*, slen ma sli tuw sana, hiɗi lawayn ma waana ma yoray hiɗi kawayna kaw.
Bulu: E mimbu muame ya njôane wé, valé a ngenan ésoé, a nga taté na a jeñ e Zambe David ésaa wé; e mbu awôm a baa ñwô a nga taté na a fubu Yuda a Yérusalém ajô bito ya bikôndôʼô yôp, mekône mʼakéra, biveʼela bezambe a bengunemelan be ne mboon a nyeman étyé.
Guiziga: Ar vi midangafaɗ naŋ ar buyo na, a zla sipa Buymisemuŋ ngi dideˀ naŋ Davite, naɓa i zuŋ aruŋ. Angi vi mukuruˀ nga cuw naŋ ar buyo ma na, a zla zuɓa dili ngi Zudahay ati ngi Zeruzalemey avra: a waha li miɗingir ɗingir ngi gi mikuliheye, kuli ɓamtalay waɗ kuli miciɗa ti ciɗey malla mipa ti piheye.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder nduuɓu laamu Yusiya njoweetataɓu, saa'i o derkeejo tawon, o fuɗɗi tefugo muuyo Allah mo kaaka maako Daawuda jaggani. Nder nduuɓu sappo e ɗiɗaɓu, o fuɗɗi ittugo nokkuuje towɗe e daŋraŋge Asera e suuraaji labbi ɓolinaaɗi e cehaaɗi nder lesdi Yahuuda e berniwol Urusaliima.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder nduuɓu laamu Yusiya njoweetataɓu, saa'i o derkeejo tawon, o fuɗɗi tefugo muuyo Allah mo kaaka maako Daawuda jaggani. Nder nduuɓu sappo e ɗiɗaɓu, o fuɗɗi ittugo nokkuuje towɗe e daŋraŋge Asera e suuraaji labbi ɓolinaaɗi e cehaaɗi nder lesdi Yahuuda e berniwol Urusaliima.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛn ɗoŋ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar pɛ ɔɔ-wan ko Josias, ká a̧ ɓɔna nɛ̀ be-ŋgaiwi, a̧ ku̧u̧ naŋ kia mɔ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ ko zɔmdáa kɔ̧-a̧ David kɔ̧a̧. Ɗoŋ n'aa kpaa pɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo tɛ wan, a̧ ku̧u̧ naŋ ɗaŋa o  kusa-fara , o te nɛ̀‘i gasi gasi in o mboo-mɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ yinɛ sɛn nù Juda in Jerusalɛm.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛn ɗoŋ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar pɛ ɔɔ-wan ko Josias, ká a̧ ɓɔna nɛ̀ be-ŋgaiwi, a̧ ku̧u̧ naŋ kia mɔ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ ko zɔmdáa kɔ̧-a̧ David kɔ̧a̧. Ɗoŋ n'aa kpaa pɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo tɛ wan, a̧ ku̧u̧ naŋ ɗaŋa o  kusa-fara , o te nɛ̀‘i gasi gasi in o mboo-mɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ yinɛ sɛn nù Juda in Jerusalɛm.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te kwa deghese ta va ta ŋkɛ te meghe, ndagwara mba ŋkɛ kawəzege, ntake kazele ɗe ta Shala ta shinyɛ David. Va wəfaɗe kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ ne, ntake kampəmte ŋkwa kedzeghe melɛ nyi hwa kələŋə, yɛ selə nyi keveyi geva tekeleke ba'a wəshi nyi zhɛrete mbeli kashala pɛtɛ mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm le hɛɗia Zhəwda.
Tupurri: Nen kiñgi po nenma' de maga se ti wañ äen mono, do ga aà hay klee ëa so mono, aà kal ya'ge ferge kië Baa mani pan äe Dafid no. Nen kiñgi ma de hwal ti äogn mokay no, se kal ya'ge façaç Juda wo go de Jerusalem wer ngeel sië jag ma ciñ wo de koore Aseran wo, de foton wo de soçoçre boo ma de yorgen wo no.

Francais: On renversa devant lui les autels des Baals, et il abattit les statues consacrées au soleil qui étaient placées dessus ; il brisa les aschérahs, les images taillées et les images fondues, et, les ayant réduites en poussière, il répandit cette poussière sur les tombeaux de ceux qui leur avaient offert des sacrifices ;
Anglais: And they brake down the altars of Baalim in his presence; and the images, that were on high above them, he cut down; and the groves, and the carved images, and the molten images, he brake in pieces, and made dust of them, and strowed it upon the graves of them that had sacrificed unto them.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi to giwin-ma-ɗifinna vi Baal gaa vok iramu, hiɗiy-fatta ma lakay kulo kalamna, nam to nagana vi Asera gaa'a, sle ma sli tuw sana hiɗi lawayn ma waana ma yoray hiɗi kawayna, nam muɗum goy butuw-kuwa, nam fat butuw-ku namna hay yam-usta vi nisi sa li ɗifin namna.
Bulu: Be nga sôʼôlô metaʼa metunaʼa Bebaal si émien a too, a nga baʼé fe biôme ba diʼi beôlobinda bi mbe été yôp; a nga buʼu mekône mʼakéra, bengunemelan be ne nkpwelan a ba be ne mboon a nyeman étyé, a nga diʼi be be bo vʼasub asup, a kut asube te e mesoñe ba be nga tyiʼi be biôm;
Guiziga: A wahaka li gi mikuli da Baˀalaya daˀ a mihiri naŋ, a waha li wura urdihey misi a hirnga li gi mikuliheye, a ngila kuli ɓamtalay waɗ kuli miciɗa ti ciɗey malla mipa ti piheye, a musukuɗo taŋ burkuɗ burkuɗ, a zliɗa taŋ kwiɗ kwiɗ ng'ar zivi ngi mizli migaka taŋ mikuli zleˀe vuna,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ngibbini haa yeeso maako kirsirɗe Ba'alji, ɓe itti gulduɗe uureteeɗum dow kirsirɗe man, ɓe ngibbini daŋraŋge Asera e labbi ɓolinaaɗi e cehaaɗi go, ɓe campiti ɗum, ɓe ɗiggini ɗum, ɓe caŋkiti mbulwuldi maajum dow genaale lii'aniiɓe ɗi kirsaaɗi .
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ngibbini haa yeeso maako kirsirɗe Ba'alji, ɓe itti gulduɗe uureteeɗum dow kirsirɗe man, ɓe ngibbini daŋraŋge Asera e labbi ɓolinaaɗi e cehaaɗi go, ɓe campiti ɗum, ɓe ɗiggini ɗum, ɓe caŋkiti mbulwuldi maajum dow genaale lii'aniiɓe ɗi kirsaaɗi .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa gbina o tua-ɗafi Bal a nù nɛ̀ gbaayí-a in o fara-dɔ-fuu-nyama ha̧ Sɔ̧ Bal a nù mbɛt. Wa gbina o mɔɔ nɔ‘i a nù nduku-nduku, ɓɛɛ wa kai o oi gbina-a a zu pɛsi-fio ko o wi nɛ̀ yaa so ɗafi nɛ̀ Bal.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa gbina o tua-ɗafi Bal a nù nɛ̀ gbaayí-a in o fara-dɔ-fuu-nyama ha̧ Sɔ̧ Bal a nù mbɛt. Wa gbina o mɔɔ nɔ‘i a nù nduku-nduku, ɓɛɛ wa kai o oi gbina-a a zu pɛsi-fio ko o wi nɛ̀ yaa so ɗafi nɛ̀ Bal.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbeli mpəmte yɛ reghwetɛa yɛ Ba'al kwa ntsə ta ŋkɛ, tsagha shɛ le yɛ ŋkwa ketere 'wərdə nyi kənə, pa mbeli tsaslemte selə nyi keveyi geva tekeleke ba'a pa mbeli mpəmte wəshi nyi zhɛrete mbeli kashala pɛtɛ. Pa mbeli zhɛrete hɛ kakeləwə, kwərə kwərəyi te yɛ kwele ta mbeli nyi kese kadzeghe nda melɛ ke hɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ srog ngeel sië jag Baal wo go pel äe haçaç, aà mbug huuli ma de jagge ti keçeç maga hay wo ti äe mono go. AÀ hrag nen koore Aseran wo go, foton wo de soçoçre boo ma de yorgen wo. AÀ geëeb nen äaara go äurgi, day kal fed äurgi äaaran go ti tipaale jar maga hay wo joñ siëgi jag ne hara mono.

Francais: et il brûla les ossements des prêtres sur leurs autels. Et il purifia Juda et Jérusalem.
Anglais: And he burnt the bones of the priests upon their altars, and cleansed Judah and Jerusalem.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Muliyan-sa-ɗifinna nam ŋalsi zoksi kulo kay giwin-ma-ɗifinna. Ki kayn nala nam por Yuda hiɗi Yerusalem goyo.
Bulu: A nga diʼi bivese betuni e metaʼa metunaʼa mabe yôp. Avale te nde a nga fubu Yuda a Yérusalém.
Guiziga: a wura tesl ngi masay da kuli tayna ar li ngi mikuli taŋhay vuna. Zoziyas muzuɓa  dili   ngi si ruwuy Zuda ati Zeruzaleme kahana.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yusiya wuli i'e liman'en labbi dow kirsirɗe maaji. Bana non o seniri lesdi Yahuuda e Urusaliima .
Fulfulde_DC: Yusiya wuli i'e liman'en labbi dow kirsirɗe maaji. Bana non o seniri lesdi Yahuuda e Urusaliima .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa dɔɔ gba̧a̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Bal sɛn zu mgbák fara nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i ɗafi so a̧ sɛnɛ‘i. Mɔ nɛ̀ Josias dee ɗafi nɛ̀ war nù Juda in ye Jerusalɛm nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa dɔɔ gba̧a̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Bal sɛn zu mgbák fara nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i ɗafi so a̧ sɛnɛ‘i. Mɔ nɛ̀ Josias dee ɗafi nɛ̀ war nù Juda in ye Jerusalɛm nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Kakwa keɗaŋe, pa mbeli teremte 'yɛ'yɛa ka dzeghe nda melɛ ke Ba'al te reghwetɛ nyi se hɛ kadzeghe melɛ te. Tsetse yaɓemte meleme ta Zhɛrəzalɛm ba'a hɛɗia Zhəwda Zhoziyas.
Tupurri: AÀ roë hm jar sië jagn wo go ti ngeel sië jag äaaran wo no. Diñ do kay nono ga aà façaç Juda wo go de Jerusalem.

Francais: Dans les villes de Manassé, d'Ephraïm, de Siméon et jusqu'en Nephthali, -- au milieu de leurs ruines, --
Anglais: And so did he in the cities of Manasseh, and Ephraim, and Simeon, even unto Naphtali, with their mattocks round about.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay hoyok-ziyna vi Manase, vi Efrayim, Simeyon, ta-ta hay Neftali, jar ziy ma ɦoy gaa'a ma ŋuyi talam kafna, nam to giwin-ma-ɗifinna gaa'a,
Bulu: E bitisone bi Manasé, Efrayim, Siméon a kui Néftali, e biliʼi biab été, mbômaʼan, a nga sôʼôlô metaʼa metunaʼa si,
Guiziga: Dar aru ng'ar walahay Manase, Efrayim, Simeyoŋ, nga Neftali waɗ ng'ar walahay midigwi taŋhay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Koo haa berniiji Manassa e Efrayim e Simeyon haa yotti Neftali boo e nder bille taariiɗe, o waɗi bana non.
Fulfulde_DC: Koo haa berniiji Manassa e Efrayim e Simeyon haa yotti Neftali boo e nder bille taariiɗe, o waɗi bana non.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ kpɔk kale mɔ‘i a̧ a̧ dee sɛn nú Manase, nú Efraim, nú Simɛɔŋ, nú Nɛftalii gú nɛ̀ o be ye katɛ wa lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ kpɔk kale mɔ‘i a̧ a̧ dee sɛn nú Manase, nú Efraim, nú Simɛɔŋ, nú Nɛftalii gú nɛ̀ o be ye katɛ wa lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ ne, cape ŋkɛ kadzeyi mbe yɛ meleme ta Manasɛ, Ɛfrayim, Simɛyon, pa le ŋa Nɛftali, tsagha le meleme nyi keŋzla ŋzla dzeyi yitea hɛ.
Tupurri: Äi leege mani Manase, Efrayim wo de Simeyon day haçaç go ni Neftali mono, yoo ngeel ma de älagge gon wo mo deñ no, day go ti äe degarra äuy mono, aà srog ngeel sië jagn wo go,

Francais: il renversa les autels, brisa et réduisit en poussière les aschérahs et les images sculptées, et abattit toutes les statues consacrées au soleil dans tout le pays d'Israël. Puis il retourna à Jérusalem.
Anglais: And when he had broken down the altars and the groves, and had beaten the graven images into powder, and cut down all the idols throughout all the land of Israel, he returned to Jerusalem.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nagan ma iniya ma yum Asera* hiɗi slen ma sli tuw sana nam tom goyo, nam muɗum goy butuwu; hiɗiy-fatta  ma ka hay nagata vi Israyel kaf nam tom gaa'a, bugol kayni nam hot hay Yerusalem.
Bulu: a nga sañ mekôn mʼakéra a bengunemelan be ne nkpwelan bifuse bifus a bo bie asup; a nga baʼé bengunemelane ya kañe jôp e si ése ya Israél. Mvus éte nje a nga bulan e Yérusalém.
Guiziga: A waha li gi mikuliheye, a buko kuli ɓamtalay waɗ kuli miciɗa ti ciɗeye, musukuɗ musukuɗ burkuɗ, a waha li wura urdihey misi asi ruwuy Israyele gar. Dar a mi nga Zeruzalem a muŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder lesdi Isra'iila fuu o yibbini kirsirɗe e daŋraŋge Asera, o fusi suuraaji labbi cehaaɗi, o nami ɗi. O sampiti gulduɗe uureteeɗum fuu. Nden o hooti Urusaliima.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder lesdi Isra'iila fuu o yibbini kirsirɗe e daŋraŋge Asera, o fusi suuraaji labbi cehaaɗi, o nami ɗi. O sampiti gulduɗe uureteeɗum fuu. Nden o hooti Urusaliima.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Josias ha̧a̧ nú, ɓɛɛ wa gbin o fara-ɗafi géé-sɔ̧, o te nɛ̀‘i gasi gasi in o géé-sɔ̧ yinɛ; a̧ gbina wa nduku-nduku a nù, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɗaŋ o fara-dɔ-fuu-nyama ha̧ o géé-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i sɛn nú  Israɛl  lɛŋ, sɛka a̧ be tɛ̀ɛ́ si ɗoŋ si Jerusalɛm.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Josias ha̧a̧ nú, ɓɛɛ wa gbin o fara-ɗafi géé-sɔ̧, o te nɛ̀‘i gasi gasi in o géé-sɔ̧ yinɛ; a̧ gbina wa nduku-nduku a nù, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɗaŋ o fara-dɔ-fuu-nyama ha̧ o géé-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i sɛn nú  Israɛl  lɛŋ, sɛka a̧ be tɛ̀ɛ́ si ɗoŋ si Jerusalɛm.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋzlamte yɛ reghwetɛ, kancɛncɛhwemte selə nyi keveyi geva tekeleke ba'a wəshi nyi zhɛrete mbeli kashala, kampəmte ŋkwa ketere 'wərdə te hɛɗia Israyɛl pɛtɛ. Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ, tewətelɛwe zhɛneke geva kadzembe Zhɛrəzalɛm.
Tupurri: geëeb koore Aseran wo go de foton wo no, wañ nen äaara go äurgi. AÀ srog huuli ma de jagge ti keçeç maga wo äi sir Israyel mono go äuy, blam äe aà kal ferge Jerusalem.

Francais: La dix-huitième année de son règne, après qu'il eut purifié le pays et la maison de Dieu, il envoya Saphan, fils d'Aslia, Maasias, commandant de la ville, et Joha, fils de Joachaz, l'archiviste, pour réparer la maison de Yahweh, son Dieu.
Anglais: Now in the eighteenth year of his reign, when he had purged the land, and the house, he sent Shaphan the son of Azaliah, and Maaseiah the governor of the city, and Joah the son of Joahaz the recorder, to repair the house of the  Lord  his God.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay busata doogo yam glafandita vi mulda valamu, kay por nagata hiɗi Tempella kayni, nam gi Safan goora vi Atsaliya, Maaseya sa ma ŋolla vi hoyok-ziyna, hiɗi Yowah goora vi Yowahaz ma ŋom slena, nam cuksi kay nisi ma kot tuw ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina Lawna valamu.
Bulu: Mbu awôm a muame ya njôane wé, a nga lôme Safan, mone Atsaliahu, Maséyahu évete tison a Yôa mone Yôakaz, mbaʼale mintilan na be kôme Nda Nti e Zambe wé, asu ya fubu si ya Yuda a Nda Zambe.
Guiziga: Oziyasa, angi vi mukuruˀ nga dangafaɗ naŋ ar buyo, a dirba naŋ muzuɓa  dili   ngi si ruwuyo waɗ ngir hay ngi Buymisemuŋ na, a slina Safaŋ mangal ngi Asaliya ati Maˀaseya, buy miwi walahay waɗ Yoˀa, mangal ngi Zoˀakas, i mijiviɗ ngi buy vuna, a ɓa taŋ ɓa ara ɗiyaka hiri ngi hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder nduuɓu laamu Yusiya sappo e njoweetataɓu, nde o ɗon sena lesdi e haykaliiru Allah, o neli Safan ɓii Asaliya e Ma'aseya, hooreejo Urusaliima e Yo'as ɓii Yo'ahas, hunndukoojo laamiiɗo, haa ɓe mbo'itina haykaliiru Allah Jawmiraawo.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder nduuɓu laamu Yusiya sappo e njoweetataɓu, nde o ɗon sena lesdi e haykaliiru Allah, o neli Safan ɓii Asaliya e Ma'aseya, hooreejo Urusaliima e Yo'as ɓii Yo'ahas, hunndukoojo laamiiɗo, haa ɓe mbo'itina haykaliiru Allah Jawmiraawo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar pɛ-wan ko Josias, ŋgimbi n'aa ɗafa war nù in war Tua ko Sɔ̧ kaɗi, a̧ toma Safaŋ bem ko Asaliya sitɛ Masɛya, gasawi zu zika-nù, sitɛ Jɔas bem ko Jɔakas betom ko wannu wen ha̧ wa mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ɗafi Tua ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar pɛ-wan ko Josias, ŋgimbi n'aa ɗafa war nù in war Tua ko Sɔ̧ kaɗi, a̧ toma Safaŋ bem ko Asaliya sitɛ Masɛya, gasawi zu zika-nù, sitɛ Jɔas bem ko Jɔakas betom ko wannu wen ha̧ wa mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ɗafi Tua ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te kwete hɛ mbe va kwa meŋe ta ŋkɛ te meghe, mba ŋkɛ kayaɓe hɛɗi le ghɛa Shala ne, pa Zhoziyas ndeke nda hweŋkwa ke Shafan, wəzege ta Asaliya, ke Masɛya, ŋgwamna ta meleme ba'a ke Yowa, wəzege ta Zhowakaz nya kande kele nda ghena ta meghe ke mbeli, kalə kahi ghɛa Shala Mahwətə ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Nen kiñgi ma de hwal ti nenma maga se ti wañ mono, aà kal laa Safan je ni Atsalyahun wo de Manaseyahun wañ äi leege no, de Yowa je ni Yowahas je bag jag kefder ciñn wo ma façaç sirn wo go de tiñ Baa no, ma kne' tiñ mani Manwuri, Baa äe no.

Francais: Ils se rendirent auprès d'Helcias, le grand prêtre, et ils livrèrent l'argent qui avait été apporté dans la maison de Dieu, et que les lévites gardiens de la porte avaient recueilli de Manassé et d'Ephraïm, et de tout le reste d'Israël, et de tout Juda et Benjamin et des habitants de Jérusalem.
Anglais: And when they came to Hilkiah the high priest, they delivered the money that was brought into the house of God, which the Levites that kept the doors had gathered of the hand of Manasseh and Ephraim, and of all the remnant of Israel, and of all Judah and Benjamin; and they returned to Jerusalem.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi co kat mul ŋol ma-ɗifinna Hilkiya, sumun vulsi gurjuta ta mara' hay ziyna vi Lawna, gurjuta ta sum sa Levitna sa ŋom vun-ziyna tara'a hay ɓam jafna vi Manase hiɗi Efrayim, hiɗi dir sumuna vi Israyel sa hini kafna, hiɗi jafna vi Yuda hiɗi Benyamin kaf, nisi hotay hay Yerusalem may.
Bulu: Nde be nga ke be njôô betuni Ilkiya, a be nga soo e moné bôt be nga ve Nda Zambe, nye Belévit be ne bebaʼale mimbé be nga nyoñ ataté Manasé, Efrayim, a Israél mboʼo ase, a Yuda ase a Bényamin; éyoñe te be nga bulan e Yérusalém.
Guiziga: Taŋ ara lumaka masay Hilkiya, madiɗa, a rakaŋ ti dala musoko di ng'ar hay ngi Buymisemuŋ, mizli levi mijigina mizlingrehey micikilaka avu mizli Manasehey, Efrayimey waɗ avu Israyeley gar, avu mizli Zuda ati Benjameŋhey gar waɗ avu mizli Zeruzalemey muvulaka ng'ar hay ngi Buymisemuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe njehi haa Hilkiyya, hooreejo liman'en, ɓe njahrani mo ceede ɗe Lewi'en aynooɓe dammuɗe njaɓno haa juuɗe yimɓe Manassa e Efrayim e luttuɓe Isra'iila fuu e yimɓe Yahuuda e Benyamin e Urusaliima, warɓe haa haykaliiru Allah fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe njehi haa Hilkiyya, hooreejo liman'en, ɓe njahrani mo ceede ɗe Lewi'en aynooɓe dammuɗe njaɓno haa juuɗe yimɓe Manassa e Efrayim e luttuɓe Isra'iila fuu e yimɓe Yahuuda e Benyamin e Urusaliima, warɓe haa haykaliiru Allah fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa nɛɛ kpa Hilkia gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ wa ha̧ mbɔi nɛ̀ wa baa tɛnɛ ha̧ Sɔ̧ ha̧ a̧; mɛ̀ nɛ́ mbɔi nɛ̀ o be Levii, o wi-pɛm-tua ko Sɔ̧ mɔi̧a so er o bíí nú Manase, nú Efraim, er o be  Israɛl  si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn, er o be Juda, er o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin in er o bíí nɛ̀ a̧a̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa nɛɛ kpa Hilkia gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ wa ha̧ mbɔi nɛ̀ wa baa tɛnɛ ha̧ Sɔ̧ ha̧ a̧; mɛ̀ nɛ́ mbɔi nɛ̀ o be Levii, o wi-pɛm-tua ko Sɔ̧ mɔi̧a so er o bíí nú Manase, nú Efraim, er o be  Israɛl  si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn, er o be Juda, er o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin in er o bíí nɛ̀ a̧a̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm.
Kapsiki_DC: Cape mbeli nyi kalə sha Hilkiya, wəndə kwelea ka dzeghe Shala. Pa hɛ keleghe cɛdɛ nyi kemave ka Lɛvi nyi keya ŋkwa kedzembe cɛ kawəsə gəmə kezha ghɛa Shala, va mbelia Manasɛ, ŋa Ɛfrayim le ka Israyɛl, tsagha va ka Zhəwda, ka Bɛnjamɛn ba'a ka Zhɛrəzalɛm.
Tupurri: AÀ kal wo rawge äiñ Hilkiya je moobe ma kluu ma joñ sië jag no, day saara kal nduugi de solay maga aè hay nduëgi de äe bi tiñ mani Manwurn mono, ga jar Lefid maga hay wo gor jag tiñn hay wo yaçëge äe do jar ni Manase wo de jar ni Efrayim wo, de jar Israyel maga gwa' wo mono, de jar Juda wo de Benjame äuy. Day saara kal ferge le Jerusalem.

Francais: Ils remirent cet argent entre les mains de ceux qui faisaient exécuter l'ouvrage, qui étaient établis surveillants dans la maison de Yahweh, et ceux-ci le donnèrent aux ouvriers qui travaillaient à la maison de Yahweh , pour réparer et consolider la maison.
Anglais: And they put it in the hand of the workmen that had the oversight of the house of the  Lord , and they gave it to the workmen that wrought in the house of the  Lord , to repair and amend the house:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi vul gurju na'ta hay ɓam sum sa lopna vuli hay ɓisiya kay li lopna hay ziyna vi Ma-Vatɗina. Nisi vula' hay ɓam sum sa li lopna, sa ka li lop hay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina kay kota' dono'o, kay kot tuw ziyda kaw;
Bulu: Be nga kalane nye e mo me ba be nga bili mbeʼe ya bo ésaé e Nda Nti. Balé ki be nga kalane nye e be bôte bebien be nga bo ésaé, be saék e nda Nti mfaʼa ya yemete a kôme Nda;
Guiziga: Dar a vulaka asi haŋ ngi mizli migi slrahay, misi taŋ i buyɓi ngi hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ. Migi slra ngir hay ngi Bumbulvuŋhoy tuwa, a ɗiyam di hiri ngi hay ngi Buymisemuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ndokki ceede man haa aynooɓe kuugal haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo. Kamɓe ɓe ndokki ɗe haa huuwooɓe nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo, waato wo'itinooɓe kuuje nder maaru.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ndokki ceede man haa aynooɓe kuugal haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo. Kamɓe ɓe ndokki ɗe haa huuwooɓe nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo, waato wo'itinooɓe kuuje nder maaru.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ ndeke nda cɛdɛa shɛ ke mbeli nyi nza slene ta hi ghɛa Shala te dzeve va hɛ, kezha ɗepe ŋki nda hɛ ke ka mene slene nyi kehi ghɛa kakwa berete.
Tupurri: AÈ kal haçge äe ne jar maga joñre ma äi tiñ mani Manwurn hay do äaara mono do. Saara kal haçge ne jar maga wo de ma joñjoñren do, ga wo de kne' tiñ mani Manwurn ga aà mo fer kiñkiñ mono.

Francais: Et ils le donnèrent aux charpentiers et aux maçons, et ils l'employèrent à acheter des pierres de taille et du bois pour la charpente, et pour mettre des poutres aux bâtiments qu'avaient détruits les rois de Juda.
Anglais: Even to the artificers and builders gave they it, to buy hewn stone, and timber for couplings, and to floor the houses which the kings of Judah had destroyed.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nisi vula' mi sa wi kotta, sa wi inda, kay gusta vi hiɗiyna ma fiyokŋa hiɗi gun ma junum vun tuwamna, hiɗi ɦoɗokŋa vi ziyna ma muliyana vi Yuda patam gaana.
Bulu: balé bete ki be nga ve nye bebo biôm, belôñe menda, asu ya kuse mbaane mekok a bilé bi ne asu ya late nda , a asu ya bo mendile menda bejô bôte ya Yuda be nga tyam.
Guiziga: Naŋ kine, a vulaka dala tuwa da mujuwa marjahay ati mindira hayay, ɓa a hiɗikam di ɗugur miciɗahay waɗ dum ngi viŋhey, ngi jaha hayay, buy Zudahay mupulaka taŋ mbak a hiryam na.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kamɓe boo, ɓe ndokki ɗe haa sehooɓe e nyiɓooɓe, haa ɓe cooda kaa'e cehaaɗe e leɗɗe ngam waɗugo jokke e kaataakooje, ngam wo'itingo cuuɗi ɗi laamiiɓe Yahuuda ngeebino.
Fulfulde_DC: Kamɓe boo, ɓe ndokki ɗe haa sehooɓe e nyiɓooɓe, haa ɓe cooda kaa'e cehaaɗe e leɗɗe ngam waɗugo jokke e kaataakooje, ngam wo'itingo cuuɗi ɗi laamiiɓe Yahuuda ngeebino.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ ndeke ŋkɛ ke ka feɗe sheghwə ba'a ka ŋa ŋkwa kezha pave pelɛ nyi bebiya bebiya ba'a yɛ sheghwə nyi kehi hɛ kezha slene ta ŋa ta ŋkwa nyi peleyite se ka meghea ka Zhəwda yitea hɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ kal wo haçge äe ne jar ko ceë feçeçren wo de jar ko boor feçeçren wo no, ma yeë huuli ma de ceëge wo, de koore ma äodge ti äe wo, de koore ma kne' tiñ maga wañre ma Judan hay älagn wo go mono.

Francais: Ces hommes travaillaient fidèlement à leur tâche. Ils avaient pour surveillants Jahath et Abdias, lévites d'entre les fils de Mérari, Zacharias et Mosollam, d'entre les fils des Caathites, qui les dirigeaient, ainsi que d'autres lévites qui tous s'entendaient aux instruments de musique.
Anglais: And the men did the work faithfully: and the overseers of them were Jahath and Obadiah, the Levites, of the sons of Merari; and Zechariah and Meshullam, of the sons of the Kohathites, to set it forward; and other of the Levites, all that could skill of instruments of musick.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sumun kayni li lopna visi hay hagata valamu, nisi ka lakay gaa kuɗ gaŋeraŋa vi Yahat hiɗi Abdiyas, sa Levitna jar gurona vi Merari, Zakariya hiɗi Mesullam, jar gurona vi sa Kehatna, sa lopna vuli hay ɓisiya kay li ŋomda.
Bulu: Bôte bete be nga bo ésaé mvoʼé . Be mbe éjôé Yahat ba Abdias si, Belévit ya bone be Merari, nalé fe éjôé Zakari a Mesulam si, Belévit ya bone be Kehat, mbe be nga bili ésaé ya fombô avalʼésaé ja wulu.
Guiziga: Mizli ara gaka slra taŋ ti mevel mezle, levi, buy ngi slraˀahaya, i ti: Yahat ati Obadiya angi muy ngi Merarihey waɗ Zakari ati Mesulam angi muy ngi Kehatay. Levi mekelemey cek misinaka kiɗa gwat ngi dunguroy na,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Huuwooɓe man ɗon kuuwa bee hoolaare. Ɓe kuuwi dow ardaaŋgal Yahat e Obadiya, Lewi'en nder danygol Meraari e Zekariya e Mesullam nder danygol Kahat, ɓe ɗon kakkilana ɓe. Lewi'en fuu ɓe waawɓe fiyugo kuuje gimruɗe.
Fulfulde_DC: Huuwooɓe man ɗon kuuwa bee hoolaare. Ɓe kuuwi dow ardaaŋgal Yahat e Obadiya, Lewi'en nder danygol Meraari e Zekariya e Mesullam nder danygol Kahat, ɓe ɗon kakkilana ɓe. Lewi'en fuu ɓe waawɓe fiyugo kuuje gimruɗe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi nɔ‘i dee tom kɔ-wa nɛ̀ de-a. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ Yahat in Obadia, o be Levii tɛ nú-gara ko Mɛrari ká bá nɛ̀ Zakarii in Mɛsulam, tɛ nú-gara ko Kehat a̧ yaa zu tom nɔ‘i. O ŋma be Levii nɛ̀ ya so nɛ́ o wi-mbɛr-mɔ,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi nɔ‘i dee tom kɔ-wa nɛ̀ de-a. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ Yahat in Obadia, o be Levii tɛ nú-gara ko Mɛrari ká bá nɛ̀ Zakarii in Mɛsulam, tɛ nú-gara ko Kehat a̧ yaa zu tom nɔ‘i. O ŋma be Levii nɛ̀ ya so nɛ́ o wi-mbɛr-mɔ,
Kapsiki_DC: Mbe mene slene ta nci ka mene slene le mehele, ka Lɛvi Yahat ba'a Obadiya, kwa yita ta Merari, Zakari ba'a Meshəwlam kwa yita ta Kɛhat ya te te ghəa slene. Ma kweci ka Lɛvi nyi keɗepe tsa wəshi kwa tsa tsa ne,
Tupurri: Jar sen kal wo joñ joñre äaaran de deele. Jar ma pel äaaran hay diñ Yahad wo de Abdiyas jar Lefid ma yoo weere mani Merari wo, lan diñ Sakari wo de Mesullam yoo weere mani Kehad wo, maga wo de lagge gor ti feçeçren wo mono.

Francais: Ceux-ci surveillaient aussi les manoeuvres et dirigeaient tous les ouvriers pour chaque travail. Il y avait encore des lévites secrétaires, commissaires et portiers.
Anglais: Also they were over the bearers of burdens, and were overseers of all that wrought the work in any manner of service: and of the Levites there were scribes, and officers, and porters.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa Levitna nisina si sum sa yali, kay nisi wi nul ma gina, nisi li lopna vi jakŋa ma ziyimna, nisi ŋom sum sa li lopna kafe, lopna vi inda kuɗ batam kafe; Levitna segena sa ɗo slena, sa li sunda hiɗi sa ziy jakŋa ka kaw.
Bulu: Belévit bete bese be mbe mintyetyeñe bebôme mezik. Be nga bili ésaé mimbeʼe be nga fombô fe ba bese ba bo ésaé, akôlô ésaé ji a kui ji évok; Belévit befe be mbe beyeme bekalate, bivet a bebaʼale mimbé.
Guiziga: a wam nga taŋ i mijijira gwatay waɗ migi slra ko wanahayka gar. Levi mekelemeye, slra taŋ i toho gwat, buy ɓihey malla jigina mizlingrehey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lewi'en woɗɓe laati hakkilanooɓe kuugal dow roondooɓe kuuje nyiɓugo e huuwooɓe kuuɗe feere feereeje. Woɗɓe boo laati winndooɓe e saraaki'en e aynooɓe dammuɗe.
Fulfulde_DC: Lewi'en woɗɓe laati hakkilanooɓe kuugal dow roondooɓe kuuje nyiɓugo e huuwooɓe kuuɗe feere feereeje. Woɗɓe boo laati winndooɓe e saraaki'en e aynooɓe dammuɗe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: yaa so zu o wi-tui-mɔ in oi o wi-de-tom lɛŋ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tom kɔ-wa. Mgbara o be Levii, o ŋma nɛ́ o wi-yɔr-kalata, o mɔ-geŋa in o wi-pɛm-tua.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: yaa so zu o wi-tui-mɔ in oi o wi-de-tom lɛŋ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tom kɔ-wa. Mgbara o be Levii, o ŋma nɛ́ o wi-yɔr-kalata, o mɔ-geŋa in o wi-pɛm-tua.
Kapsiki_DC: hɛ ka sleke ka kekele wəshi le ka mene slene pɛtɛ, kala nza slene ta nci. Ma slene ta rafe wəshi gəmə, rafe wəshi mahalegə ba'a ya mɛa degha, ka Lɛvia shɛhɛ ka mene.
Tupurri: Jar Lefid sen hay diñ jar maga wo de ëeñ ma'ge joçoç äuy. AÀ hay wo ko joñre soëge feçeçre poçoçren wo, hay wo de ko joñre ti ngeel maga aà de joñge ni mo taëtaë äuy no. Jar Lefid ma tigriñ hay wo diñ jar yerge, komiser wo, jar gor jag tiñ wo.

Francais: Au moment où l'on retirait l'argent qui avait été apporté dans la maison de Yahweh, le prêtre Helcias trouva le livre de la loi de Yahweh, donnée par l'organe de Moïse.
Anglais: And when they brought out the money that was brought into the house of the  Lord , Hilkiah the priest found a book of the law of the  Lord  given by Moses.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma nisi yaw gurjuta ta mara' hay ziyna vi Ma-Vatɗina ay goy kayni, mul-ma-ɗifinna Hilkiya fi ɗerwelda vi gatta vi Ma-Vatɗina ta Ma-Vatɗin vula' hiɗi ɓam Mususta.
Bulu: Eyoñ be nga kuli e moné bôt be nga ve Nda Nti atan, ntuni Ilkiya a nga some kalate metiñe Nti a nga ve Môze.
Guiziga: Ti taŋ mahilaka dala mipaka ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ na, masay Hilkiya, a luuma ɗerewol ɓimujuwa ngi Bumbulvuŋ muvula da Moyis zleˀe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Saa'i ɓe ɗon koo'a ceede cigaaɗe nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo, Hilkiyya limanjo tawi deftere tawreeta ka Jawmiraawo hokkuno bee juŋngo Muusa.
Fulfulde_DC: Saa'i ɓe ɗon koo'a ceede cigaaɗe nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo, Hilkiyya limanjo tawi deftere tawreeta ka Jawmiraawo hokkuno bee juŋngo Muusa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa ɓɔna fara kaia o mbɔi wen Tua ko Sɔ̧ gbonɛ nɛ̀ kɔ̧ kuɓa, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Hilkia kpaa kalata Heembea ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ Moisɛ ee so.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa ɓɔna fara kaia o mbɔi wen Tua ko Sɔ̧ gbonɛ nɛ̀ kɔ̧ kuɓa, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Hilkia kpaa kalata Heembea ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ Moisɛ ee so.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma vəa ŋkwa nya kele cɛdɛ mbeli same kwa səndəkwə nya veyi mbeli kwa mbe ghɛa Shala, pa Hilkiya, wəndə kwelea ka dzeghe Shala ntsate palepa ta wəsə mahalegəa Mahwətə, nya ndeke nda ŋkɛ ka Israyɛl laka Moyize.
Tupurri: De maga aè hoo solay maga aè hay nduu de äe äi tiñ mani Manwurn le go mono, je sië jag Hilkiya kal da' kefder jag liñgi mani Manwur no, kefder maga aà haçn ne Moyis mono.

Francais: Alors Helcias, prenant la parole, dit à Saphan, le secrétaire : "J'ai trouvé le livre de la loi dans la maison de Yahweh";
Anglais: And Hilkiah answered and said to Shaphan the scribe, I have found the book of the law in the house of the  Lord . And Hilkiah delivered the book to Shaphan.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hilkiya sli ditiya, nam di tam Safan ma ɗo slena ala: ɗerwella vi gatta nan fumawa hay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina. Hilkiya vul ɗerwel namna mi Safan.
Bulu: Nde Ilkiya a nga jô Safan, ñyeme bekalate na: Me someya kalate metiñ e Nda Nti. Ane Ilkiya a nga ve Safan kalate.
Guiziga: Dar Hilkiya a ɓa Safaŋ, mbur mutoho gwata: «I luuma ɗerewol ɓimujuwa le ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ.» Hilkiya a vula ɗerewol tuwa da Safaŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O wi'i Safan, binndoowo: “Mi heɓti deftere tawreeta nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo.” Nden o hokki nde Safan.
Fulfulde_DC: O wi'i Safan, binndoowo: “Mi heɓti deftere tawreeta nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo.” Nden o hokki nde Safan.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hilkia tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wi-yɔr-kalata Safaŋ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mi kpaa kalata Heembea sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.» Hilkia ha̧a̧ kalata'i ha̧ Safaŋ,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hilkia tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wi-yɔr-kalata Safaŋ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mi kpaa kalata Heembea sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.» Hilkia ha̧a̧ kalata'i ha̧ Safaŋ,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Hilkiya gezete nda ke nde rafe wəshi Shafan nahe ŋkɛ kentsate palepa ta wəsə mahalegə mbe ghɛa Mahwətə, pa ŋkɛ ndeke nda ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Do kay nono, Hilkiya kal mañ waçaçre day wii Safan je yergen ga: Ndi da' kefder jag liñgin we äil tiñ mani Manwur no. Day Hilkiya kal haç kefdern ne Safan.

Francais: et Helcias donna le livre à Saphan. Saphan porta le livre au roi, et il rendit aussi compte au roi, en disant: "Tout ce qui a été confié à tes serviteurs, ils l'ont fait:
Anglais: And Shaphan carried the book to the king, and brought the king word back again, saying, All that was committed to thy servants, they do it.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Safan tuɗ ɗerwella mi mulla, nam vum labar lopna kaw ala: Sa sunda vaŋu li lop ma naŋ disi kalamnawa kaf;
Bulu: Safan ki a nga zuu kalate e be njô bôt a kate fe nye mame ya ésaé a jôʼô na: Bebo bisaé bôé be maneya bo jam ése be nga bendé be;
Guiziga: Safaŋ aru di da buy, a sipaŋ ɓi, a ɓaŋ: «Slraka mupula asi haŋ ngi gawla ɗikey na gar, ara gakaŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Safan yahrani nde laamiiɗo, waddani mo habaru, wi'i mo: “Jaggiiɓe ma mbaɗi ko umruɗa min fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Safan yahrani nde laamiiɗo, waddani mo habaru, wi'i mo: “Jaggiiɓe ma mbaɗi ko umruɗa min fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ Safaŋ nɛ́ɛ̀ ba kalata'i ha̧ ha̧ wannu, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «O wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧a̧ tɛ dee mɔ lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ de'i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ Safaŋ nɛ́ɛ̀ ba kalata'i ha̧ ha̧ wannu, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «O wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧a̧ tɛ dee mɔ lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ de'i.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Shafan keleghe nda palepa shɛ ke meghe kagezete nda ghena nya te: «Slene ta nci yamene ka mene ŋa slene kala nya ndeke nda na ke hɛ, wa'a ke shɛ.
Tupurri: Safan kal nduugi de kefdern ne wañ, day kal bag blam waçaçre ne hen ni lay ga: Weere joçoçre äon joñ wo fen maga aè hay wii ra ti äe mono we go äuy.

Francais: ils ont vidé l'argent qui se trouvait dans la maison de Yahweh et l'ont remis entre les mains de ceux qui sont établis surveillants et entre les mains de ceux qui font exécuter l'ouvrage."
Anglais: And they have gathered together the money that was found in the house of the  Lord , and have delivered it into the hand of the overseers, and to the hand of the workmen.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: gurjuta ta ka hay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina nisi vula'awa goyo, nisi vula'awa hay ɓam sa ŋulona hiɗi sa li lopna.
Bulu: be maneya ve moné a mbe e Nda Nti a kalane nye e mo betebʼôsu a e bôt ba bo ésaé.
Guiziga: Dala taŋ mulumaka ar hay Bumbulvuŋ na, a hilaka le gar, a vulaka le da buyɓi ngi slrahay waɗ da migi slraˀahaya.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe njuppi ceede gonɗe nder sundukru haykaliiru, ɓe ndokki ɗe haa juuɗe hakkilanooɓe kuugal e haa juuɗe huuwooɓe boo.”
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe njuppi ceede gonɗe nder sundukru haykaliiru, ɓe ndokki ɗe haa juuɗe hakkilanooɓe kuugal e haa juuɗe huuwooɓe boo.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ mbɔi nɛ̀ duka wen tom Tua ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ duka so kɔ̧ kuɓa ha̧ o wi-de-tom.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ mbɔi nɛ̀ duka wen tom Tua ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ duka so kɔ̧ kuɓa ha̧ o wi-de-tom.»
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ka dzeghe Shala təkwəmte səndəkwə ba'a ndeke nda cɛdɛ ke mbeli nyi te ghəa slene ba'a ke ka mene slene.»
Tupurri: AÀ haç wo solay maga hay äi tiñ mani Manwurn we go ne jar ma pel joñren wo de jar maga wo ti joñren mono do.

Francais: Saphan, le secrétaire, fit encore au roi cette communication: "Le prêtre Helcias m'a donné un livre." Et Saphan lut dans ce livre devant le roi.
Anglais: Then Shaphan the scribe told the king, saying, Hilkiah the priest hath given me a book. And Shaphan read it before the king.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Safan ma ɗo slena vi labara lo tam mulla ala: Mul-ma-ɗifinna Hilkiya vulan ɗerwel (tara) kep. Bugol kayni Safan jaŋ ɗerwel na'ta goy vok mulla.
Bulu: Safan, ñyeme bekalate a nga kate fe njô bôte na: ntuni Ilkiya a te ve ma kalate éziñ. Nde a nga lañe nye njô bôt a too.
Guiziga: A dirba nah, Safaŋ mbur mutoho gwat tuwa, a ɓa buyo. «masay Hilkiya, a vuliy ɗerewol ani.» Dar Safaŋ tuwa, a slufa a mbuŋ buyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Safan wi'i laamiiɗo: “Hilkiyya hokki yam deftere nde'e.” O jaŋngani nde laamiiɗo.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Safan wi'i laamiiɗo: “Hilkiyya hokki yam deftere nde'e.” O jaŋngani nde laamiiɗo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ siti ha̧ wannu woyo: «Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Hilkia ha̧a̧ kalata’ɛ ha̧‘m mbɛt.» Ɓɛɛ a̧ ku̧naŋ tɔra kalata'i ti wannu.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ siti ha̧ wannu woyo: «Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Hilkia ha̧a̧ kalata’ɛ ha̧‘m mbɛt.» Ɓɛɛ a̧ ku̧naŋ tɔra kalata'i ti wannu.
Kapsiki_DC: Zhɛne ne, ma ke mtsehete: «Hilkiya, wəndə kwelea ka dzeghe Shala nde ndeke ɗa palepa nya.» Ntake kajaŋga nda ke meghe.
Tupurri: Safan je yergen kal bag blam waçaçre ma kay ne wañ ni pa, je sië jag Hilkiya haç kefder po me mokay no. Blam äe Safan Kal jañ kefdern go pel wañ ni.

Francais: Lorsque le roi eut entendu les paroles de la loi, il déchira ses vêtements,
Anglais: And it came to pass, when the king had heard the words of the law, that he rent his clothes.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma mulla hum yoboy ma ka hay gatta, nam jet sligara valam goyo.
Bulu: Eyoñe njô bôt a nga wôʼô mejô ya metiñ, a nga nyabe mengômesane mé.
Guiziga: Buy tuwa micina ɓi ngir ɗerewol ɓimujuwa cin cin na, a ngira zana ngi vu vuhoyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde laamiiɗo nani ko winnda nder tawreeta, o seeki limce mum.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde laamiiɗo nani ko winnda nder tawreeta, o seeki limce mum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wannu zia wen nƐ yɔra zaŋ kalata Heembea'i kaɗi, a̧ a̧ka̧ laa tɛ-a a nU.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wannu zia wen nƐ yɔra zaŋ kalata Heembea'i kaɗi, a̧ a̧ka̧ laa tɛ-a a nU.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa fate ghena mbe palepa ta wəsə mahalegə meghe Zhoziyas ne, pa ŋkwahemte lekwesa ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: De maga wañ wo laa waçaçre jag liñgin wo mokay no, aà kal ngar oçoçbe ma ti äen wo go.

Francais: et il donna cet ordre à Helcias, à Ahicam, fils de Saphan, à Abdon, fils de Micha, à Saphan, le secrétaire, et à Asaa, serviteur du roi :
Anglais: And the king commanded Hilkiah, and Ahikam the son of Shaphan, and Abdon the son of Micah, and Shaphan the scribe, and Asaiah a servant of the king's, saying,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla vul dita tam Hilkiya, Ahikam goora vi Safan, Abdon goora vi Mikka, Safan ma ɗo slena hiɗi Asaya sa ma sunda vi mulla:
Bulu: Ane njô bôt a nga bendé Ilkiya, Ahikam, mone Safan, Abdon, mone Miké, Safan ñyeme bekalate a Asaya mbo ésaé njô bôte na:
Guiziga: Akẽh na, a zila ti Hilkiya, Ahikam, mangal ngi safaŋ, Abdoŋ mangal ngi Mika, Safaŋ mbur mutoho gwat waɗ Asaya, gawla nga naŋ buyo, a ɓa taŋ na:
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden o umri Hilkiyya e Ahikam ɓii Safan e Abdon ɓii Mika e Safan binndoowo e Asaya, suka laamiiɗo, o wi'i:
Fulfulde_DC: Nden o umri Hilkiyya e Ahikam ɓii Safan e Abdon ɓii Mika e Safan binndoowo e Asaya, suka laamiiɗo, o wi'i:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Hilkia in Ahikam o bem ko Safaŋ, ha̧ Abdɔŋ bem ko Mika, ha̧ wi-yɔr-kalata Safaŋ in ha̧ Asaya o wi-de-tom ko wannu hegɔ:
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Hilkia in Ahikam o bem ko Safaŋ, ha̧ Abdɔŋ bem ko Mika, ha̧ wi-yɔr-kalata Safaŋ in ha̧ Asaya o wi-de-tom ko wannu hegɔ:
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hekakɛ Hilkiya, Ahikam, wəzege ta Shafan, Abdon, wəzege ta Mika, Shafan, nde rafe wəshi ba'a Asaya, kwete hwa ka mene slene ta ŋkɛ, ma ke sha hɛ:
Tupurri: Wañ kal fer waçaçre ma kay ne Hilkiya, ne Ahikam je ni Safan no, ne Abdon je ni Mise no, ne Safan je yerge no, day ne Asaya weejoçoç wañ no, ga:

Francais: "Allez consulter Yahweh pour moi et pour ce qui reste en Israël et en Juda, au sujet des paroles du livre qu'on a trouvé; car grande est la colère de Yahweh qui s'est répandue sur nous, parce que nos pères n'ont pas observé la parole de Yahweh, en agissant selon tout ce qui est écrit dans ce livre."
Anglais: Go, enquire of the  Lord  for me, and for them that are left in Israel and in Judah, concerning the words of the book that is found: for great is the wrath of the  Lord  that is poured out upon us, because our fathers have not kept the word of the  Lord , to do after all that is written in this book.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Tuɗgiya, jobgi Ma-Vatɗin kanu, kay sum sa ka lakay hay Israyel hiɗi Yuda kaw, kay yoboyna vi ɗerwelda ta nay fa'ta kayni; kay ɦiyda vi Ma-Vatɗina na' ŋolo, na' meray goy kaya, kay mige sumiyay may li kuɗ yoboyna vi Ma-Vatɗinɗi, nisi may li kuɗ slen ma ka ɗoy hay ɗerwelda kaynɗi.
Bulu: Kela yemelane nkômbane Nti asu dam a asu mebukaʼa me Israél a Yuda ajô mejô ya kalate a te some nyô, amu ayaa Nti é maneya sôébane be bia di e ne anen, amu bʼésaa bangan be nji ke baʼale nkobô Nti a bo aval ése é ne ntilan e kalate nyô.
Guiziga: «Ɓi ngi ɗerewol mulumoko di hana na, ara cufuɗaka Bumbulvuŋ aseˀe vur ya, vur is ngi Israyel ati Zudahaya. Asi mingiɓi hana i ɓi madiɗa, Bumbulvuŋ a zuɓ himaˀ le fõh fõh ar ndra, asi dideˀ ndrahay a jaka ɓi nga naŋ Bumbulvuŋ a hirnga ta, yo a gaka gwata kaɓa mutohoko cek ar ɗerewol hana na ta.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: “Njehe, ƴame Jawmiraawo ngam am e ngam luttuɓe nder Isra'iila e Yahuuda fuu dow bolle binndaaɗe nder deftere heɓtaande nde'e. Ngam kaakiraaɓe meeɗen kakkilanaay wolde Jawmiraawo haa ɓe mbaɗa fodde ko winnda nder deftere nde'e dow meeɗen fuu. Ngam maajum, Jawmiraawo ukkani en tikkere maako saatunde.”
Fulfulde_DC: “Njehe, ƴame Jawmiraawo ngam am e ngam luttuɓe nder Isra'iila e Yahuuda fuu dow bolle binndaaɗe nder deftere heɓtaande nde'e. Ngam kaakiraaɓe meeɗen kakkilanaay wolde Jawmiraawo haa ɓe mbaɗa fodde ko winnda nder deftere nde'e dow meeɗen fuu. Ngam maajum, Jawmiraawo ukkani en tikkere maako saatunde.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ wór GASA WAN wen am in wen o be  Israɛl  bá nɛ̀ o be Juda, wen zu wen zaŋ Kalata’ɛ n’ɛɛ kpaa’ɛ. Nyimsea ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ kura zu yɛ ɔ gasa nyɛmna, wen bó nɛ́ o dáà k’ɛɛ mboo so zu tɛ wen ko GASA WAN de nɛ̀ mɔ nyɛm ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ yɔra zaŋ kalata’ɛ na.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ wór GASA WAN wen am in wen o be  Israɛl  bá nɛ̀ o be Juda, wen zu wen zaŋ Kalata’ɛ n’ɛɛ kpaa’ɛ. Nyimsea ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ kura zu yɛ ɔ gasa nyɛmna, wen bó nɛ́ o dáà k’ɛɛ mboo so zu tɛ wen ko GASA WAN de nɛ̀ mɔ nyɛm ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ yɔra zaŋ kalata’ɛ na.»
Kapsiki_DC: «Kwiɗi mə 'yɛwakɛ ɗa mə ghena va Mahwətə, ba'a kezha ka Israyɛl le ka Zhəwda nyi ketene, te ghəa ghena nyi mbe palepa nya ntsate nya mbeli tsetsenya. Kwa nza ŋkɛ nahe ka shihɛ ɓəmə keɗema yɛ fete yitea ghena nyi gezeke ŋkɛ, tewəmbəreke wəsə nya ne, kwele kwele tenza hwepe wənəa Mahwətə kənəa gheɓəmə.»
Tupurri: See wee ko ëiggi Manwur ti äi, ti te jar Israyel maga gwa' wo mono, wo de Juda, day ti glog waçaçre ma äil kefder se maga aè da'n mono. Werga tï¡ï¡gi go de wañ mani Manwur dus go ne naa ti debañ, diñ wer maga paçaçre naa hoo wo sug ti waçaçre mani Manwurn do maga aà de yerge äil kefder sen ni no äuy gaa mono.

Francais: Helcias et ceux que le roi avait désignés se rendirent auprès de la prophétesse Holda, femme de Sellum, fils de Thecuath, fils de Hasra, gardien des vêtements; elle habitait à Jérusalem, dans le second quartier.
Anglais: And Hilkiah, and they that the king had appointed, went to Huldah the prophetess, the wife of Shallum the son of Tikvath, the son of Hasrah, keeper of the wardrobe; (now she dwelt in Jerusalem in the college:) and they spake to her to that effect.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hilkiya hiɗi nisi sa mulla yisi sesina tuɗ kat cata-jobta Hulda, cata vi Sallum, goora vi Tokehat, goora vi Hasra, ma ŋom sligara. Na' musi ziy hay Yerusalem, hay Hoyok-ziy ma wulina. Nisi di ta'a ki ŋray jarsi nala.
Bulu: Ane Ilkiya a ba njô bôt a nga liti, be nga ke be nkulu mejô minga, Ulda, nga Kalum, mone Tôkehat, mone Asra, mbaʼale mengômesan. A nga too Yérusalém, e mfefé tison. Be nga kobô nye avale e mbe njôan.
Guiziga: Hilkiya ati mizli buy muwuna taŋ tuwa, a ram ng'avu Hulda, ngwas mijiviɗe. Hulda i ngwas ngi Salum, mbur mijigina zana ngi mezegweley ar hay ngi Buymisemuŋ, i mangal ngi Tokehat, yo i dideˀ meciɗek ngi Hasra. Hulda, naŋ a slala nawayaŋ a Zeruzalem. Mizli a ɓakaŋ ɓi ngi buyo, a kiɗ mi na,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hilkiyya e nelaaɓe laamiiɗo njehi haa annabi Hulda, debbo Sallum ɓii Takahat taaniraawo Hasra, aynoowo limce cenaaɗe nder haykaliiru. Annabiijo debbo oo ɗonno jooɗi haa fattude hesre nder Urusaliima. Ɓe ngecci mo haala man.
Fulfulde_DC: Hilkiyya e nelaaɓe laamiiɗo njehi haa annabi Hulda, debbo Sallum ɓii Takahat taaniraawo Hasra, aynoowo limce cenaaɗe nder haykaliiru. Annabiijo debbo oo ɗonno jooɗi haa fattude hesre nder Urusaliima. Ɓe ngecci mo haala man.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Hilkia gú nɛ̀ o wi nɛ̀ wannu hoka so nɛ̀ɛ̀ kpa Hulda okoo-tɔ̧-wen oi nú Sɔ̧, kóò ko Salum wi-pɛm-laa, bem ko Tokehat, bezaŋ Hasra nɛ̀ ɔ so ndɔŋ nú mbe ye Jerusalɛm. Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen'i ha̧ okoo-tɔ̧-wen oi nú Sɔ̧‘i,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Hilkia gú nɛ̀ o wi nɛ̀ wannu hoka so nɛ̀ɛ̀ kpa Hulda okoo-tɔ̧-wen oi nú Sɔ̧, kóò ko Salum wi-pɛm-laa, bem ko Tokehat, bezaŋ Hasra nɛ̀ ɔ so ndɔŋ nú mbe ye Jerusalɛm. Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen'i ha̧ okoo-tɔ̧-wen oi nú Sɔ̧‘i,
Kapsiki_DC: Cape yɛ Hilkiya le kweci mbeli nyi ghwenakɛ meghe kalə sha nde mɛ ŋkwa Həwlda, nya kamale mbe ghedəkwə nya kamɛnɛfɛ mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm. Ma za nta Shaləwm, wəzege ta Tokehat ba'a shinyɛ Hasra ne, te dzeve lekwesa nyi keveyi geva tekeleke mbe ghɛa Shala ve. Pa mbelia shɛhɛ gezete nda ghena shɛ ke nde mɛ ŋkwa.
Tupurri: Hilkiya wo de jar maga wañ hay hoo ra mono, kal wo rawge äiñ Hulda waçy ma ndar nen waçaçre no, waçy Sallum je ni Tekehad no, je ni Hassa je gor ti oçoçben wo no. AÀ hay de tiñ Jerusalem, äi leege ma defay no. AÀ kal wo fer waçaçre ne hen do maga saara hay waçaçn le go nono.

Francais: Lorsqu'ils lui eurent parlé selon leur mission, elle leur dit : "Ainsi dit Yahweh, Dieu d'Israël : Dites à l'homme qui vous a envoyés vers moi : Ainsi dit Yahweh :
Anglais: And she answered them, Thus saith the  Lord  God of Israel, Tell ye the man that sent you to me,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Na' di tisiya: Ma-Vatɗina vi Israyel ka di ala: Nigi ma di tam sa ma cukgi ay katanna ala:
Bulu: A nga jô be na: Avale di nde Nti, Zambe Israél a jô na: Katane môt a te lôme mia be ma na:
Guiziga: joˀ Hulda a ɓa taŋ: «Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ngi Israyel a ɓi na: ara ɓaka mbur mislino kum ng'avi ya vuna ani:
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O jaabi ɓe: “Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo Allah Isra'iila wi'i: Mbi'e gorko nelɗo on:
Fulfulde_DC: O jaabi ɓe: “Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo Allah Isra'iila wi'i: Mbi'e gorko nelɗo on:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: a̧ kifa nú ha̧ wa hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko  Israɛl  tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: ‹Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wi nɛ toma'nɛ́ tɛnɛ sɛn ti'm hee ndé,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: a̧ kifa nú ha̧ wa hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko  Israɛl  tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: ‹Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wi nɛ toma'nɛ́ tɛnɛ sɛn ti'm hee ndé,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Həwlda gezete nda ghena ke hɛ kalə kageze nda ke meghe kala nya:
Tupurri: AÀ kal fer waçaçre ne hara ga: Waçaç do kay nono diñ Manwuri, Baa mani Israyel no, ga: Wii wee blo maga laa nday le see äi mono ga:

Francais: Voici que je vais faire venir des malheurs sur ce lieu et sur ses habitants, toutes les malédictions écrites dans le livre qu'on a lu devant le roi de Juda.
Anglais: Thus saith the  Lord , Behold, I will bring evil upon this place, and upon the inhabitants thereof, even all the curses that are written in the book which they have read before the king of Judah:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni mi va ma Ma-Vatɗina di'e: Nan min hin joot co'o hay liyn tani hiɗi sum sa hayamna kaf, kuɗ be'da kaf ma ka ɗoy hay ɗerwelda kayni, ma jaŋam goy vok mulla vi Yuda.
Bulu: avale di nde Nti a jô na: Ma ye zuu bidim e vôme nyô a e be bôt be too été avalʼane biyoʼé bise bi ne ntilan e kalate ba te lañe njô bôte ya Yuda bi né.
Guiziga: Bumbulvuŋ a ɓi na: I wuɗ i go mendere ng'ar li hana waɗ ng'ar mizli ngi raˀahaya. Nis mutoho gar ar ɗerewol muslufaka a mbuŋ buy Zuda na gar na, i ga gar muduba.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Min Jawmiraawo mi ukkan sarru dow nokkuure nde'e e jooɗiiɓe haa maare, fodde naalooje binndaaɗe nder deftere nde ɓe njaŋngani laamiiɗo Yahuuda.
Fulfulde_DC: Min Jawmiraawo mi ukkan sarru dow nokkuure nde'e e jooɗiiɓe haa maare, fodde naalooje binndaaɗe nder deftere nde ɓe njaŋngani laamiiɗo Yahuuda.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: mi tɛ fo ŋgamɔ pi̧ zu Jerusalɛm gú nɛ̀ o bíí nɛ̀ a̧a̧ hi̧i̧ lɛŋ; mɛ̀ nɛ́ o fom nɛ̀ a̧a̧ zaŋ kalata nɛ̀ wa tɔra ha̧ wannu Juda'i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: mi tɛ fo ŋgamɔ pi̧ zu Jerusalɛm gú nɛ̀ o bíí nɛ̀ a̧a̧ hi̧i̧ lɛŋ; mɛ̀ nɛ́ o fom nɛ̀ a̧a̧ zaŋ kalata nɛ̀ wa tɔra ha̧ wannu Juda'i.
Kapsiki_DC: «Wa nya ghena nya gezeke Mahwətə, Shala ta ka Israyɛl nya: ‹Kateve ndiremi 'ya kadzete Zhɛrəzalɛm le mbeli nyi mbe kala nyi kerafete geva mbe palepa nya jaŋgate nya mbeli te kema ta meghea Zhəwda.
Tupurri: Waçaç do kay nono diñ Manwuri, ga: Ndi joñ nen nduugi de bon ti ngeel sen mo ta' no, ti jar ma äil äen wo no, do maga waçaçre faëgen wo de yerge äil kefder maga aè jañn pel wañ Juda ni mo äuy no.

Francais: Parce qu'ils m'ont abandonné et qu'ils ont offert des parfums à d'autres dieux, de manière à m'irriter par tous les ouvrages de leurs mains, ma colère s'est répandue sur ce lieu, et elle ne s'éteindra point.
Anglais: Because they have forsaken me, and have burned incense unto other gods, that they might provoke me to anger with all the works of their hands; therefore my wrath shall be poured out upon this place, and shall not be quenched.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay nisi noyanawa goyo, kay nisi ŋal urdina tam lawayn mara'a, kay ɓulakan dikanu hiɗi lopna ma nisi lum hiɗi ɓisin kafe, ɦiyda vanu merawa goyo hay liyn tani, na' ma sleɗ gaa'a noŋɗi.
Bulu: Amu be liʼiya ma a diʼi bezambe befe beôlobinda; asu ya bo me na me wôʼôlun a mimboone mise ya mo map, nde ayaa dam é sôébaneya e vôme nyô, a da ye bo teke dim.
Guiziga: Asi a pulikiy le fuku, yo a wuram urdihey le da kulihey, hã gwat ngi gi taŋ gar na, a slikiɗiy mevel. Vurˀe, i zuɓ himaˀ le fõh fõh ng'ar li hana, himaˀ ɗu anta muc mata.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mi waɗan ɗum, ngam ɓe acci yam, ɓe nguli uurle ngam ɗowanteeɓe woɗɓe, haa ɓe tikkinammi bee kuuɗe maɓɓe fuu. Ngam man ukkanmi tikkere am dow nokkuure nde'e, nde feewtataako.
Fulfulde_DC: Mi waɗan ɗum, ngam ɓe acci yam, ɓe nguli uurle ngam ɗowanteeɓe woɗɓe, haa ɓe tikkinammi bee kuuɗe maɓɓe fuu. Ngam man ukkanmi tikkere am dow nokkuure nde'e, nde feewtataako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o be Jerusalɛm ea'm duk, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ ɗafi o géé-sɔ̧, tu̧ nɛ̀ see-am, ha̧ nɛ̀ ɗaŋsee ha̧‘m mbɛt ga, tu̧u̧-see kɔ‘m ɔ dita zu ye'i ɓɛɛ beka kaɗi na.›
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o be Jerusalɛm ea'm duk, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ ɗafi o géé-sɔ̧, tu̧ nɛ̀ see-am, ha̧ nɛ̀ ɗaŋsee ha̧‘m mbɛt ga, tu̧u̧-see kɔ‘m ɔ dita zu ye'i ɓɛɛ beka kaɗi na.›
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe ka Zhɛrəzalɛm keneghakɛ ɗa, nahe hɛ keterekɛ nda 'wərdə kwa hə hə ke kweci shala. Pɛtɛa wəshi nyi menete nyi hɛ kehwepete ɗa wənə. Vatse hwepete wənəa 'ya va meleme nya kwele kwele, kagweɗakwete geva ŋkɛ we.
Tupurri: Werga aà tob wo ndi go, day hay roë wo feçeçre foçoçre no ne baa ma tigriñ wo, nen maga saara mo roë jag jiili me de feçeçre maga saara joñ ra de do äaara mono, tï¡ï¡gi de wañ äin kal dusgi go ti ngeel sen mo ta' no. AÀ kaçaç ge ma hugi go gaè.

Francais: Et vous direz au roi de Juda qui vous a envoyés pour consulter Yahweh: Ainsi dit Yahweh, Dieu d'Israël : Quant aux paroles que tu as entendues,
Anglais: And as for the king of Judah, who sent you to enquire of the  Lord , so shall ye say unto him, Thus saith the  Lord  God of Israel concerning the words which thou hast heard;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May mulla vi Yuda ma cukgi aya kay job Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vi Israyel kay yoboy ma nam humumna, nigi ma di talam ala:
Bulu: Ve mia ye jô njô bôte ya Yuda a te lôme mia mi yemelane nkômbane Nti na: Avale di nde Nti, Zambe Israél a jô ajô ya mejô wo te wôʼô na:
Guiziga: Amma buy Zuda mislino kum nga cufuɗiy na, kisa ɓakaŋ na: Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ngi Israyel a ɓi ani: Ki cine mingiɓi ngir ɗerewol hana le kuy kuy,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamiiɗo Yahuuda nelɗo on ƴamgo Jawmiraawo, mbi'e mo: Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo Allah Isra'iila wi'i: A nani bolle deftere nde'e.
Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo Yahuuda nelɗo on ƴamgo Jawmiraawo, mbi'e mo: Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo Allah Isra'iila wi'i: A nani bolle deftere nde'e.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: War ko wannu Juda nɛ toma'nɛ́ tɛnɛ sɛn ti'm'i, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ a̧‘e: ‹Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko  Israɛl  tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Mɛ zia gba̧a̧-mɔ nɛ̀ yɔra zaŋ kalata'i nɛ̀ de-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: War ko wannu Juda nɛ toma'nɛ́ tɛnɛ sɛn ti'm'i, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ a̧‘e: ‹Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko  Israɛl  tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Mɛ zia gba̧a̧-mɔ nɛ̀ yɔra zaŋ kalata'i nɛ̀ de-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kaŋa meghe le ghəa ŋkɛ nya keghweneke ŋayɛ ka'yɛwe ntsehwele va 'ya ne, wa nya wəsə nya geze nda 'ya, Shala Mahwətə ta ka Israyɛl nya: nahe na kefate ghena nya geze palepa nya.
Tupurri: Ama, nday wii gi wañ Juda maga laa nday le wii ëiggi Manwur ga: Waçaç do kay nono diñ Manwuri, Baa mani Israyel no, ti glog waçaçre maga ndo laan mono ga:

Francais: parce que ton coeur s'est repenti, et que tu t'es humilié devant Dieu en entendant ces paroles contre ce lieu et contre ses habitant; parce que, en t'humiliant devant moi, tu as déchiré tes vêtements et pleuré devant moi, moi aussi je t'ai entendu, oracle de Yahweh;
Anglais: Because thine heart was tender, and thou didst humble thyself before God, when thou heardest his words against this place, and against the inhabitants thereof, and humbledst thyself before me, and didst rend thy clothes, and weep before me; I have even heard thee also, saith the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay tuwaŋ muɗi nari, kay naŋ hot yaŋ gaa'a vok Lawna hay li ma naŋ hum yoboyna vanu ma law kat sumuna vanu, kay naŋ hot yaŋ gaa vok iranu, kay naŋ jet sligara vaŋ goyo, naŋ tiy vok iranu, nan kaw nan humiya, din Ma-Vatɗina.
Bulu: Amu mejô mete ma te bi wo nlem , amu wo te suu womiene si asu Zambe éyoñ wo te wôʼô mejô mé ma wosane vôme nyô a bôt be too été, amu wo te suu womiene si asu dam, amu wo te nyabe mengômesane môé a yôn asu dam, me fe me wôʼôya, nalé Nti a jô.
Guiziga: ka micina mingiɓi ya miɓa vur li hana waɗ vur mizli ngi raˀahaya cin cin na, a wusuw mevele le, hã ki hin hirnga le a mbuŋ ɗu, ya Bumbulvuŋ. Ani ki hin hirnga le a mbuŋ ɗu, ki ngira zana ɗik ngi vu vuhoyo, hã ki tuwuy a mbuŋ ɗu. Naŋ kuy, ya kwana i cinuw di le, i mingiɓi ɗu, ya Bumbulvuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɗum meemi ɓernde ma, a leestini hoore ma yeeso am nde nanɗa bolle am dow Urusaliima e jooɗiiɓe ton. A seeki limce ma, a woyi yeeso am, min boo, mi jaɓi tornde ma, non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɗum meemi ɓernde ma, a leestini hoore ma yeeso am nde nanɗa bolle am dow Urusaliima e jooɗiiɓe ton. A seeki limce ma, a woyi yeeso am, min boo, mi jaɓi tornde ma, non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɛ iŋa mɔ n'am kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de in Jerusalɛm gú nɛ̀ o bíí saaye mbɛt; mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ mɛ dee ko nɛ̀ tɛ-mɛ hi̧i̧ nɛ̀ kɔ̧a̧ ti'm. Mɔ‘i nɛ̀ mɛ dea'i yee tɛ‘m, mi GASA WAN;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɛ iŋa mɔ n'am kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de in Jerusalɛm gú nɛ̀ o bíí saaye mbɛt; mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ mɛ dee ko nɛ̀ tɛ-mɛ hi̧i̧ nɛ̀ kɔ̧a̧ ti'm. Mɔ‘i nɛ̀ mɛ dea'i yee tɛ‘m, mi GASA WAN;
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe na keveyite sleme yitea wəsə nya gezete 'ya te yɛ Zhɛrəzalɛm le mbeli nyi mbe. Nahe na kempiyi dzeve, pa na ɗepete fete ta ŋa kwa kema ta ɗa, pa na ŋkwahemte lekwesa ta ŋa ba'a kanehweneyi nehwene sərəɓə sərəɓə. 'Ya perə, nahe 'ya kefate, 'ya Mahwətə nde gezete.
Tupurri: Diñ wer maga waçaçre sen du' ndo jag jiili, day ndo kal fer ti see äo gesiñ pel Baa, ti maga ndo laa waçaçre ti ngeel sen mo ta' de jar ma äil äen wo, diñ wer maga ndo ngar oçoçbe ma ti äon wo go, day ndo kal rage pel äi, patala ndi lay, ndi laa we, kay diñ jag Manwuri.

Francais: Voici que je te recueillerai auprès de tes pères, tu seras recueilli en paix dans ton sépulcre, et tes yeux ne verront pas tous les malheurs que je ferai venir sur ce lieu et sur ses habitants." Ils rapportèrent au roi cette réponse.
Anglais: Behold, I will gather thee to thy fathers, and thou shalt be gathered to thy grave in peace, neither shall thine eyes see all the evil that I will bring upon this place, and upon the inhabitants of the same. So they brought the king word again.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nan ma paŋ gaa'a kat sumiyaŋu, nisi ma paŋ hiɗi sle'ta hay zulla vaŋ mara kep, joota kaf ta nan min hina' ma'a kay liyn tani hiɗi sum sa hayamna kaf iraŋ ma wa'ɗi. Nisi tuɗ hot dita na'ta tam mulla.
Bulu: Ma ye nyoñe wo e vôme bʼésoo be né, wo ye nyoñebane mvoʼé e soñe jia ya mesoñe môé, a mise môé ma ye bo te yene bidime bise ma ye zuu bie vôme nyô a bôt be too été. Nde be nga ke kate njô bôt éyalane te.
Guiziga: Ani i wuɗ i sa ga ɓa kisa mucu, kisa muc ti zuy. Bonoy ya mawuɗ i ga da li hana waɗ da mizli ngi raˀahay na, ko k'anta sa pura ta.» Dar misliney ara mbiɗaka ɓi nah da buyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mi accete a maaya nder hayru. Ɓe mballinte nder yenaande ma bilaa yi'ugo sarru ngu ukkanmi Urusaliima e jooɗiiɓe ton.” Nelaaɓe ngartirani laamiiɗo jaawaabu man.
Fulfulde_DC: Mi accete a maaya nder hayru. Ɓe mballinte nder yenaande ma bilaa yi'ugo sarru ngu ukkanmi Urusaliima e jooɗiiɓe ton.” Nelaaɓe ngartirani laamiiɗo jaawaabu man.
